See where the kings of Spain once lived on this guided tour of the Royal Palace, which provides insightful commentary into the history and significance of this must-see Madrid attraction.
events.name: Royal Palace of Madrid 1.5-Hour Guided Tour Optional Prado Museum Combo

events.description: See all of Barcelona’s legendary landmarks on a half-day electric bike tour of the city. Explore the captivating Catalonian capital at a leisurely pace on your state-of-the-art electric bicycle. Cycle around the iconic Olympic Stadium, gaze at panoramic vistas of the city from a cable car, and then sail the sea in an eco-friendly catamaran on a short cruise. Immerse yourself in the modern magnificence of Gaudi sites like La Pedrera and Casa Batllo and enjoy an intimate atmosphere on this small-group tour, limited to 12.
events.name: Ebike Tour with Cable Car Ride and Goleta Boat Barcelona Premium Small Group

events.description: Cruise across the Strait of Gibraltar and spend the day on Moroccan shores on this full-day tour from Gibraltar. Explore the coastal resort of Tangier on a guided walking tour, ride a camel along the beach, and shop for souvenirs in the souks and bazaars. Lunch and round-trip transport is included.
events.name: Full-Day Tangier, Morocco Tour from Gibraltar

events.description: Set sail around Tenerife’s southwest coast on this half-day cruise and travel aboard a luxury catamaran with just 12 passengers on-board. Look out for whales, dolphins, and sea turtles as you cruise along the coast; dive in to swim and snorkel, and tuck into a selection of Spanish tapas, accompanied by beer, cava, or soft drinks.
events.name: Whales and Dolphins Watching 12 person Luxury Catamaran, Free Meal & Transfers

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/17972P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer from Barcelona El- Prat Airport

events.description: Explore the colorful urban attractions of Barcelona and the mythical mountain of Montserrat on this private, full-day tour. See the city's most famous landmarks, including Las Ramblas, Port Olympic and Plaza Espanya, plus iconic Modernist buildings like Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Cathedral and the Casa Mila. Then, journey outside the city center to ascend the ‘Magic Mountain’ of Montserrat, known for its Benedictine monastery and important place within Arthurian legend. Price is per group, based on a maximum of 7 adults per vehicle.
events.name: Private Tour Barcelona and Montserrat 8 hours

events.description: Experience the unique flavor and culture of the Spanish capital on a history and tapas walking tour in Madrid, including dinner. Stroll through the atmospheric streets of the old city center while your guide illuminates the many-layered history of sights like Plaza Mayor and the Royal Palace. Along the way, stop at several authentic tapas bars, to feast like a local on an array of traditional appetizer-sized dishes paired with Spanish wine, sangria, and typical liquors.
events.name: Madrid Historical Walking Tour with Food Tasting and Dinner

events.description: The Atlantic waters of Tenerife’s Costa Adeje are home to five different species of dolphins, including bottlenose, striped, and common dolphins. On this tour, paddle around the beaches and bays on a sea kayak, enjoy spectacular ocean views, and have the chance to cruise among pods of wild dolphins in their natural environment.
events.name: Kayaking With Dolphins and snorkeling With Turtles

events.description: Sail into the Port of Mortil and set out to explore one of Granada’s most alluring attractions with a skip-the-line shore excursion to the Alhambra palace complex. Enjoy luxurious transportation and a knowledgeable guide as you wander the opulent chambers and pristine palaces of the complex. Sail past the long lines of the entrance hall with a priority access pass and visit historical highlights like the Nasrid Palaces and the Generalife Gardens.
events.name: Motril Shore Excursion: Skip-the-Line Alhambra and Generalife Gardens Day Trip

events.description: Take a break from bustling Barcelona to experience the serenity of Montserrat, a sacred mountain just an hour’s drive from the city. Learn about the history an ancient legends that surround the mount while traveling in a comfortable bus, and arrive early to beat the lines to enter the Benedictine monastery near the top. Here, see the famous Black Madonna statue, view paintings by Modernist masters at an on-site museum, and browse Spanish goods at vendor stalls, all in a peaceful natural setting.
events.name: Early Access Montserrat Experience - Half Day Guided Tour from Barcelona

events.description: Enhance your experience of Barcelona’s majestic surrounding sights on a full-day tour of Montserrat and Sitges from the Catalonian capital. Alongside an expert guide, marvel at the distinctive ridges of the Montserrat mountain and absorb the sacred ambience of the holy Monastery, home to the revered Black Virgin statue. Ascend to the mountain’s summit in a cable car to enjoy panoramic vistas; explore the quaint fishing town of Sitges on a guided walking tour; and sample Mediterranean delicacies in a traditional Spanish restaurant.
events.name: Montserrat and Sitges Easy Hike with Hotel Pickup from Barcelona

events.description: Discover the best of Spain and Portugal on a 1-week adventure. Visit the cities of Madrid, Zaragoza, Barcelona, Valencia, Alicante, Granada, Malaga, Seville, Lisbon, and Toledo during the week. Discover famous monuments such as the Royal Palace, Sagrada Familia, La Rambla, Alhambra, Plaza de Espana, the Alcazar of Seville, the Jeronimos Monastery, Belem Tower, and much more as you learn about the history and culture of each place.
events.name: 7-Day European tour exploring best of Spain and Portugal

events.description: Explore the southern port city of Malaga on a hop-on hop-off City Sightseeing tour. Hop aboard a double decker bus and pass top attractions, including the Playa de la Malagueta, Plaza de Toros, and the Malaga Cathedral, known for its mysteriously unfinished south tower. Hop off to explore as many times as you like within 24 hours, and then rejoin the route at one of 14 stops evenly distributed throughout Malaga. Upgrade to include a guided walking tour with your ticket.
events.name: City Sightseeing Malaga Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/117812P3/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: La Rioja Explore Tour

events.description: Take a detour from Seville to explore another Andalusian gem on this full-day tour to Granada. Take a guided walking tour of the World Heritage-listed Albaycin Moorish quarter and the legendary gypsy caves of Sacromonte. Enjoy skip-the-line access to the famed Islamic palaces of the Alhambra, and learn about Granada’s fascinating multilayered history. Enjoy leisure time for lunch, and admire the scenic Spanish countryside on the drive to and from Seville.
events.name: Granada Day Trip from Seville with Skip-the-line Alhambra Access

events.description: Escape the crowds and maximize your time in Granada’s magnificent the Alhambra on this tour. With a priority-access pass, you’ll be one of the first to enter the Alhambra — a UNESCO-listed landmark famed for its architecture — with a guide. Explore the Alcazaba Fortress, walk through the Generalife Gardens and take in panoramic views of Granada from Torre de la Vela.
events.name: Priority Access to Alhambra and Generalife Gardens in Granada

events.description: Treat your taste buds to this 3.5-hour walking tapas tour of Madrid! Gain insight into the cherished Spanish culinary tradition from your local guide as you visit four or five eateries around the city on a lunch or dinner tour. Sample authentic tapas like Iberian ham, locally produced cheeses and paella, accompanied by regional wine or beer at each stop. All tapas and drinks are included, so be sure to bring your walking shoes and your appetite!
events.name: Madrid Food Tour - Spanish Local Gastronomy & History 3-course Lunch or Dinner

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/104043P8/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private tour to Toledo from Madrid with licensed guide and private driver

events.description: Enjoy the sunrise over Toledo or Segovia on this 1-hour hot air balloon flight. See sites such as the Alcazar of Toledo, once a 3rd-century Roman Palace; the Tagus, the longest river on the Iberian Peninsula; and the Aqueduct of Segovia, one of the area's best-preserved ancient monuments. Then celebrate with a glass of Spanish Cava and brunch after the flight. Upgrade your ticket to include hotel pickup and drop-off from your Madrid hotel.
events.name: Hot Air Balloon Flight Over Segovia or Toledo with Optional Transport from Madrid

events.description: Sample the best of Spain’s atmospheric southern cities during this 5-day, 4-night exploration of Andalusia. See some of the country’s most iconic attractions in world-famous cities like Seville, Granada and Toledo. Then get a sense for the local Andalusian flavor and fascinating history of charming towns like Ronda and Córdoba, before enjoying some time in Mediterranean-style Marbella. A guide, coach transport, 4 nights’ accommodations, some meals and site admission tickets are all covered.
events.name: 5-day Guided Tour in Andalusia from Madrid via Cordoba

events.description: Beat the crowds with this tour of the Royal Palace of Madrid before public opening hours. Breeze in and follow your guide through parts of the "Palacio de Oriente" that most visitors don't get to see. Marvel at the collection of weapons in the Royal Armory, take in the Throne Room, and more. Along the way, learn about the history of the Spanish royal family through your guide's engaging narrative.
events.name: Early Access to Royal Palace of Madrid

events.description: Visit Seville’s most notable monuments with ease on this guided walking tour. Accompanied by a guide, visit the Alcazar of Seville and learn about the palace’s history. Stroll the winding streets of Santa Cruz and the Old Jewish Quarter. Stop at the Seville Cathedral and climb to the top to take in the sweeping views over the city.
events.name: Alcazar and Cathedral Tour

events.description: Enjoy the sights and shopping of Gibraltar on this full-day trip from the Costa del Sol. Travel to the famous British territory by air-conditioned coach, and discover its main attractions, including the legendary Rock of Gibraltar, on a sightseeing tour. Head inside St Michael’s Cave, meet the cheeky Barbary monkeys and visit Europa Point, where a lighthouse marks the gateway of the Atlantic and Mediterranean. Plus, get free time to enjoy Gibraltar’s British atmosphere and high-street stores, fashion chains and duty-free outlets — all perfect for a dose of great-value shopping.
events.name: Gibraltar Sightseeing Day Trip from Costa del Sol

events.description: La Sagrada Familia is indisputably Barcelona’s most iconic landmark. Make the most of your time at Gaudi’s modernist masterpiece on a 1.5-hour guided tour of the cathedral’s interior. Alongside your guide, you’ll admire the elaborate detail of the facades and learn about the religious symbolism of the interior.
events.name: La Sagrada Familia Guided Tour

events.description: Experience the Ribera del Duero wine region with a small group of just seven people or fewer, which means personalized attention and an intimate atmosphere. This full-day tour from Madrid includes tastings of two to three premium wines per winery visit, a gourmet 3-course meal, and visits to three fantastic wineries. Round-trip transportation in a luxury minivan with hotel pickup in central Madrid for a truly memorable day during your stay in Spain.
events.name: Premium Ribera del Duero wine tour with lunch & hotel pick-up

events.description: Rewind to old-time Andalusia on a Jerez and Cádiz day trip from Seville. With an expert guide, explore palm-lined Jerez, known for its sherry and equestrianism. Visit a bodega to learn about and sample local sherry, and watch a dazzling performance of dressage and other equestrian skills by the riders and stallions of the iconic Royal Andalusian School of Equestrian Art. Lastly, take a ferry to Cádiz and enjoy free time before admiring the medieval center and rooftop views from the ‘camera obscura’ (dark room) at the Tower Tavira.
events.name: Jerez and Cádiz Day Trip from Seville Including Sherry Tasting, Andalusian Horse Show and Ferry Ride

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/183204P2/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Tickets for Sagrada Familia: Fast Track（Audio Guide）

events.description: Visit Girona and the Costa Brava on a full-day tour from Barcelona with a private guide. Enjoy the flexibility of a private tour to customize the day to your interests as you explore the medieval towns of Girona and Pals on guided walking tours, pause in a picture-perfect Costa Brava village, and explore beaches, coves, and cliffs. This 10-hour tour includes pickup and drop-off at your hotel in Barcelona.
events.name: Private Girona and Costa Brava Tour with Hotel pick-up from Barcelona

events.description: Feel like Moorish royalty during this 12-hour visit to Granada, and see its magnificent UNESCO World Heritage-listed Alhambra palace. Wander through the elaborate Islamic-style architecture of this palace and one-time fortress dating back to the 9th century, stopping for an in-depth look at its Palacio de Generalife, Alcazaba, Patio de la Acequia, and Jardín de la Sultana. You’ll also learn about this iconic complex’s history and fate following its recapture by Spanish forces in the 15th century. A guide, entrance fees, and round-trip hotel transport are all included.
events.name: Alhambra of Granada (Skip-the-line) Full Day Trip from Seville

events.description: Stand in awe beneath the looming Mt Teide volcano and explore the lava-sculpted landscapes of the UNESCO-listed Mt Teide National Park on this 6-hour tour. Choose from two different itineraries depending on your pick-up point: those arriving from south Tenerife will stop off at the unique rock formations of Cañadas del Teide and Los Roques de García; while the northern route passes through the serene La Orotava Valley. For the ultimate panoramic view, opt for a thrilling cable car ride up Mt Teide, the highest mountain in Spain.
events.name: Teide National Park Tour Including Transfers and Cable Car or Observatory Tickets

events.description: Escape the city streets of Barcelona with a private guided tour of Montserrat. Tour the monastery and learn about its legendary Black Madonna. Take in stunning views and visit a museum with works by Picasso, Dalí, Monet, and other renowned artists. Enjoy a 3-course meal with cava before heading to a small family-owned winery. Sample delicious wines and learn about regional wine production before your tour concludes.
events.name: Private Full Day Tour: Montserrat & Organic Winery Plus Lunch

events.description: Discover the tradition of pintxos (Basque tapas) during this small-group food tour in San Sebastian. See the city through a local’s lens and visit six pintxos bars meeting the families behind them along the way. Taste a variety of snacks and Spanish wine as you stroll through San Sebastian in a group limited to just eight people.
events.name: Ultimate San Sebastian Pintxos & Wine Tour (Evening)

events.description: Discover the postcard star of Seville with a guided tour of the Seville Cathedral and the Giralda Tower. Learn how the UNESCO-listed Seville Cathedral is the world’s biggest cathedral as you follow your guide around the Gothic marvel and visit the tomb of Christopher Columbus. Then, enjoy skip-the-line access to the Giralda Tower and take in spectacular panoramic views of the city.
events.name: Seville Cathedral and Giralda Tower Guided Tour

events.description: Swim, snorkel, look for sea life, and call at Lanzarote and Los Lobos Island on this glass bottom catamaran trip from Fuerteventura. As you cruise, watch fish through the underwater windows, and scan the seas for dolphins. Visit the nature reserve of Los Lobos to explore, swim, or snorkel. Includes onboard lunch and drink, plus pickup from selected Fuerteventura hotels and resorts.
events.name: Fuerteventura, Lanzarote, and Los Lobos Glass Bottom Catamaran Cruise with Lunch

events.description: Don’t waste time waiting to enter the UNESCO-listed Alcazar of Seville, book a guided tour of the majestic monument that includes skip-the-line entry. After sailing past long lines, you’ll head straight inside the Alcazar of Seville and see opulent features like Lion Gate and Courtyard of the Dolls. Behold architectural evidence of decadent Moorish rulers and absorb the botanical beauty of the gardens, replete with distinctive water features and exotic plants, while listening to history-rich commentary from your guide.
events.name: Skip the line: Alcazar Guided Tour in Seville

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/65531P7/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Cala Comte and Cala Bassa Beach Hopping Cruise, Paddle Surf-Snorkel-Drinks- FYB

events.description: Sail the Atlantic Ocean in search of whales and dolphins in style during a luxury motorboat cruise—the obvious choice for travelers seeking an extra-special experience. In an intimate group limited to seven passengers, you’ll travel to secluded bays and maximize your chances of spotting elusive whales and dolphins with the help of your skipper. Plus, a choice of departure times are available and stress-free hotel pickup and drop-off are included.
events.name: Luxury motor boat cruise with whale and dolphin watching

events.description: Explore central Spain beyond Madrid even with just a day to spare on this combo tour of three UNESCO World Heritage Sites. Take a walking tour of Ávila’s medieval cathedral and city walls, see the remarkable Roman aqueduct and Moorish Alcazar of Segovia, and marvel at the royal scale of the El Escorial palace and monastery. It's an easy and affordable way to see all three sites without planning a thing.
events.name: Avila, Segovia and El Escorial Day Tour from Madrid

events.description: Delve into FC Barcelona's history on a 1.5-hour independent tour of Camp Nou stadium. Sail past the long entrance lines with your priority-access ticket and follow in the footsteps of football (soccer) legends from past and present. Visit the changing room, pitch, presidential box, and press room, then head to the FC Barcelona Museum, where you'll find the club’s gleaming trophy collection and interactive exhibits.
events.name: Camp Nou - F.C.Barcelona Open Date Ticket

events.description: Eliminate the stress of making your own way to and from Barcelona El Prat Airport with a cost-effective and convenient private round-trip airport transfer. On arrival, greet your courteous driver in the arrivals lounge and travel in comfortable and style to your Barcelona accommodation. When your time in the Catalonian capital comes to an end, climb aboard your comfortable, air-conditioned vehicle at your hotel and travel to the airport well in advance of your departure flight.
events.name: Round Trip Private Transfer: Barcelona El-Prat Airport to Hotel

events.description: Treat yourself to a night of fiery Catalan flamenco at Barcelona City Hall, in the city's former historic theater. Featuring some of the most talented dancers on the local scene, the show strips the flamenco back to its authentic roots with punchy guitar solos, face-to-face duels, and singing. Choose your seating area, show time, and included drink option when you book online.
events.name: Flamenco Show at THEATRE Barcelona City Hall

events.description: If you only have time for one day trip from Barcelona, the mountaintop monastery of Montserrat is a must, but many tours only offer a whistle-stop visit. This private full-day tour from Barcelona offers ample time to explore Montserrat and hear the famous choir, followed by a cava tasting tour of the Penedes wine region. Hotel pickup and drop-off are included.
events.name: Private Montserrat and Penedès Full-Day Tour with Hotel Pick Up from Barcelona

events.description: Discover two top Barcelona sites on this 8-hour day trip to Colonia Güell and Montserrat. Stop by Colonia Güell, one of the more intriguing projects of celebrated architect Antoni Gaudí. Then board the rack railway for a ride to the alpine retreat of Montserrat, where you'll take in sublime views and see the Benedictine monastery. This partially guided excursion also includes free time to wander the two sites at your own pace.
events.name: Barcelona Day Trip: Montserrat, Colonia Guell, and Gaudi Crypt

events.description: The tiny British colony of Gibraltar juts out from Spain’s southern coast, facing out toward Africa. On this convenient tour, time-tight visitors can tick off the major landmarks and learn about local history. Accompanied by a guide, travel to the Rock of Gibraltar. Visit the southernmost point of the rock, see wild monkeys, and view St. Michael’s Cave. For some extra insight into Gibraltar’s past, upgrade to include a guided tour of the World War II tunnels.
events.name: Gibraltar Rock Tour

events.description: If you’re searching for marine life, you can always go whale watching, but this Mogán submarine tour takes you under the Atlantic Ocean to see awesome ocean life. The submarine features large windows for viewing a a TV screen at each seat, so you can watch footage of your sub diving down and resurfacing afterward. Plus, if you’d like you can choose free pickup when booking.
events.name: 40-minute Submarine Tour in Mogán

events.description: Get a taste of authentic Spanish culture during this Paella cooking class in Valencia, the birthplace of the famous rice dish. Shop for ingredients at the Central Market alongside your guide and group, and then head to the kitchen to learn how to turn simple ingredients into a delicious meal with deep cultural roots. This tour includes all instruction, ingredients, food, and drinks during the class.
events.name: Valencia Paella Cooking Class with Mercado Central Visit

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92439P24/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Barcelona Airport Transfer to Barcelona CITY (any Hotel or destination)

events.description: Maximize you time in Madrid by visiting the UNESCO-listed wonders of nearby Avila and Segovia on this tour including tapa or lunch. Following a scenic drive in an air-conditioned coach, you’ll embark on a walking tour of Avila: tick off top attractions including the medieval Walls of Avila, Avila Plaza Mayor, and Avila Cathedral. In Segovia, opt to enjoy tapa. or a standard or gourmet lunch option before exploring the narrow streets and discovering Gothic Segovia Cathedral on a walking tour. Hotel pickup and drop-off in Madrid are included.
events.name: Avila and Segovia Guided Tour with Lunch Upgrade

events.description: Cruise alongside pods of splashing wild dolphins on this 75-minute water safari in the Strait of Gibraltar. Get an up-close encounter with these playful marine mammals on specially designed viewing boats as an experienced crew navigates the waters of the iconic strait. In addition to dolphins, take in magnificent views of Morocco, Spain and the Rock of Gibraltar.
events.name: Dolphin Watching Excursion in Gibraltar With Optional Top of The Rock Cable Car Ticket

events.description: Tantalize your taste buds with traditional Basque cuisine on a ‘pintxos’ (Basque tapas) tour of San Sebastiàn. Explore the winding streets of the atmospheric Old Town with a gastronomic guide and discover local haunts that serve the best pintxos in town. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of six exquisite eateries and sample styles ranging from classic to contemporary. Sip cider and fine wines designed to compliment each dish and enjoy the intimate atmosphere of this small-group tour, on which numbers are limited to 10 people.
events.name: San Sebastian Evening Pintxo Tour with Wine

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/170867P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Barcelona Hot-air Balloon Experience with a rich Catalonian breakfast

events.description: If you’re visiting Barcelona for the first time, orient yourself among the city’s top landmarks on a sightseeing tour by luxury, open-top minivan. Receive personalized attention in a small group limited to 15 and save hours of waiting in line with skip-the-line admission tickets to Park Guell and La Sagrada Familia, where lines often exceed two hours. Plus, traveling with a guide means you skip the hassle of navigating public transport.
events.name: Gaudí Art Works Tour on Luxury Minibus - Premium Small Group

events.description: Beat the crowds, and get early access to Park Güell in Barcelona. Explore the stunning creations of Antoni Gaudí before the park gets too packed with people. Spend time marveling at the Hall of Columns, a mosaic lizard statue, beautifully planned viaducts and porticoes, and storybook-like gatehouses.
events.name: Fast Track Access to Park Guell

events.description: Flamenco dancing is undoubtedly the most famous of Spain’s cultural expressions, making a performance a must-see during your vacation. Secure your ticket to an often sold-out show by booking a seat at El Palacio Andaluz, one of the oldest dance halls in Seville, in advance. Depending on your budget, you can choose from options that include a drink and a traditional tapas dinner.
events.name: Flamenco Show at El Palacio Andaluz Admission Ticket

events.description: No visit to Andalucia is complete without seeing a flamenco show, an art form that’s recognized as an Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO. Guarantee your ticket to a performance at the prestigious Tablao Flamenco los Amaya by booking your experience in advance, and choose from an early or late evening start time to suit your schedule.
events.name: LIVE FLAMENCO SHOW IN MÁLAGA - TABLAO FLAMENCO LOS AMAYAS

events.description: On this 12-hour excursion to La Gomera — an idyllic Canary island — from Tenerife, you’ll get acquainted with local culture and admire spectacular sights with a guide. Travel with ease to and through the island, and explore Garajonay National Park, El Cedro forest and the island’s capital, San Sebastian. Lunch, a boat ride and round-trip hotel transport are included.
events.name: La Gomera Day Trip from Tenerife with Lunch in Abrante

events.description: Skip the long lines at Seville’s top two must-see monuments on a guided tour of the Royal Alcazar and the Seville Cathedral. Tickets can sell out during peak times, so guarantee your entrance to Europe's oldest royal palace and the largest Gothic cathedral in the world. Learn the fascinating history behind both places as a guide lead you to hidden treasures and highlights, including the burial site of Christopher Columbus.
events.name: Alcazar and Cathedral of Seville Tour (Tickets included & Skip the line)

events.description: Admire some of Europe’s greatest artworks at leisure with admission to the Prado Museum in Madrid. Spain’s leading art museum, the Prado houses an acclaimed European art collection dating from the1300s to the 1900s. Walk through the halls to view masterpieces by Titian, Bosch, Rubens, Velázquez, Goya, and others, including Velázquez’s ‘Les Meninas’ and Bosch’s ‘The Garden of Earthly Delights.’ Choose a regular or mobile ticket for the day of your choosing.
events.name: Madrid Prado Museum Entrance Ticket

events.description: Succumb to tranquility at Granada’s Hammam Al Ándalus, opulent Arabian baths located in the heart of the historical Old Town. Enjoy relaxing amid candle-lit walkways and beautifully designed pools; then indulge with a massage from a professionally trained masseuse. Submerge yourself in the soothing waters of a thermal bath and inhale the scented aromas of the steam room while sipping fresh mint tea. Upgrade your experience to include a 30-minute Midra 30 or 45-minute Midra 45, both of which include an exfoliating body scrub.
events.name: Arabian Baths Experience at Granada's Hammam Al Ándalus

events.description: When your cruise ship docks in Mallorca’s captivating capital, gain cultural insight into the picturesque villages of Valldemossa and Palma de Mallorca on a private 6-hour shore excursion. Admire spectacular seaside scenery; explore the charming streets of Valldemossa; and gaze at the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Sierra de Tamuntana Mountain Range. Absorb panoramic vistas of Palma at the stolid Bellver Castle and see all of the city’s spectacular sights on a guided walking tour, visiting the Cathedral of Santa Maria and the old fish market.
events.name: Private Shore Excursion to Valldemossa and Palma de Mallorca

events.description: Explore Barcelona and two of its most famous pieces of architecture on this private 4-hour walking tour. Your guide will lead you through Antoni Gaudi’s famous works – La Pedrera and Casa Batllo, before heading to the historic alleyways of the Gothic Quarter and to Las Ramblas and Plaza Cataluña.
events.name: Barcelona Private Walking Tour with Skip the Line La Pedrera and Casa Batllo

events.description: Take private Barcelona tour with this easily-customized, half-day excursion led by an expert guide. Pick the time of day and Barcelona sights that you find most interesting, as your guide helps arrange a personalized experience based on your request. Move easily through the city via vehicle and by walking with your guide. During your visit you may stop by such iconic sites as Antoni Gaudí's Sagrada Familia cathedral, ancient Gothic quarter or the gorgeous hill-top attraction of Montjuic - it's up to you. This private tour of Barcelona also includes round-trip transportation from your hotel.
events.name: Private Tour: Barcelona Half-Day Sightseeing Tour

events.description: When your cruise ship sails in the port of Malaga, set out to explore the cultural majesty of Granada on a full-day shore excursion. Accompanied by an accomplished guide, immerse yourself in the regal extravagance of the Alhambra palace complex on a guided tour. Sail past the long lines at the crowded entrance hall with a priority access pass and immediately begin exploring vast courtyards, winding walkways and richly decorated chambers. Admire the architectural amalgamations inspired by Moorish and colonial styles then absorb the botanical beauty of the Generalife Gardens. An intimate experience is ensured with numbers limited to 18 people.
events.name: Malaga to Granada Shore Excursion: guided tour + skip-the-line @ Alhambra Palace

events.description: The Alcazar of Seville is a Seville icon and UNESCO World Heritage site renowned for its stunning architecture and storied past. This guided tour of the fortified palace helps you get the most out of your visit: learn about its origin, motifs, and modern-day significance as you walk through the halls and gardens with a guide.
events.name: Full Tour with tickets in Alcazar of Seville

events.description: Learn to prepare some of the classic dishes of Spain and Catalonia during a half-day cooking class in Barcelona. Your cooking class can start with a market tour and takes place with a professional chef who teaches you to prepare favorites such as seafood paella. Learn the history of tapas, sample a variety of tapas, and enjoy the delicious lunch that you helped to create, accompanied by unlimited wine, beer, or soft drinks. Upgrade to begin with a fascinating tour of La Boqueria, one of Spain’s most important food markets.
events.name: Mediterranean Cooking Class in Barcelona

events.description: Explore the Spanish region of Galicia and Portugal during this immersive 8-day tour. Visit cities such as Santiago de Compostela, Vigo, Porto, Coimbra, Fatima, and Lisbon and learn about the history of each one. See famous landmarks like the Spanish Fjords, Santa Clara Church, the port wine cellars, the ancient University of Coimbra, the Jeronimos Monastery and much more. Sample the gastronomy and absorb the local culture throughout the tour.
events.name: 8 Days Guided Tour from Santiago to Lisbon

events.description: See the medieval city of Segovia from above on a hot-air balloon adventure. After a convenient hotel pickup, soar through the sky and snap photos of Segovia’s historic aqueduct, cathedral, and alcázar. Learn about the UNESCO World Heritage Site’s rich history and architecture from your pilot. Enjoy a delicious brunch, glass of sparkling cava, flight certificate, and souvenir photo included in the tour price.
events.name: Hot-Air Balloon Ride over Segovia with Optional Transport from Madrid

events.description: Journey inside the mind of Salvador Dalí during this intimate 10-hour exploration of the life and preferred haunts of this famous surrealist. Explore the early days of Dalí in Figueres, the artist’s birthplace, which is now home to his eponymous museum. Enjoy the charming scenery of Cadaqués, a small coastal village along the Costa Brava. Continue your trip in Port Lligat, a tiny fishing cove that was once Dalí’s preferred residence and studio. A guide and round-trip transport are included.
events.name: Dali Museum, Figueres and Cadaqués Small Group Tour with Hotel pick-up

events.description: Experience the culture and cuisine of Barcelona on this electric bike, tapas, and wine tour. Follow your knowledgeable guide through the atmospheric streets of the Catalonia's capital in search of landmarks such as the El Born Cultural Centre and Frank Gehry’s Golden Fish sculpture. Absorb the botanical beauty of Parc de la Ciutadella, and admire the picturesque charm of La Barceloneta port. Appease an appetite for authenticity by visiting a local bar to feast on up to four tapas dishes and three drinks in a convivial atmosphere.
events.name: Barcelona Electric Bike Small Group Tour with Tapas and Wine Tasting

events.description: This private Barcelona tour helps you discover many of the city’s most popular attractions in one day. After a hotel pickup, you’ll travel with a guide and enjoy commentary about the secrets and history of Barcelona. Save time waiting in long lines with skip-the-line access to Gaudi’s popular attractions—Park Güell and Sagrada Familia (extra cost.) You’ll climb Montjuïc hill for incredible views, explore the Old Town on foot, and much more.
events.name: Private Full-Day Barcelona Tour: Park Güell & Sagrada Familia with Hotel pick-up

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/2512P38/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Half day Trip to Montserrat - Easy Montserrat

events.description: Barcelona is a wildly popular tourist destination, so it can be tough to enjoy the city's top sights without fighting for tickets, and waiting in long lines. Fortunately, with this small-group guided tour, you can see the top attractions in Barcelona—from Gaudi's famous buildings to the hilltop vistas from Montjuic—with skip-the-line admission to Park Guell, included. With a guide to lead the way and hotel pickup provided, you can avoid the hassles, and truly enjoy this beautiful city.
events.name: Skip 2 Lines: Barcelona city tour, small-group, with pickup at hotels and port

events.description: Go off-roading in the Canary Islands on an exciting buggy trip through a landscape of volcanos, valleys, and sea cliffs, then open up the throttle to roar down white sand beaches. You’ll see coastal villages and traditional Canary Island architecture along the way, with time to stop for lunch at a local restaurant. This four-wheeling experience includes pickup and drop-off at select Fuerteventura hotels, with the self-drive options that range from one to six people..
events.name: Dune Buggy Fuerteventura Off-Road Excursions

events.description: Uncover the stirring landscapes of Mallorca’s west coast on this full-day tour. Following pickup from your hotel or the cruise port, travel by coach to the UNESCO-listed Serra de Tramuntana mountain range, whose formidable limestone peaks tower over the coastline. Follow the winding roads to La Calobra, where you’ll catch a boat to the coastal village of Port Soller. After free time to do as much or as little as you want, take the tram to Soller before capping your tour with a ride through Soller Valley aboard a vintage train.
events.name: Mallorca in One Day Sightseeing Tour with Boat Ride and Vintage Train

events.description: Discover Spanish history on a guided half-day visit from Madrid to the monastery of El Escorial and the Valley of the Fallen monument. Accompanied by a guide, delve into the history of the religious El Escorial complex and discover why it was considered the eighth wonder of the world. Then see the sculptures at the Valley of the Fallen monument built to honor those who died during the Spanish Civil War.
events.name: El Escorial Monastery and the Valley of the Fallen from Madrid

events.description: Maximize time in Spain with a day trip to Granada from Seville. Travel through Andalusian olive groves to reach Granada and skip-the-line at the city’s most popular landmark, the Alhambra. Relax over a lunch of tapas in the Albaycin neighborhood and explore Granada on foot with a guide leading the way to see markets and mountain views.
events.name: Granada Day Trip from Seville

events.description: Rather than just eating paella, learn the secrets behind Spain’s most famous dish so that you can recreate at home during a cooking class led by a Michelin-starred chef. The perfect choice for food lovers and first-time visitors, this experience provides an introduction to Barcelona’s culinary heritage and culminates with a 5-course meal accompanied by wine and cava.
events.name: Paella Cooking Experience with Professional Chef and Bottomless Wine

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/8647P300/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Official Guide to Visit Alhambra in Granada from Malaga-Group Option

events.description: Sail past long lines and crowded entrance halls on a private tour of Granada’s Alhambra Palace. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, explore the majestic UNESCO World Heritage Site while enjoying priority access and insightful commentary. See historical highlights like the Alcazaba Fortress and the Nasrid Palaces, then stroll amid the botanical beauty of the Generalife Gardens. Select the option of hotel pickup and drop-off to enjoy convenient round-trip transportation.
events.name: Private Tour: Alhambra and Generalife Gardens, Nasrid Palaces, Skip the line.

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/178636P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Wine, Food and the Valencian countryside!

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/67243P16/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Small Group Guided Tour of Tangier (DIRECT from Málaga, no stops)

events.description: Benefit from personalized attention and the ability to ask questions at during this private tour of the Prado museum. Meet your dedicated guide and proceed directly inside; booking this private tour means you have skip-the-line privileges and will save valuable vacation time. Embark on a whirlwind tour of the museum's most famous pieces, as well as focusing on any pieces are artists that interest you. Upgrade to add on a guided visit to the nearby Retiro Park.
events.name: Prado Museum 3-hour Private Tour with Skip-the-line

events.description: Bask in the beauty and history of coastal Catalonia on this full-day tour from Barcelona. In Tarragona, walk in the footsteps of gladiators and merchants at the UNESCO-listed ancient Roman ruins, and then explore the bohemian vibe and Modernist architecture of Sitges on a guided tour of old town. Finish the day with sunbathing or swimming at the popular San Sebastian urban beach.
events.name: Tarragona and Sitges Full-Day Tour with Small Group and Hotel Pick Up

events.description: Discover Seville Cathedral, a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of the world’s largest churches, on this 1-hour guided tour. Dodge the queues with skip-the-line entrance; see the Great Chapel, Giralda Tower, and tomb of Christopher Columbus; and learn about the mosque that once stood on the same site.
events.name: Skip-the-Line Seville Cathedral Guided Tour

events.description: Follow in the footsteps of centuries of pilgrims on a 7-day self-guided walking tour along the historic Camino de Santiago route. Complete the last 62 miles (100) of the UNESCO-listed pilgrimage, known as the Camino Francés, beginning in Sarria and finishing in Santiago, where you can your pilgrim's passport stamped and admire the shrine of St. James the Great. Accommodation, breakfast and dinner each day, and luggage transfer are all included so you can focus on a meaningful walk through the scenic towns and forests of Galacia.
events.name: 7-Day Camino Frances Pilgrimage Tour from Sarria to Santiago

events.description: Explore one of Spain’s most celebrated historic monuments on a guided tour of the Great Mosque Cathedral of Córdoba. Originally built as a mosque in the eighth century, the opulent house of worship was later converted into a cathedral and boasts well-preserved architecture from many eras of Córdoban history. Hear its fascinating story from your local guide, and don’t miss a word with narration provided through a headset.
events.name: Great Mosque Cathedral of Cordoba History Tour

events.description: Enjoy the ultimate day of fun in the sun on this kayaking and snorkeling excursion to stunning Costa Brava. Escape the bustle of the city and immerse yourself in pristine coastal landscapes, paddling to secluded beaches, rocky caves, and volcanic cliffs. Top it all off with a group picnic alongside the Mediterranean and free time to relax, followed by a round of beers or sangria back in Barcelona.
events.name: Barcelona: Kayaking and Snorkeling tour to Costa Brava

events.description: Visitors flock to Barcelona’s historic churches, plazas, and vista points, but with this exclusive tour can see it all without waiting in the crowd. Fast-track tickets at the Sagrada Familia leave ample time to explore the temple’s vast interior while you learn about its renown creator, Antoni Gaudi. Then, discover the history and culture of the city and squeeze in other attractions on your way to Montjuic.
events.name: All Barcelona Highlights tour

events.description: Visit some of the top attractions outside of London on this day trip to Stonehenge, Windsor Castle and the historic town of Bath. Start at Windsor Castle, home to the British royal family, for a tour of the State Apartments and St George’s Chapel, and then continue west of London to Salisbury, home of the mysterious Stonehenge rock formations. Finally, arrive in Bath, known for its elegant Georgian architecture and Roman baths. All admission tickets are included in the tour price.
events.name: Stonehenge, Windsor Castle, and Bath from London

events.description: Immerse yourself in the spellbinding world of Harry Potter™ on this trip to the Warner Bros. Studio Tour London. Travel to the fabled Harry Potter studios by air-conditioned coach from central London, and on arrival, trace the footsteps of Hogwarts’ student wizards at leisure. Behold original sets such as Platform 9 ¾ and Diagon Alley; see the Hogwarts Express steam train; ride a broomstick like the cast; and uncover the behind-the-scenes secrets of the movies’ on-screen wizardry. This Harry Potter studio London tour includes round-trip coach transport and entrance tickets.
events.name: Harry Potter Tour of Warner Bros. Studio in London

events.description: Immerse yourself in the magic and mystery of Harry Potter™ with a ful-day behind-the-scenes experience at Warner Bros. Studio Tour London - the Making of Harry Potter. Enjoy round-trip transportation by luxury coach from London Victoria, and spend roughly four hours exploring the spellbinding film sets independently. See the Gothic grandeur of the Ministry of Magic, walk Diagon Alley, snap photos at iconic locations such as Platform 9 ¾ and the Hogwarts Express, and admire intricate costumes and props used in the movies.
events.name: Warner Bros. Studio: The Making of Harry Potter with Luxury Round-Trip Transport from London

events.description: Avoid the hassle of renting a car to see rural England’s highlights with help from this full-day tour which includes round-trip transport from London. Choose from two options to find what best suits your preferences, and travel by air-conditioned coach bus with onboard Wi-Fi. You can either combine a visit to Stonehenge with a pub lunch in Lacock and a walking tour of Windsor, or opt to visit both Windsor Castle and Stonehenge with a break for a traditional English pub lunch. Both options also pass by the city of Bath, hometown of Jane Austen.
events.name: Stonehenge, Windsor and Bath with Pub Lunch in Lacock

events.description: Enter the magical world of Harry Potter, everyone’s favorite boy wizard, on this day trip to Oxford and the Warner Bros. Studio Tour London—The Making of Harry Potter. First, travel to Oxford and visit the Bodleian Library, Christ Church College, and other famous University of Oxford buildings. Then, wander around original sets, see costumes and props worn by Dumbledore, Hagrid, Harry, Ron, Hermione, and others, and uncover the on-screen wizardry used to bring J.K. Rowling’s best-selling books to the silver screen. Round-trip coach transportation from London is included.
events.name: Warner Bros. Studio Tour London - The Making of Harry Potter and Oxford Day Trip

events.description: Discover two gems of southern England on this full-day coach trip to Stonehenge and Bath from London. Travel to Stonehenge, a prehistoric stone monument that rises imperiously from Salisbury Plain. Gaze at the gigantic stones, learn how the monument was used, and then continue to the UNESCO-listed city of Bath to discover this gorgeous 18th-century city independently. Choose to stroll the elegant Georgian streets and see top Bath attractions such as the Royal Crescent as you wish; or upgrade to visit the stunning Roman Baths or Jane Austen Visitor Centre.
events.name: Stonehenge and Bath Day Trip from London

events.description: Harry Potter fans, grab your wands and owls for the journey to Hogwarts and beyond on an official guided tour of Warner Bros. Studio Tour London – The Making of Harry Potter. Take a train directly from central London to the studio, where you’ll be greeted by a representative and taken on an immersive journey featuring original sets, props and costumes featured in all eight Harry Potter movies. From Platform 9 ¾ and Diagon Alley to Hagrid’s Hut and Dumbeldore’s office, you’ll be transported directly to J.K. Rowling’s beloved world of wizardry.
events.name: Fully Guided Tour of Warner Bros Studio Tour London – The Making of Harry Potter

events.description: Discover some of southern England’s most visited spots on this day trip from London. Delve into the history of the British Royal Family on an audio guided tour of Windsor Castle, one of Queen Elizabeth II’s official residences. Unearth Neolithic secrets at Stonehenge, the UNESCO-listed stone circle that dates back thousands of years. Then explore Christchurch College, the Bodleian Library, and other renowned university buildings during a guided Oxford city tour.
events.name: Windsor Castle, Stonehenge, and Oxford Day Trip from London

events.description: Get to know London in one day on this sight-packed, full-day tour with a guide. Traveling by air-conditioned coach, see top London attractions such as Big Ben and Westminster Abbey, and enjoy fast-track entry and a guided tour of St Paul's Cathedral. Watch the Changing of the Guard at Buckingham Palace, and then visit the Tower of London. Break for a pub lunch, and receive a ticket for a Thames River sightseeing cruise to use after your tour or another day. For a bird's-eye view of the city, upgrade to include an open-date ticket for the London Eye.
events.name: London in One Day Sightseeing Tour Including Tower of London, Changing of the Guard with Optional London Eye Upgrade

events.description: Discover the grandeur of London aboard the open-top, double-decker Big Bus on this hop-on, hop-off sightseeing tour. With your 1-, 2-, or 3-day ticket, design a personal itinerary with dozens of possible stops, including Buckingham Palace, Hyde Park, St. Paul’s Cathedral, and more. Enjoy unobstructed views and onboard commentary as you view the city’s highlights. Hop off to enjoy a free walking tour and a River Thames cruise.
events.name: Big Bus London Hop-On Hop-Off Tour

events.description: See Paris and savor a lunch on the Eiffel Tower on this day trip by Eurostar from London. Travel by Eurostar train from St Pancras International and, on arrival, take a panoramic coach tour of top Paris attractions including the Champs-Élysées and Opera House, followed by a Seine River cruise. Then, after having lunch at a chic Eiffel Tower restaurant, chose either a guided visit to the Louvre or time at leisure. Upgrade to first-class Eurostar travel, including breakfast and dinner.
events.name: Fully Guided Luxury Paris Day Trip with Lunch at the Eiffel Tower

events.description: Take a day out of your London city break to visit Oxford, Stratford-upon-Avon, and Warwick Castle, traveling to three of England’s most-popular locations. Begin with a tour of Warwick Castle before heading to Stratford-upon-Avon, William Shakespeare's birthplace. Then explore Oxford and its university buildings, and drive through the Cotsworlds, an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty.
events.name: Oxford, Cotswolds, Stratford-upon-Avon and Warwick Castle Day Trip from London

events.description: Rewind 4,500 years and ponder one of Europe’s greatest prehistoric monuments on this independent day trip to Stonehenge from London. Travel from central London to Stonehenge by air-conditioned coach, and on arrival, enjoy ample free time to explore this UNESCO-listed ancient masterpiece and the Stonehenge visitor center as you wish. Stroll around the monument perimeter, marvel at the stones, and discover how the monument was probably built and used through the audio-visual displays and archaeological exhibitions. This round-trip London to Stonehenge bus trip includes entrance tickets and a complimentary audio-guide.
events.name: London to Stonehenge Shuttle Bus and Independent Day Trip

events.description: Enjoy Paris as you please with a guide or independently during this rail day trip by Eurostar from London. Opt for an independent trip with an included Paris hop-on-hop-off bus tour, and then stroll, sightsee, shop and spend the day exactly as you wish. Alternatively, choose a guided experience with an included Paris city tour, a sightseeing cruise on the Seine River, and time to explore. Either trip includes round-trip Eurostar standard or first-class tickets—your choice—between London’s St. Pancras and Paris’ Gare du Nord station.
events.name: Paris Rail Day Trip from London

events.description: Be one of a rare few to walk inside the UNESCO-listed prehistoric stone circle of Stonehenge, and visit Bath and medieval Lacock on this day trip from London. Select a morning or afternoon tour for early or late access to the Stonehenge site, and walk inside the inner circle of stones—an experience only available to your group—without the daytime crowds. Then visit the Lacock Abbey and the Georgian spa city of Bath to cap off your tour.
events.name: Inner Circle Access of Stonehenge including Bath and Lacock Day Tour from London

events.description: Tick off two UNESCO-listed monuments in one day on this full-day tour of Bath and Stonehenge from London. Escape the city for a scenic drive through the English countryside, stopping to admire the ancient monoliths of Stonehenge and ponder over the significance of the mysterious stone circle. Next, enjoy free time to explore the historic spa town of Bath and visit landmarks like the Roman Baths, the Royal Crescent, and Bath Abbey (own expense).
events.name: Bath, Stonehenge and The English Countryside Day Tour from London

events.description: Discover three of southern England’s top sights on this full-day coach trip from London to Leeds Castle, Canterbury Cathedral, and Dover. Pass the maritime historical buildings of Greenwich on your way to scenic Kent, a county known as the ‘Garden of England.’ Take a private look around stunning Leeds Castle before the crowds arrive, and enjoy a privileged tour of UNESCO-listed Canterbury Cathedral. End your day with views of Dover Castle and the famous White Cliffs of Dover.
events.name: Leeds Castle, Cliffs of Dover and Canterbury Day Trip from London with Guided Cathedral Tour

events.description: Discover some of England’s most popular attractions in one full-day tour on this trip to Stonehenge, Bath, the Cotswolds, and Stratford-upon-Avon from London. Travel by air-conditioned coach to see the prehistoric stones at Stonehenge and glorious Georgian spa city of Bath. Then, drive through the enchanting hills and villages of the Cotswolds, and visit Stratford-upon-Avon, William Shakespeare’s birthplace. Enjoy sparkling wine and scones at Shakespeare's Schoolroom, and admire this half-timbered market town.
events.name: England in One Day: Stonehenge, Bath, the Cotswolds and Stratford-upon-Avon Day Trip from London

events.description: Experience one of London’s must-see attractions with this skip-the-line London Eye ticket. Bypass the long queue and enjoy priority access and boarding for a standard flight in a shared capsule. Then admire panoramic views over the Thames River, Big Ben and other landmarks on your "flight." Your ticket includes interactive Samsung Galaxy Tab-powered guides and admission to the London Eye 4D Experience, an immersive journey that brings London alive through 3D film and multi-sensory effects.
events.name: London Eye Fast-Track Ticket

events.description: Tick off more of southern England’s attractions in less time on a private day trip to Windsor Castle, Stonehenge, and Bath from London. On a private vehicle equipped with Wi-Fi, travel to Windsor Castle, the weekend residence of Her Majesty the Queen; demystify the ancient stone circle of Stonehenge; and take a guided tour of Bath, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Refreshments and hotel pickup and drop-off in London are included.
events.name: Private Windsor Castle, Stonehenge, and Bath from London

events.description: Combine two of England’s most-visited UNESCO World Heritage sites on a full-day tour of Stonehenge and Bath from London. Visit iconic Stonehenge and learn all about the mysterious stone circle with the help of your audio guide, then journey to historic Bath, where your tour includes entrance to the grand Roman Baths and free time to explore the city’s many shops and teahouses.
events.name: Stonehenge and Bath Day Trip from London with Stonehenge Entrance

events.description: Take to the Thames for a sparkling 2.45-hour river dinner sailing past London’s waterfront sights. Settle at your table to savor a delectable 5-course dinner and admire floodlit city sights such as Tower Bridge, the London Eye and Big Ben as you eat and relax, and enjoy enchanting live entertainment.
events.name: London Thames River Dinner Cruise

events.description: See the English capital’s top landmarks on this most comprehensive of London magical tours. Take a tour of beautiful St Paul’s Cathedral, then make a photo stop at Westminster Abbey. Watch the Changing of the Guard at Buckingham Palace and visit the Tower of London, where you'll have free time for lunch (own expense). Enjoy an extended river sightseeing cruise, and upgrade to cap everything with a London Eye flight or cream tea at Harrods.
events.name: Best of London Including Tower of London, Changing of the Guard, with a Cream Tea or London Eye Upgrade

events.description: Discover the natural and architectural splendor of ‘Downtown Abbey’ filming locations on a full-day tour of the Cotswolds from London. With a knowledgeable guide, travel through the picturesque Oxfordshire countryside and visit the charming farm village of Cogges and Bampton, the setting of ‘Downtown Abbey’s’ quintessentially English town. See recognizable sights like the Grantham Arms pub and then spend the afternoon exploring Highclere Castle on a guided tour of the structure’s opulent chambers. Enjoy an intimate atmosphere on this small-group tour, limited to 18 people.
events.name: Small-Group 'Downton Abbey' and Highclere Castle Tour from London

events.description: Trace the footsteps of Lady Mary Crawley on a full-day tour of rural ‘Downton Abbey’ locations from London. Rewind to the early 20th-century Britain portrayed in the hit TV period drama, and tour the Oxfordshire village that doubled as Downton as you hear anecdotes about the series and actors. Plus, visit Highclere Castle, the real-life Downton Abbey, to explore its above-stairs rooms and gardens independently. Highclere admission and round-trip transport included.
events.name: Small Group Tour: Downton Abbey and Village Tour of Locations from London

events.description: Bypass the long lines at the Tower of London and make the most of your tour through this dark and infamous complex. View the remarkable Crown Jewels and visit the White Tower, Traitors’ Gate and Tower Green, where Anne Boleyn met her grisly end. Choose to explore on your own or follow a ‘Beefeater’ guard on a guided walk. An audio tour is also available for an additional fee.
events.name: Tower of London Entrance Ticket Including Crown Jewels and Beefeater Tour

events.description: One of London’s most recognizable and in-demand attractions, the London Eye welcomes millions of visitors every year. Save yourself any sightseeing hassle, and secure your admission before you travel, when you book your tickets in advance. Upon arrival, you’ll step into a large, air-conditioned capsule and will take to the skies. The London Eye stands at 443 feet (135 meters) high, and offers impeccable views of Big Ben, St. Paul’s Cathedral, Buckingham Palace, and other key landmarks. Tickets also include entry to the companion 4D Cinema Experience.
events.name: London Eye Standard Ticket

events.description: See three of England’s architectural treasures on a full-day trip to Windsor Castle, Stonehenge, and Oxford from London. First, check out Windsor Castle, second home to the Queen of England, and opt to upgrade with a guided tour of the castle’s opulent interior. Next, head to Stonehenge to uncover the mystery behind this UNESCO-listed site, and then explore the canals of Oxford on a complimentary walking tour of the city. Upgrade to include entrance fees, or enjoy the flexibility of deciding on the day which attractions you'd like to visit.
events.name: Windsor Castle, Stonehenge, and Oxford Custom Day Trip

events.description: Swap the bustle of London for the rural beauty of the Cotswolds on this full-day trip, including a 2-course lunch. Traveling to the Cotswolds from London by comfortable, air-conditioned coach, drink in the rolling countryside and slow pace of this enchanting region, famous for its stone-built villages, lush pastures and old-world atmosphere. Enjoy free time to stroll around gorgeous towns and villages such as Burford, Bibury and Stow-in-the-Wold; and break midway to enjoy a traditional English lunch at an old Cotswolds hotel restaurant, complete with stone fireplace and oak beams.
events.name: Lunch in the Cotswolds from London

events.description: Discover everything from Roman ruins to Royal residences on this full-day tour of Stonehenge, Windsor, and Bath from London. Start with a visit to the 18th-century spa resort of Bath, where the elegant thermal baths date back to Roman times. Then, be awed by the towering 5,000-year-old stone circle of Stonehenge, before brushing up on your Royal history at the extravagant Windsor Castle, one of the Queen’s official residences.
events.name: Windsor Stonehenge and Roman Baths Day Trip from London

events.description: Enjoy a memorable evening of food, wine and entertainment on this showboat dinner cruise on the Thames River in London. Feast on a 4-course dinner aboard your sightseeing boat as you sail past London attractions such as Big Ben, the London Eye and Tower Bridge, all illuminated at night. While you eat and admire the sights, enjoy live entertainment from a cabaret singer, and, if you wish, take to the dance floor.
events.name: The London Showboat Dinner Cruise on the Thames River

events.description: Visit one of England’s most popular yet mysterious attractions on this London to Stonehenge independent day trip. Travel from London by air-conditioned coach to the UNESCO World Heritage–listed site of Stonehenge. With your audio guide in hand, explore the site at your leisure and hear the various theories behind its existence. Marvel at the bluestone rocks inside the ancient circle, and wonder how and why the 40-ton rocks were placed there. Enjoy great value for money and a hassle-free visit to this top UK attraction.
events.name: Stonehenge Half Day Tour with Entry and Extra Time

events.description: See the best of London without the stress of rigid tour times and massive crowds on this hop-on hop-off bus tour. With your flexible pass, hop aboard the double-decker, open-top bus for a comfortable sightseeing excursion. Great for kids and adults, your pass offers three route options with stops at main attractions like Big Ben, the Tower of London, Buckingham Palace and more. Bonus features include three city walking tours, a River Thames cruise and local discounts.
events.name: The Original Tour London: Hop-on Hop-off Bus Tour

events.description: Many of London’s top attractions lie along the River Thames. This boat tour cruises by most of them and includes a London Eye ride to see them from above afterward. Get to know the city’s beating heart and great contrasts as you pass historic sites such as Big Ben, St. Paul’s Cathedral, and the Tower of London as well as contemporary landmarks like the Tate Modern and Millennium Bridge. Then, ride the London Eye for sweeping views of the city.
events.name: London Eye River Cruise and Standard London Eye Ticket

events.description: Immerse yourself in glamour and spectacle at Madame Tussauds in London. Head to the world-famous venue and join the dedicated queue for pre-purchased entrance tickets and experience shorter queues than walk-up guests. Spend some quality time with remarkable wax replicas of Her Majesty the Queen, Victoria and David Beckham, or take a selfie with a pouty-faced Kim Kardashian. Enjoy access to the Marvel Super Heroes 4D Exhibition, Spirit of London taxi ride, and then meet classic Star Wars heroes like Yoda, Luke Skywalker, and Princess Leia.
events.name: Madame Tussauds London Standard Ticket

events.description: Upon arriving at London Heathrow, Gatwick, Stansted, Luton or City Airport, avoid lugging around your baggage and waiting in line for a taxi. Book this private airport transfer — available 24 hours daily — and get to your destination in London Docklands or London City quickly and in comfort.
events.name: Private London Arrival Transfer - Airport to Hotel/Accommodation

events.description: Limited time in London doesn’t have to mean a limited view of the capital. Soak up the key sights in just one action-packed day on this guided small-group tour. Explore Westminster Abbey and watch the Changing of the Guards at Buckingham Palace. Then cruise the River Thames to Tower Bridge and explore its inner workings before delving into British history at the Tower of London.
events.name: London In a Day: Tower of London, Westminster Abbey & Changing of the Guard

events.description: Grab your passport and cross the channel to Paris for an unforgettable day in the City of Lights. Your guided day trip includes round-trip transportation by Eurostar from London and entrance to two of Paris’ most popular attractions – the Louvre and the Eiffel Tower. That’s not all: you’ll also enjoy a guided tour of Paris, including sights like the Champs-Elysees, the Arc de Triomphe, and the Trocadero, then set sail for a cruise along the Seine river.
events.name: Guided Day Trip to Paris from London-includes Eiffel Tower, River Cruise, Louvre

events.description: Discover London’s top sights for one low price with the London Pass®. Choose from a 1-, 2-, 3-, 4-, 5-, 6-, or 10-day sightseeing credits package, and enjoy access to your London Pass straight from your mobile (or print it out at home). Simply show it at the gate or ticket office to gain entrance to more than 80 attractions including Tower Bridge, Westminster Abbey, and the View from the Shard. You'll also benefit from skip-the-line access at some of the city's top attractions like the London Zoo. Your pass also includes a hop-on hop-off bus tour, a Thames River cruise, a free guidebook packed with useful information, and valuable shopping and dining discounts.
events.name: London Pass Including Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour and Access to Over 80 Attractions

events.description: Visit the historic town of Windsor on a half-day tour from London, including round-trip transfers and entrance to the lavish Windsor Castle, the Official Residence of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth. Admire the mighty stronghold, built by William the Conqueror in the 11th century, peek into the royal bedchambers and see Queen Mary’s doll house, then stroll the beautiful gardens and enjoy free time in Windsor.
events.name: Windsor Half Day Tour Including Entry to Windsor Castle from London

events.description: First time in London? Visit the capital’s most iconic landmarks on this full-day London tour, including a Thames River cruise and a ride on the famous London Eye. You’ll stop for photos at Westminster Abbey, take a tour of St Paul’s Cathedral and admire panoramic views of the capital from your air-conditioned coach. There’s a chance to get a taste of Royal London too, as you tour the notorious Tower of London, view the Crown Jewels and watch the traditional Changing of the Guard ceremony at Buckingham Palace.
events.name: Total London Experience with London Eye, Tower of London, St Paul's & Lunch Pack

events.description: The medieval Tower of London is widely considered among London’s top attractions, but exploring independently means missing the hidden secrets behind the priceless treasures it holds. On this tour, beat the queues with skip-the-line entry and explore the tower as your guide brings its history to life. Along the way, meet the ravens guarding the tower, and discover must-see sites including the Jewel House and the White Tower.
events.name: Private Tour, Tower of London

events.description: Experience a wealth of England’s rural and historical treasures, and the fictional ‘Downton Abbey’ village, on this full-day trip from London with an expert guide. Marvel at splendid Blenheim Palace, the UNESCO-protected country house where Sir Winston Churchill was born, and discover the enchanting scenery of the Cotswolds, with visits to an idyllic village: either Bibury or Bourton-on-the-Water. Lastly, explore the pretty village of Bampton to see some of the locations where the much-loved TV series, ‘Downton Abbey’, was filmed, and enjoy time for lunch here before returning to London.
events.name: Downton Abbey Village, Blenheim Palace and Cotswolds Day Trip from London

events.description: Have exclusive access to one of London’s most popular and in-demand landmarks, and bypass the crowds, on this VIP tour of the Tower of London. Begin the tour with early, skip-the-line access, and see the tower’s storied opening ceremony. With just a small group for company, you’ll explore the landmark’s highlights. You’ll also be among the first visitors to enter the Tower of London’s world-famous Jewel House, where the glittering Crown Jewels await.
events.name: Early Access Crown Jewels: Complete Tour of Tower of London & Opening Ceremony

events.description: See the very best of Paris on a full-day trip from London by high-speed train, and enjoy a mix of guided tours and time to explore on your own. Take in key sites on a 1.5-hour tour by coach, then board a river boat for an hour-long cruise along the Seine. Spend the afternoon by yourself, with plenty of time to shop Parisian boutiques, visit museums, or sample classic French cuisine in the City of Light.
events.name: Guided Paris Day Trip from London

events.description: The Tower of London and Westminster Abbey are two of London’s most impressive must-see attractions, but the entry queues can be long. On this tour, save valuable sightseeing time with skip-the-line entry and head straight inside with your guide. Learn the history of Parliament Square and Trafalgar Square on a walking visit, and stop at Buckingham Palace, Nelson’s Column, and more.
events.name: Private Tour London Highlights, entries Westminster Abbey, The Tower of London

events.description: Uncover centuries of British history on a full-day guided coach tour of three unique historic landmarks, including two of England’s most visited UNESCO World Heritage sites. Learn about legendary royals like Henry VIII, Queen Mary and Queen Elizabeth at the lavish Windsor Castle, then unravel the mysteries of the enigmatic stone circle of Stonehenge, which dates back more than 5,000 years. Finally, visit the Roman spa town of Bath, an architectural marvel famed for its natural thermal springs and the Roman Baths.
events.name: Windsor Castle, Stonehenge and Bath Tour from London with Admission & Lunch Pack

events.description: The London Eye, Madame Tussauds, and the SEA LIFE® London Aquarium number among the British capital’s most popular attractions—and with this combo ticket, you have access to all three. Plan your sightseeing for a single day, or space out your visits; as the passes are valid for up to 90 days, you have the freedom to create your very own itinerary.
events.name: Combo Ticket: London Eye- SEA LIFE London -Madame Tussauds London

events.description: Get a taste of British food, from timeless recipes to creative new cuisine, on this walking tour of London Bridge and Borough Market. Follow your guide to local pubs, market stalls, artisan stores, and bakeries to sample British cheese and chutney, fish ‘n’ chips, and award-winning Lincolnshire sausage. Wash it down with London ale or cider, then indulge in a portion of treacle sponge pudding or some tasty homemade fudge.
events.name: Secret Food Tour in London: London Bridge and Borough Market

events.description: Enhance your experience of England’s natural and architectural treasures on a customizable full-day trip to Leeds Castle, Canterbury Cathedral and the Cliffs of Dover. Relish the flexibility of this customizable day-trip, which allows you to explore each site independently or upgrade for insightful guided tours. Marvel at the verdant grounds and ancient majesty of Leeds Castle; discover the ecclesiastical elegance of Canterbury Cathedral; and gaze at the crumbling white cliffs of Dover on this enriching excursion. Enjoy transportation by luxury coach and an experienced guide.
events.name: Leeds Castle, Canterbury Cathedral and Cliffs of Dover Custom Day Trip

events.description: While in London, combine an iconic British tradition with a unique sightseeing excursion on an afternoon tea cruise! Spend a luxurious time enjoying a unique dining experience with family and friends on the River Thames. As you cruise from Tower Pier to Westminster, indulge in tea, freshly prepared cakes and sandwiches, and view London’s great landmarks including the Tower of London, the Houses of Parliament and the London Eye.
events.name: Thames River Sightseeing Cruise with Afternoon Tea

events.description: Discover London’s royal history and sights on a London tour by foot and boat. Start with an early access visit to the Tower of London to see the opening ceremony and Crown Jewels without the usual daytime crowds. Then, take to the water on a half-hour River Thames sightseeing cruise. Stroll to Horse Guard’s Parade or Buckingham Palace to see the famous Changing of the Guard ceremony, and learn all about the British Royal Family from a knowledgeable local guide.
events.name: Royal London Walking Tour: Early Access Tower of London & Changing of The Guard

events.description: Delve into London’s legendary rock music history on this morning, afternoon or full-day tour. Hop aboard your coach and check off the English capital’s top rock ‘n’ roll landmarks, from ‘Tin Pan Alley,’ where the Rolling Stones cut their first record, to the famous Abbey Road zebra crossing. This small-group tour is limited to just 16 participants, ensuring a more intimate experience with personalized attention from the guide.
events.name: London Rock Music Tour

events.description: Discover The Beatles’ hometown on this rail day trip to Liverpool from London. On arrival in this historical city, enjoy free time, a museum visit, and a guided Liverpool Beatles tour to explore the places linked to the Fab Four. Visit The Beatles Story attraction, packed with memorabilia and replicas of Beatles’ sites; and enjoy a Magical Mystery coach tour of locations including Penny Lane and the Cavern Club. Return rail tickets, entry to The Beatles Story, and the Magical Mystery trip are included in this independent Beatles Liverpool tour.
events.name: Beatles and Liverpool Rail Day Trip from London

events.description: Check off three of England’s UNESCO-listed wonders on this full-day tour from London. Stand in awe before the prehistoric stones of Stonehenge, marvel at the Neolithic stone circle of Avebury, stroll around historic Bath, and visit Lacock Village, where Harry Potter and Downton Abbey have filmed. Enjoy a more personal experience on this small-group tour of just 16 people. Round-trip transport is included.
events.name: Full-Day Tour of Stonehenge, Bath, Lacock, and Avebury from London

events.description: The University City of Oxford and the idyllic countryside of The Cotswolds are two of the most popular day trips from London, but visiting on a large group tour can mean less time to explore. This full-day small-group tour ensures a personalized experience, with free time to admire Oxford landmarks like the Bridge of Sighs, Christchurch Cathedral, and the Ashmolean Museum, and visit the villages of Bampton, Burford, and Bilbury.
events.name: Oxford and Traditional Cotswolds Villages Small-Group Day Tour from London

events.description: Rather than grapple with London’s public transport after a long flight, take it easy with this cost-effective shared shuttle that drops you right to your door. Your driver will greet you in the arrivals hall, then transfer you direct to your hotel, making no more than three stops along the way. Choose between Heathrow, Gatwick, Luton, Southend, and Stansted Airports.
events.name: Shared Arrival Transfer London Airport to Hotel/Accommodation

events.description: Dare to discover the legend of London’s notorious Jack the Ripper on a tour like no other! Using state-of-the-art RIPPER-VISION™, innovative hand-held projectors help to recreate the atmosphere of Victorian London using spooky images, film clips and moving images. Follow your guide on a walking tour to explore the dimly lit backstreets of Whitechapel and hear the harrowing tales and conspiracy theories of London’s most notorious serial killer.
events.name: Jack the Ripper Tour with 'Ripper-Vision' in London

events.description: For fans of Harry Potter, the Warner Bros. Studio London should be at the top of your England itinerary. On this full-day tour from London, you’ll travel with ease to Oxford, for a walking tour of the historic university town. Next head to the Making of Harry Potter and discover the exact sets used in the magical film franchise. Stroll down Diagon Alley, sit on the Hogwart’s Express, and ride the Knight Bus. This family-friendly tour is limited to 20 people in order to maintain an intimate atmosphere.
events.name: Small-Group Warner Bros Studio Tour London - The Making of Harry Potter & Oxford

events.description: Go behind the scenes at Warner Bros. Studio London to see how Hogwarts, Diagon Alley, the Forbidden Forest, and other magical realms were created on the Making of Harry Potter studio tour. Walk through elaborate sets you’ll recognize from several “Harry Potter” films and learn about camera tricks and special effects used to bring J.K. Rowling’s enchanting tale to life.
events.name: Warner Bros Studio Tour London - The Making of Harry Potter with hotel pick up

events.description: Follow in the footsteps of England’s kings, queens, statesmen and poets as you explore the magnificent Westminster Abbey, one of London’s most iconic and important religious buildings. Listen to your audio-guide as you stroll around the great church, see the coronation site of England’s many kings and queens, and admire the striking Gothic architecture. Best of all, your audio guide will fill you in on the abbey’s fascinating history, from the coronation of William the Conqueror to the royal wedding of Prince William and Kate Middleton.
events.name: Westminster Abbey Entrance Ticket Including Audio Guide

events.description: Learn about London’s darkest tales with a 2.5-hour haunted London bus and walking tour. Experience the grisly histories of execution, rebellion, madness, and murder that shadow this ancient city. Discover the stories and sites of Jack the Ripper, Sweeney Todd, and the Cock Lane Ghost. Visit the medieval Smithfield Market and the monument of Sir Willam Wallace, then finish in Trafalgar Square where you can purchase a tasty pub dinner and drink.
events.name: Jack the Ripper and Sherlock Holmes Tour of Haunted London

events.description: The Warner Bros studio might be the top ticket for Harry Potter lovers visiting London, but the city has so many magical movie locations for fans to explore. Join a group of fellow muggles for a walking tour and see the real-life locations that inspired sets such as Diagon Alley, the Leaky Cauldron, and the Ministry of Magic.
events.name: Harry Potter Walking Tour for Muggles in London

events.description: Make like a VIP in London with a private guide, personal chauffeur, and an itinerary tailor-made for you. Choose between a 3- or 6-hour tour and admire landmarks such as Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, and the Tower of London; hit the shops at Harrods or Oxford Street; or explore the local neighborhoods. Hotel pickup and drop-off is included.
events.name: Private Guided and Chauffered Tour of London

events.description: Get acquainted with two iconic London monuments on a half-day tour of Westminster Abbey and the Houses of Parliament. While gaining fascinating insight into the royal history of Great Britain, absorb the Gothic grandeur of Westminster Abbey’s interior and head inside the Houses of Parliament—home to the renowned Big Ben—to see highlights like the House of Commons and Lord’s Chamber. From your guide, learn about the United Kingdom’s political system and major historic events while touring the prominent landmarks.
