You’ll also see Big Ben and the London Eye, and make a stop at Charles Dickens’ favorite London pub as your guide tells you stories about the fictional character Ebenezer Scrooge. Then, end your delightful night at the River Side Christmas Market.
events.name: Christmas Lights and Markets Tour in London

events.description: Delve into London’s rich royal heritage during a visit to Buckingham Palace to see the Changing of the Guard Ceremony. Marvel at the traditional Changing of the Guard performance, which involves meticulously dressed soldiers marching to the rhythm of military drums. Then, enjoy an exclusive experience as you enter the opulent State Rooms of Buckingham Palace for an independent audio tour. See lavish chambers during a tour only available for two months of the year, and gain fascinating insight into the history of the British monarchy.
events.name: Buckingham Palace Tour Including Changing of the Guard Ceremony

events.description: Watch the Thames River light up at night on a 3-hour dinner cruise with live jazz. Kick off your night with a glass of sparkling wine as you glide into the current, and spot the iconic Houses of Parliament, Big Ben, the London Eye and Tower of London. Enjoy jazz classics along with swing and Latin tunes, then relax over a 3-course dinner in a heated cabin. Savor cheese and charcuterie, an escalope of chicken and rich berry cheesecake, with plenty of time to take in the sights between courses.
events.name: Thames River Jazz and Dinner Cruise

events.description: Delve into England’s rich medieval history on a full-day tour of Windsor, Oxford, and Henley-on-Thames from London. Scheduled to reveal more of the English countryside in less time, this tour covers the charming riverside town of Henley-on-Thames and Windsor Castle, official residence of Her Majesty the Queen. See, too, grandiose university buildings on a guided tour of Oxford.
events.name: Windsor, Runnymede and Kew Gardens in One Day from London

events.description: Go inside London's iconic Tower Bridge to gaze beneath its glass floor, browse its exhibitions, and visit the Victorian engine rooms. With your entrance ticket, you'll ride up in the elevator to the walkways. Learn about the history of the bridge that was considered an engineering marvel from the exhibits, and discover the inner workings of the bridge as you explore the engine rooms that once powered the bridge's gates.
events.name: London Tower Bridge Exhibition Entrance Ticket

events.description: Visit two of England’s most popular UNESCO World Heritage sites on this day trip from Oxford. Unravel thousands of years of history on an audio-guided tour of Stonehenge — arguably Britain’s most important archaeological site — and then continue to the spa city of Bath, where you’ll see the Roman Baths, Bath Abbey, the Royal Crescent and other attractions on a walking tour.
events.name: Bath and Stonehenge Day Trip from Oxford

events.description: Discover the historical delights and regal charm of Windsor on an independent sightseeing trip from London. Relish the flexibility of this customizable tour, the itinerary of which can be tailored according to your interests, and only visits sights you wish to see with a private driver. Perhaps explore the opulent chambers of Windsor castle or see the prestigious school buildings of Eton on this enriching excursion. All entrance fees and refreshments must be purchased at your own expense.
events.name: Windsor Independent Day Trip from London with Private Driver

events.description: Trace the footsteps of Shakespeare, James Bond, Sherlock Holmes, and the Beatles on this private, half-day tour of London. Traveling in a classic black cab, you’ll zip around the English capital in search of sites associated with the city’s most influential inhabitants and literary characters. Receive the undivided attention of your own personal driver-guide throughout.
events.name: Private Tour: The London of Shakespeare, the Beatles, James Bond and Sherlock Holmes by Traditional Black Cab

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/26601P61/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Arrival Transfer from Cruise Ports to London Hotel or London Airports

events.description: Discover two of Britain’s most renowned landmarks in a single day—and don’t worry about the logistics of organizing your own transport—when you embark on this private, full-day two of Stonehenge and Windsor Castle. Choose your own departure time, meet your guide in the morning, and set off via comfortable, private vehicle. You have guaranteed admission at both sights, where you can explore at your leisure (audio guides included).
events.name: London to Stonehenge and Windsor Castle Private Vehicle Day Trip

events.description: Visiting a museum may seem like a difficult setting to keep children entertained, but this tour is the perfect solution. It’s especially geared towards children, with a kid-friendly blue badge guide to lead the way. You’ll save time studying the floor plan and trying to decide what to see, and instead have a guide to shortlist top sites and lead the way. Highlights include an Egyptian mummy, the Rosetta Stone, and lots of treasures.
events.name: British Museum for Kids & Families Semi-Private Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/123799P10/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Stonehenge Private Car Tour

events.description: Book your seat for the spectacular ‘Wicked The Musical’ London production at the Apollo Victoria Theatre. This big-hearted musical tells the story of the two polar-opposite witches of L. Frank Baum's tale, ‘The Wonderful Wizard of Oz,’ bringing their unlikely friendship alive with jaw-dropping technical wizardry and unforgettable songs. With its powerful atmosphere and poignant storyline, the 'Wicked' show has been casting a spell on adults and children since its opening. Choose from standard or top-price seats, and upgrade to enjoy a delectable 2-course Italian dinner before the show.
events.name: Wicked the Musical Theater Show

events.description: Step inside one of London's most iconic attractions on this behind-the-scenes tour of the Houses of Parliament. Meet your guide right in front of the UNESCO-listed attraction. Once inside, you’ll follow in royal footsteps, will visit both the House of Commons and the Lords Chamber, will admire artworks and architectural highlights, and more. As you go, your guide will share stories and facts about the landmark’s long history.
events.name: Behind-the-Scenes Houses of Parliament Guided Tour

events.description: Test your Manchester United knowledge on this tour of Old Trafford and a visit to the official Man United Museum. Peruse historical exhibits and state-of-the-art interactive experiences in the Museum and Tour Centre. Get an inside look at the players' daily lives with a visit to the dressing room and a walk through the tunnel that leads to the pitch. Imagine the roar of thousands of fans as you set foot on the field, then sit down in the Managers' dugout to get their perspective. Listen to historical commentary from your expert guide.
events.name: Manchester United Museum and Stadium Tour at Old Trafford

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/26601P32/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private transfer to Southampton with a stop at Stonehenge

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/207851P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Harry Potter Studio Tour London

events.description: Paris is just two hours by train from London, but visiting on a group tour can mean limited time to explore. This full-day self-guided tour offers the best of both worlds, with round-trip transport by Eurostar, a Paris map and welcome pack, and a Seine River sightseeing cruise, plus plenty of free time to take in the sights that interest you most.
events.name: Full-Day Self-Guided Paris Tour from London by Eurostar with Seine River Cruise

events.description: Bypass the long lines at the Eiffel Tower with this tour that includes summit access. After fast track, skip-the-line access, proceed to the second level to survey the city from the viewing platforms while listening to commentary about Paris culture, traditions, and history. Then, proceed to the summit to see Gustave Eiffel's private apartments and sip Champagne from the onsite bar (own expense).
events.name: Eiffel Tower Summit Priority Access with Host

events.description: Among the world’s largest and most-visited museums, the Louvre always attracts crowds and long lines. Guarantee your admission, and bypass the lengthy wait times, by purchasing tickets in advance. With priority access, you’ll be able to head straight inside, and will have more time left over to discover masterpieces ranging from the Mona Lisa and Nike of Samothrace to the Venus de Milo and beyond. Your tickets also include admission to the Musée National Eugène-Delacroix if used within 48 hours.
events.name: Louvre Museum Direct Entry Ticket

events.description: Feast your senses on the vibrant color and charisma of the ‘Féerie’ show at Paris’ iconic Moulin Rouge during an extravagant evening in the City of Light. Take a seat in the atmospheric theater and prepare for a dazzling spectacle of drama, dance and music. See elaborately dressed show girls dominate the stage; marvel at dancers as they perform compelling choreography; and opt to upgrade to include a French feast and fine Champagne before the show starts.
events.name: Moulin Rouge Show Paris

events.description: Ensure a memorable night out in Paris with a gourmet dinner cruise along the Seine River. Float past the city’s famed monuments, such as the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Ile de la Cité aboard a luxury Bateaux Parisiens riverboat. Soak up the magic of Paris from an onboard dining room while enjoying a gourmet 3-course meal. Please note that Champagne and live music are also included on select 8:30pm departures.
events.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Dinner Cruise

events.description: Save time with this Viator skip-the-line Eiffel Tower ticket. This priority access admission ticket allows for a relaxing visit to one of the world’s busiest monuments, accompanied by a host. Listen as your host adds colorful history and facts to the sights below as you look over Les Invalides, Notre Dame Cathedral, and other city landmarks.
events.name: Eiffel Tower Priority Access Ticket with Host

events.description: Breeze past the crowds outside the Eiffel Tower with this skip-the-line pass and 1.5-hour tour. In the company of your local guide, you'll gain priority access to the tower's second level. Delve into the history of one of the world's most famous monuments and soak up the exhibits and maps on display. Then bid adieu to your guide and head to the tower's summit for stellar views of the City of Lights. Toast your travels with a glass of bubbly from the Champagne bar (own expense).
events.name: Skip the Line: Eiffel Tower Tour and Summit Access by elevator

events.description: Experience culture and art through the ages with a small-group tour of Paris’ epic Louvre Museum. Jump the queue and spend three hours with a guide, seeing and learning about some of the museum’s 35,000 artworks across eight themed galleries. Then enjoy time on your own to explore, viewing paintings, sculpture and architecture from 450 BC to the 19th century. Numbers are limited to 25 on this small-group tour to ensure a more intimate experience. To upgrade your ticket, select a private tour exclusive to just your group.
events.name: Skip the Line: Louvre Museum Walking Tour including Venus de Milo and Mona Lisa

events.description: Experience an evening of iconic glamour with a late-night show at the Moulin Rouge, the legendary home of Parisian cabaret! Take your seat among the elegant vintage surroundings and be dazzled by a 2-hour cabaret revue featuring the Moulin Rouge’s famously beautiful and talented showgirls. Sip on French Champagne while feasting your eyes on eye-popping costumes and elaborate sets. Shows regularly sell out months in advance, so book your seat now to enjoy a quintessential night out in Paris!
events.name: Moulin Rouge Late Night Show with Champagne

events.description: Make sightseeing in the French capital easy with a Big Bus tour of Paris. Enjoy the convenience of hop-on hop-off access at any stop along the route, and soak in the views from an open-top, double-decker bus. See sights like the Louvre Museum, Moulin Rouge cabaret club, Notre-Dame Cathedral, and the iconic Eiffel Tower as you listen to informative, English-speaking guides on some routes, or audio-commentary available in 11 languages. There are two routes to choose from, with 15 stops in total around the city, and you can pair your Paris bus tour with a Seine River cruise. Choose either a 1-day or 2-day bus ticket.
events.name: Big Bus Paris Hop-On Hop-Off Tour

events.description: Visit the D-Day beaches during this full-day trip from Paris to Normandy. Stop at Omaha Beach to learn stories and historical facts about WWII; drive along Juno and Gold Beaches; pause at the American Cemetery; and stop by the Caen Memorial Museum for a scenic lunch. Gain fascinating insights from your guide into the sacrifices of Allied soldiers and the French citizens they liberated. Upgrade to a small-group tour when booking for a more personal experience.
events.name: Normandy D-Day Beaches Day Trip with American Cemetery and Lunch

events.description: Make the most of your time in Paris with a combination of a cruise on the Seine and a 3-course dinner. This 75-minute dinner cruise allows you to see the main attractions of the City of Lights while you enjoy a casual meal. Relax into a comfortable armchair facing one of the boat's windows, the better to take in the view, and watch sights like the Louvre, Place de la Concorde, and Eiffel Tower drift by. Upgrade the experience to include wine or Champagne with dinner.
events.name: Bistro-Style Seine River Dinner Cruise on board PARIS EN SCENE

events.description: Indulge your inner romantic on an atmospheric evening cruise down the Seine and see the City of Lights at its most magical. Dine on a decadent 4-course dinner, accompanied by live music on-board, as you float past illuminated landmarks like the Louvre, Notre Dame Cathedral and the Eiffel Tower.
events.name: Bateaux Mouches Seine River Cruise Including Dinner and Live Music

events.description: Dig deep into history with an underground Paris Catacombs tour. Learn why the bones of more than six million people were deposited under the city in a complex maze of tunnels that you definitely need a guide to navigate.
events.name: Skip The Line Paris Catacombs Tour

events.description: Travel with a small group—including hotel pickup from Paris—and spend a day touring the Champagne region. Visit a world-renowned Champagne house such as Moët & Chandon, Mumm, or Veuve Clicquot, as well as smaller estates. Experience eight tastings and learn how the popular bubbly drink is made as you stroll through sprawling vineyards and enter cellars. Enjoy a gourmet lunch at a family-run winery and stop at the abbey in Hautvillers.
events.name: Champagne Small-Group Wine Day from Paris including 8 Champagne tasting

events.description: Paris’ Louvre is one of the world’s largest art museums, so don't waste your time waiting in line. Head straight inside, with your priority access admission, to see three of its biggest crowd-pleasers, including the unavoidable gaze and wry smile of Da Vinci’s “Mona Lisa." On this guided tour, hear fascinating tales and tidbits about these unmissable masterpieces. After coming face to face with several artworks by great masters, you’re free to explore the Louvre independently.
events.name: Skip the Line Louvre Museum Must-See Guided Tour

events.description: On this Paris dinner cruise, glide along the Seine aboard an intimate La Marina de Paris boat, and enjoy a 3-course meal while admiring riverfront sights like the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame, and the Louvre. The glass-enclosed boat provides unobstructed views and photo ops, allowing you to soak up the romantic atmosphere of Paris lit up at night. Options are available to exclude drinks from your experience.
events.name: 3-Course Seine Dinner Cruise at The Marina de Paris

events.description: Prepare to be inspired by some of the world’s most famous artists as you step inside the iconic Louvre Museum. Head straight to the front of the queue with skip-the-line entrance, then journey through art history on a private tour. With the help of your expert guide, see masterpieces like the 'Venus de Milo' and the 'Mona Lisa,' learn about the evolution of art around the world, and discover little-known gems that many visitors miss.
events.name: Skip-the-line Louvre Museum Guided Tour - Private Tour

events.description: Surround yourself in the grand spectacle of the Versailles palace and gardens on a small-group tour from Paris. Enjoy pickup from your Paris hotel, then breeze past the queue at Versailles and take a small-group tour through the castle’s ornate interior. Discover the rich tastes of Louis XIV, who built the enormous 700-room complex, adorning the space with extravagance and luxury. Then take a leisurely stroll in the palace gardens before returning to Paris.
events.name: Versailles Guided Tour and Priority Access with Hotel Pickup from Paris

events.description: Discover the darker side of the City of Lights with this skip-the-line tour of the famed catacombs of Paris. Explore these fascinating underground passageways lined with the bones of thousands of former Parisians and learn the history of the mesmerizing and macabre labyrinth. Bypass the long lines for this popular attraction and enjoy personalized attention in a small group limited to 19 people.
events.name: Skip-the-Line: Paris Catacombs Tour with VIP Access to Restricted Areas

events.description: Gain entry to the famous Palace of Versailles without waiting in line with this 5-hour skip the line tour from Central Paris. With priority access to the UNESCO World Heritage site, don your audio tour (available in eleven languages) to listen as you walk through the legendary State Apartments and the Hall of Mirrors. Stroll through the lush gardens, designed by André Le Nôtre, and learn about Louis XIV, the flashy king who once inhabited this opulent residence. Round-trip transportation from 3 departure points in Paris via air-conditioned bus is included.
events.name: Skip The Line: Palace of Versailles and Gardens from Central Paris

events.description: Enjoy an intimate historical look at the D-Day landings on this 12-hour trip to the beaches of Normandy from Paris. Travel by comfortable van accommodating no more than eight people, and visit Omaha Beach, the Operation Overlord Museum, German bunkers, Pointe du Hoc, as well as the American Cemetery home to 10,000 white crosses. See period-era military maps, plans, and photos, while listening to inspiring stories about June 6, 1944. Sip some of Normandy’s famous traditional cider before returning to Paris.
events.name: Small-Group Normandy D-Day Beaches Day Trip with Omaha Beach, American Cemetery and Cider Tasting

events.description: Immerse yourself in the extravagance of the Moulin Rouge, the most popular show in Paris, during an unforgettable evening that includes a gourmet 3-course meal. See talented troupes of colorful showgirls and expert dancers strut their stuff on the historical stage of the Moulin Rouge. Lose yourself in the dancing and drama and pleasure your palate with fine French flavors during a delicious meal. Book in advance to avoid missing this sell-out show.
events.name: Moulin Rouge Paris Dinner and Show

events.description: This exclusive gastronomic tour puts the tastiest treats of Paris—from gourmet cheeses to delicate pastries— at your fingertips. Get insider knowledge on the most happening hotspots in Montmartre, the city’s cobblestoned arts district, and meet some of the most talented food artisans in the capital. Enjoy up to 10 pre-selected food stops, and get a peek at landmarks along the way, from Moulin Rouge to the Sacré Coeur.
events.name: Montmartre Food and Wine Tour

events.description: This Seine River dinner or lunch cruise is a relaxing way to view Paris landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre. Admire the waterfront sights and pass under bridges such as the Pont Neuf as you savor a gourmet 3-course meal, paired with a glass or half bottle of Champagne and French wine. Enjoy exquisite cuisine and fine service aboard a La Marina de Paris glass-enclosed boat.
events.name: Viator Exclusive: 3 Course Dinner Cruise with Champagne at Marina de Paris

events.description: Celebrate 65 years of folly and glamour at Crazy Horse Paris with its new show, Totally Crazy. This 90-minute performance includes a selection of magnificent acts created by Philippe Decouflé, Christian Louboutin, Chantal Thomass, and more. Upgrade your experience to include Champagne and appetizers.
events.name: Crazy Horse Cabaret New Show in Paris

events.description: Travel through scenic Normandy en route to the medieval Mont-St-Michel on a full-day trip from Paris. Discover the UNESCO World-Heritage-listed island, with its iconic Gothic abbey, with a guide, and listen to fascinating history and legendary stories about the site. Enjoy ample time to explore the island, and admire views of the surrounding bay before traveling back to the French capital.
events.name: Mont Saint Michel Day Trip from Paris

events.description: Save by booking this half-day Super Saver and enjoy a discount on two best-selling Paris tours: an Eiffel Tower visit followed by a cruise along the Seine River. An informative guide whisks you past the entrance lines at the Eiffel Tower with fast-access entry. Learn little-known trivia about the iconic monument as you explore the second-floor viewing gallery. Then, embark on a cruise along the Seine that's chock-full of sights including the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Louvre Museum.
events.name: Skip the Ticket Desk Line: Eiffel Tower and Seine River Cruise

events.description: Venture beneath the City of Light to explore the dark underworld of the Paris Catacombs. Skip the entrance lines and head inside this fantastically macabre tunnel system filled with the skeletal remains of more than 6 million Parisians. Hear about the remarkable construction of the catacombs from an expert guide as you walk past ornate chambers piled with decorative arrangements of bones, and gain special access to chapels and chambers closed to the general public. Group size is limited to 19.
events.name: Paris Catacombs Special Access Tour

events.description: See the major sights of Paris from the water on a hop-on hop-off Seine boat cruise. With either a 1- or 2-day ticket, glide leisurely along the river, hopping off and on when you wish to visit the attractions that most interest you, such as Musée d'Orsay and the Louvre. Or simply stay on the boat to admire Paris’ World Heritage-listed riverbanks.
events.name: Seine River Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Cruise in Paris

events.description: Escape the city of Paris for a day, and go on a tour to Versailles, which is known for its magnificent regal architecture. You’ll travel in a comfortable air-conditioned vehicle to Versailles, which takes the stress out of organizing transport. Conveniently, an entrance ticket to the Palace of Versailles is included, so you’ll beat the crowds. Your guide will enrich your experience with stories about the area’s royal history.
events.name: Small-Group Versailles Guided Tour from Paris

events.description: Glide down the River Seine while enjoying a gourmet 3-course lunch aboard a Bateaux Parisiens river cruise. Soak up views of riverside attractions like the Louvre, Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame and Musée d'Orsay as you dine on seasonal selections from an à la carte menu, accompanied by wine. Enjoy live entertainment and a welcome glass of Champagne for a bubbly beginning to the experience.
events.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Lunch Cruise with Live Music

events.description: Maximize your time at the Louvre with skip-the-line entrance and a private guided tour for you and your party. Take all the hassle out of exploring the world’s largest museum, as your guide whisks you to star attractions like the ‘Mona Lisa’, ‘Raft of the Medusa’ and ‘Venus de Milo’, and points out lesser-known gems among the vast exhibitions. Best of all: your private tour can be tailored to your preferences and you can stay at the museum as long as you like after the tour ends.
events.name: 1.5 Hour Louvre Museum Must-See Private Guided Tour

events.description: Travel from Ancient Greece to the Renaissance with a skip-the-line entrance ticket to the Louvre, a sprawling former palace. Glide right past the long lines for a cultural immersion with an included audio tour and museum map. Make a beeline to whatever strikes your fancy, such as Da Vinci's enigmatic "Mona Lisa" and the imposing "Venus de Milo" sculpture. Suggested routes let you explore independently while taking your time.
events.name: Skip the Line Louvre Museum Independant Audio Guided Tour

events.description: Visit the Palace of Versailles with skip-the-line admission, and avoid standing in the entrance queue before touring this royal chateau. On this 75-minute tour, follow a knowledgeable guide around the palace to see the King’s and Queen’s State Apartments and Hall of Mirrors. Then head outside independently to explore the expansive gardens at your leisure (note: an additional fee for the garden is required on days when the fountain show takes place).
events.name: Skip-the-line Versailles Classic

events.description: Marvel at the Loire Valley's opulent châteaux and taste its famous locally-made wine during this full-day tour from Paris. First head to Chateau de Chambord—the inspiration for Disney's 'Beauty and the Beast'—for a guided tour. Then, relax midday with a traditional French lunch at Nitray Vineyards, with unlimited wine. Then, visit the elegant Château de Chenonceau and embark on a tour through its intricately carved stone walls, rich hanging tapestries, and intimate chapel. Entrance fees, a gourmet lunch, and round-trip transportation from Paris are included.
events.name: Loire Valley Castles Tour from Paris: Chambord, Chenonceau with Lunch & Wine

events.description: See the French capital with a guide on a full-day tour of Paris, ideal for travelers short on time. Immerse yourself in the culture and architecture of the city as you travel along the banks of the Seine River to the iconic Eiffel Tower with lunch in a heated bubble dome on the tower terrace. Head inside the Louvre Museum to see artwork by Leonardo Da Vinci and tour Île de la Cité.
events.name: Paris in One Day: Louvre, Eiffel Tower Lunch and Notre Dame Cathedral

events.description: Avoid the huge crowds, and skip the line when going to the Arc de Triomphe in Paris. This 160-foot- (50-meter-) tall and 148-foot- (45-meter-) wide arch is a must-see when traveling to France’s capital. Stroll down Champs-Élysées, one of the city’s largest boulevards, to make your way there. Admire the mighty monument where the wars fought by France and the names of the French generals involved are written. Climb up the terrace for beautiful views across Paris and spend time visiting the tomb of the Unknown Soldier.
events.name: Skip the Line: Arc de Triomphe Including Terrace Access

events.description: Gain admission to more than 60 top Paris attractions with the Paris Pass—a flexible sightseeing pass that lets you access the best the French capital has to offer, such as the Palace of Versailles and Arc de Triomphe. Enjoy entrance to Parisian showstoppers like the Louvre Museum, Orsay Museum, and Centre Pompidou. Make the most of a 1-day hop-on hop-off Big Bus sightseeing tour, Bateaux Parisiens river cruise, and unlimited public transport with the included travelcard. Choose from a 2-, 3-, 4-, or 6-day pass; guidebook and map included.
events.name: Paris Pass Including Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour and Entry to Over 60 Attractions

events.description: Spend an evening immersed in a Paris cabaret with a 3-course dinner at the new Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles"® show. Make your way to the club on the Champs-Elysées, and settle in for a menu of French specialties while you watch the famous Bluebell girls kick up their heels onstage. Enjoy one of the city's newest cabaret productions, complete with music and a dazzling light show, and upgrade your ticket to include dinner in a private box with personalized service. Please note that the Lido de Paris is free for children under 11, with the exception of holidays.
events.name: Lido de Paris Cabaret Show with optional Dinner

events.description: Spend an evening at the iconic Moulin Rouge in Paris, where you enjoy a 3-course dinner with wine before watching the show ‘Feerie.’ Dine on quintessential French dishes like foie gras and fine seafood and then see dancers on stage perform the famous cancan. Transportation by coach is included from central Paris up to the bohemian Montmartre district. The Moulin Rouge dress code is elegant, so dress to impress!
events.name: Dinner and Show at the Paris Moulin Rouge with Transport

events.description: Soak in the splendor of Paris in one unforgettable night that includes fine-dining, sightseeing, and a flamboyant cancan show. Choose between dining at the Eiffel Tower and a sightseeing river cruise, or combine the experience with a spectacular dinner cruise along the Seine. Top your evening off by sipping Champagne and enjoying a show at the legendary Moulin Rouge.
events.name: Eiffel Tower,Dinner,Seine River Cruise and Moulin Rouge Show

events.description: Sit down to a 3-course Gallic dinner and pass Paris' top sites on this 4-hour evening cruise on the Seine River. From the panoramic windows of the dining room, look out at the Louvre, Musée d'Orsay, Ile de la Cité, Pont Alexandre III, and other glittering waterfront sights. Upgrade to include Champagne, cocktails, wine, or beer, and head to the top deck for open-air views of the City of Light.
events.name: Paris Seine River Cruise with 3-Course Dinner on board CAPITAINE FRACASSE

events.description: Make the most of your visit to one of the world’s most popular landmarks on a guided Eiffel Tower tour. Hear the history and legends behind the Paris icon as a guide accompanies you up to the second level, where panoramic views of the city await. Get help identifying the monuments below, and upgrade for summit access to go even higher.
events.name: Guided Eiffel Tower Tour by Elevator with Optional Summit Access Upgrade

events.description: Many visitors to France make time to visit both the Palace of Versailles and Monet's Impressionist garden at Giverny. This day trip from Paris allows you to do both. First, wander through the lush landscape around the artist’s residence, which served as inspiration for his Nymphéas (Water Lilies) series. After lunch, head to Versailles and visit Louis XIV's lavish royal palace. On particular dates, you see the fountains on display.
events.name: Day trip to Versailles Palace and Giverny's Monet House including Lunch

events.description: Spend a half-day in the charming Medieval town of Saint-Emilion on a  trip from Bordeaux. Explore the best of this UNESCO-listed village, including a wine tasting at a grand cru wine estate, a walk along the historic city walls and visits to unique artist galleries and studios. Enjoy some free time in Saint-Emilion, too.
events.name: St Emilion Half-Day Trip from Bordeaux

events.description: Put a twist on the typical Paris sightseeing tour with a private drive around the city in a Citroën Traction—a classic French car. Inside the open-top vehicle with a retractable roof, you'll drive through neighborhoods like Montmartre and the Latin Quarter and pass by major sights such as the Eiffel Tower, Champs-Elysées, the Louvre, and the Moulin Rouge. Learn about the city from a guide as you go. Up to four people can fit in one car.
events.name: Paris Private Tour by Classic French Citroën

events.description: Discover the beaches of the D-Day landings on this guided day trip to Normandy from Paris. Focusing on the sites where heavy losses were suffered by American soldiers, the tour stops at the Omaha Beach Visitor Centre, Utah Beach Museum, and the American Cemetery at Colleville-sur-Mer. Enjoy free time on the beaches and hear poignant tales about the events of June 6, 1944. During this full but inspiring day of sightseeing, revitalize with a cup of traditional cider and lunch at a waterside restaurant.
events.name: Normandy D-Day Landing Beaches Tour including Cider Tasting and Lunch

events.description: Treat yourself to an exclusive Parisian event with a VIP seat at the world-famous Moulin Rouge Show. Breeze past the queue with your skip-the-line ticket and take a seat in a premium seat. From your table, enjoy great views of the stage and indulge in Champagne and Dalloyau macaroons or chocolates as you watch the dazzling 2-hour cabaret show.
events.name: Moulin Rouge Show: VIP Seating with Champagne

events.description: Discover the cultural highlights and delectable bites of France’s capital on a culinary tour of Paris. Spend the afternoon strolling past the city’s iconic monuments with a guide and enjoy intermittent samples of pastries, chocolate and freshly baked bread. Listen to commentary of Paris’ rich heritage and receive personalized attention from your guide on this small-group tour, limited to only eight people.
events.name: Pastry and Chocolate Tour of Paris

events.description: Don’t miss the views of Paris from the Eiffel Tower at night, when the twinkling City of Lights spreads before you. This evening combination package lets you experience Parisian monuments three enchanting ways: sightseeing by coach, cruising on the Seine River, and admission to the Eiffel Tower's second floor. Orient yourself to top attractions like the Champs-Élysées, and Louvre Museum, and be part of Paris’ lively nighttime atmosphere.
events.name: Eiffel Tower Summit Optional,Seine River Cruise & Paris Lights Evening Tour

events.description: Hit all the Paris highlights, starting with a guided tour of the Eiffel Tower including standard access to the tower's summit. Follow up with a narrated cruise along the Seine River, a tour of Ile de la Cité home to the Notre-Dame Cathedral, and a guided walk through the Louvre Museum. Enjoy skip-the-line access so you can bypass the Louvre's outdoor crowds and tour the artworks with your guide.
events.name: Paris in One Day : Eiﬀel Tower Summit, Louvre, Notre-Dame, Seine River Cruise

events.description: See Paris’s iconic monuments from the water on a 1-hour sightseeing cruise along the Seine. Prepare for a thrilling introduction to Paris as you hop on-board a Compagnie des Bateaux-Mouches sightseeing boat and look out over the city from the open-air viewing deck. Keep your camera to hand as you pass waterfront attractions like Notre Dame Cathedral and La Conciergerie, admire the iconic façade of the Louvre and enjoy prime views of the Eiffel Tower.
events.name: Bateaux Mouches 1-Hour Seine River Cruise or Cruise with Optional Champagne

events.description: Travel back in time on a historical 12-tour of World War II landing sites, with optional hotel pickup. Departing from Paris, your driver will guide your group to the Beach of Normandy, where you'll see The Pointe du Hoc, a promontory that was a German fortification strong point until U.S. army members invaded on June 6, 1944. You'll visit the American Cemetery on a bluff above Omaha Beach, and explore other significant locations such as Mulberry Harbour — built specifically to speed the unloading process of Allied troops — and the Caen Peace Memorial. The tour also includes return transport to Paris.
events.name: Small-Group Normandy D-Day Battlefields and Landing Beaches Day Trip from Paris

events.description: The Palace of Versailles is one of the most visited attractions in France, but many tours only visit the palace itself. This full-day tour from Paris includes a visit to Claude Monet’s home Giverny; lunch at a spectacular riverfront location; a guided tour of Versailles; and a chance to see the popular Musical Fountain show.
events.name: Small-Group Day Trip to Giverny and Versailles from Paris

events.description: Versailles Palace is a must-see attraction in Versailles. Save time waiting in long lines, and make the most of your trip with priority access. Your skip-the-line ticket gives you special access to the Palace, the gardens, and the Trianons, via an independent entrance. You won’t have to worry about finding a place to eat, as a delicious breakfast at Ore Restaurant is included too.
events.name: Skip the Line: Versailles Palace Entrance Ticket and Breakfast at Ore Restaurant

events.description: Explore the Catacombs of Paris on a small-group tour limited to only six people. With this skip-the-line admission, you can avoid the typically long ticket queue at one of Paris' most fascinating attractions, and learn about the history of the underground burial site with a guide.
events.name: Semi-Private VIP Catacombs of Paris Restricted Access Tour

events.description: Most visitors ride the elevator at the Eiffel Tower, but travelers with a sense of adventure can save time by taking the stairs. Climb the 704 steps to the second viewing platform of the Eiffel Tower on this guided tour and be rewarded with spectacular views of the Louvre, the Arc de Triomphe, the Seine River, and the Champs-Élysées. Opt for a ticket to the summit and take the lift to the very top.
events.name: Guided Climb of the Eiffel Tower with Optional Summit Access

events.description: Book this Disneyland® Paris Ticket, a 1-Day 2-Park pass, and enjoy the flexibility to hop between two fantastic parks as often as you like: Disneyland® Park and Walt Disney Studios®. In Disneyland® Park, find thrills such as Space Mountain: Mission 2 and kid-friendly adventures for the whole family. At Walt Disney Studios® Park, enter the exciting world of movie magic, see how stunts are performed, and meet your favorite Disney characters.
events.name: Disneyland® Paris 1-Day Ticket

events.description: Go behind the scenes of the Champagne industry on this full-day guided tour of Epernay from Reims. Sample Champagnes throughout the day, including a visit to the prestigious Moët & Chandon cellars. Drive through the Avenue of Champagne and admire UNESCO-listed vineyards, and visit a restored 19th-century Champagne house for a regional family-style lunch. On this small-group tour, limited to eight people, you’ll learn to taste Champagne like an expert.
events.name: Champagne Day Trip to Moët & Chandon and Family Winery with Lunch from Reims

events.description: Experience one of the most popular areas of northwestern France, the ‘château country’ of the Loire Valley, a UNESCO World Heritage–listed region. With a guide, visit a few of the region’s many castles—Château d’Amboise, Château de Chenonceau and Château de Chambord. Learn about the Renaissance architecture and the historical figures who once lived in and visited these stunning residences. If you have a short stay in France, this is a great way to see more of the country than just Paris. Lunch with drinks is included.
events.name: Loire Valley Castles Small Group Day Trip from Paris by Minivan

events.description: Get the whole family engaged in the treasures of the Louvre during this 1.5-, 2-, or 3-hour private tour. Tailor the itinerary to the needs of your family, depending on time available, ages and interests of the family members. Skip-the-line privileges ensure less waiting in long ticket lines.
events.name: Kids and Families Skip-the-Line Private Louvre Tour in Paris

events.description: Retrace the steps of American D-Day troops on a full-day tour of Normandy’s US landing sectors from Bayeux. Travel by air-conditioned minivan with your expert guide, and stand at key landing and drop points, including Omaha Beach and St-Mere-Eglise. See the battle sites at La Pointe du Hoc, inspect the German batteries at Longues Sur Mer, and visit the Utah Beach Museum and Normandy American Cemetery to remember those who gave their lives in June 1944. Numbers are limited to eight people for a more personalized experience.
events.name: American D-Day Beaches Full Day Tour from Bayeux

events.description: Start your trip to Disneyland® Paris in style by hopping this dedicated express shuttle bus, which will whisk you to the park from four convenient pick-up locations. But this isn’t just comfortable, round-trip transportation. Your ticket includes direct admission to both Disneyland® Park and Disney Studios® Park—a convenient and hassle-free way to get your visit started. Small children get special discounts, and the air-conditioned shuttle bus has multiple departure times.
events.name: Disneyland® Paris Express Shuttle with Admission Tickets

events.description: Enjoy a fully personalized French Riviera tour when you book this seamless shore excursion. Meet your driver at the Cannes Port upon disembarkation, and travel in a comfortable minibus. As this is a private tour, your itinerary is up to you. Discover Cannes’ highlights, or venture to other in-demand destinations, from elegant Nice to picture-perfect Èze. You can even cross the border into Monaco to explore the Prince’s Palace and beyond. At the end of the day, return to the Cannes Port.
events.name: Cannes Large Group Shore Excursion

events.description: Get to know the Parisian neighborhood of Le Marais on a food walking tour with a guide who introduces you to local food vendors and artisans. You'll see sights like Hôtel de Ville and visit the oldest covered market in Paris, Marche des Enfants Rouges, as you learn about and taste the fine products found in this historical yet trendy district.
events.name: Marais District Food Walking Tour with Wine and Cheese Tastings

events.description: Delve into the Versaille’s visionary architectural array on a comprehensive full-day tour from Paris. Travel by luxury minibus to the regal city and sail past long lines outside of the Palace of Versailles with your priority-access pass. Embark on a guided tour of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed wonder and see grand chambers like the Hall of Mirrors. Absorb the botanical beauty of the palace gardens, and then head to an esteemed restaurant by the Grand Canal for a gourmet 3-course lunch. Conclude with a visit to the Queen’s Hamlet and the Grand Trianon.
events.name: Best of Versailles Day Trip from Paris including Skip-the-Line and Lunch

events.description: Immerse yourself in the opulence and drama of Versailles Palace and Gardens on a small-group tour from Paris to Versailles. With your ticket, breeze past the queue and join an expert guide for a fun and informative walk through the castle and gardens. Witness the extravagance of Louis XIV—the Sun King—who built up the massive 700-room complex, adorning the space with luxuries fit for the French monarchy.
events.name: Skip-the-Line Versailles Palace & Gardens from Paris with Optional Fountain Show

events.description: See the world-class treasures of Paris’s Louvre Museum on a 2-hour guided tour. Bypass the long entrance queues with a skip-the-line ticket, and follow an expert guide straight to collection highlights including the ‘Mona Lisa,’ ‘Venus de Milo’ and ‘Winged Victory of Samothrace.’ Learn the backstories of these artistic masterpieces to enrich your experience, and feel free to continue exploring the museum at the end of the tour. Group size is limited to six people for a more intimate tour.
events.name: Louvre Museum Guided Tour in English (Small Group 6 max)

events.description: Reach the heights of Paris's most iconic monument while bypassing the long wait with a skip-the-line ticket to the Eiffel Tower. Head to the front of the line and ride the elevators up to the first and second levels for marvelous views of the Trocadero gardens, the Louvre, and other famous monuments. Keep going all the way up to the summit level, where the whole of Paris stretches around you in an unforgettable panorama.
events.name: Eiffel Tower Skip-the-Line Ticket with Summit Entrance

events.description: Ensure a stress-free start and end to your vacation with a pre-arranged arrival and departure transfer between Charles de Gaulle or Orly airport, and your Paris hotel. Opting for a private transfer means no stops along the way to pick up other passengers, minimizing travel time, and your prepaid voucher means no need to worry about carrying cash or exchanging currency at the airport.
events.name: Paris Airports Roundtrip Transfer

events.description: Embark on a culinary tour of Paris's Montmartre neighborhood, one of the city's most charming neighborhoods. Sample delicacies like croissants and éclairs at a local patisserie, enjoy a guided tasting of various cheeses at a fromagerie and satisfy your sweet tooth at a classic chocolaterie. Of course no gourmet tour of Paris would be complete without a stop at a boulangerie, where you'll learn the proper way to eat a baguette in France.
events.name: Paris Secret Food Tour: Taste of Montmartre

events.description: Experience Paris from three different perspectives during this half-day city tour that covers the city’s top attractions. Tour essential sights from the comfort of a coach, and take to the water on a Seine River cruise, floating under its many bridges as you go. Then, skip the long lines at the Eiffel Tower to absorb panoramic views of the City of Lights from the second-floor observation deck.
events.name: Eiffel Tower Skip-the-Line Access, Seine River Cruise & Paris City Half Day Tour

events.description: See many noteworthy sights of Paris in one day, including skip-the-line access to the Eiffel Tower and Louvre Museum. With a guide, tour Montmartre and the Latin Quarter. At the Eiffel Tower, head up to the second level for views of the city. A ticket for a Seine River cruise is also included on this small-group sightseeing tour of Paris.
events.name: Paris in a Day: Montmartre, Louvre, Eiffel Tower and Seine River Cruise

events.description: Follow the fascinating story of Marie Antoinette and the French Revolution with an audio tour of the Palace of Versailles. Enjoy skip-the-line access to the magnificent chateau, then spend as long as you like exploring the elegant rooms. See the famous Hall of Mirrors, the King's Grand Apartment and the Royal Chapel, then stroll around the beautiful French gardens.
events.name: Skip-the-line Special Versailles Chateau and Gardens

events.description: Start your Paris vacation in style with a private arrival transfer from Charles de Gaulle airport. With a prepaid private transfer, there will be no waiting around at the airport—your driver will meet you on arrival, help with your luggage, and take you directly to your central Paris hotel in the comfort of private, air-conditioned vehicle.
events.name: Private Transfer from Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport to Paris

events.description: Finding your way around Paris needn’t be challenging, thanks to this hop-on hop-off bus tour. You have the option of one, two, or three days of double-decker bus access, covering various routes with stops at most of Paris’s most important museums, attractions, and shopping areas. And with your ticket, get all sorts of freebies, including walking tours and on-board audio guides with narration in multiple languages.
events.name: Open Tour Paris: Hop on Hop off Sightseeing Tour

events.description: Discover the world’s largest collection of Impressionist and Post-Impressionist art on a private, 1.5-hour tour of the Musée d'Orsay in Paris. Bypass the long entrance queues with skip-the-line access, and let an art historian guide lead you straight to masterworks by Monet, Cézanne, Renoir, Degas and more. Enjoy personalized attention from your guide and learn the history behind the art for a truly immersive experience.
events.name: Musée d'Orsay Skip the Line Private Tour

events.description: Majestic castles and wine tastings make up this unforgettable day trip to the charming Loire Valley. Skip-the-line admission to the chateaux of Chambord (or Amboise) and Chenonceau is included, with your choice of a licensed guide or audio guide. Get an up-close look at the extravagant glamour of the French aristocracy and gain insight into life within these Renaissance residences. Travel by luxury coach from Paris, with optional hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: Loire Valley Day Trip including Wine Tasting, Chambord and Chenonceau Castles

events.description: Discover the delights of France’s Côte d’Azur on this French Riviera day trip from Nice. Walk the famous red carpet at the Cannes Film Festival Centre. Explore the medieval village of Eze, nestled high in the hills over France’s rugged coastline. Watch gleaming yachts bobbing in the harbor in Antibes and Saint-Paul de Vence. Take in top attractions in Monaco including the Monte-Carlo Casino and Prince’s Palace with your guide.
events.name: French Riviera Day Trip from Nice

events.description: During this private excursion, beat the crowds at the popular Palace of Versailles with skip-the-line admission tickets, while learning more from your professional art historian guide than travelers exploring independently. Ideal for first-time visitors or those on a time budget, visit the palace, gardens, the Hall of Mirrors, and more, in only half a day.
events.name: Versailles Half Day Private Guided Tour From Paris With Skip The Line Tickets

events.description: Visit one of France’s top attractions on this independent day trip from Paris to Mont-St-Michel. Relax on a comfortable coach ride as you travel through the scenic landscapes of Normandy en route to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed island, and spend four hours exploring at your leisure with a multi-language audio guide (if option selected). Tour the famous Gothic abbey, wander through the narrow streets of the surrounding village, or admire views across the Atlantic Ocean, as you enjoy the island at your own pace, before heading back to Paris.
events.name: Mont-St-Michel Independent Day Tour with Optional Audio Guide from Paris

events.description: Spend an enchanted evening in Paris complete with dinner at the Eiffel Tower, a romantic Seine River cruise and a show at the world-famous Le Moulin Rouge cabaret club. This experience includes pick-up and drop-off at your central Paris hotel plus a half-bottle of champagne per person.
events.name: Eiffel Tower Dinner, Seine River Cruise and Moulin Rouge Show by Minivan

events.description: Discover Paris after sundown and find out what makes the City of Lights shine so bright as the city’s top monuments and Seine River illuminate the night. Enjoy a gourmet 3-course meal and absorb panoramic views in a bubble-dome on the terrace of the Eiffel Tower. Then, board a glass-topped boat and cruise along the Seine for some sightseeing after dark.
events.name: Eiffel Tower & Dinner Experience with Cruise on the River Seine

events.description: Experience Paris' famous Moulin Rouge cabaret like a VIP, with a 4-course dinner, Champagne and a view of the show from some of the best seats in the club. Enjoy skip-the-line access, complimentary coat check, a dinner of French specialties, fine wine and great views of the 2-hour cabaret performance from one of only 24 VIP balcony seats. It's an exclusive evening at Moulin Rouge, and a night you'll never forget.
events.name: Viator VIP: Moulin Rouge Show with Exclusive VIP Seating and 4-Course Dinner

events.description: Imagine how the extravagance of Versailles was part of everyday life for Marie Antoinette during a 4-hour guided tour of the palace with an optional fountain show. Take advantage of skip-the-line access to avoid the long lines at the start of your tour. Gaze in wonder at the Royal Apartments and the Queen’s Apartments, and walk through the glittering Hall of Mirrors to the Salon de la Guerre and the Salon de la Paix. Plus explore the expansive gardens on your own after the palace tour.
events.name: Palace of Versailles Tour from Central Paris with Optional Fountain Show

events.description: Soak in the incredible beauty and background of one of France's most recognizable landmarks, Mont Saint-Michel, while leaving Bayeux behind. Your day trip begins with a coastal drive to the UNESCO-listed site: a Gothic-style Benedictine abbey that sits atop a rocky bay perch. Explore its ramparts while an expert guide fills you in on Mont Saint-Michel's remarkable history and heritage. You'll have time to tour the onsite museum independently and stroll the neighboring village's cobbled streets, marveling at its traditional homes and walking atop its fortified wall.
events.name: Mont Saint-Michel Day Trip from Bayeux

events.description: Travel back in time to the site of France’s most extravagant monarch with this 2.5 hours guided audio tour of the Palace of Versailles. Fast-track entry allows you to skip the lines at this UNESCO World Heritage site, and you’ll arrive in style in a fully air-conditioned coach. Spend time exploring one of France's most famous and impressive landmarks.
events.name: Palace of Versailles with Skip the Line Audio Guided Tour

events.description: Discover the pleasures and history of Champagne on this full-day winery tour from Paris. In the Champagne wine region, visit the house of Moët & Chandon, which boasts 17 miles (28 km) of cellars, and meet a local producer. Learn about the growing, harvesting, and bottling process, and sample at least three types of Champagne. See the resting place of Dom Perignon, the monk who developed the French bubbly wine. Travel by comfortable van accommodating no more than eight people, and come away knowing how to properly taste Champagne.
events.name: Small-Group Champagne Tasting Day Trip from Paris with Moet et Chandon and Reims Cathedral Visit

events.description: Get to know the best of the Alsace region with this full-day tour from Strasbourg. Travel on scenic roads through green hills and Alsatian vineyards. Wander the cobblestoned streets of the charming towns of Colmar and Eguisheim, and explore the village of Riquewihr inside Medieval walls. Cap off a magical Alsatian day with a visit to the 12th-century castle of High Koenigsbourg. Get personalized attention from your knowledgeable guide throughout with group size limited to eight people.
events.name: Alsace Day Trip from Strasbourg: Colmar, Eguisheim, Riquewihr, High Koenigsbourg Castle

events.description: Take your understanding of French wine to another level with a guided wine and Champagne tasting in an atmospheric wine cellar in Paris. Sample six different wines in the course of an evening, including Bordeaux, Sancerre, Rhone and Champagne, while you learn about how to properly taste wines and how to read a French wine label. It's a relaxing way to deepen your cultural knowledge and taste some fantastic French wines at the same time. Upgrade to include a plate of cheese or cured meats to eat while you sip.
events.name: French Wine and Champagne Tasting in Paris

events.description: Enjoy two of Paris' most famous attractions with a sunset cruise on the Seine and a skip-the-line ticket for an Eiffel Tower night tour. Drift along the Seine, sipping Champagne from a reserved seat at the front as your guide points out what's happening along the banks. After your sightseeing cruise, take a short walk to the nearby Eiffel Tower for skip-the-line entry and a tour of the second-level viewing gallery.
events.name: Paris VIP Twilight Tour: Seine Champagne Cruise and Eiffel Tower Tour

events.description: Visiting the Louvre can be overwhelming for first-time visitors, so why not enjoy skip-the-line access and personal attention from your guide on a small-group tour? Journey through the history of art as you explore one of the world’s biggest and most famous museums on this 2.5-hour tour, with numbers limited to eight. See iconic works like the Venus de Milo and the Mona Lisa, discover little-known masterpieces, and learn how to distinguish different art styles and techniques. After your tour, spend as long as you want exploring the museum independently.
events.name: Skip-the-line Louvre Museum Guided Tour - Semi-Private 8ppl Max

events.description: Get acquainted with Paris' most important landmarks on this 10.5-hour Viator Exclusive VIP tour. With your small group of 9 people or fewer, visit the charming neighborhood of Montmartre, the Louvre, the Eiffel Tower and Île de la Cité, home of the Notre Dame Cathedral. Learn about the City of Light's culture, history and traditions through your guide's commentary and semi-private tours at each stop. All entrance fees, priority access to some attractions and round-trip private transportation from your accommodation in Paris are included.
events.name: Viator Exclusive: VIP Access to Louvre, Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame

events.description: Get out of Paris for a trip to the countryside on this tour to Giverny, the location of Claude Monet's House and Gardens. Travel by bus to the Monet property, where you have free time to wander around the house and grounds independently. An audio guide, available in several languages, is included, which you receive before departure. Select a morning or afternoon departure time when booking.
events.name: Independent Giverny and Monet's House Tour with Transport from Paris

events.description: Paris is often called the City of Light, but the nickname only makes sense if you experience this historic city at night. On this scenic evening boat cruise on the River Seine, take in the sparkling lights of Paris, complete with stunning river views. Along the way, enjoy the bistro ambience of the boat, pass several must-see attractions like the Eiffel Tower and Grenelle Bridge, and sip a glass of champagne—included in the tour price.
events.name: Champagne Evening cruise in Paris (1h30)

events.description: Experience Paris like an insider, and see the city’s popular attractions and secret hidden gems on a full- or half-day private tour that’s designed just for you. With this custom, private tour, you choose what you want to see in the city, and your ideal day in Paris will be pre-planned for you, complete with round-trip transportation. Catch sight of the iconic Notre Dame Cathedral, or the Eiffel Tower. Whether you’re interested in history, art, food, or something else, your guide (who’s born and raised in the City of Lights) will help you make the most of your time in Paris.
events.name: Private Tour: Customize Your Perfect Day in Paris

events.description: Glide by the famous sights of Paris on a relaxing sightseeing cruise down the Seine River. See treasured riverside monuments including the Eiffel Tower, Musée d'Orsay, the Louvre and Notre Dame Cathedral from aboard a comfortable riverboat. Learn about the history of passing attractions through audio commentary, and upgrade to include your choice of French-inspired aperitifs and snacks.
events.name: Vedettes de Paris Seine River Cruise: Direct Access E-Ticket

events.description: Short on time in Bayeux but keen to see Normandy’s World War II US D-Day sites? Visit some key 1944 American locations on this half-day tour from Bayeux. Journey by air-conditioned minivan to Omaha Beach and Pointe du Hoc, where US troops landed on June 6th. Gaze at the cliffs and beaches as your expert guide shares detail and stories of the landings and forces involved. Finish at the American Cemetery to pay homage to those who lost their lives. Numbers are limited to 15 for a more personalized experience.
events.name: Half-Day Group Tour to American D-Day Beaches from Bayeux

events.description: Gain insight into France’s war history on this private day trip to Normandy from Paris. Leave France’s busy capital behind and travel into rural Normandy with your private guide. Discover World War II landing sites and learn of the profound sacrifices the soldiers made during battle. Discover the Pointe du Hoc lookout position, and see the famous Omaha Beach. Explore an American cemetery then head to Longues-sur-Mer, a German battery position.
events.name: Private day tour to Normandy D-day beaches from Paris

events.description: See a different side of Paris’s ‘Iron Lady’ on a guided climbing tour of the Eiffel Tower. Take the slow and scenic route and climb the stairs! Learn all about the construction, controversies, and mystique surrounding the iconic tower from a guide as you ascend to the first and second levels, admiring Gustave Eiffel’s intricate design from angles and viewpoints that most visitors miss. It’s an adventurous way to go behind the scenes—and under the beams—of one of the world’s most popular attractions.
events.name: Eiffel Tower Climbing Experience with Guide and Optional Summit Upgrade

events.description: Spend an afternoon wine tasting in the French countryside in one of two famous wine regions – St-Emilion or Medoc – during a tour from Bordeaux. On this half-day tour, stop at two charming châteaux to sample the local wines. Nibble on French cheese and cured meats with fresh bread as you sip. Cap off the small-group tour with a mini-class, during which you'll learn some wine-tasting tips from an expert.
events.name: Small-Group Medoc or St-Emilion Wine Tasting and Chateaux Tour from Bordeaux

events.description: Discover the delights of Champagne—both the drink and the region itself—on this full-day excursion from Paris. You'll visit three different Champagne houses, including Moët & Chandon, to learn about production methods, see the cellars, and hear about the history of this beloved sparkling wine. Enjoy several tastings as well as lunch at a vineyard. Round-trip hotel transportation is provided so you don't have to worry about getting there yourself.
events.name: Small-Group Champagne Tour from Paris Including 3-Course Lunch

events.description: Stroll through the châteaux of Chenonceau, Chambord and Amboise on this full-day tour from Paris to the UNESCO-listed Loire Valley. Admire Chenonceau’s amazing floral gardens, and marvel at the sheer grandeur of Chambord, the largest chateau in the valley. At Amboise, see the quarters of King Francois I and the tomb of Leonardo Da Vinci. Learn from an informative guide about each site, and fit in souvenir shopping along the way. This small-group tour is limited to just eight people, ensuring personalized attention.
events.name: Small-Group Loire Valley Three Top Castles Day Trip with Wine Tasting

events.description: Explore the landscapes of the Normandy and Brittany regions during a 2-day tour from Paris, including one night in Caen. Stroll the charming streets of Honfleur and Rouen. Pay your respects at WWII sites like the D-Day beaches of Normandy and the American Cemetery and Memorial. Walk through the historic walled city of Saint-Malo. Visit the surreal island of Mont-St-Michel, one of the country's most recognizable landmarks. Transport, meals, entry fees and overnight lodging are included.
events.name: 2-Day Normandy, Saint Malo and Mont St Michel Tour from Paris

events.description: Enjoy a VIP, private full-day tour of Versailles Palace. Travel comfortably by a WIFI-equipped Mercedes Benz vehicle from Paris. Bypass the entrance queues with no-wait, skip-the-line admission tickets to the main residence, as well as the Grand Trianon, the Petit Trianon, and Marie Antoinette's private rural hamlet. Tours include a gourmet three-course lunch at the historic and picturesquely situated "La Flotille" restaurant.
events.name: Versailles Full Day Private Guided Tour With Lunch & The Marie-Antoinette Estate

events.description: See the world-famous treasures of the Louvre with this skip-the-line tour. Head to the front of the long queue and follow your guide to the museum’s most renowned masterpieces, including the ‘Venus de Milo’ sculpture and iconic paintings like ‘The Raft of the Medusa’ and the ‘Mona Lisa.’ Learn about the history and significance of these pieces from your expert guide and enjoy an intimate, small-group tour of no more than 12 people.
events.name: Louvre Masterpieces Express 1.5 hour Tour - Group of 12 max

events.description: Ring in the New Year in deluxe Parisian style with dinner and a show at the legendary Lido de Paris! Treat yourself to a gourmet 6-course dinner, accompanied by a bottle of fine French wine or Champagne and served in the Lido’s sumptuous, historic showroom. Then, feast your eyes on the decadent costumes and enchanting sets of the ‘Paris Merveilles’ cabaret revue, starring the famous Bluebell Girls and Lido Boy dancers. Celebrate the stroke of midnight with a Champagne toast, and dance to live orchestra music until dawn.
events.name: Lido de Paris New Year's Eve Dinner Show

events.description: Experience the magic of Disney with a European twist with this 1-day package tour, including the bedazzling Disney Illuminations show, complete with fireworks and light projections. Not only will you get a ticket to one or both Disneyland® Paris parks, but you'll also be provided with round-trip train (RER) tickets from Paris to the parks and back again.
events.name: Disneyland® Paris Park Entrance Ticket with Round-Trip Train from Paris

events.description: Discover the beauty of Bruges on a day trip by luxury coach from Paris. A guide leads you on foot through the UNESCO-listed city center, from cathedrals to palaces. Admire the well-preserved medieval architecture and learn about the history of this picturesque Belgian town. Soak up the sights of the "Little Venice of the North" on a seasonal canal cruise and take time out for a leisurely lunch (own expense).
events.name: Bruges Guided Visit Day Trip Optional Hotel Pick-Up from Paris

events.description: Enjoy a hassle-free arrival in Paris with this private transfer service. Meet your driver at Orly International Airport or Charles de Gaulle, and relax on the journey to your Paris hotel or private residence in the 75 zip code area. These private vehicles can accommodate up to eight passengers.
events.name: Paris Private Arrival Transfer: Charles de Gaulle (CDG) or Orly (ORY)

events.description: Go back in time to experience the opulence of the Palace and Gardens of Versailles on this small-group tour from Paris. Walk through the glittering Hall of Mirrors and see the Royal Apartments. Admire the enormous gardens and beautiful fountain displays. Weekend visitors from April to October can see the famous fountain shows. Choose either a half-day independent tour in either the morning or afternoon, or a full-day guided tour. Pick-up and drop-off at central Paris hotels is included to make everything hassle-free.
events.name: Small Group Versailles Palace Day Trip with Skip the Line Audio Guided Tour

events.description: Discover the dark side of the “City of Lights” with pre-booked admission tickets to the Paris Catacombs. Skip-the-line entry lets you beat the rush and jump to the front of the entrance queue. Wander through tunnels and rooms decorated in the human bones and skulls of millions of Parisians. Tickets include an audio headset with commentary available in three languages.
events.name: Skip the Line: Catacombs of Paris ticket and audio-guide

events.description: Ensure a smooth and stress-free end to your vacation by pre-booking a private departure transfer to Charles de Gaulle Airport in Paris. Your driver will pick you up from your central Paris hotel, help with your luggage and drive you directly to your terminal in time for your flight. All you have to do is sit back, relax and enjoy the views!
events.name: Paris Private Departure Transfer: Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport

events.description: Enhance your experience of Normandy and its intriguing historical heritage on a half-day tour of Pointe du Hoc and Omaha Beach from Bayeux. Delve into the turbulent past of the region with a knowledgeable guide and visit renowned D-Day battlefield sites situated on Normandy’s picturesque coastline. Pay tribute to fallen soldiers at the Normandy American Cemetery and Memorial and browse the exhibitions in the informative visitor center. Enjoy personalized attention from your guide on this small-group tour, limited to only eight people.
events.name: Normandy Beaches Half-Day Trip from Bayeux

events.description: Book a shared arrival transfer from Charles de Gaulle Airport to your downtown Paris hotel, and enjoy a stress-free start to your trip. It’s a simple, cost-effective daytime option that’s available between the hours of 4am and 11pm. Transport is by comfortable shuttle bus.
events.name: Paris Shuttle Arrival Transfer: Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG)

events.description: Spend a day sipping French reds and whites in the Saint-Emilion and Pomerol wine region. Departing from Bordeaux, visit two chateaux to taste the region’s famous wines and wander the streets of beautiful Saint-Emilion, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
events.name: Saint-Emilion Day Trip from Bordeaux

events.description: Discover the subterranean cellars and winemaking secrets of the Bordeaux wine region on a half-day tour from Bordeaux. Admire sweeping vistas of the picturesque countryside as you travel by air-conditioned coach to prestigious wineries in the appellations of either Saint-Emillion or Mèdoc. Descend into the ancient cellars and see oak barrels of refined wines before marveling at expansive sprawls of vineyards. Pamper your palate with delicious samples of wine and gain fascinating insight into the wines’ delicate flavors and meticulous manufacture.
events.name: Bordeaux Vineyards Wine Tasting Half-Day Trip

events.description: Discover France’s exquisite Champagne country on this full-day history and tasting tour from Paris. In a small group, wind through verdant hillsides en route to wine estates, a distinguished Champagne house and the charming city of Reims for a tour of the famous Gothic cathedral. Your tasting adventure includes guided tours of vineyards and champagne cellars, complimentary samples of sparkling wines and a traditional French lunch.
events.name: Champagne Small-Group Day Trip including Moet & Chandon Visit & Lunch

events.description: Hop over to London in less than 2.5 hours on the high-speed Eurostar train from Gare du Nord in central Paris. Travel in comfort and arrive early to enjoy a full day exploring the British capital. Discover top sights such as Big Ben, the Houses of Parliament, Westminster Abbey, and the Tower of London. Enjoy a hop-on hop-off double-decker bus tour, Thames River cruise, and a choice of two walking tours before you cross the Channel back to Paris.
events.name: Day Trip from Paris to London by train including Hop on Hop off Tour

events.description: Visit one of France’s most popular locations, the Palace of Versailles, on this private excursion from Paris. Explore the home of former French kings and queens as you stroll through hidden rooms, the Hall of Mirrors, and the gardens as well as the Petit Trianon of Marie Antoinette. Learn about the rich history of France and Versailles from your dedicated tour guide as you explore.
events.name: Versailles Monarchy from Paris

events.description: A Seine River cruise—plus a gourmet lunch—is not to be missed during a stay in Paris. Board a glass-enclosed boat conveniently located in central Paris, and float past attractions such as the Eiffel Tower and Notre-Dame Cathedral. You’re served a 3-course meal while you savor the views. Upgrade to include a glass of French wine or Champagne to pair with exquisite cuisine on board.
events.name: Lunch Seine River Cruise with 3-Course Gourmet Meal

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/175789P22/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Louvre Museum Exclusive Experience

events.description: Add some extra sparkle to your Paris trip with a Champagne-tasting cruise down the River Seine. With an English-speaking sommelier, enjoy an educational Champagne presentation in the comfort of a private room. Sip on three fine Champagnes as you float past Paris’ signature monuments such as the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, and Musée d’Orsay.
events.name: Champagne Tasting on a Seine River Cruise

events.description: Spend a celebratory Christmas Eve or Christmas day gliding down the River Seine on an elegant Bateaux Parisiens dining cruise. Toast to your friends and loved ones with a glass of Champagne while admiring waterside views of the UNESCO-listed riverbanks and landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, the Louvre, and Musée d’Orsay. Take a seat in your chosen section for a gourmet, 5-course dinner accompanied by wine and live entertainment for a truly memorable holiday.
events.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Christmas Cruise with 5-Course Dinner or Lunch

events.description: The Eiffel Tower is one of Paris' most popular attractions — why not bypass those lengthy lines all the way up to the second floor? This small-group, skip the ticket desk line gets you entry to the base of the Eiffel Tower and direct access to the tower's second-level viewing platform, which offers views of everything from the Louvre Museum to Notre Dame Cathedral. A guide accompanies you, providing details on the tower's origins and intricacies as you go.
events.name: Skip the Ticket Desk: Eiffel Tower Guided Tour

events.description: Enjoy a full day of exploring the beautiful Médoc region on a wine tour from Bordeaux. The Médoc region is responsible for some of the best wines that are produced in Bordeaux, and it’s an excellent place to go wine tasting in France. Stop at three wineries housed in magnificent chateaux. The idyllic surroundings, renowned vineyards and historic castles make this a perfect day trip from Bordeaux.
events.name: Full-Day Medoc Wine Tour from Bordeaux

events.description: Uncover history and art on a small-group, full-day tour from central Paris. Explore Giverny, including its tranquil water lily gardens at Monet’s house and famed Musee des Impressionnismes; indulge in lunch at Moulin de Fourges; and then discover the splendor of the Palace of Versailles with its decadent Hall of Mirrors and gardens.
events.name: Giverny and Versailles Small Group Day Trip from Paris

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/131161P16/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: The D-day, Normandy Landing Beaches Private Tour From Paris-VIP Service

events.description: Visit one of WWII’s most important battle sites on this full-day small-group tour of the Normandy landing beaches from Bayeux. Walk the battlefields and beaches where thousands of Allied troops took part in history’s largest seaborne invasion and learn all about the fateful events of ‘D-Day’. Tour key sites like Utah beach, Omaha Beach and Pointe Du Hoc, then pay your respects at the Normandy American Cemetery.
events.name: Full-Day Group Tour of American D-Day Beaches from Bayeux

events.description: Pedal your way around the parks of Versailles and enjoy skip-the-line entrance to the magnificent palace on this full-day tour from Paris. Learn the secrets of palace life, the truth about Marie Antoinette and the palace’s role in the French Revolution on a bike tour of Marie-Antoinette's Hamlet and the Petit and Grand Trianons. Next, bypass the queue and head straight inside the Palace of Versailles, where you’ll have time to explore independently and use your audio-guide to discover the King’s apartments and famous Hall of Mirrors.
events.name: Versailles Bike Tour with Skip-the-Line Entrance to Palace

events.description: Enjoy the idyllic scenery and world-class wines on a half-day wine tour of the Médoc region from Bordeaux. Visit two classified growth chateaux wine estates for guided wine tastings. Admire the spectacular scenery surrounding them and along the drives. Pass other famous chateaux, such as Palmer and Chateaux Margaux.
events.name: Médoc Half-Day Wine Tour from Bordeaux

events.description: Fans of French Impressionism don’t want to miss this half-day trip by luxury coach to the village of Giverny, where Claude Monet and other artists lived and painted. Enjoy priority access to Monet's exquisite 19th-century home, then, with an art historian as your guide, tour the flowerbeds, Japanese bridge, and water lily pond that served as inspiration for Monet's paintings, including the Nymphéas series.
events.name: Skip the Line: Giverny and Monet House Half-Day Trip from Paris

events.description: See Paris at its best during this nighttime tour that includes a show at the Moulin Rouge. You’ll start with an illuminations tour past the Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe and other famous sights, made even more beautiful as they light up after dark. Then head to the Moulin Rouge, home of the cancan, in the Montmartre district for a dazzling performance of ‘Feerie.’ Choose either a standard coach tour or small-group tour by minivan for a more intimate sightseeing experience.
events.name: Paris by Night Illuminations Tour and Paris Moulin Rouge Show

events.description: Swap Paris for Versailles on this intimate half-day tour. It’ll be the ultimate hassle-free experience with hotel pickup, drop-off and transfers included. By having a private guide, you’ll be able to ask questions along the way and personalize your experience. You’ll save time waiting in line by having a skip the line entrance ticket when visiting the Palace and Gardens of Versailles.
events.name: Intimate Half-Day Afternoon Tour at Versailles from Paris

events.description: Make your trip to one of the world's most romantic cities even more so by including a vow renewal in Paris at the Eiffel Tower. Choose the iconic French monument or another central spot in Paris as the location for your ceremony, where a celebrant will read your vows. After a brief ceremony, enjoy a romantic walk through this incredible city, escorted by a professional photographer who will capture every wonderful moment. Receive roughly 130-150 high-quality images by email as part of the package. You can upgrade to include professional video footage of the occasion, too.
events.name: Renew Your Wedding Vows in Paris

events.description: During the Holiday season, experience the festive magic of Paris by going on this private tour. Accompanied by your guide, explore diverse sites and Christmas-spirited neighborhoods as you navigate on foot and by private transportation. Discover top landmarks at their most festive including the Louvre, the Eiffel Tower, and the Champs Elysees. Observe Galeries Lafayette’s famed Christmas window display and creative Christmas tree, a ride on the Ferris wheel at a Holiday market and relax as you indulge in seasonal snacks and mulled wine or some rich hot chocolate.
events.name: Paris Christmas illuminations + ferris wheel ride & Holiday market private Tour

events.description: See Paris like a local as you pedal around its vibrant neighborhoods, lively markets and hidden sights on this small-group bike tour. Explore the famous Latin Quarter, the Jewish communities of Le Marais and the historic Place de la Bastille, as well as enjoying views of iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre and Notre-Dame Cathedral. With plenty of rest stops and photo opportunities, this tour is suitable for all ages and fitness levels.
events.name: Hidden Paris: Day Bike Tour
