events.description: Chart the story of the World War II D-Day landings by American forces on this day trip from Bayeux. Learn about the objectives and achievements of the US assaults on June 6, 1944 as you visit the key beaches of Utah and Omaha, and German battery at Pointe du Hoc. Plus, visit the Airborne Museum at Sainte-Mère-Église and the US cemetery overlooking Omaha. Air-conditioned minivan transport, entrance fees, and central Bayeux pickup and drop-off included.
events.name: Full-Day American Battlefields and Sites of Normandy Tour from Bayeux

events.description: Take an incredible walking tour of the Palais Garnier, Paris' premier opera house, to see one of largest opera houses in Europe. The Opera Garnier, as it is often called, inspired the setting for the famous musical, 'Phantom of the Opera.' During the tour, your expert guide will show you the Grand Foyer, the sumptuous main staircase (Grand Escalier), the Member's Rotunda and the auditorium itself. Enjoy the opulent Neo-Baroque décor of this beautiful building, designed by French architect Charles Garnier in the late 19th century.
events.name: Treasures of the Opera Garnier Tour in Paris

events.description: Dinner in Paris is almost always a fabulous experience, but dinner at the Eiffel Tower is truly something to brag about to friends back home. This evening tour combines a gourmet meal and wine at the Eiffel Tower terrace with a relaxing cruise on the Seine River, which takes you underneath Paris’ beautiful bridges and past sights like the Musée d’Orsay. Hotel pickup and drop-off are included.
events.name: Eiffel Tower Dinner and Seine River Cruise by Minivan

events.description: Avoid the crowds and explore the Palace of Versailles at your own pace with skip-the-line entry to the awe-inspiring French château, including an intelligent audio pen. Walk in the footsteps of Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette as you explore the opulent interiors, walk through the famous Hall of Mirrors and stroll around the beautiful French Gardens. Finally, pay a visit to Marie Antoinette’s Estate and enjoy the dazzling musical gardens or fountains show (depending on the day).
events.name: Skip-the-Line Versailles Pass

events.description: Disneyland® Paris is one of Europe’s most popular family-friendly attractions—with the crowds to match. Skip the entry lines and save time for more rides with these pre-booked admission tickets, which allow you to hop between both parks as often as you’d like, depending on the duration selected. Choose between 2-, 3-, and 4-day options to mix-and-match sights in both Disneyland® Park and Walt Disney Studios®.
events.name: Disneyland® Paris Multi-Day Ticket

events.description: Delve into the creative mind of impressionist master Claude Monet on this small-group Giverny day trip from Paris, including round-trip transport and admission tickets. Explore the artist’s former home and gardens independently, where you can peek into his studio and bedroom, and stroll through the colorful gardens, which inspired many of his paintings. Next, pay a visit to the Museum of Impressionism (extra cost), visit Monet’s grave or stroll through the village of Giverny, where you’ll find many cafes and souvenir shops.
events.name: Giverny Small group transfer and Skip-the-Line Ticket

events.description: Meet over 200 celebrities at the Grevin Wax Museum in Paris with this direct access ticket. Step through the reserved pre-paid ticket entrance to see famous figures populate historic scenes of Paris. Snap photos of the lookalikes, including Ryan Gosling, Marilyn Monroe, Louis XIV, and Mozart, and learn how the wax figures are made at the end of the tour.
events.name: Grevin Paris Wax Museum Ticket

events.description: Visit the Belgian city of Bruges in just one day on this 14-hour tour from Paris. Often referred to as the Venice of the North, Bruges is known for its canals and UNESCO World Heritage–listed historic center. This independent tour includes round-trip transportation and an audio guide. Your time in Bruges is yours to spend as you wish, allowing you the freedom to explore on your own.
events.name: Bruges Independent Day Trip with Optional Audio Guide from Paris

events.description: Experience the history and gastronomy of Paris on a family-friendly combo tour. Sightsee around the French capital from the comfort of your coach and cruise along the Seine to admire landmarks such as the Louvre and Notre-Dame. Cap it off with a gourmet meal inside a heated transparent-bubble dome on the first-floor terrace of the Eiffel Tower—priority access, drinks, and views included.
events.name: Paris City Half Day Tour with Seine River Cruise & Lunch at the Eiffel Tower

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/2050P290/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Dinner Cruise & Eiffel Tower with Moulin Rouge Show

events.description: See all the highlights of the French Riviera, from Cannes to Monaco, on this small-group day trip from Nice. Soak in the scenic beauty of the road that snakes between cliffs and towns and the Mediterranean Sea. Enjoy pretty coastal towns like Eze, Cannes, and Juan-les-Pins as well as the glamorous city-state of Monaco. A small tour group size of no more than eight people ensures plenty of personalized attention from your guide.
events.name: French Riviera Small Group Day Trip from Nice

events.description: Indulge in a true gourmet French experience: preparing, cooking, and enjoying your own 3-course meal. Choose between a 4.5- or 6-hour Paris culinary course (a 1.5-hour market visit is optional) then set out to learn the tricks and techniques of French cooking. An instructor will help you through the steps of creating an appetizer, main dish, and dessert. French wine is also included with your gourmet lunch.
events.name: Paris Cooking Class Including 3-Course Lunch, Wine and Optional Market Visit

events.description: Let the dancers of the famous Le Moulin Rouge entertain you for an evening in Paris with the latest show, ‘Feerie.’ This experience includes round-trip transport between your hotel and the club, as well as a half-bottle of champagne to make the night even more celebratory.
events.name: Moulin Rouge Show with Transfers

events.description: Capture your unique journey in the City of Lights with professional photos taken by a professional photographer who knows exactly where to get unique shots. Enjoy a 1 hour private photo session, great for families, engagement photos, and vacations with friends. Choose from several iconic sights in Paris’ amazing cityscape; the Eiffel Tower, Louvre, Jardin de Tuileries, or a landmark of your choice, can be your backdrop.
events.name: Paris Private Photoshoot Experience

events.description: See more of the French Riviera from a base in Nice with a half-day trip from Nice to Eze and Monaco. Explore two of the highlights along the Mediterranean, from the luxurious city-state of Monaco to the Medieval hilltop town of Eze. Tour a traditional perfumery in Eze, watch the changing of the guard at Monaco's Royal Palace and do a lap of Monaco's Formula One Grand Prix circuit. Tour group size is limited to eight people, ensuring plenty of personalized attention from your guide.
events.name: Monaco and Eze Small Group Half-Day Trip from Nice

events.description: See the best of beautiful Provence during a small-group day trip from Nice. Spend time visiting coastal Cannes, home of the world-famous film festival. Take a guided tour of a perfumery in Grasse, explore the medieval hilltop village of Gourdon and roam the galleries and boutiques of Saint Paul de Vence. Transportation is taken care of, so you’re free to relax and enjoy the day. A small group size of no more than eight people ensures plenty of personalized attention from your guide.
events.name: Provence Countryside Small Group Day Trip From Nice

events.description: Explore Paris on your own terms on this private half-day tour. Instead of the tiring tours for large groups, travel by air-conditioned transport and receive a personalized overview of top Paris attractions in the company of just your family and friends (up to eight people). Simply indicate which sights you’d like to see during a 3- or 4-hour tour. Admire the Eiffel Tower, capture breathtaking city views from Sacre-Coeur in Montmartre and ogle the luxurious shops on Champs- Élysées. Enjoy a hotel pickup at a time of your convenience.
events.name: Paris Half-Day City Tour with a Private Driver

events.description: The gardens of Versailles span an impressive 1,976 acres. Rather than exploring the sprawling grounds on foot, pedal your way around with an informative guide on this full-day Versailles bike tour from Paris. Discover a leisurely 10 miles of garden trails and tree-lined paths behind the palace, and reach parts of the grounds that visitors on foot do not frequent, including Marie Antoinette's country-style Hameau, the Petit Trianon and the Grand Trianon. Stop by the Grand Canal for a picnic lunch before heading inside the Palace of Versailles.
events.name: Day Bike Tour of Versailles from Paris

events.description: Tour the historic locations of World War II on this tour of D-Day sites and the Mémorial de Caen museum. See Omaha Beach, Pointe du Hoc and other important D-Day sites, as well as a guided tour of Mémorial de Caen. This is an ideal day trip from Paris, especially since it begins at the Caen train station. Group size is limited to seven for the American sites ensuring a personalized experience.
events.name: D-Day Tour Including Guided Visit of the Mémorial de Caen Museum, Lunch and D-Day Landing Beaches

events.description: Step back in time to June 1944 with a visit to Normandy's main landing beaches. Set out on a guided tour from Paris to visit these legendary sites including Omaha Beach and Colleville American Cemetery, where the bodies of American soldiers who lost their lives on D-Day and at the Battle of Normandy reside. Afterward, spend some time exploring the medieval town of Bayeux, one of the few places in France's Calvados department to remain mostly intact following WWII.
events.name: D-Day in Normandy - Landing Beaches Guided Tour from Paris

events.description: Spend an evening in Paris at the Moulin Rouge, where you’ll enjoy a 3-course French dinner with Champagne and enjoy the cabaret show ‘Feerie.’ While the dancers on stage kick up their heels to perform the famous cancan, you’ll dine on quintessential dishes like foie gras, fine seafood and, of course, a decadent dessert. Unlike similar tours, this Moulin Rouge admission includes hotel pickup and drop-off so you don’t have to worry about how to get to the show in the Montmartre district.
events.name: Dinner and Show at the Moulin Rouge with Hotel Pickup

events.description: Discover grand spires and medieval houses along the Eure River on a 5-hour trip to Chartres from Paris with a private driver and guide. Find out firsthand why the Chartres Cathedral has been a pilgrimage place since the 12th century as you explore the rich symbols and artwork that adorn the stunning interior. Enjoy the flexibility of a private tour, so you can visit the cathedral and surrounding old city at your own pace, with plenty of time to see the places that interest you most.
events.name: Chartres and Its Cathedral: 5-Hour Tour from Paris with Private Transport

events.description: This tour allows you to see the City of Lights after dark on a city bus tour. See the Paris' landmarks and monuments illuminated, such as the Place Pigalle, Moulin Rouge, and the Eiffel Tower.
events.name: Big Bus Paris Night Tour

events.description: Skip the long lines with easy access to the Catacombs. Explore these underground tunnels and learn their fascinating history as a solution to the overcrowded cemeteries of Paris. Follow your guide through this subterranean world of skulls and other human remains dating back to the 18th century. This tour grants you rare access to typically forbidden parts of the Catacombs.
events.name: Catacombs Guided Tour - Skip the Line access

events.description: Champagne tasting at Moët & Chandon and Taittinger is a not-to-be-missed experience for connoisseurs of vintage French bubbly. This small-group tour of the Champagne-producing region of Reims, France also includes a stroll down the Avenue de Champagne in Épernay.
events.name: Small-Group Day Tour of Moët et Chandon and Taittinger with Champagne Tasting from Reims

events.description: See the 'City of Lights' sparkle on a guided night tour of the Eiffel Tower. Skip the ticket desk line and rise straight up to the second-floor observation deck of Paris’ most recognizable landmark. Take in spectacular panoramic views of the cityscape, and admire illuminated monuments like Notre-Dame Cathedral, Sacré Coeur Basilica, the Arc de Triomphe, and the Louvre. Great for a post-dinner adventure, it’s an iconic finish to a day of sightseeing in Paris.
events.name: Skip the Ticket Desk Line: Eiffel Tower Tour by Night

events.description: Reims is the Champagne capital of France and there’s no better place to sample the world’s finest Champagne. This full-day tour includes a tour of the Veuve Clicquot Champagne estate, a visit to the UNESCO-listed Cathedral of Reims, a Champagne lunch, and Champagne tasting in the Montagne de Reims’ vineyards.
events.name: Champagne Tasting Day Tour: Veuve Clicquot, family domains, lunch included

events.description: See and taste magnificence on this 11-hour tour from Paris that takes you to the Chambord Château and Loire Valley wineries. At Chambord, learn all about the French Renaissance castle during an audio tour. Then, spend time at two family-run wineries and savor white, red, rose, sparkling and sweet wines. With your appetite opened up, settle in at one of these wineries for a traditional gourmet meal. This small-group tour limited to just eight people includes hotel pick up and drop off in central Paris by air-conditioned minivan.
events.name: Small Group Wine-Day Trip from Paris: Chambord Castle and Loire Valley Wines

events.description: Enjoy two of Paris' most iconic experiences on this combo Seine River cruise and Moulin Rouge tour. On board the river cruise, you'll pass by illuminated waterfront landmarks such as Notre-Dame Cathedral, and then head north to the Moulin Rouge for its 'Féerie' cabaret show, which includes one glass of Champagne. Hotel pickup is not provided but hotel drop-off is for accommodations within the city.
events.name: Seine River Cruise & Moulin Rouge Show with Champagne Evening Experience

events.description: Enjoy two iconic Parisian experiences during this evening tour that combines a dinner cruise on the Seine River with admission to the Moulin Rouge. First, see Paris sights like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre and Notre Dame Cathedral while enjoying a 3-course meal of French cuisine aboard a La Marina de Paris glass-enclosed boat. Then head to the Moulin Rouge in the Montmartre district for a performance of the show ‘Feerie,’ which includes a half bottle of Champagne per person. Hotel transport is included for your convenience.
events.name: Parisian Evening Experience: Seine River Dinner Cruise and Moulin Rouge Cabaret

events.description: Visit the Musée du Louvre to see its most famous artwork, Leonardo da Vinci's 'Mona Lisa,' without the typical crowds on this tour that provides skip-the-line access for the museum's last entry of the day. Enter the museum as it's getting ready to close, taking advantage of this time of day to admire the painting among fewer people. Plus, see the museum's other masterpieces with an art historian guide. Tour is limited to 15 people for a small-group experience.
events.name: Skip the Line - Closing Time with the Mona Lisa

events.description: On this gourmet, half-day food crawl through Nice, you’ll enjoy a full dinner on the go as you travel between over nine different tasting stops. Soak up the sights and sounds of the picturesque Old Town, discovering in-the-know gastronomy hotspots where only locals go. Highlights include a tasting platter of local Niçoise treats, a creamy gelato, and an Italian-run olive oil boutique.
events.name: Afternoon and Dinner Food and Wine Walking Tour in Nice

events.description: Immerse yourself in Paris cabaret during a "Paris Merveilles"® show including a 3-course dinner. In a premier venue located on the Champs-Elysées, dine in style on fine French cuisine, accompanied by wine or Champagne depending on your choice of menu. Then, soak up the glitz and glamour of the Bluebell girls during a sequin-studded spectacle. Opt to upgrade to the VIP experience to include dinner in a private box with personalized service. Please be advised that this performance contains partial nudity, and may not be appropriate for all audiences.
events.name: Lido de Paris Cabaret Dinner Show

events.description: Leave the long drive from Paris to the professionals and check off six key World War II sights in just one day on this comprehensive tour. Learn about 1944’s Normandy Landings from your guide as you visit Omaha Beach, the American Military Cemetery, the Canadian Juno Beach Center, the cliffs of Pointe du Hoc, the Mémorial de Caen museum and memorial, and the remains of an artificial harbor at Arromanches-les-Bains.
events.name: Guided Normandy D-Day Beaches Day Trip from Paris

events.description: Depart Paris via comfortable luxury vehicle for a private tour of Versailles, the stunning château and gardens that were once home to French royalty. Enjoy direct pick-up from your Paris lodging and journey to this iconic UNESCO World Heritage Site, where your licensed guide helps you unlock its secrets. Skip the lines and go straight inside to explore such rooms as the King's Grand Apartment and the opulent Hall of Mirrors, then return outdoor to stroll Versailles's exquisite gardens before returning to Paris.
events.name: Versailles 4-hour Private Guided Tour with Hotel Pickup

events.description: Skip the long lines and see famous works of art on this semi-private, guided tour of one of the world’s most famous museums. Designed to show the very best of the Louvre, your small group will pass by the lines to see popular pieces including Venus de Milo and the Mona Lisa. Learn the art history of the French Romantic, Neoclassical, and Renaissance movements and enjoy free time to explore.
events.name: Skip-the-line: Louvre Museum Highlights small group Guided tour

events.description: See one of Paris's spookiest attractions with this skip-the-line tour of the "world's largest grave." You'll get to forego the oftentimes long lines in front of the attraction and head straight inside. Be prepared to see thousands of bones and skulls, remains from graves that were overflowing and consequentially excavated in the 17th century and hear amusing antidotes from your expert guide.
events.name: Skip the Line Paris Catacombs Tour

events.description: Venture far off the beaten track and discover hidden culinary hotspots on this small-group food and wine tasting tour through Nice. Travel comfortably on foot as you follow your guide to multiple culinary stops, and enjoy a bite of local specialties like Swiss chard and white truffles. You also hit a few drink stops for a taste of local wines and brews.
events.name: Half-Day Food and Wine Walking Tour in Nice

events.description: Enjoy a leisurely trip down the Seine on this Bateaux Parisiens river cruise. Glide past Paris’ world-famous monuments including Notre Dame Cathedral, the Eiffel Tower and historic bridges like the Pont Neuf. Listen to audio commentary along the way to learn more about passing attractions. Cruise during the day, or choose an evening departure time to float through the enchanting city at night. Either way, it’s a fantastic introduction to the highlights of Paris.
events.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Sightseeing Cruise

events.description: When it’s time to say goodbye to Paris, end your trip the easy way with this shared departure transfer to Charles de Gaulle Airport. It’s a wallet-friendly alternative to the pricey private taxi rides. Transfer services are available from centrally located Paris hotels with a postcode starting with 75 and apply to flights departing between 4am and 11pm.
events.name: Paris Shuttle Departure Transfer: Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG)

events.description: Uncover the secrets of the macaron with this small-group baking class at Galeries Lafayette. Meet your instructor, a French pastry chef, in a quiet corner of the iconic department store. Over the course of 1.5 hours, learn to prepare the delicate shells and ganache of the perfect macaron. Work with organic ingredients to create flavors like chocolate, pistachio, and more.
events.name: Macaron Bakery Class at Galeries Lafayette

events.description: Discover two gems of the French Riviera with this delightful half-day shore excursion from Cannes. Soak up the medieval charm and hilltop views in Eze, and treat your senses with a visit to the Fragonard perfume factory. Explore tiny, glamorous Monaco, where you’ll visit the tomb of Princess Grace, take in the action of the Formula One Grand Prix race track and see where the world’s high rollers come to play at Monte Carlo’s Casino Square. Numbers are limited to eight people for a personalized small-group experience.
events.name: Cannes Shore Excursion: Small-Group Monaco and Eze Half-Day Tour

events.description: When you don’t have oodles of time in the French capital, make the most of it with a trip to Versailles and a tour of the best of Paris in one day. Spend the morning at the extravagant Palace of Versailles with a guide, then head back to Paris for lunch, a sightseeing cruise on the Seine River and a coach tour of the City of Lights.
events.name: Full Day Tour with Versailles Palace, Eiffel Tower and Seine River Cruise

events.description: Revel in the high-octane splendor of the early 9pm Paris Merveilles® show with this fabulous package, which includes half a bottle of Champagne. At the Lido de Paris, a prestigious cabaret venue in the heart of Boulevard Champs-Elysees, you’ll witness a sequin-studded spectacle that combines flawless choreography with high-energy dancing and music. Plus, you’ll receive half a bottle of Champagne to enjoy during the 1.5-hour show. Please note, the performance contains partial nudity and may not be appropriate for all audiences.
events.name: Lido de Paris 9pm Show with Champagne

events.description: Paris is one of the most romantic cities in the world and an evening cruise down the illuminated Seine is the perfect way to ramp up the romance. This cruise includes a delicious 3-course dinner and Champagne along with spectacular views of Paris icons such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame Cathedral, and the Louvre Museum.
events.name: Romantic Dinner Cruise with Champagne

events.description: Explore one of the world's most important collections of impressionist and post-impressionist art on this guided tour of the Musée d'Orsay. Instead of trying to navigate the museum on your own, you'll enjoy insight from a guide to make sure you see the top pieces and learn about the artists, such as Van Gogh, Monet, Manet, and Renoir.
events.name: Impressionists at the Musée d'Orsay: Guided Tour with Skip-the-Line Access

events.description: Escape Nice for a tour east along the Mediterranean coast on this half-day trip to Eze and Monaco. Admire a panoramic view of the sea from Villefranche before arriving in Eze, a historic French village known for its hilltop perch. Then head to the Principality of Monaco to see sights like the Monte Carlo Formula One racetrack.
events.name: Half-Day Tour to Eze and Monaco-Monte Carlo from Nice

events.description: Discover the charms of one of Paris' most popular neighborhoods on a walking tour of Montmartre, a district known for its artists and historically bohemian vibe. Start your rout at the Moulin Rouge and see where artists like Van Gogh, Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec, and Pissarro lived and worked. See sights like the Basilica du Sacré-Coeur, and get insights from your guide about the art, music, food, and history of Montmartre.
events.name: Montmartre Walking Tour: Paris' Best Art, Culture and Food

events.description: Get an up-close look at the site of America’s D-Day invasion with a visit to the Normandy battlefield beaches from Bayeux. On this 9-hour small-group tour, you’ll stroll Utah and Omaha beaches, explore famous wartime sites like Pointe du Hoc and Sainte-Mère Church, and learn the turbulent history of this key WWII location. Throughout the tour, enjoy free time to take souvenir photos, pay respects and ask questions of your expert guide.
events.name: Normandy Battlefields Tour - American Sites

events.description: Head to the coast of Normandy to visit Mont-Saint-Michel on this day tour from Paris. You'll receive an orientation from a guide, and then enjoy time to explore the UNESCO World Heritage site independently with an audio guide or by wandering the hilly streets at your leisure. Transportation is by coach from Paris.
events.name: Mont Saint Michel Full Day Experience from Paris

events.description: Get the authentic French culinary experience with a small-group cooking class in a private Parisian apartment. Head to the centrally-located home and get ready to learn — and eat! Meet your local chef instructor, gather ingredients on an optional market tour, and discover the fundamentals of preparing classic French dishes such as soufflé, cod mouclade, and chocolate fondant. Then prepare and savor delicious dishes with fellow food lovers.
events.name: Small-Group French Cooking Class in Paris

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/2050P331/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: All Day Small Group Guided Versailles with Skip the line Access

events.description: It can be complicated to work out Paris’ public transport system, especially if you’re a first-time visitor. Avoid the stress of figuring out an itinerary by going on a hop-on hop-off combo tour. A Paris sightseeing bus allows you to hop-on and hop-off as often as you like and explore only the sites that interest you. As an added bonus—see the city from a different perspective by going on a Seine River Cruise.
events.name: Open Tour Paris: Hop on Hop off Sightseeing Tour + Seine River Cruise

events.description: Explore the glamorous coastal towns of the French Riviera on a day trip to Eze and Monaco from Nice. See the changing of the guard at one of Monte Carlo's palaces, take a tour of a perfumery in Eze, and lap the world-famous circuit of the Formula One Grand Prix in Monaco. Travel by air-conditioned coach and receive personalized attention from your guide on this small-group tour, limited to only eight guests.
events.name: Monaco and Eze Small-Group Day Trip from Nice

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92439P271/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private ROUND-TRIP transfer from Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport to Paris City

events.description: The Eiffel Tower is a must-see for all first-time visitors to Paris, but most tours only take in the view from the second-floor observation deck. This small-group tour includes skip-the-line entrance and access to the top floor of the tower, from where the spectacular views span the entire city.
events.name: 1,5-hour Skip-the-Line Eiffel Tower Tour with Summit Access

events.description: While the city of Paris is celebrated for its charm, romance, and elegance, Parisians are known for . . . other qualities. During this show by French comedian Olivier Giraud, watch the stereotypes of Parisians—as being rude, short-tempered or arrogant—come alive in this side-splitting performance. Giraud's spot-on impressions keeps you laughing as you learn how to recognize Parisian facial expressions and use iconic French phrases correctly. Audience participation encouraged!
events.name: How to Become a Parisian in 1 Hour? The Hit Comedy Show 100% in English in Paris

events.description: Get photo-worthy views of the Parisian skyline lit up for the night on this private tour to the Eiffel Tower's summit. Not only will you be fully attended to by a private guide, you'll get skip-the-line access, which saves you tons of time. Up at the top, listen to insightful commentary and ask plenty of questions. You'll certainly return home with frame-worthy photos.
events.name: Eiffel's Glittering Tower's Summit by Night

events.description: Breeze past the large crowds at Versailles on this 4-hour tour, including skip-the-line access. Follow your guide through the palace and gardens of Louis XIV, including all entrance fees and round-trip transportation from central Paris.
events.name: Versailles Guided Tour from Paris with Skip the Line Access

events.description: Paris is packed with things to do and see, and this guided walking tour does more in six hours than most can with far more time. An elevator ride up the Eiffel Tower, a Seine cruise, pass by the Notre Dame Cathedral, and a stroll to the Louvre Pyramid are among the highlights.
events.name: Paris Full-Day "Must See" Highlights Guided Tour

events.description: Discover the medieval village of Mont Saint Michel on this 14-hour trip from Paris. Reach the unique mountainous island, a UNESCO World Heritage site, by comfortable minivan, and wind your way through the village. Explore the abbey at your leisure with a provided audio-guide. Along the way, learn about the lore and legend of Mont Saint Michel from an informative guide. This small-group tour is limited to just eight people, ensuring personalized attention.
events.name: Small-Group Mont Saint-Michel Day Trip with Abbey Entrance and Cider Tasting

events.description: Experience the culture and lasting traditions of Champagne wine country on a guided wine-tasting tour from Paris. With a small group of fellow wine enthusiasts and an expert guide, spend a full-day visiting three distinguished Champagne houses such as Mercier in Epernay or Tattinger in Reims to taste eight samples and learn about local varietals. Your excursion includes estate tours, a delicious lunch and intimate tasting sessions in a breathtaking natural setting.
events.name: Small-Group Wine-Tasting Trip to the Champagne Region from Paris

events.description: Witness the opulence of one of Europe's most magnificent royal residences on a guided tour of the Palace and Gardens of Versailles. Skip the long lines with priority entrance, and explore the decadent salons and chambers where kings and queens of France once held court. Stroll through the expansive, World Heritage gardens, and add a regal flair to your visit with an optional fountain or music show on certain days.
events.name: Versailles Palace & Gardens Tour from Versailles - Optional Fountain Show

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/160696P3/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Eiffel Tower Skip-the-Line Entry Tour

events.description: Embark on your very own British invasion with this full-day trip to London from Paris. Ride the high-speed Eurostar train under the English Channel, then hop on an open-top coach tour to see some of London’s most iconic attractions, including Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, the Tower of London and the Palace of Westminster. Join a Beatles- or royal-themed walking tour if you like, and get a waterside perspective with a cruise down the River Thames. Enjoy leisure time to explore, shop, or dine on your own.
events.name: Independent Day Trip to London from Paris including Thames River Cruise

events.description: The Allied landings of D-Day and the Battle of Normandy were among the most memorable events of WWII, and thousands of visitors return to the battlefields each year to pay their respects. This private full-day tour from Bayeux helps you trace the path of the American soldiers, with a customized itinerary that takes in sites such as Omaha Beach, Utah Beach, Brecourt Manor, and the Normandy American Cemetery, as well as optional extras like the UNESCO-listed Mont Saint Michel.
events.name: Full-Day Private Tour of Historical Normandy Sites from Bayeux

events.description: Pair a romantic, gourmet meal with fantastic sightseeing and you have this unique panoramic bus tour in Paris. Aboard a glass-enclosed, double-decker bus, take a seat at your table and soak up stunning 360-degree views of the City of Light as you indulge in fine French cuisine. Enjoy a 4-course lunch tour or stretch out the experience over a 6-course dinner. Sip wine, dine, and watch beautiful landmarks including the Notre Dame Cathedral, Louvre, and the Eiffel Tower pass by.
events.name: Luxury Paris Bus Dining Experience

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/88256P61/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: From Cannes Port, Private 7 hour customized shore excursion

events.description: Pedal through the gorgeous rolling vineyards that surround Nice on a half-day electric bike tour. Cruise up and down the region’s picturesque hills with ease while your guide shares insight into the town’s history and culinary culture. Visit a local family-run winery to learn about traditional wine harvesting and production methods, and taste some of the estate’s excellent French wine. Enjoy a picnic lunch surrounded by vineyards (not included) and take in spectacular views of the Provençal landscape. Group size is limited to 10 for a more personalized experience.
events.name: Half-Day E-Bike Vineyard Tour with Wine Tasting from Nice

events.description: Pop a cork in France’s famous Champagne region on a full-day tour from Paris. Visit some of the most famous Champagne cellars in the world at the Mumm and Mercier wineries, where you can taste varieties of beloved bubbly and learn about the time-honored tradition of making Champagne. Delve into regional history with a tour of the Notre Dame Cathedral in Reims, the coronation site for many kings of France.
events.name: Champagne Tasting Day Trip from Paris and Reims Cathedral Visit

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/9511P24/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Mont Saint Michel Guided Tour from Paris - Abbey Visit included

events.description: The magnificent castles of Chenonceau and Chambord are two of the most famous and most visited chateaux of the Loire Valley. Enjoy guided tours of both on this full-day tour and benefit from the undivided attention of a private guide. Explore the Renaissance castle of Chenonceau with its stunning gardens, enjoy wine tasting and lunch (optional) at the Caves Duhard winery, then visit the UNESCO-listed castle of Chambord.
events.name: Private tour of Loire Valley most visited castles

events.description: This Mont Saint-Michel & Bay Tour will help you save time and get more out of your day, by having a high speed train ticket from Paris included. Once you get to Mont Saint-Michel, you won’t have to worry about organizing transport as a private minibus will collect you. Depending on the tide, you’ll visit the bay, and then explore the village afterwards. Save time waiting in line with a skip-the-line ticket to the Abbey included too.
events.name: Exclusive Mont Saint-Michel & Bay Tour from Paris by High-Speed Train

events.description: Cruise the coastal curve of the French Riviera to St Tropez on a full-day excursion from Nice. Gaze at sweeping ocean vistas as you sail the Mediterranean Sea to the glamorous town of St Tropez, famed for the famous faces that frequent the opulent resort. Spend a day exploring at your leisure and discover alluring attractions like St Tropez Church and St Tropez Citadel. Alternatively, browse sophisticated boutiques for designer clothes, sample seafood specials at gourmet restaurants, and lounge on the powdery soft sand of the town’s pristine beaches. Return to Nice by boat at the end of your relaxing day.
events.name: Ferry to St Tropez from Nice

events.description: The French know that wine and cheese are made for each other. Treat your taste buds to this perfect pairing at a specialty cheese cellar beneath the streets of Paris. Taste seven different French and Swiss cheeses accompanied by wine chosen to complement the aged flavors, plus bites of baguette and fresh fruit. A professional cheesemonger will guide you through the tasting. Group size is limited to 10 for a more personalized culinary experience.
events.name: Cheese and Wine Tasting in a Paris Cheese Cellar

events.description: Stock up on designer fashions in Paris on this shopping tour to La Vallée Village, an outdoor outlet center just an hour from the city. You’ll enjoy round-trip transportation by luxury coach or mini-coach so all you have to worry about is how to fit your new clothing into your suitcase. Browse high-fashion stores like Ferragamo, Givenchy and Calvin Klein, where items from previous collections are discounted.
events.name: La Vallée Village Shopping Outlet Round-Trip Transport from Paris

events.description: When you need a break from Paris’ historical monuments for a day of magical family fun, head to Disneyland® Paris resort. This admission ticket includes convenient transportation from the city so you don’t have to worry about how to get to the resort’s two theme parks, Disneyland® Park and Walt Disney Studios® Park. You have the choice of single admission to Disneyland® Park only or combo admission to Walt Disney Studios® Park, as well.
events.name: Disneyland® Paris 1 or 2 Parks Day Trip from Central Paris

events.description: Pay your respects to French and British military history on a full-day tour of the Somme battlefields. Walk on the sites where one of the bloodiest battles in history was fought during World War I, while learning about the battle’s causes and repercussions from your historian guide. See the Delville Wood cemetery where thousands of fallen soldiers were laid to rest, and visit several war memorials and the Historial Great War museum in Peronne. Numbers are limited to eight for a personalized and informative tour.
events.name: Small-group WWI Somme Battlefields Day Trip from Paris with John Monash Centre

events.description: An absolute must for chocolate connoisseurs, this 2.5-hour walking tour takes you to the acclaimed chocolate shops of Saint-Germain. Alongside a gastronome guide, you’ll visit prestigious chocolatiers to sample French delicacies such as the chocolate éclair, homemade macaroons, and delectable truffles. Discover the history of chocolate in Paris and find out how many tons of chocolate are consumed by French people every year. On this small-group tour, limited to eight people, you’ll receive personalized attention from your guide.
events.name: Chocolate, Pastries & Macaron Walking Tour of Saint-Germain

events.description: Discover iconic attractions of Paris such as the Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame at your own pace on a 2-day hop-on hop-off bus tour of the captivating French capital. Aboard a distinctive double-decker bus, admire the quaint cobbled streets of the Left Bank and the military splendor of Ecole Militaire. When an attraction captures your attention, hop off to explore further, and then simply hop back on when it’s convenient for you. Plus, this Paris hop-on hop-off bus tour also includes a skip-the-line admission ticket to the Louvre to use in the morning.
events.name: Louvre Skip the Line Ticket & Big Bus Hop-On Hop-Off Tour

events.description: Guarantee your admission to the always-busy Louvre, and save time that otherwise would’ve been wasted in line, when you book this skip-the-line experience. Meet your host in front of the world-renowned museum, and head right inside. Beyond typical pre-booked, skip-the-line ticket purchases, this experience also guarantees you can pick your preferred itinerary, receive a map to guide you, and ask any logistical questions of your host before setting off to explore the galleries independently.
events.name: Louvre Skip The Line Tickets with A Host and Choice of Itineraries

events.description: Explore the atmospheric neighborhoods of Paris like a local on this private custom-made tour that cleverly combines pleasurable walking moments into the historic neighborhoods with leisure driven time around Paris. Accompanied by your guide, enjoy walking tours of the Latin Quarter and Montmartre, and admire landmarks like the Pantheon, Jardin du Luxembourg, or Basilica du Sacré-Coeur. Get to navigate like a true Parisian and learn to easily and safely use the Paris Metro. Your itinerary can be adapted to suit your group, so be sure to let your guide know of your preferences.
events.name: Paris in a Day - Private Experience

events.description: Take a day trip from Paris to Fontainebleau to visit two castles once home to members of France’s extravagant aristocracy. First, explore Château Vaux le Vicomte, said to have inspired the Palace of Versailles. Then head to Château de Fontainebleau, a UNESCO World Heritage site whose history dates back to the 12th century. You’ll have free time at each castle to look around on your own via provided audio guides, checking out the ornate architecture and opulent gardens.
events.name: Fontainebleau & Vaux le Vicomte Chateaux Day Trip from Paris

events.description: Experience the magic of Paris without the hassle of navigating public transport by hiring your own private chauffeur service. Choose from a 4- or 8- hour set itinerary, or tailor your tour to your interests and stop off to see the Eiffel Tower, walk the Pont des Arts or browse the shops along the Champs-Élysées. Your driver will pick you up from your hotel and take you wherever you want to go in the comfort of a luxury, air-conditioned sedan, equipped with Wi-Fi and refreshments.
events.duration:
Product code: 16949P3

events.name: Full Day Private Tour of Paris - Sedan Car

events.description: Travel to Giverny in France’s Upper Normandy region to spend time exploring the home and gardens of the famous painter Claude Monet on this guided tour. Take a luxury bus ride from Paris to Giverny, and then wander the grounds of Monet’s home and garden to see places that inspired the Impressionist painter to create world-known masterpieces. Numbers are limited to 15 people on this small-group tour, ensuring you'll spend an intimate day with like-minded art lovers.
events.name: Giverny and Monet's Garden Small-Group Tour from Paris

events.description: Discover the UNESCO-listed landscapes of the Loire Valley, sample regional wines and cuisine, and visit two magnificent châteaux on this full-day tour. Traveling in a small group ensures a more personalized experience as you visit Chambord and Chenonceau Castles, sample regional wines and cheeses at a local winery, and enjoy a traditional lunch at a local restaurant.
events.name: Loire Valley Chateaux Day Tour: Chambord, Chenonceau and Wine tasting lunch

events.description: Beat the crowds at two of Paris' most popular attractions during this 8-hour tour, combining skip-the-line access to the Louvre and Versailles. Entrance fees, lunch, and round-trip transportation from a central Paris meeting point included.
events.name: Versailles and the Louvre Tour with Skip-the-Line Access

events.description: Explore one of France’s most famous wine regions with a full-day small-group tour of Burgundy’s wineries from Dijon. Enjoy a scenic drive through the vineyards, stopping at traditional wine cellars to sample a variety of fine wines and learn about France’s prestigious Premier and Grand Cru classifications. Discover the wine capital of Beaune, with free time to enjoy lunch (own expense), tour the Moutarderie Fallot mustard house (own expense) or explore the charming old town.
events.name: Small-Group Full-Day Tour of Côte de Nuits, Côte de Beaune Vineyards and Beaune Historical District

events.description: When you only have a day after arriving by cruise ship in Cannes and you want to see the French Riviera, this private, fully-narrated day trip is the way to go. Visit glamorous Monaco and historic Eze in one day, with free time to explore Monaco and a guided tour of a perfumery in Eze.
events.name: Cannes Shore Excursion: Private Day Trip to Monaco and Eze

events.description: Spend a delightful day in port exploring two highlights of the Côte d'Azur with this full-day shore excursion from Villefranche. Head to the medieval hilltop town of Eze for spectacular Riviera views and a tour of the fragrant Fragonard perfume factory. Next, make your way to tiny but glamorous Monaco to tour iconic attractions like the Prince’s Palace, the Formula One Grand Prix circuit and Monte Carlo’s glitzy Casino Square. Numbers are limited to eight people for a personalized small-group experience.
events.name: Villefranche Shore Excursion: Small-Group Monaco and Eze Half-Day Tour

events.description: The Burgundy wine region is renowned for producing some of France’s finest wines and this full-day tasting tour from Paris is the ideal introduction. Explore the vineyards and wineries of Chablis and North Burgundy; sample red, white, and rosé wines during expert-led wine tastings; and tuck into a delicious wine-tasting lunch at a family-run winery.
events.name: Full-Day North Burgundy and Chablis Wine Tasting Tour from Paris

events.description: Glide through Paris and experience its years of history in just a few hours by Segway. In a short period of time, zoom around effortlessly and see the City of Light’s top landmarks, including the Eiffel Tower, Louvre and Orsay museums, Les Invalides, Napoleon’s tomb and more. Learn heaps of unique and fascinating stories from an entertaining guide. This Paris city Segway tour is limited to just eight people, ensuring more personalized attention.
events.name: Paris City Segway Tour

events.description: Breeze past the crowds queuing up at the Louvre for your semi-private tour of the iconic collection. With your art historian guide and small group of 12 people or fewer, skip the line and get straight to viewing the art. Admire the Louvre's spectacular collection from all over the world, dating from 450 BCE through the 1800s. This semi-private tour ensures a flexible itinerary and personalized attention from your guide. Entrance fees and use of headsets are included.
events.name: Semi-Private Louvre Museum Tour with Skip-the-Line Entry - Group of 12 max

events.description: Make your visit to Versailles truly special with a helicopter tour from Paris. See the most popular attractions in the Paris area from the air, including the Seine River, Bois de Boulogne and of course the Palace of Versailles. Land not far from Versailles for a drink (included) and pose for pictures in front of the helicopter. During the return trip to Paris, fly over sights such as Montparnasse, Trocadéro, La Défense and get distant views of the Eiffel Tower. Select either a morning, afternoon or evening departure.
events.name: Versailles Helicopter Tour from Paris

events.description: Treat the family to a fun day out at Parc Spirou when you are traveling through Provence. Conveniently located less than 10 miles (15 km) from Avignon, the amusement park offers fun for all ages with roller-coasters, digital simulators, and other attractions. See characters from the 'Spirou and Fantasio' comics such as Marsupilami, Gaston, and Lucky Luke, along with dinosaurs and other favorites.
events.name: Spirou Park Admission Ticket

events.description: A sightseeing cruise along the Seine River and a show at the Moulin Rouge are two quintessential Paris experiences, and this 5-hour evening tour combines both. Cruise past Paris icons such as the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame Cathedral, and the Louvre Museum; then sip champagne as you enjoy a spectacular cabaret show at the Moulin Rouge. Hotel drop-off is included.
events.name: One Hour Seine River Cruise and Moulin Rouge Show

events.description: Soak in the wonders of France, Switzerland and Italy on a 7-day 'Taste of Europe' tour. Depart Paris for a trip through the spectacular Swiss Alps and visit the lovely lakeside city of Lucerne. Then it's off to Milan, Italy's fashion capital, as well as Verona and Venice where you'll enjoy a Murano glassblowing demo. Continue through Italy with visits to Rome, the Vatican and Florence and return to France for a ride along the French Riviera. Travel by comfortable coach and sleep in 3-star lodgings along the way.
events.name: 7-Day Taste of Europe Tour from Paris: Switzerland, Italy and France

events.description: The buttery croissant is a staple in French bakeries. Learn how to make this local favorite yourself during a 3-hour cooking class in the captial of French cuisine: Paris. With assistance from your expert instructor you'll learn the tricks to making a fluffy, flaky and perfecty folded croissant every time. Still hungry? Try your hand at making pain au chocolat. You'll have an opportunity to sample your fresh-from-oven results when they're through baking, along with some hot coffee or tea.
events.name: Paris Cooking Class: Learn How to Make Croissants

events.description: Enjoy a slice of the good life on the French Riviera with a private yacht cruise from Nice. Leave everything to your personal skipper, who guides a private yacht along the picture-perfect Côte d’Azur while you relax in style. Glide past towns like Beaulieu, Cap-d'Ail, Villefrance-sur-Mer and Menton. Soak in the Mediterranean sun on your private deck while you sip refreshing drinks. Snorkel gear is on hand if you want to take a dip. Select any duration from a 2-hour cruise to a full-day out at sea to a romantic sunset cruise.
events.duration:
Meet your personal skipper at Nice Harbor at the appointed departure time and board your 11,5-meter Sunseeker Superhawk 34 motorized yacht. This private boat can accommodate up to seven people, so it makes an excellent option for a family excursion, an outing for you and your friends or simply a romantic trip with your sweetheart.

Settle in and get comfortable as your skipper guides the yacht out from Nice and along the coast, passing sandy white beaches and sun-kissed Mediterranean seafront towns. See places such as Menton, Villefranche-sur-Mer, Cap-d'Ail and Beaulieu from the water. Pass the creeks of La Mala and Fossette. Get a look at the many secluded luxury villas secreted away from town centers.

Relax on deck or the comfortable cabin below deck, sip refreshingly cold soft drinks, or don the snorkel gear that's on hand and dive into the Mediterranean to see what's swimming under the yacht – if you're particularly lucky, you may even see whales or dolphins during your cruise.

Choose from several tour options, from a 2-hour cruise to a full-day. See the itinerary section below for sample itineraries, and keep in mind that with a private tour your personal skipper will do as much as possible to make it a more personalized experience.

Itinerary

Sample Itineraries:

2-Hour Morning CruiseHead to Villefranche-sur-Mer, with its fishing village and medieval fortress, and then cruise to St-Jean-Cap-Ferrat and Beaulieu.

2-Hour Champagne Sunset CruiseEnjoy an unforgettable sunset while sipping a glass of Champagne paired with snacks as you cruise to Villefranche-sur-Mer, St-Jean-Cap-Ferrat and Beaulieu.

3-Hour Morning CruiseFollow the same itinerary as the 2-hour morning cruise, followed by Eze-sur-Mer, Cap d'Ail, and the La Mala creek and caves.

4-Hour Afternoon CruiseAfter seeing the sights listed above, make a trip to glittering Monaco Bay and Cap Martin.

8-Hour Morning CruiseSpend the first part of your full-day cruise following the above itinerary, and then continue to Roquebrune Beach. Enjoy a stunning panorama of Menton and cruise along part of the incredible Italian coastline.

events.name: Private Motorboat Cruise from Nice with Personal Skipper

events.description: Spin through the city streets like a local and explore the French capital in style on this approximately 3-hour fat tire bike tour in Paris. Follow your guide through the city to top attractions such as Napoleon’s tomb and Les Invalides, the Louvre Museum and the Eiffel Tower. Cycle along the UNESCO World Heritage–listed banks of the Seine River and stop for a break among the trees in the pretty Tuileries Gardens. Admire the Arc de Triomphe, the Orsay Museum and more, and learn of their history from your guide.
events.name: Paris Bike Tour

events.description: Witness the fairy tale castles of Neuschwanstein and Linderhof, created by Germany’s 19th-century King Ludwig II, on a day trip from Munich. Traveling by air-conditioned coach, admire Bavaria's magnificent scenery as you journey to Linderhof, Ludwig’s rococo-style hunting lodge and last home. Join an optional interior tour and then continue to Neuschwanstein, a picture book clutch of turrets and chambers that inspired Disney’s Sleeping Beauty castle. Enjoy free time in nearby Hohenschwangau village for lunch and to explore Neuschwanstein’s grounds, and take an optional castle tour. Entrance fees not included.
events.name: Neuschwanstein Castle and Linderhof Palace Day Tour from Munich

events.description: Add a bit of legend and enchantment to your German vacation with a full-day trip to Neuschwanstein and Linderhof from Munich. Relax for the scenic coach ride through the Bavarian Alps, then spend hours exploring the former royal residences, sources of inspiration for modern fairy tales like Walt Disney's Sleeping Beauty. In your small group, tour the castle’s opulent halls, unique spaces and the incredible kitchens. Conclude with free time in the charming village of Oberammergau.
events.name: Small-Group Neuschwanstein and Linderhof Castle Luxury Coach Day Trip from Munich

events.description: Discover elegant Salzburg—historic birthplace of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart—on a day trip from Munich. Relax on the comfortable train ride to Salzburg, take a guided tour of city attractions like Domkirche Cathedral and the Festung Hohensalzburg fortress, then enjoy hours of independent time to explore. Soak up Austrian history, sample local delicacies, and snap photos of the city set against the striking backdrop of the Alps.
events.name: Salzburg Small-Group Day Tour from Munich

events.description: Travel from Munich to Bavaria’s Neuschwanstein Castle on this day trip that includes round-trip transportation by train. Often known as Germany’s "Cinderella castle," Neuschwanstein was actually the inspiration for a different Disney story, the ‘Sleeping Beauty’ castle at Disneyland. Take a guided tour of the castle, and hear stories about the "Mad" King Ludwig II, who commissioned it. The entrance fee is not included, but skip-the-line access is, so you won’t wait in the main admission queue.
events.name: Neuschwanstein Castle Small-Group Day Tour from Munich

events.description: Escape the bustle of Frankfurt on a half-day tour of beautiful, riverside Heidelberg! Make the short trip south by coach, then spend hours exploring the medieval town with your savvy guide. Listen to historic anecdotes as you wind through Old Town, visit the ruins of Heidelberg Castle, and soak up the intellectual vibe at Heidelberg University.
events.name: Heidelberg Half-Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: Gain insight into the Holocaust of World War II on this half-day tour of Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site from Munich. Travel by train and bus to the memorial site, and take a guided tour of the compound, a place of memorial and education dedicated to the thousands who were imprisoned and lost their lives there between 1933 and 1945. Learn how Dachau provided a model for all Nazi camps, and see the exhibitions and memorials, together with the reconstructed barracks and cells, as your guide provides illuminating, informative and sensitive commentary.
events.name: Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site Tour from Munich by Train

events.description: Admire the countryside, castles and villages of Germany’s Romantic Road on a day trip from Munich. Enjoy a coach drive along the iconic Road, a famously picturesque route through Bavaria’s mountains and forests. Stop at 11th-century Harburg Castle, one of Germany’s oldest fortifications, and continue to Rothenburg, a beautifully preserved medieval town of cobbled lanes, squares, and half-timbered houses. See top attractions such as the Renaissance-era Town Hall and St Jakob’s Church, enjoy free time to wander, have lunch (own expense), and browse the famous year-round Christmas shop.
events.name: Romantic Road, Rothenburg, and Harburg Day Tour from Munich

events.description: Experience the fairytale atmosphere of Neuschwanstein Castle and the Bavarian Alps during this full-day train excursion from Munich. Travel by rail to the village of Hohenschwangau, where you can pick between a tour of the castle’s interior (own expense) or a guided hike in the nearby foothills with views of the fortress. Train transport and your guide are included.
events.name: Neuschwanstein Castle Excursion from Munich

events.description: Delve into Munich’s dark past and the birth of the Nazi ideology on a revealing 2.5-hour city walking tour. Led by a knowledgeable guide, discover the sites that provided backdrops to Adolf Hitler and his followers as they set about founding the Third Reich, giving Munich its title as the ‘Capital of the Nazi Movement.’ See beer-halls where Nazi brown shirts first gathered, buildings from where Hitler delivered speeches, and memorials to opposers of the movement, all as your guide charts the events that saw Hitler take power in 1933.
events.name: Hitler and the Third Reich Munich Walking Tour

events.description: Visit two of Germany’s most popular attractions in one day with this Frankfurt Super Saver tour. See majestic Neuschwanstein Castle, one of three palaces built by King Ludwig II of Bavaria and the inspiration for the Disney movie Sleeping Beauty. Then explore the Jewel of the Middle Ages, the picturesque town of Rothenburg ob der Tauber, perhaps the most well-preserved medieval old town in all of Germany. Combine two best-selling tours at one discounted price. Round-trip transportation from Frankfurt and Neuschwanstein Castle admission fees included.
events.name: Frankfurt Super Saver: Neuschwanstein Castle and Rothenburg Day Trip

events.description: Explore beautiful Strasbourg and the majestic Black Forest on this 10-hour tour from Frankfurt. You’ll first stop in the spa town of Baden-Baden deep in the Schwartzwald, where you’ll take a guided tour, learn about the famous thermal baths and see landmarks like Kurhaus Casino. Then traverse the German-French border to visit the Alsatian City of Strasbourg. Take some free time take explore key sites like 'La Petite France,' Strasbourg’s UNESCO-listed old town center.
events.name: Black Forest and Strasbourg Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: Immerse yourself in Salzburg, sights from the ‘The Sound of Music’ movie and Austria’s Lake District on a day trip from Munich. Absorb the beautiful Lower Bavarian Alps as you journey south to Salzburg, and enjoy free time to explore its churches, squares and filming locations from the ‘Sound of Music’ movie independently. Continue through the Lake District toward the postcard-pretty town of St Wolfgang, and ogle the glorious mountain scenery on an optional boat trip on Lake Wolfgang. Lastly, return to Munich via gorgeous Lake Mondsee, where several scenes from the ‘Sound of Music’ movie were filmed.
events.name: Salzburg and Lake District Day Tour from Munich

events.description: Travel to the Castle of Neuschwanstein on a private tour from Munich, which ensures you personalized attention and the ability to travel at your own pace. Sit back and enjoy a smooth ride in a luxury vehicle, take in the scenery, and listen to guided commentary on the way there and back. Visit the Neuschwanstein Castle and explore on your own, then stop by other local attractions such as Linderhof Palace or stop for a local lunch.
events.name: Private Neuschwanstein Tour in Mercedes Minivan V-Class (up to 6 person)

events.description: Gain insight into Munich’s dark past with a moving half-day tour of Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site, including transport by train from Munich. Take a guided tour of the camp’s cells, barracks and gas chamber, learn about Dachau’s role as Germany’s first concentration camp and read prisoners' stories of the atrocities carried out under the Nazi regime. You’ll also have the opportunity to pay your respects at the poignant memorial site and watch an emotional documentary about the camp.
events.name: Half-Day Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site Walking Tour with a Local Guide from Munich by Train

events.description: Journey along the romantic Rhine on a half- or full-day tour from Frankfurt and take in the UNESCO-listed wonders of the Rhine Valley. Set sail along the Rhine River on a traditional steamer and cruise past sweeping vineyards, medieval towns and mountaintop castles. Jump off to explore historic Rudesheim, see the landmark Loreley Rock (full-day trip only) and indulge in wine tasting, then tuck into a delicious lunch (full-day trip) or dinner (half-day trip) by the riverside.
events.name: Rhine Valley Trip from Frankfurt including Rhine River Cruise

events.description: Enjoy Oktoberfest in Munich with this 7-hour experience that includes a Munich city tour and a guaranteed spot inside a tent. Beginning with a 1.5-hour walking tour, learn about the city’s history and brewing customs, and hear about the 200-year-old festival at Theresienwiese. Then take a seat at your reserved place in one of the major Oktoberfest beer tents, where you’ll receive two liters of beer and chicken.
events.name: Small-Group Munich City and Oktoberfest Tour Including Reserved Oktoberfest Tent Table

events.description: Visit Neuschwanstein Castle, Linderhof Palace, and the forest-ringed village of Oberammergau in one easy day trip from Munich. After leaving your city hotel, travel with your own private driver-guide into the heart of Bavaria where fairytale castles and picturesque villages beckon. Prebooked skip-the-line tickets are included to save you time at the admission desks, and you discover the history of each site through commentary from your guide.
events.name: Neuschwanstein Castle and More Private Tour

events.description: Experience Berlin’s past and present on this half-day guided walking tour through the city's Mitte district. Visit landmarks from the city’s Prussian, Imperial, Nazi, Cold War and modern eras, offering insight into the evolution of this fascinating German capital. Stroll along the iconic Berlin Wall and follow Unter den Linden to the Brandenburg Gate. Then check out the rebuilt Reichstag and the Holocaust Memorial and hear the amazing stories of Cold War Berlin at Checkpoint Charlie. Your walking tour of Berlin also includes a complimentary city map and guidebook.
events.name: Discover Berlin Half-Day Walking Tour

events.description: Absorb the wealth of culture and elegant architecture found in Dresden, longstanding hub of German arts, during this full-day from Berlin. Begin with a guided tour of the city center on foot, learning about its history as you explore the Zwinger palace, Semperoper (Semper Opera) and Frauenkirche (Church of our Lady). Spend the afternoon independently, wandering through the city’s lush parks, baroque architecture or lovely riverbanks along the Elbe, offering skyline views. This Berlin to Dresden visit also includes transport by air-conditioned coach.
events.name: Dresden Day Trip from Berlin

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/76648P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Big Bus Berlin Hop on Hop off tour with live guide

events.description: Spend a night out at one of the most famous sites in Berlin with “An Evening at Charlottenburg Palace,” a dinner and concert experience with the Berlin Residence Orchestra. Enjoy a delicious, 3-course candlelight dinner in the Charlottenburg Palace Orangery. Then take in the classical sounds of the Berlin Residence Orchestra, performing selections from Bach, Handel, Mozart and more. Choose from four ticket categories. At intermission, VIP seat holders receive a glass of sparkling champagne. This event regularly sells out weeks in advance so be sure to book early.
events.name: 'An Evening at Charlottenburg Palace' Dinner and Concert by the Berlin Residence Orchestra

events.description: Getting from Munich to Hitler’s Eagle’s Nest (Kehlsteinhaus) by public transport makes for a long day trip. Avoid stressing about connections or the hassle of arranging a rental car, and take this relaxing tour instead. Explore the Dokumentation Obersalzberg museum and Eagle's Nest at your expense, and stop at the alpine town of Berchtesgaden. If bad weather renders Eagle’s Nest inaccessible, visit the Berchtesgaden salt mines instead.
events.name: Berchtesgaden Town and Mountains and the Eagle's Nest from Munich

events.description: Discover Sachsenhausen, one of the first concentration camps established by Nazi Germany’s Third Reich, on this guided trip from Berlin. Listen as an expert historian details the facts surrounding the camp’s creation, as well as a timeline of the atrocities that took place there. Today, the site serves as a national memorial to the prisoners who lived and died here, and on your visit you'll explore the various locations inside the camp, like the command headquarters and execution trench, and learn about Germany during the rule of the Third Reich.
events.name: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Tour from Berlin

events.description: Discover Berlin’s turbulent past on this private, guided, 4-hour historical walking tour. Enjoy personalized attention while visiting some of Berlin’s most popular World War II and Cold War attractions, like the Berlin Wall Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie, Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag building, Hitler’s bunker and much more. Customize the tour and learn about the history of Berlin, from its founding, to its role as capital of the Nazi Third Reich, to the divided city of the Cold War. A central Berlin hotel pickup and drop-off is included.
events.name: Private Walking Tour: World War 2 and Cold War Sites in Berlin

events.description: Take in Austria, the Czech Republic, Germany, Hungary, Slovakia and Switzerland on this 7-day European highlights tour from Frankfurt. Travel through Europe with a guide and explore top attractions such as St. Vittus Cathedral and the Charles Bridge. Delve into Budapest’s ancient history in Buda and Pest, enjoy sightseeing tours in pretty Vienna and Lake Mondsee, and delve deep into Germany’s beautiful Black Forest region. Explore Alpine regions including Lucerne, Mt Titlis and Zurich, marvel at the mighty Rhine Falls and gaze over serene Lake Titisee.
events.name: 7-Day European Highlights Tour From Frankfurt: Germany, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Austria And Switzerland

events.description: Get acquainted with Munich the easy way on a fun, flexible hop-on hop-off city bus tour. Choose a 24-hour Express Tour to check out Munich’s main highlights or a 24-hour or 48-hour Grand Tour ticket to widen your sightseeing net. Either way, settle aboard an open-top double-decker bus, listen to the enlightening onboard commentary, and enjoy panoramic views of sites such as the Marienplatz, Hofbrauhaus, Viktualienmarkt and more. Hop off at the stops that interest you, explore on foot and then re-board the bus at any stop you wish.
events.name: Munich City Hop-on Hop-off Tour

events.description: Get a dose of Bavaria's iconic beer culture with this food and beer tour in Munich. Home of Oktoberfest and a collection of famous beer halls and beer gardens, Bavaria's beautiful capital invites visitors from around the globe with its promise of fun and camaraderie. Partner with a savvy guide for an insider look at this tradition of imbibing. You’ll hit local haunts and enjoy Bavarian nibbles in the company of fellow beer aficionados.
events.name: Bavarian Beer and Food Evening Tour in Munich

events.description: Celebrate your visit to Berlin with a sky-high meal in the clouds during this panorama dinner 679 feet (207 meters) above the city at Sphere, the Berlin TV Tower's revolving restaurant. Enjoy skip-the-line access to the tallest building in Berlin, where you'll sit down to a panorama dinner. Savor a delicious 3-course dinner at a guaranteed window-seat table, accompanied by two-glasses of wines, and soak up the incredible vistas of nearby Berlin landmarks such as Charlottenburg Palace and Checkpoint Charlie.
events.name: Skip the Line: Dinner Atop the Berlin TV Tower

events.description: Discover beautiful Nuremberg — site of Hitler’s infamous propaganda rallies — on a 10-hour rail tour from Munich. Relax on the comfortable train ride to Nuremberg, take a guided tour of city attractions like Congress Hall and medieval old town, then enjoy some free time to make an optional visit to the Documentation Center. Soak up German history, sample local delicacies, and snap photos of the medieval and gothic accents that decorate this modern city.
events.name: Nuremberg Day Trip from Munich

events.description: While in Berlin, make a trip to the Friedrichstadt-Palast theater for a captivating show you won’t soon forget. This admission ticket grants you access to the theater to watch the VIVID Grand Show, which features more than 500 costumes and headpieces, 100 artists, and intense special effects. Choose from six seating options, and upgrade to VIP seating and receive a welcome drink and program booklet with your ticket.
events.name: Friedrichstadt-Palast Berlin - VIVID Grand Show

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/158751P3/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Small Group Munich's ULTIMATE Beer & Street Food Tour - all beer & food included

events.description: Don’t waste time standing in line at Neuschwanstein Castle, one of Germany’s most popular attractions. After picking up your skip-the-line admission ticket, you’ll ensure that you spend your time inside the Bavarian castle, known for its fairytale-like architecture and picturesque hilltop setting near Füssen.
events.name: Neuschwanstein Castle Skip-the-line Ticket

events.description: Get an insider’s look at Berlin, the capital and cultural centerpiece of Germany, on this guided walking tour. Visit some of Berlin’s most popular attractions — like the Berlin Wall, Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag and Checkpoint Charlie — as well as a few lesser-known locations that many group sightseeing tours miss. Learn about the history of Berlin, from the time of the Teutonic Knights to its role as capital of the Nazi Third Reich, to the divided city of the Cold War, to the modern-day capital of a unified Germany.
events.name: Explore Berlin: Top Attractions Walking Tour

events.description: Take a sobering look at the Dachau Concentration Camp and Memorial Site during this guided visit from Munich. Learn about the history of one of Germany’s first concentration camps dating back to 1933 as you visit camp locations like the SS Training Camp, Nandor Gild Monument, Appellplatz (Roll Call Square), and more. Round-trip transport is also included.
events.name: Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site Tour from Munich

events.description: Walk in the footsteps of medieval lords and aristocrats on a tour of stunning Eltz Castle. On this guided, full-day, small-group tour from Frankfurt, explore this “fairy tale in stone” castle, learning about eight centuries of Western architecture and culture. Visit the Treasury and Armoury room, boasting world-class artworks in gold and silver. See the Eltz Forest, a surrounding nature reserve full of rare fauna and flora, with an incredible view of the neighboring Elzbach Valley. Then relax with a dinner at a restaurant on the Rhine River.
events.name: Eltz Castle Tour from Frankfurt with Dinner

events.description: Get an overview of Berlin and its history on this river cruise through the city. Listen to informative commentary via audio guide as you pass landmarks such as the Reichstag, Bellevue Palace, the Berliner Dom, Museum Island and more. This is a great way to see Berlin’s highlights with a limited amount of time.
events.name: Berlin 1-Hour City Cruise: History and Main Attractions

events.description: Purchase the Berlin WelcomeCard for free admission to Berlin’s museums, majors attractions like the TV Tower and Olympic Stadium, free city bus and boat tours, and free city walking tours. Cardholders also receive discounts at a 20 different attractions, restaurants, and shows in Berlin. Purchase a 2-, 3-, or 4-day ticket and seamlessly travel through zones A, B, and C on public transport also included in the ticket price.
events.name: Official Berlin City Pass: Berlin WelcomeCard All Inclusive

events.description: Take a trip to Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site on this private, half-day tour from Munich. Dachau was the first Nazi concentration camp in Germany and it served as a model for all the other camps that followed it. See various parts of the facility—including the 'Arbeit macht frei' gateway and the administration headquarters—and explore the museum with a guide. You'll benefit from personalized attention while gaining insight into the site's past.
events.name: Private Tour: Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site by Train from Munich

events.description: Explore Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site on this half-day tour from Munich. Travel by train from Munich to Dachau with a guide, and visit the former concentration camp. During your guided tour, gain insight into the brutality of the Nazi regime and learn of the 42,000 innocent prisoners who lost their lives there. Explore the history of the Third Reich in the visitors' center, and read of the camp’s historical context from the prisoners’ perspective.
events.name: Fully Guided Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site Tour from Munich

events.description: Celebrate your visit to Berlin with a sky-high meal in the clouds during this VIP lunch 679 feet (207 meters) above the city in the revolving restaurant of the Berlin TV Tower. Enjoy skip-the-line access to the tallest building in Berlin, sitting down for a 2-course lunch (main plus dessert) at Sphere, the revolving eatery located at the tower’s apex. Savor a delicious meal with a guaranteed window-seat table, accompanied by a soft drink and soaking up the incredible vistas of nearby Berlin landmarks like Charlottenburg Palace, Olympic Stadium (Olympiastadion) and Brandenburg Gate.
events.name: Berlin TV Tower: Skip-the-Line Ticket with 2-Course Lunch

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/115296P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: SPECIAL DEAL: Day Trip to the castles Linderhof and Neuschwanstein from Munich

events.description: Explore the best Berlin has to offer on this hop-on hop-off bus tour. Choose from two different routes and visit many of Berlin’s top attractions, including Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie, and the Berlin Wall Memorial. Select a 24- or 48-hour pass, and then board at any of the stops and get to know the city with live on-board commentary, hopping off whenever you'd like. You can also upgrade to add a scenic boat cruise.
events.name: City Sightseeing Berlin Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour

events.description: Experience the fairy-tale beauty of Rothenburg on a full-day tour from Frankfurt. Travel into the heart of Bavaria to this treasured medieval city, renowned for its beautifully preserved homes and Renaissance attractions like the formidable town hall. Enjoy included access to St Jacob’s Church or Rothenburg's Medieval Crime Museum, then stroll the town’s cobblestone lanes and soak up the essence of small-town Germany.
events.name: Guided Rothenburg Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: Discover the treasures of southern Germany on this full-day tour of Heidelberg and Rothenburg. Depart Frankfurt for a scenic journey to riverside Heidelberg, where you marvel at stunning city sites from the ruins of Heidelberg Castle and the town’s bustling university. Then travel along German Castle Road to the walled city of Rothenberg to admire beautifully preserved medieval homes and Renaissance attractions like St Jacob’s Church.
events.name: Heidelberg and Rothenburg Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: The line can get long at the entrance to the TV Tower's observation deck, home to Bar 203, the highest bar in Berlin. Skip the line and save time by pre-booking your Fast View Ticket, which allows you to enter the elevator up directly. Simply select any date and time that suits you and enjoy the view.
events.name: Skip the Line: Fast View Ticket at Berlin TV Tower

events.description: Visit Munich and Rothenburg ob der Tauber on a day trip from Frankfurt, and discover these must-see Bavarian towns through a mix of guided walks and free time. During your morning in Munich, you’ll visit the legendary Hofbräuhaus and soak up the history that abounds in Marienplatz. Spend the afternoon in Rothenburg, strolling through the medieval streets and learning about the town from your guide.
events.name: Full-Day Tour to Munich and Rothenburg From Frankfurt

events.description: History enthusiasts will love this tour of Berlin that focuses on the Third Reich, World War 2, and Adolf Hitler. You will visit churches, government buildings, and other places associated with this period, and learn many fascinating stories from your guide. As this is a private tour you can customize it to suit your needs and interests. Both first-time and repeat visitors to Berlin will learn something new.
events.name: Private Third Reich Berlin Tour- Hitler and World War 2

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/17972P236/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival or Departure Transfer: Munich Airport

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/131478P10/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Berlin Complete History All Day Tour

events.description: Explore Potsdam’s elegant gardens and palaces on a 6-hour, private tour from Berlin with an experienced guide. Enjoy the flexibility of a private tour, with time to visit the sites that interest you most. See the Glienicke ‘bridge of spies’ and a palace that housed WWI peace conferences, then stroll the manicured park that surrounds Sanssouci Palace, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Enjoy tips on the best places to eat in Potsdam’s old city, with plenty of time to browse cafes, boutiques and a local market before returning to Berlin.
events.name: Private Day Tour to Potsdam from Berlin by Minivan

events.description: See the best of Frankfurt by land and water on this combo city tour and steamboat cruise on the historic Rhine River! Enjoy a guided morning coach trip through the Frankfurt City, where you’ll see landmarks like St Paul's Church, Frankfurt Cathedral, Goethe House and Hauptwache Plaza, and on to the UNESCO-listed Rhine Valley for breathtaking natural vistas. You’ll break for lunch before your afternoon sightseeing cruise, and conclude your day with a fun wine-tasting session.
events.name: Frankfurt Super Saver: City Highlights Tour plus Full-Day Rhine Valley Trip and Cruise
