events.description: Experience the storybook romance of Bavaria on a private tour from Füssen to two of the region’s most impressive castles. Skip the ticket line and guarantee admission to both Neuschwanstein Castle, which inspired the Disney symbol, and Ludwig II’s royal retreat at Linderhof Palace. In between, enjoy free time to explore charming Oberammergau village and the UNESCO-listed Wieskirche church in the meadow while your private guide and car wait.
events.name: Fairytale Castles Private Tour from Füssen

events.description: Enjoy a hassle-free arrival and departure in Munich with this private transfer service. Meet your driver at Munich Airport, and relax on the journey to your hotel in the city. When it’s time to leave, you’ll be taken back to the airport with convenient door-to-door service. These private vehicles can accommodate up to three or seven passengers, depending on option selected when booking.
events.name: Private Airport Round-Trip Transfer: Munich Airport to Munich Hotel

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/107763P10/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private 'Eagles Nest' Tour in Mercedes V-Class (up to 6 person)

events.description: Trace the origins and history of Adolf Hitler and Germany’s infamous Third Reich in Munich during this 3-hour guided walking tour. Learn about the central role this Southern German city played in Hitler’s movement as you explore World War II-era landmarks like the Führerbau, the former Gestapo headquarters, Haus der Kunst, and much more.
events.name: Munich 3-Hour Third Reich History Walking Tour

events.description: Make a sobering visit to the Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp near Berlin on this 6-hour private tour. Discover the history of this model concentration camp using the expertise of historian and former British military attaché in Berlin, Nigel Dunkley, who created the tour. Explore the site’s cells, execution grounds, hospital and more with your guide, learning about the camp’s unique design and role in the events of World War II. Your visit also includes hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: Private Tour: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial from Berlin

events.description: Neuschwanstein Castle is known for being a picturesque fairytale castle surrounded by greenery. Visit this beautiful site without the hassle of waiting in long visitor lines as skip-the-line entry is included. Explore the castle grounds with a guide, so you learn about its creator—King Ludwig II, and the stories behind this incredible structure.
events.name: From Hohenschwangau: Neuschwanstein Tour with Skip-the-line Ticket and Guide

events.description: First time in Munich? Take in the best bits of the Bavarian capital on this 2-hour walking tour of Munich’s Old Town. Admire architectural wonders like the Old Town Hall, St Peter’s Church and the Munich Residenz; stroll through the lively Viktualienmarkt; and see the world-famous Hofbräuhaus beer hall. Accompanied by an expert guide, you’ll have ample opportunities to learn more about Munich’s history, cultural heritage and beer-brewing legacy, while walking between the central squares of Marienplatz and Odeonsplatz.
events.name: Munich Old Town Walking Tour

events.description: Marvel at Munich’s monuments, parks and famous beer halls on a hop-on hop-off bus tour. Combine the ease of a tour with the flexibility of independent travel and see the city sights at your own pace with a 24- or 48-hour pass. The 1-hour route passes all the city’s most popular attractions including the Nymphenburg Palace, Odeonsplatz and Olympic Park. Listen to the on-board audio commentary or jump off to explore the English Garden, stroll around lively Marienplatz or enjoy a beer (own expense) at the legendary Hofbräuhaus beer hall.
events.name: Panoramic Hop-On Hop-Off Tour of Munich by Double-Decker Bus

events.description: Ensuring you see the best of Berlin’s Museumsinsel’s (Museum Island’s) vast collection can be a daunting task. Marvel at the UNESCO-listed Pergamon Museum’s and the Neues Museum's (New Museum's)  highlights on a guided tour and enjoy skip-the-line entry to both museums on this cultural experience, which includes entry to all five of Museumsinsel’s museums. Travel back in time to the age of Enlightenment and admire classic artefacts including The Bust of Nefertiti, Market Gate of Miletus, and the Ishtar Gate. Receive personalized attention on this small-group tour, limited to 15 people.
events.name: Skip-the-Line Pergamon and New Museum Guided Tour in Berlin including Museum Island Day Pass

events.description: Explore the bustling city of Berlin on a double-decker bus tour. This hop-on hop-off tour covers all the highlights of the city and allows you to create your own itinerary based on your interests. Hop onboard and listen to informative commentary available in a variety of languages and conveniently discover sites such as Potsdamer Platz, the Berliner Dom, the Reichstag, and more with this 24- or 48-hour travel pass.
events.name: Red Buses Berlin Hop-On Hop-Off Bus with Boat Option

events.description: See two of the palaces built by King Ludwig II of Bavaria on this private, full-day royal castle tour from Munich. Escape to the Bavarian foothills of Füssen to see the Neuschwanstein Castle, the inspiration for Disney’s 'Sleeping Beauty' movie. Skip the line and enjoy a walking tour of this popular fairy tale abode. Also, see Hohenschwangau Castle, King Ludwig’s childhood home. Then, enjoy a stroll around Hohenschwangau’s scenic Lake Alpsee or visit nearby Linderhof Palace, modeled after the Palace of Versailles. Hotel pickup and drop-off and admission to all castles included.
events.name: Private Tour: Royal Castles of Neuschwanstein and Hohenschwangau from Munich

events.description: While docked at the Warnemünde cruise port, discover Berlin’s turbulent past on this private, guided, full-day historical walking/riding tour. Enjoy personalized attention while visiting some of Berlin’s most popular World War II and Cold War attractions, like the Berlin Wall Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie, Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag building, Hitler’s bunker and much more. Customize the tour and learn about the history of Berlin, from its founding, to its role as capital of the Nazi Third Reich, to the divided city of the Cold War. Port pickup and drop-off is included.
events.name: Warnemünde Shore Excursion: Private Tour of Berlin's World War II and Cold War Sites

events.description: Discover the best of Berlin on this all-in-one shore excursion from Warnemunde Port. Head to Germany’s capital and visit some of its key landmarks such as Charlottenburg Palace, the Brandenburg Gate, the Berlin Wall, Checkpoint Charlie, and much more. Learn about the city’s history from your informative guide as you traverse every corner of this alternative city before heading back to your ship.
events.name: All-in-One Berlin Shore Excursion from Warnemünde and Rostock Port

events.description: Discover Berlin past and present on this private 4-hour sightseeing tour. First, learn about the city’s dark past with a visit to the Brandenburg Gate, the Holocaust Memorial, and Hitler’s Bunker. Then, explore the vibrant neighborhood of Mitte; admire architectural highlights such as Museum Island and the Gendarmenmarkt; and tuck into a delicious Currywurst.
events.name: Private WWII Past and Present Tour with a Local

events.description: Neuschwanstein Castle, the fairy tale castle on which Disney’s Cinderella castle is based, is a must-see when in the Munich area. Wait time for tours can take several hours; this ‘skip-the-line' tour is essential for making the most of your time in Bavaria. Hauptbanhof, Munich’s Central Station, is your convenient pick up and drop off spot for this round-trip tour. Your informative driver will guide you through the castle, so you won’t miss a thing.
events.name: Skip-the-Line Neuschwanstein Castle Half-Day Tour from Munich

events.description: Visit Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site, the first permanent concentration camp to be built by the Nazi Party, on this 6-hour tour from Munich. Travel by train from the Bavarian capital to Dachau, where you'll learn about the camp’s prisoners, gain insight into life under Nazi rule, and visit the visitors' center, reconstructed barracks, gas chambers and other rooms.
events.name: Full-Day Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site Tour from Munich by Train

events.description: Discover the spectacular sights of Berlin at your own pace on a full-day customizable private tour led by a knowledgeable guide. Travel in a luxury private vehicle to arresting landmarks like the Brandenburg Gate and the Reichstag parliament building while listening to informative commentary from your expert guide. Relish the flexibility of this private tour by adapting your itinerary according to your interests; perhaps head to the East Side Gallery to see the vibrant art that decorates the Berlin Wall, or spend a moment reflecting at the poignant Holocaust Memorial. Enjoy an authentic German lunch in a local restaurant recommended by your guide when hunger strikes.
events.name: Private Custom Berlin Sightseeing Tour in a Minivan: East and West Berlin

events.description: Hop in the saddle for a 4-hour bike tour of Munich, and discover the charms of the Bavarian capital as you explore it on two wheels. With a local guide, you’ll pedal past landmarks such as Odeonsplatz with its Italianate architecture and the landscaped English Garden. Hear fun facts about life in the city as you go, and enjoy an hour-long stop at the Chinese Tower beer garden for food and drink (own expense).
events.name: Classic Munich Bike Tour @ 11.30am

events.description: Get behind the wheel of an adorable, undersized Trabi for a self-drive tour of Berlin. Enjoy a fun, unique way of seeing the sights; all eyes will be glued to your 'Trabi Convoy' as you putter through the heart of the German capital. Listen to live commentary throughout the trip from an experienced guide, and finish the day with an official Trabant drivers license souvenir.
events.name: Berlin Live-Guided Self-Drive Trabi Safari Tour

events.description: Get to know the best of Berlin on this guided bike tour. Learn the history of the city, from its beginnings to its role as capital of the Nazi Third Reich, to the divided city of the Cold War, to the modern-day capital of a unified Germany. This tour includes a trip to the Berlin Wall Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie, Brandenburg Gate and more. Ride along the Spree River, through Tiergarten Park. Choose from an immersive full day tour, or hit just the highlights on a half day tour. On the full day tour, there will be a stop at a beer garden for lunch (own expense). Use of a bike and helmet is included.
events.name: Berlin Bike Tour

events.description: Visit the popular Neuschwanstein Castle on this guided walking tour. A “skip-the-line” ticket allows for quick access to the inside of the medieval masterpiece. One of three palaces built by King Ludwig II of Bavaria, it would eventually become the inspiration for the castle in Disney’s "Sleeping Beauty." After the tour, enjoy a horse-drawn carriage ride down to the village of Hohenschwangau and take a leisurely stroll around scenic Lake Alpsee.
events.name: Skip-the-Line: Neuschwanstein Castle Tour Including Horse-Drawn Carriage Ride

events.description: Save both time and money with this Madame Tussauds Berlin happy hour admission ticket. By visiting after 4pm you can avoid the busiest crowds inside. Skip the line with this ticket, so you have more time to spend admiring the exhibits. Both kids and adults will enjoy ‘meeting’ their favorite celebrities at this iconic museum.
events.name: Madame Tussauds Berlin Happy Hour Admission Ticket

events.description: See the best of Berlin on this 24- or 48-hour, hop-on hop-off bus tour with an optional river boat cruise during the summer months. Discover the city’s top sights, including Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie, Berlin Cathedral and more. Hop off at any of the 18 stops around Berlin to explore on foot, or stay on board the open-air, double decker bus to enjoy insightful commentary along the citywide loop. Upgrade your ticket to include a boat ride along the River Spree.
events.name: Berlin City Hop-on Hop-off Tour with Optional Cruise

events.description: Sightsee and feast on German food at the same time on a 2.5-hour dinner cruise along the River Spree. Begin your evening with a welcome drink and continue the night with included wine and beer. Enjoy a four-course meal of German cuisine, including Swabian potato salad, glazed salmon, and more. While you enjoy your meal, take in the illuminated monuments of the city.
events.name: Capital Dinner Cruise at Sunset with Sightseeing of Berlin

events.description: Get an insider’s look at Berlin on this private, guided, 3- or 4-hour walking tour. Enjoy personalized attention while visiting some of Berlin’s most popular attractions — like the Berlin Wall Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie and Brandenburg Gate — as well as a few lesser-known locations. Customize the tour and learn about the history of Berlin, from the time of the Teutonic Knights to its role as capital of the Nazi Third Reich, to the divided city of the Cold War, to the modern-day capital of a unified Germany. Hotel pickup and drop-off included.
events.name: Private Walking Tour: Berlin Highlights and Hidden Sights

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/30791P675/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: The Ultimate Munich History Experience: Private & Personalized

events.description: Book your Hamburg Dungeon admission ticket in advance, and secure a day and time to visit this super-popular attraction. Professional actors guide you on a tour that takes you through 600 years of Hamburg history. Be sure to book a 10am tour on Friday, Saturday, or Sunday if you’d like an English-speaking guide.
events.name: Saver Ticket Hamburg Dungeon

events.description: Escape the city bustle of Dresden with a full-day tour to the Bohemian and Saxon Switzerland National Parks. Get picked up at your hotel in Dresden for a small-group tour with stops at popular landmarks including Bastei Bridge, Neurathen Castle, and the Sněžník Lookout Tower. Relax over an included lunch and then visit the Tyssa Walls, filming site of the Chronicles of Narnia.
events.name: Best of Bohemian and Saxon Switzerland Day Trip from Dresden- Fantasy Tour

events.description: Learn about WWII and the Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial during this tour from Berlin. Travel by train and take a tour of the site, once one of the most pivotal concentration camps in Nazi Germany. Discover the camp’s history, see the barracks, infirmary, laboratory and cells, and listen to tales of courage and suffering sensitively told by your guide. Learn about the daily routines and fates of the 200,000 people imprisoned here between 1936 and 1945, and visit the intensely poignant site memorials.
events.name: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Walking Tour

events.description: Explore the chilling legacy of Germany’s Third Reich during this 4-hour walking tour of Berlin. Follow your historian guide on a walk to the ruins of Anhalter Bahnhof, previously Europe’s largest train station, used to deport prisoners to concentrations camps. You'll also visit the former headquarters of the SS and Gestapo, concluding at the Reichstag, the German parliament building. Your guide will contextualize the rise of the Nazis as you go, offering insight into those who resisted as well as the horrific impact of the Holocaust.
events.name: Berlin's Infamous Third Reich Sites Half-Day Walking Tour

events.description: Experience the best of Bavarian beer culture with this all-inclusive Oktoberfest tour and table reservation. Enjoy skip-the-line entry into the festival with a guide. Explore the historic Theresienwiese and gain insight into Bavaria’s rich brewing heritage, then take your seat inside one of the Oktoberfest tents. Savor a traditional Bavarian lunch and swill as many steins of beer as you wish! Afterward — when the party ramps up — drink and dance as Bavarian music fills the tent. Book early to avoid disappointment!
events.name: All Inclusive Oktoberfest Tour and Table Reservation at a Major Tent

events.description: If visiting Berlin for the first time, check off all the city’s must-see landmarks in just a half day with a small-group tour that starts and ends right at the door of your hotel. The sprawling capital can be intimidating to navigate, but a driver and guide makes it easy to take in all the top sights, from wartime and Communist relics to leafy boulevards and modern cultural complexes. Take a break to digest what you’ve seen with a lunch stop at a hand-picked German restaurant.
events.name: Berlin City Tour with Hotel pick up and Drop off

events.description: Visit the beautiful city of Cologne on this guided, full-day sightseeing tour from Frankfurt. Enjoy a scenic drive north to Cologne, then hop on a double-decker bus to see many of this 2,000-year-old city’s top attractions. Pass by the Romanesque Catholic Great St. Martin Church, bustling Roncalliplatz, the historic Alter Markt square, Cologne City Hall and much more. Then visit the Cologne Cathedral, Germany’s most-visited site, for an independent tour. On the return trip to Frankfurt, discover the medieval old town of Limburg.
events.name: Cologne Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: Frankfurt is one of Germany’s most dynamic cities, from its atmospheric Old Town to its skyscraper-lined riverfront. On this tour, connect with a Frankfurt local who will show you around their city like a friend and introduce you to the neighborhoods that they know and love. Gain an insight into German culture, traditions, and everyday life; visit only the sights that interest you; and receive recommendations on where to eat, drink, and shop.
events.name: Frankfurt Like a Local: Customized Private Tour

events.description: See Germany’s Romantic Road on a private day trip from Munich and discover its showpiece sights with ease. With your own private guide for a group of up to seven people, you’ll travel to Harburg Castle, Dinkelsbühl, and Rothenburg ob der Tauber, hearing about the history of the culture-rich route as you go. Free time to sightsee, shop, and explore is included at each stop.
events.name: Romantic Road: Rothenburg ob der Tauber and More Private Tour

events.description: Visit the cities of Heidelberg and Baden-Baden on this guided, full-day sightseeing adventure from Frankfurt. First, explore Heidelberg, Germany’s oldest and most famous university town. See the Gothic landmark Heidelberg Castle and the bustling Old Town district that runs for one mile along the Neckar River. Then visit the spa town of Baden-Baden in Germany’s Black Forest. Travel through the region, famous for its production of traditional German cuckoo clocks, and see some of its popular attractions. Round-trip coach transportation from Frankfurt included.
events.name: Heidelberg and Baden-Baden Tour from Frankfurt

events.description: Spend the day exploring Munich’s enchanted surroundings with your own private guide and vehicle. Visit the popular sights of the Ettal Monastery, the village of Oberammergau, the opulent Linderhof Palace, and finish the day with a guided tour of the famous Neuschwanstein Castle. Discover the rich history of Bavaria and get insider tips from your informative guide during this private tour.
events.name: Private Mini Van Tour to Neuschwanstein Castle, Linderhof, Ettal & Oberammergau

events.description: Pair Munich signatures with off-the-path gems on this small-group walking tour that’s simply jam-packed with local insights. Stroll sights including St. Peter’s Church, the New Town Hall, the Marienplatz, the Munich Residence, the Bavarian State Opera, and the Victuals Market as your guide tells tales of the city ancient and modern. With a maximum of 10 travelers on the tour, don’t hesitate to ask for personalized travel and food tips.
events.name: Munich Small-Group Walking Tour

events.description: Learn to make one of Bavaria’s celebrated snacks, the pretzel, during this private hands-on cooking experience in Munich. Meet your host at his home and discover all there is to know about the brezn. After you’ve baked your delicious bread, enjoy the fruits of your labor paired with a weisswurst, or white sausage, and a non-alcoholic beer while chatting with your host.
events.name: Bake Bavarian Pretzels in a Local's Munich Home

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/137266P264/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: The Best of Munich - Private Walking Tour - 4 hours with English-speaking guide

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/135081P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Dachau Tour

events.description: Visit the cities of Heidelberg and Nuremberg on this guided, full-day sightseeing adventure from Frankfurt. First, explore Heidelberg, Germany’s oldest and most famous university town. See the Gothic landmark Heidelberg Castle and the bustling Old Town district that runs for one mile along the Neckar River. Then visit the medieval city of Nuremberg. Learn about its history — from the days of the Holy Roman Empire to the German Renaissance, Third Reich, Nazi rallies and Nuremberg Trials — and see many of its popular attractions. Round-trip coach transportation from Frankfurt included.
events.name: Heidelberg and Nuremberg Tour from Frankfurt

events.description: Visit the head of the former Prussian Empire on a half-day trip to Potsdam. Enjoy a guided tour of the famous Sanssouci Palace and walk through its gardens—during the summer months. Listen to informative commentary from your guide about the history of the Prussian Empire as you stroll through this UNESCO-listed city and visit attractions such as the Dutch Quarter, the rebuilt City Palace, and the New Palace.
events.name: Half-Day Potsdam Sightseeing Tour Including Guided Sanssouci Palace Visit from Berlin

events.description: Skip the line at Neuschwanstein Castle, one of Germany’s most popular attractions, on this half-day tour from Füssen. Board the coach and explore the historic town of Fussen before heading to the famous Bavarian castle known for its fairytale-like architecture and picturesque hilltop setting. Transportation from Fussen to Hohenschwangau Village is included.
events.name: Skip-the-Line Neuschwanstein Castle Half-Day Tour from Fuessen

events.description: Get to know the best of Munich on this guided, 3-hour bike tour. Learn the history of this popular city, along with fascinating stories and facts, while riding around its wide open parks, elegant plazas, meandering riverbanks and winding, medieval alleyways. This tour includes stops at gathering spots like Marienplatz, Königsplatz, the Odeonsplatz and much more. Ride through Englischer Garten, Europe’s largest city park and stop at the Chinese Tower beer garden for a beverage.
events.name: Munich Bike Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/115296P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Winter tour to the royal castles Neuschwanstein und Linderhof from Munich

events.description: See what’s ‘brewing’ in Berlin, a world capital of beer culture, during this beer-themed exploration of the German capital. Stop by three of the city’s bars and breweries for tastings, learning along the way about the long, multi-century history of the drink in Germany and about locals’ love for all things beer. A traditional German snack is also included.
events.name: 3-Hour Berlin Beer Tour

events.description: Enjoy a royal palace adventure in the Bavarian heartland on this 2-day tour from Munich. Start with a visit to Linderhof Palace in Ettal, which King Ludwig II of Bavaria modeled after the Palace of Versailles. Make a brief stop in Oberammergau before reaching Hohenschwangau. Then step inside the king’s palace of retreat, Neuschwanstein Castle, for a self-guided tour of one of Germany’s most popular attractions. After an overnight stay, visit Hohenschwangau Castle, the king’s childhood home. Transportation, accommodation plus breakfast and the entrance fee to Hohenschwangau Castle included.
events.name: Overnight Royal Castles Tour - Linderhof, Hohenschwangau, Neuschwanstein

events.description: Discover the regal heritage of Potsdam, Berlin’s posh royal suburb. See the Dutch Quarter and well-preserved palaces of Frederick the Great and other Prussian kings, including Cecilienhof and splendid Sanssouci, with a driver and guide. Hotel pickup and drop-off makes this an easy way to escape the urban grind of Berlin for a day among Potsdam’s lush gardens, plentiful fountains, and fascinating history.
events.name: Potsdam City Tour

events.description: Enjoy a worry-free arrival and departure in Berlin with this private transfer service. Meet your driver at Berlin Schönefeld Airport, and relax on the journey to your hotel in the city. When it’s time to leave, you’ll be taken back to the airport with convenient door-to-door service. These private vehicles can accommodate up to three, eight or 15 passengers, depending on option selected when booking.
events.name: Private Airport Round-Trip Transfer: Berlin Schönefeld Airport to Berlin Hotel plus Return Trip

events.description: Get a comprehensive look at Berlin during a hop-on hop-off bus tour with guided commentary provided via audio headsets. Double-decker buses offer convenient transportation to Berlin’s famous landmarks, such as Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie and the Berlin Cathedral. Stay on board throughout the circle tour, or travel at your own pace with your choice of a 1- or 2-day ticket.
events.name: Berlin 1- or 2-Day Hop-On Hop-Off City Circle Tour: Berlin's Landmarks and Monuments

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/137266P43/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Transfer from Nuremberg to Munich with 2 Sightseeing Stops

events.description: Enhance your experience of Germany’s captivating capital on a private 3-hour walking tour of Berlin led by a professional guide. Discover Berlin’s arresting landmarks from the comfort of a luxury vehicle as you travel down great boulevards like Unter den Linden while listening to informative commentary from your guide. Absorb the botanical beauty of Tiergarten Park; capture photographs of the impressive Reichstag parliament building and the Brandenburg Gate; and see the vibrant street art that covers the former Berlin Wall. Receive undivided attention from your private guide on this enriching tour.
events.name: Private Half-Day Berlin Sightseeing Tour with a Minivan Including Short City Walks

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/127248P8/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Nuremberg World War 2 Tour

events.description: Travel to Salzburg, forever associated with Mozart and ‘The Sound of Music,’ on this rail day trip from Munich. Relax on a scenic train journey to this historical Austrian city, and enjoy a guided walking tour of its UNESCO-listed Old Town, seeing the Mirabell Gardens, St. Peter’s Church, Mozart’s Birthplace, and more. Lastly, enjoy free time to stroll, shop, and sightsee for yourself, before your return train ride. Rail tickets and walking tour included.
events.name: Salzburg Sightseeing Day Trip from Munich by Rail

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/87669P12/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: PRIVATE Nuremberg Highlights Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/89617P87/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Best of Cologne with a private guide

events.description: See Munich’s night lights come to life, plus enjoy dinner at the famous watering hole Hofbräuhaus, on this private, guided, 4-hour sightseeing tour. Munich is the capital of Bavaria and one of Germany’s most popular destinations. Start with a tour of the city’s popular squares, monuments, fountains and buildings while they are illuminated for the evening. Then enjoy dinner and a show at Hofbräuhaus before traveling to the top of the Olympiaturm for a spectacular panoramic view of the city and beyond. Finally, hoist a farewell drink at a Munich nightclub.
events.name: Munich by Night including Dinner at Hofbrauhaus and Olympic Tower Ascent

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/60125P22/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Tour to Neuschwanstein and more for groups.

events.description: Discover the city of Potsdam, once home to Prussian kings and the German Kaiser, on a full-day walking tour from Berlin. See how royalty left its mark on the city's streets as you wander past Cecilienhof Palace, King Frederick William II’s Marble Palace, the Dutch quarter, and the UNESCO-listed Sanssouci Palace and Gardens. Stop for lunch (own expense) in the city center, learn the regal history behind each site that you pass, and return to your original departure point in Berlin when your tour concludes.
events.name: Discover Potsdam

events.description: Visitors unfamiliar with Cologne’s unusual brewhouse etiquette may find themselves confused by the system. On this brewhouse tour, find out how the ordering process works and—crucially—how to indicate you’ve had your fill. Visit four traditional brewhouses with a guide, savoring a glass of kölsch—Cologne’s signature beer style—at each.
events.name: Old Town Public Brewhouse Tour in English

events.description: Explore two of Bavaria’s beautiful cities in one day on this Munich and Nuremberg day trip from Frankfurt. Explore Munich by double-decker bus and discover top attractions including the Cathedral of Our Blessed Lady and the Old Town Hall. Admire Nymphenburg Palace’s Baroque architecture and sightsee at your leisure. In Nuremberg, take a walking tour through the Old Town and Castle Quarter, where half-timbered houses tell of a bygone era. Listen as your guide explains Nuremburg’s medieval history, and perhaps visit the Germanic National Museum or Nuremberg Castle independently.
events.name: Munich and Nuremberg Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: Explore the best of the city with the Berlin Welcome card and enjoy discounts at 200 highlights and attractions. Choose from 10 different ticket types that also include public transportation throughout the city from anywhere between two and six days from the time of validation. Discounts range from 25 to 50 percent and includes sites such as the TV Tower, Sanssouci Palace, and a number of tours and museums.
events.name: Berlin Welcome Card

events.description: Get a sobering look at the Sachsenhausen-Oranienburg Nazi concentration camp during this guided excursion from Berlin. Learn about the more than 200,000 prisoners that passed through the camp’s gates as you tour its barracks, pathology department, ‘appellplatz’ (roll call square), ‘Zellenbau’ (Gestapo prison), and more.
events.name: Sachsenhausen-Oranienburg Memorial Tour From Berlin

events.description: Hit all the highlights of historic Frankfurt on this hop-on hop-off sightseeing tour. With your one-day pass, create your own adventure with 14 possible stops including Römer (town hall), St Paul's Church, the Botanical Garden Palmengarten and the majestic Opera House. As you cruise through town aboard a double-decker coach, listen to interesting audio commentary (available in 12 languages) about the city’s history and culture.
events.name: Frankfurt City Hop-On Hop-Off Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/158751P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Munich's Original Christmas Market Food Tour - all tastings included!

events.description: Soak up the holiday spirit with a 2-hour tour of the Munich Christmas markets. With more than 20 holiday markets across the city, follow a guide through Munich's Old Town to explore the city's festive offerings, including Christkindlmarkt in Marienplatz. Shop for handmade Bavarian gifts, sip on glühwein (mulled wine), and try lebkuchen, the gingerbread cookie that has been a local Christmas staple since the 14th century.
events.name: Munich Christmas Markets Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/197833P5/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Magic Christmas Tour in Munich

events.description: Visit the Eagle’s Nest in Berchtesgaden, Adolf Hitler’s famous mountaintop retreat, on this day trip from Munich. Travel by air-conditioned coach through Bavaria’s lush mountainscapes, and ride a bus and elevator to the lodge, 6,148 feet (1,834 meters) up Mt. Kehlstein. See where Hitler entertained dignitaries, view the hall where weddings and conferences were staged, and explore the terrace to admire the spectacular Alpine views—vistas that Hitler, ironically, found challenging due to his vertigo. Enjoy time for lunch (own expense) and the option to visit the Nazi Documentation Center Museum.
events.name: Berchtesgaden and Eagle's Nest Day Tour from Munich

events.description: Enjoy one of Bavaria's most popular attractions, Neuschwanstein Castle, on this day trip from Munich. Avoid the long ticket queues with skip-the-line admission and enjoy plenty of free time to explore this fairy tale castle that was the inspiration for Disney's 'Sleeping Beauty' castle. The train tickets for the round-trip journey from Munich to Füssen are included making this a hassle-free experience.
events.name: Skip-the-Line Day Tour from Munich to Neuschwanstein and Hohenschwangau

events.description: Explore the best of Frankfurt on this guided, 2-hour sightseeing adventure around the city. Visit many of Frankfurt’s top attractions on board an open-top bus. See Frankfurt Central Station, the Museum Embankment, European Central Bank (Eurotower), the historic Römer city hall, St. Paul's Church, Frankfurt Cathedral and the Hauptwache, one of the most famous plazas in the city. Enjoy a detailed commentary about Frankfurt’s history, culture and architecture from the expert local guide while rolling along through this historic yet modern town.
events.name: Frankfurt City Tour

events.description: On this full-day, customizable shore excursion, you’ll cover the highlights of Austria’s most scenic and history-rich locations. Choose from bespoke itineraries to postcard-perfect Hallstatt, the picturesque city of Salzburg, or the panoramic Eagle’s Nest, a hilltop lodge. Tours are specially designed for cruise ship passengers, ensuring you’ll be transferred back to the port in time to sail.
events.name: Customized Private Tour to Salzburg for Cruise Guests from Linz or Passau

events.description: Explore Berlin like you own the place on a private half-day tour of the vibrant German capital. With a private guide and chauffeur, you’ll delve into the city’s history as you visit monuments such as Brandenburg Gate (Brandenburg Tor) and the UNESCO-listed Museum Island. Admire the vibrant art of East Side Gallery — formerly the Berlin Wall — and marvel at the grand architecture of Unter den Linden. On this private tour, you’ll receive the undivided attention of your guide while seeing the best that Berlin has to offer.
events.name: Private Berlin Custom Half-Day Tour with Private Driver and Guide

events.description: Make the most of your time at shore on a tour through Berlin’s highlights and a trip to the Sachsenhausen concentration camp. Learn about Germany’s dark history from your informative guide as you walk through the former concentration camp. Then hop aboard the bus and head to Berlin to explore the city and visit key landmarks such as Checkpoint Charlie, Berlin Cathedral, the Reichstag, and Potsdamer Platz.
events.name: Shore Excursion: Best of Berlin & Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/173111P5/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: MY*GUiDE Exclusive SKIP-THE-CROWDS Neuschwanstein & HSG Castle Tour from Munich

events.description: Visit the famous Zugspitze, Germany’s highest peak, on this guided, full-day trip with road transfers from Munich. Take a cable car to the summit of Zugspitze, Germany's highest mountain at 2,962 meters (9,718 feet) above sea level, for breathtaking views of Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and Italy, then ride the cogwheel train back down.
events.name: Zugspitze Day Tour from Munich

events.description: See Munich in a fun new way: via Segway. After learning how to ride a Segway, zoom through the attractive Bavarian city. Learn about the history of Munich from the guide while seeing such sites as Odeonsplatz, Hofgarten, Victory Gate, Leopoldstraße, the Maximilianeum and the Peace Angel, among others. This tour is a great way to rest your cobblestone-weary feet!
events.name: Segway tour Munich´s highlights (3 h)

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/131478P17/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: PRIVATE BEHIND THE BERLIN WALL & COLD WAR BERLIN TOUR

events.description: Enjoy festive celebrations in the heart of Germany on this 2.5-hour Christmas Sunday brunch cruise in Cologne. Hop aboard your sightseeing boat in Cologne’s Old Town, and enjoy a welcome drink of sparkling wine or orange juice. Cruise out onto the Rhine River as Christmas music fills the air. Gaze over top attractions such as the UNESCO–listed Cologne Cathedral, the bustling Old Town and the marina of Rheinauhafen. Sit down to a delicious buffet brunch of eggs, cold meats, pasta, and fish as the city drifts slowly past outside.
events.name: Cologne Christmas Sunday Brunch Cruise

events.description: On this small-group, half-day Segway tour, you’ll get an attraction-packed introduction to central Berlin. See Checkpoint Charlie, a symbol of the Cold War, and explore the history of Gendarmenmarkt. Cover more sights in less time as you discover the highlights of the city, without having to walk from place to place.
events.name: Segway Classic Tour (3 hours)

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/127248P7/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Nuremberg WWII, Courtroom 600 and 3rd Reich sites

events.description: Go beer tasting in Berlin on this 3-hour private tour. Let a private guide introduce you to four beers from some of the best brewers in the city as you enjoy part of Germany's famous beer culture. A snack is also included. When booking, you have a choice of departure times.
events.name: Private Beer Tour and Snacks with a Local in Berlin

events.description: Visit the magnificent, medieval city of Nuremberg, Germany — featuring a trip to the Nazi party rally grounds — on this guided, 4-hour sightseeing tour. Learn about the history of the city, from the days of the Holy Roman Empire to the German Renaissance, Third Reich, Nazi rallies and Nuremberg Trials. See German Renaissance artist Albrecht Dürer's house, the Imperial Castle courtyards, plus Town Hall, gothic St. Lawrence Church, bustling Craftsmen’s Courtyard and much more. Public transportation to and from the Nazi party rally grounds is included.
events.name: Nuremberg Old Town and Nazi Party Rally Grounds Walking Tour

events.description: Take a break from Christmas sightseeing or shopping and celebrate the season with this 2-hour cruise along the Rhine River from Düsseldorf. Take in the scenic, wintry panorama of Düsseldorf's Old Town and the shores of the Rhine while listening to live Christmas music on board the MS Warsteiner boat. It’s a delightful way to spend part of any afternoon.
events.name: Düsseldorf Rhine River Christmas Afternoon Cruise

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/158751P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Small Group Viktualienmarkt Food Tour & Beyond - Munich's Best Local Tastings!

events.description: Begin your stay in Munich with ease with this stress-free, one-way shared transfer service from Munich International Airport to Munich Central Station. After landing, cross the Munich airport arrivals hall and head outside to board the shared, air-conditioned shuttle bus. Then, enjoy a smooth and comfortable journey to the station, with the option to hop out at Schwabing North on route. If you need a return transfer to the airport at the end of your time in Munich, upgrade to a round-trip transfer service when you book.
events.name: Shared Arrival Transfer: Munich Airport to Munich Central Station

events.description: Make the most of your time in Germany on a shore excursion with convenient round-trip transport from the Warnemünde Cruise Center. Going with a guide means you eliminate the hassle of planning, as lunch, tours, and all admission tickets are pre-arranged for you. The day’s itinerary includes a spin through Rostock’s city center, St. Marien Church, and Schwerin Castle.
events.name: Hanseatic Rostock and Fairytale Schwerin Shore Excursion

events.description: Spend a night out at one of the most famous and frequented sites in Berlin with “An Evening at Charlottenburg Palace” concert experience. Enjoy the classical sounds of the acclaimed Berlin Residence Orchestra, performing selections from composers like Bach, Handel, Mozart and more. Choose from four ticket categories. At intermission, VIP seat holders receive a glass of sparkling champagne. This event regularly sells out weeks in advance so be sure to book early.
events.name: 'An Evening at Charlottenburg Palace' Concert by the Berlin Residence Orchestra

events.description: Explore Berlin’s highlights on this full-day bus tour from the cruise port of Warnemünde. Once arriving in Berlin, take a 5.5-hour tour of significant landmarks such as Checkpoint Charlie, the Reichstag, and the Brandenburg Gate. Enjoy informative commentary from your onboard guide and learn about the history of the German capital.
events.name: Shore Excursion: Best of Berlin Tour from Warnemünde or Rostock with Wi-Fi

events.description: Skip the long lines at Neuschwanstein Castle on this 9-hour tour of the castle and its surrounding area. This tour includes round-trip transport from Innsbruck and skip-the-line access at Neuschwanstein Castle to take away the hassle of planning. During your time, you’ll also get to see Hohenschwangau Castle, and enjoy the views from the outside.
events.name: Neuschwanstein Castle Small Group Tour from Innsbruck

events.description: Spend an unforgettable day touring some of Southern Germany’s most lovely destinations! Depart Frankfurt on a scenic journey to riverside Heidelberg, where you'll marvel at stunning city sites from medieval Old Town to bustling Heidelberg University. Soak up the many sites and flavors of Germany as you visit castle ruins, see lovely villages and vineyards, cruise along the UNESCO-listed Rhine River, and indulge in a delectable dinner and wine-tasting session.
events.name: Heidelberg and Rhine Valley Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: Get to know the Bavarian city of Regensburg, the only authentically preserved large medieval city in Germany, on this full-day rail trip from Munich. Enjoy a guided walking tour of this UNESCO World Heritage site and its Old Town district. See the Old Stone Bridge, crossing the Danube River; the Regensburg Cathedral, a twin-spired Gothic landmark; and the historic Wurstkuchl, the oldest sausage kitchen in the world, to name a few. Then enjoy ample free time to explore the town at leisure. Round-trip train ticket and Regensburg city map included.
events.name: Regensburg Rail Day Trip from Munich

events.description: Experience the dramatic final days of the World War II in Berlin during this half-day walking excursion. Visit some of the most important historical sites in Berlin with your guide, discovering the series of events that culminated in the final German surrender. Trace the Soviet attack as it drove ever-deeper into the German capital, ending with the final battle at the Reichstag. View the site of Hitler's former bunker and learn about daily life for residents during the war, particularly those who opposed the Third Reich.
events.name: Third Reich Berlin - Hitler and WWII

events.description: Discover Munich with a private guide, exploring the enchanting Old Town squares and hearing the city's history. During a walking tour, you'll learn about landmarks such as the Glockenspiel, Munich Hofbräuhaus, and the Royal Residence, and hear tales of wartime history. Find out fun facts about the beer purity law and the annual Oktoberfest, and enjoy photo stops aplenty as you walk your way around the city. The tour is led by a private guide, and the meeting point and start time can be chosen by you.
events.name: Private Munich Walking Tour

events.description: Munich is the unofficial beer capital of the world, home to the legendary Oktoberfest as well as hundreds of beer halls, gardens and cellars. Get a taste of Bavarian beer culture at its very best on this private, 3.5-hour walking tour, led by your own personal guide. Immerse yourself in the convivial atmosphere at a local beer hall; sip a stein at the renowned Hofbräuhaus; and learn about the techniques used to make Bavarian brew at the Beer and Oktoberfest Museum. Receive one-to-one attention from your private guide throughout.
events.name: Private Tour: Bavarian Beer and Food Evening in Munich

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/30791P624/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private and Personalized Experience: See Munich with a Local

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/107763P5/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Zugspitze "Top of Germany" Tour in Mercedes Van V-Class (up to 6 person)

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/137266P265/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Food & Drink Walking Tour - Munich - 4 hours with English-speaking guide

events.description: Discover vibrant and historic Hamburg on this hop-on hop-off double-decker bus tour.  With your single-day pass, relax for the full loop, or design an itinerary with 29 possible stops like St. Michael Church, St. Pauli Fish Market, and the renowned Reeperbahn red-light district. Enjoy unobstructed views from the open-air viewing deck (weather permitting) and onboard commentary in English and German. Upgrade to add a harbor cruise.
events.name: Hamburg Hop-on Hop-off Tour - Red Double Decker

events.description: Taste the best of Bavarian food and drink on a private 3-hour culinary tour in Munich. Follow your personal guide to a traditional bierkeller (beer garden) to try two local München beers. Pair your local drinks with traditional dishes, including veal sausages, regional cheeses, and obatzda (cheese spread).  Please note that the tour’s menu and itinerary can be customized based on your unique tastes and dietary restrictions.
events.name: Eat like a local in Munich: private & personalized

events.description: Experience the true beauty of Bavaria by going on a day trip to Lake Konigssee, St. Bartholomew island, and Berchtesgaden Salt Mine. Save time figuring out local public transport schedules and enjoy having an itinerary planned out for you. Travel with ease in air-conditioned vehicle, and cross the lake on an electric boat. Along the way, hear interesting facts and stories from your guide, as you explore the best parts of the local landscape, such as Berchtesgaden Alpine National Park.
events.name: Königssee and Berchtesgaden Saltmine Day Trip from Munich

events.description: Discover Berlin as the frontier of the Cold War on this guided historical walking tour. After World War II, Berlin changed from the capital city of Nazi Germany into the pivotal city in a struggle to control war-torn Europe. Retrace the trail of the “death strip” and the Berlin Wall. Visit some of Berlin’s most popular Cold War attractions, like the Berlin Wall Memorial, Brandenburg Gate, underground "ghost stations," and more. Learn about the history of Berlin, from its founding to this divided city of the Cold War.
events.name: Cold War Walking Tour of Berlin

events.description: Discover Nuremberg’s rich and storied past on a full-day bus and walking tour from Munich. Relax on the comfortable ride to Nuremberg, then take a guided tour of the city, famous as the epicenter of the Nazi propaganda campaign. See attractions like Congress Hall and historic old town, and learn about the birth of the Third Reich empire. Afterward, enjoy some free time to explore, sample local foods and snap souvenir photos.
events.name: Nuremberg Third Reich and Roman Empire Historical Day Trip

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/137266P237/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Scenic Transfer from Munich to Nuremberg with 4h of Sightseeing

events.description: Raise a glass to Bavarian beer with an evening of beer tasting in Munich! Follow your guide, a fellow beer lover, on a 3.5-hour tour of the city’s beer halls and breweries. Go behind-the-scenes with a tour of one of Munich’s historic breweries, learn about Bavaria’s famous purity law and see the beer-brewing process in action. Then, pay a visit to the famous Hofbräuhaus beer hall, where you can sample a refreshing Weissbier (Wheat Beer) or order a ‘mass’ – a whole liter of beer!
events.name: Munich Beer and Brewery Tour Including Samples

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/173111P10/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: MY*GUiDE Exclusive MUNICH & Surroundings ALL-IN-ONE Culture, Nature&History Tour

events.description: Get the most out of your visit to Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp by visiting alongside a guide trained and licensed by the Camp’s Memorial Foundation. Learn more about the concentration camp than you would if exploring independently.
events.name: The Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Tour

events.description: Experience Berlin’s culinary delights and fascinating history with a local guide. Learn about the city’s dark past, including the notorious “death strip” and the graffiti that covered the 27-mile (43-kilometer) Berlin Wall. Marvel at the amazing street art and rich cultural diversity of Kreuzberg. Enjoy food and drink tastings at a famous bakery and a historic market included in the tour price.
events.name: Culinary Tour Scene and East-Side-Gallery

events.description: Spend a night out at one of the most famous sites in Berlin with “An Evening at Charlottenburg Palace,” a dinner and concert experience with the Berlin Residence Orchestra, plus a tour of the palace. Enjoy a 3-course candlelight dinner in the Palace Orangery. Then take in the classical sounds of the Berlin Residence Orchestra, performing selections from Bach, Handel, Mozart and more. Choose from four ticket categories. At intermission, VIP seat holders receive a glass of champagne. This event regularly sells out weeks in advance, so book early.
events.name: 'An Evening at Charlottenburg Palace' Palace Tour, Dinner and Concert by the Berlin Residence Orchestra

events.description: Experience the impact that the Nazi period and construction of the Berlin wall left on Germany’s capital. Touring Berlin by bike lets you experience historic sites at a pace you can’t access by car. Ride along Berlin’s bike lanes and neighborhood streets with an experienced guide who knows the city and its history.
events.name: Third Reich and Berlin Wall History 3-Hour Bike Tour in Berlin

events.description: Explore one of Hamburg’s most celebrated and sordid districts when you go on a nighttime tour of the Reeperbahn. The city’s infamous red-light district, and now also home to popular bars, clubs, and other nightlife destinations, the Reeperbahn comes alive after dark. Pick between two evening departure times and set off. You’ll see the Beatles-Platz, Hans-Albers-Platz, the seedy Herbertstraße, and other famed local landmarks. As you go, learn about the characters who have frequented the area, and discover its unique history.
events.name: Red and Blue light: Walking Tour on the Reeperbahn

events.description: Discover the marvellous monuments and architectural wonders of Dresden on a guided walking tour. Learn how the jewel of baroque Germany was painstakingly reconstructed after WWII as you follow your guide around the elegant plazas and grand boulevards. Keep your camera to hand as you pass the striking Zwinger Palace and Theater Square; take a peek inside the Church of Our Lady; and admire the dramatic Procession of Princes mural.
events.name: Dresden Walking Tour of the Historic Old Town

events.description: Enhance your Hamburg experience with a hop-on hop-off sightseeing tour by land and water! Aboard a double-decker bus, pass main city attractions and disembark at any of the 28 stops for close-up views of sights like St Michael Church and the renowned Reeperbahn red-light district. Your ticket includes two 60-minute boat trips through Hamburg’s historic harbor and Lake Alster. Do everything in one day, or spread the three activities over three consecutive days!
events.name: Essential Hamburg Combo: Hop-on Hop-off Tour, Cruise and Lake Alster

events.description: Board a private plane and share your pilot’s passion for flying while you soar above the sights of Cologne (Köln). Seeing the city from the air is an unforgettable way to learn about the landscape, with informative commentary provided by the pilot. You’ll have stunning views of UNESCO-listed Kölner Dom (Cologne Cathedral) and beyond to the Rur Reservoir.
events.name: Cologne: 1-Hour Private Sightseeing Flight

events.description: Experiencing Bavarian food while visiting Germany isn’t the same as learning to make it own your own. This Bavarian cooking class takes you inside a local’s 150-year-old farmhouse in Oberaudorf, while you learn firsthand how to make a Bavarian-style dinner. Learn to make strudel and schnitzel, as you sip on Bavarian beer and local schnapps, and then take home the recipes and skills to do it again after your trip.
events.name: Bavarian Schnitzel Cooking Class in Oberaudorf Farmhouse

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/30791P474/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Eat like a local in Hamburg: private & personalized

events.description: Visit the magnificent, medieval city of Nuremberg, Germany — featuring a trip to the Nazi party rally grounds — on this private, guided sightseeing tour. Choose from a 2-, 3- or 5-hour tour, then enjoy personalized attention while learning about the history of the city, from the days of the Holy Roman Empire to the German Renaissance, Third Reich, Nazi rallies and Nuremberg Trials. See German Renaissance artist Albrecht Dürer's house, the Imperial Castle courtyards, plus Town Hall and more. Hotel pickup and drop-off is included.
events.duration:

events.description: Shop till you drop at designer boutiques and luxury outlets on this 6-hour Wertheim Village shopping day trip from Frankfurt. Travel from Frankfurt to Wertheim Village, a luxury shopping outlet just one hour outside town. Choose the ‘express option’ for the travel only, or upgrade your tour to the ‘experience option’ to make the most of further benefits such as a 50-euro shopping card, lunch and VIP card for extra discounts. When you’ve made your purchases for the day, meet back up with your driver and return to Frankfurt.
events.name: Wertheim Village Shopping Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: Explore Berlin’s craft beer scene with this 3.5-hour guided tour to three different locations. Sample three to nine craft beers throughout the tour at a local brewery and two craft beer bars. Learn about the brewing process and the rise of craft beer in Germany. Enjoy a hot snack during the tour and learn about the rich history of beer within the country.
events.name: 3.5-Hour Guided Original Craft Beer Tour in Berlin

events.description: While visiting Munich for Oktoberfest, or to experience its popular beer culture any time of the year, take this guided, 3-hour, behind-the-scenes brewery tour. Visit several Munich breweries to see their beer-making facilities, including the fermenting tanks and malting towers. Meet master brewers and learn about the history of brewing lager. Then enjoy a fresh Bavarian pretzel with a glass of beer.
events.name: Behind-the-Scenes Brewery and Beer Tour in Munich

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/133896P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Personal wine tours in the heart of Germany from Frankfurt region - Mainz

events.description: Sign up for a seamless transfer service between Passau and Prague—and enjoy a sightseeing stop along the way—with this private, two-in-one excursion. After pickup at your Passau hotel, hop aboard your luxurious Mercedes Benz and hit the road. While en route, enjoy a short stopover in Cesky Krumlov, a Czech town known for its UNESCO-listed historic center. After a guided walking tour, return to your vehicle and continue to Prague.
events.name: Scenic transfer from Passau to Prague with 2-hours guided tour of Cesky Krumlov

events.description: There’s more to German cuisine than bratwurst and sauerkraut, and this Berlin market tour and cooking class offers an ideal introduction. Shop for ingredients at the Winterfeldtmarkt, enjoy an expert-led cooking class, then tuck into a delicious 4-course lunch of homemade specialties. This small-group tour is limited to four people.
events.name: Berlin Market Tour and Cooking Class

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/108020P29/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Munich Airport (MUC) Private Transfer (Minibus 7pax)

events.description: Taste the best of East Berlin during this walking tour sampling the area’s history along with a mix of tasty ethnic eats and traditional German staples. Enjoy a feast for your stomach (and your eyes) as you wander past this trendy area’s mix of hip galleries, communist-designed boulevards, kebab shops, boutique bakeries and German sausage sellers, plus much more. Along the way you’ll gain a new appreciation for Berlin’s culture, food and history. A guide, all food samples, and bottled water are included.
events.name: Secret Food Tours East Berlin

events.description: Explore the streets of Berlin on a 4-hour historic tour. Pedal past famous monuments such as the TV Tower, the Berlin Wall Memorial, and the Brandenburg Gate as you learn about Germany’s history from the Prussian monarchy to the unification of the country after the Cold War. Snap some photos along the way and take in the city scenery as you whizz by on your bike.
events.name: Small-Group Historical Bike Tour in Berlin

events.description: Have only a limited amount of time to explore Hamburg? Discover many of the city’s top attractions in the space of just a couple hours: this small-group tour makes it easy to explore. Meet your guide in the city center, and set off. You’ll visit monuments like St. Michael’s Church, the Hamburg Town Hall, and the St. Nikolai Memorial. You’ll also explore the UNESCO-listed Speicherstadt warehouse district and will admire HafenCity highlights like the Elbphilharmonie.
events.name: Hamburg Small Group Walking Tour

events.description: See some of Bavaria’s most spectacular places on a private, full-day tour from Fussen for your group of up to four people. Experience the fairy-tale Neuschwanstein Castle, enjoy free time to explore Marien Bridge, Alpsee, and Hohenschwangau, then spend the afternoon at Oberammergau and Linderhof Castle. This full-day private tour is priced per group, and includes skip-the-line tickets to Neuschwanstein Castle and Linderhof Castle, as well as round trip transport from your Fussen hotel.
events.name: Private Day Tour from Fussen: Neuschwanstein Castle, Oberammergau and Linderhof Castle

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/70478P14/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Airport Transfer: Berlin Tegel Airport (TXL) to Berlin

events.description: The Elbphilharmonie is one of the most acoustically advanced concert halls in the world. Don’t miss out on learning about its building process and controversial history by talking this walking tour of the Elbphilharmonie. A guide takes you through the hall and tells you little-known facts you wouldn’t necessarily hear otherwise.
events.name: Elbphilharmonie Hamburg guided walking tour

events.description: Explore Berlin’s vibrant street art scene on this guided small-group walking tour. See both old and new examples of street and graffiti art on this engaging tour through the back streets of Berlin. Discover more than 50 incredible street artists from Berlin and beyond, find out what motivates them and learn their unique methods. Then decorate the walls of an abandoned factory and design a canvas piece to take home. The material and equipment for the art workshop is included. Some public transportation expense is required.
events.name: Small-Group Berlin Street Art Tour and Graffiti Workshop

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/64567P2/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Hotrod Tour Frankfurt

events.description: Learn about how Munich became the birthplace of the Nazi Party and what happened there during WW2 on this comprehensive walking tour. By going on a walking tour, you’ll be able to access places that can’t be reached by car or bus. A private tour means a more personalized experience, and you’ll be able to ask questions along the way. Explore key sites associated with WW2 and discover important historical information about the origins and activities of the Nazi Party.
events.name: Munich in the 3rd Reich and WW2 private walking tour

events.description: See Berlin from a new perspective on an evening boat tour along the Spree River. Don’t forget your camera: There are plenty of photo ops of Berlin’s cityscape and top landmarks illuminated under the night sky—from the Berlin Cathedral to the Reichstag. For your comfort and convenience, drinks and snacks are available for purchase on board.
events.name: Berlin: 2-Hour Evening River Spree Cruise on cosy sparkling glitter ship

events.description: Make your visit to Dachau Concentration Camp Memorial Site the best experience possible with help from this round-trip transfer service from Munich. Get picked up right at your hotel, and ride in a private vehicle over to the historical site. Spend your time soaking in all the history at your own pace, and then travel safely back to Munich comfortably.
events.name: Private Round Trip to Dachau Camp from Munich Hotels

events.description: Instead of taking a traditional tour of Nuremberg, pair up with a local guide for a private walking tour. It’s a new travel concept that’s more like exploring the city with a friend; before your private walking tour of Nuremberg, you’ll connect with the Lokafyer guide to chat about your interests. That means an experience that’s tailored to you, not a one-size-fits-all tour.
events.name: Nuremberg Like a Local: Customized Private Tour

events.description: When cruise ship pulls into port, explore two northern German towns—Warnemuende and Rostock—on this half-day shore excursion. Booking this excursion in advance means no scrambling for last-minute tours once you come ashore. With a guide in the lead, explore the two charming towns on walking tours that follow carefully curated itineraries designed to showcase the best of each location.
events.name: Shore Excursion: Warnemuende & Rostock Join-in Tour

events.description: Learn the ins and outs of Germany’s picturesque university city during this private walking tour of Heidelberg. Explore the markets and pedestrianized streets in the Baroque-era Old Town, take a peek at centuries-old cells in the Student Jail, and enjoy complimentary admission to the panoramic Heidelberg Castle, home to one of the best views in town.
events.name: Private Walking Tour of Old Town Heidelberg including Castle Visit

events.description: Rock your senses with classic American cooking and the world’s greatest collection of music memorabilia at the Hard Rock Cafe Munich. Choose from a 2- or 3-course meal and fill up on hearty dishes such as the classic cheeseburger, a half-rack of hickory-smoked and barbecue chicken. Both options include a dessert and your choice of drink (coffee, tea or soda). Cheers!
events.name: Hard Rock Cafe Munich Including Meal

events.description: Ride through Berlin and learn about its turbulent history on this guided tour. Drive an East-German-made Trabant through the streets in a convoy and pass sites from the Cold War, including still-standing sections of Berlin Wall. Whether you take the wheel or not, you’ll still receive your own souvenir Trabant driver’s license to bring home.
events.name: Berlin Wall Self-Drive Trabant Tour in Berlin

events.description: Step into the fairy-tale world of Bavaria and visit majestic castles, alpine lakes and medieval towns on this full-day tour from Fussen. Enjoy skip-the-line entrance to the dreamy Neuschwanstein Castle, famously the inspiration for Disney’s Sleeping Beauty castle. Then, visit Linderhof Castle, another of King Ludwig II’s magnificent castles, and Hohenschwangau Castle, the ‘Mad King’s’ childhood home. That’s not all: stop off to admire the colorful painted houses of Oberammergau and take in views of the Austrian Alps and Lake Plansee.
events.name: Full-Day Bavarian Castles Tour from Fussen

events.description: Go beyond the typical tourist sites in Berlin as you explore the city’s unique ethnic enclaves and thriving countercultures on this guided walking tour. Take a deep dive into the Berlin neighborhoods of Friedrichshain, Prenzlauer Berg, Kreuzberg, and Mitte, stopping to learn about the various cultures and vibrant creativity that define these dynamic sectors. Explore Kreuzberg’s Turkish community before discovering Yaam Beach, which plays host to Berlin’s reggae and hip-hop scenes. Then pass into hidden courtyards and secret gardens as you admire some of Berlin’s legendary street art. This small-group excursion is limited to just 20 guests.
events.name: Berlin Off-the-Beaten-Path Walking Tour: Kreuzberg, Mitte and Friedrichshain

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/19053P465/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Low Cost Private Transfer From Munich International Airport to Munich City

events.description: Visit the sophisticated spa town of Baden-Baden in Germany’s Black Forest on this guided, full-day sightseeing adventure from Frankfurt. Explore the town’s elegant tree-lined avenues, see the grand buildings and visit the chic boutiques alongside the legendary thermal bath houses. See some of the popular local attractions, like Kurhaus of Baden-Baden. Take a tour of this spa resort, casino and conference complex, then enjoy a relaxing drive to the Mummelsee, a popular lake in the Black Forest near Seebach. Round-trip luxury coach transportation from Frankfurt included.
events.name: Black Forest and Baden-Baden Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/17972P391/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer from Frankfurt FRA Airport to Frankfurt City

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/205141P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Frankfurt Impressions -Express-

events.description: See the best of Europe’s undisputed capital of cool on a 3.5-hour bike tour of Berlin. As you follow your guide, you’ll cycle to iconic landmarks such as Brandenburg Gate and Museum Island. Stop regularly to capture photographs and learn of the history of East Side Gallery — formerly the Berlin Wall — and Postdamer Platz. Travel at a leisurely pace and receive personalized attention from your guide on this small-group tour.
events.name: Small-Group Berlin Highlights Bike Tour

events.description: See some of Munich’s top attractions and discover its days of Third Reich rule on this private, guided, 2-hour walking tour around the city’s Old Town. Learn about the history of Munich as well as the Third Reich’s rise to power here. This tour features visits to historic landmarks like Marienplatz, Frauenkirche and the Viktualienmarkt. Then explore those sites associated with Adolf Hitler, the leader of the Nazi party, like the building where he first joined the Nazis, the former headquarters of the Gestapo and much more.
events.name: Private Munich Old Town and Third Reich Walking Tour

events.description: See the sights of Munich with your own private guide for a group of up to eight people, and enjoy a pickup direct from your accommodation. The 3-hour tour takes in all of the Bavarian city's showpiece sights including the Royal Residence, Marienplatz, and the Ohel Jakob Synagogue, along with commentary about the history of each landmark. Finish up near the Viktualienmarkt food market -- a perfect setting for a Bavarian lunch.
events.name: Munich Walking Tour with a Private Guide

events.description: Get to know the best of Potsdam on a guided, 4.5-hour bike tour around this scenic university town. Discover its beautiful palaces, parks and gardens. See the historical city center and Dutch Quarter. Pedal past the royal residences of Sansoucci Palace, one of the largest UNESCO World Heritage sites in Germany. Visit Cecilenhof Palace, where Churchill, Truman and Stalin wrote world history, then stop at a beer garden for lunch (own expense). A train ticket plus the use of a bike and helmet is included.
events.name: Gardens and Palaces of Potsdam Day Bike Tour

events.description: Explore the East German city of Dresden on a full-day private tour from Berlin. Stroll through the “Florence of Germany” with your guide and visit popular sights like the Catholic Cathedral and the famous Semperoper Opera House. Discover the city’s history and the effects World War II had on its infrastructure from your guide. Enjoy some free time to walk around the city, shop, or have lunch before heading back to Berlin.
events.name: Private Dresden Day Trip from Berlin

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/137266P322/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Transfer: River Cruise Dock Nuremberg to Prague: Port / Harbor transport

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/110321P39/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Frankfurt: Your 30 min Private Sightseeing Flight

events.description: Escape the city and marvel on this private 8-hour Bavarian Mountains tour from Salzburg. Travel along the Kingslake River Valley deep into the Bavarian Mountains with your private guide. Admire breathtaking views over Austria’s mighty Lake District from the top of Obersalzberg. Head off the tourist trail to Hinterbrand and enjoy a walk along the shore of Koenigssee Lake. Explore the pretty mountain town of Berchtesgaden during your free time, then return to Salzburg via a 450 year-old salt mine.
events.name: Private Tour: Highlights of the Bavarian Mountains from Salzburg

events.description: Explore all that Berlin has to offer with this 2-day ticket for a hop-on hop-off tour. Set your own pace and itinerary to explore the city’s landmarks such as the Brandenburg Gate, the Berlin Wall, Museum Island, Potsdamer Platz, and much more. Enjoy stunning views of Berlin from the glass dome of the Reichstag with a cup of coffee and cake, included in the price of the tour.
events.name: Coffee & Cake at the Reichstag in Berlin and 48Hour Hop-on Hop-off City Tour

events.description: Discover Berlin’s many faces on a private 6-hour walking tour of East and West Berlin. Hear stories of the city during WWII and the Cold War as you pass the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church, Checkpoint Charlie and the Holocaust Memorial, and learn about Berlin’s former divide as you walk through the Brandenburg Gate. That’s not all: stroll down the grand boulevard of Kurfürstendamm and ride a double-decker bus through Tiergarten park, past the Victory Column, Bellevue Palace and the Reichstag.
events.name: Private Custom Walking Tour of East And West Berlin Including Double-Decker Ride

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/131478P18/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Tour to Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial (With Licensed Guide)

events.description: Get an excellent primer and introduction to Berlin on this private 3-hour tour. See some of the main landmarks and sites as the guide regales you with historical anecdotes, bringing the past right into the present. See Hitler's Bunker, the Brandenburg Gate, remnants of the Berlin Wall, Checkpoint Charlie and Museum Island, among many others. The tour can be customized to your preferences. Also, consider the optional visit to the Reichstag at the end of the tour.
events.name: Private 3-Hour Walking Tour of Berlin with Optional Reichstag Visit

events.description: Find hidden gems on this guided walking tour of Old Town Heidelberg and its castle. Traveling with a guide allows you to visit some spots that independent travelers may miss while listening to engaging commentary on the city's architecture, art, and culinary scene. Stroll down the streets of the Old Town to see history with your own eyes, then step in to the castle to visit the castle garden, the courtyard, and the wine cellar.
events.name: Heidelberg old Town Tour.

events.description: It's easy to get lost in the crowd on a group tour of Berlin—and with so many sights to see—travelers get a better experience with a private tour. On this Berlin city tour, complete with your own private guide, travelers can uncover the city's main attractions and landmarks. Visit the top sights, including the Brandenburg Gate, Potsdamer Platz, Museum Island, and the Holocaust Memorial. And to make the tour complete, visit the remains of the famous Berlin Wall.
events.name: Best of Berlin Tour: Highlights & Hidden Gems With a Local

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/85439P374/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Munich Private Transfers : Cruise Port Passau to Munich City in Luxury Van

events.description: Sit back and relax on this sightseeing cruise in Frankfurt where you choose your own journey. Pick between traveling upstream or downstream on the Main River. No matter what you pick, you’re sure to see impressive views of the city. Sit outside on top of your boat or head inside to sightsee from the comfort of a window seat.
events.name: Frankfurt 50-Minute Sightseeing Cruise

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/137266P38/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Transfer from Munich to Salzburg with 2 Sightseeing Stops

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/89617P26/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Excursion to Düsseldorf

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/183204P9/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Tickets for Berlin TV Tower: Skip The Line

events.description: Enjoy a true Berlin insider’s experience during this 90-minute private, customizable, city walking tour led by a local guide. Unwrap the layers of Berlin’s past as you explore a combination of must-see historical landmarks and lesser-known gems such as Museum Island, the Holocaust Memorial, the site of Hitler’s former bunker, Brandenburger Tor, and much more.
events.name: Private Walking Tour with a Local: Berlin in 90 Minutes

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/131687P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Munich-Prague One-Way Sightseeing Tour Bus

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/88037P42/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Munich Christmas Market Private Walking Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/101278P8/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Berlin & Highlights & Minivan & Driver & Guide & 5 Pers.

events.description: Explore Berlin from a culinary perspective on this private food tour with 10 tastings. Following a private guide, visit restaurants and other food venues in the city to experience a variety of dishes, from German to Turkish.
events.name: Private Berlin Food Tour Including 10 Food Tastings

events.description: Visit the cities of Mainz and Wiesbaden on this guided, full-day sightseeing adventure from Frankfurt. First, explore luxurious Wiesbaden, the capital of the German state of Hessen. See the collection of hot springs, elegant villas and historical houses in this sophisticated spa town and take a train ride to the top of Neroberg Mountain. Then visit Mainz, exploring the city on a walking tour past its churches, half-timbered houses, cobblestone alleyways and most popular attractions. Round-trip transportation from Frankfurt and a Neroberg Mountain train ticket are included.
events.name: Wiesbaden and Mainz Day Trip from Frankfurt

events.description: With its scenic waterfront, grand bridges, and UNESCO-listed Cathedral, Cologne offers an atmospheric backdrop for a cycling tour. This bike tour ensures that you maximize your time, exploring much further than a walking tour. The circuit takes in landmarks such as Cologne Cathedral, Hohenzollern Bridge, and the Rhine River, including plenty of photo stops along the way.
events.name: Small-Group Bike Tour of Cologne with Guide

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/112780P9/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Scenic Private Transfer from Passau to Prague

events.description: Explore the hinterlands outside of Hamburg on this chauffeured SUV tour of the countryside and lesser-known towns. With enough room for four people (plus snacks and drinks along the way), the tour takes you to the 1,000-year-old town of Buxtehude, the oddly shaped city of Lüneburg and Lübeck, a gorgeous UNESCO-world-heritage listed town. Learn about the history and culture of each place you visit and get many insider's tips from the guide.
events.name: Private 5-Hour Hamburg Countryside Tour in a Large SUV

events.description: Hop on a Segway to see the sights of Düsseldorf, and put a fun twist on your sightseeing experience. Starting from Düsseldorf's handsome Old Town, the tour crosses the Rhine River and takes in the city's bridges, harbor district, and the designer boutiques of the Königsallee shopping enclave.
