events.description: Discover one of the world’s most breath-taking natural wonders from the sea and the sky on this 6-hour tour from Cairns. Marvel at the UNESCO-listed Great Barrier Reef as you cruise out to the Moore Reef pontoon; enjoy swimming and snorkeling amid schools of tropical fish and spot marine life from a glass-bottom or semi-submersible boat. After tucking into a hearty buffet lunch (included), return to the mainland on a thrilling helicopter flight and admire spectacular aerial views along the coast.
events.name: Cruise to Moore Reef Pontoon and Return Helicopter Flight from Cairns

events.description: See the dramatic landscapes of the Blue Mountains from different perspectives on this action-packed full-day tour. Ride the world’s steepest railway at Scenic World; observe kangaroos and koalas at the Featherdale Wildlife Park; and snap photos of the Three Sisters from the Echo Point lookout. The fun doesn’t stop there! Stock up on sugary treats at Leura’s famous candy store and finish your day with a scenic cruise along the Parramatta River to Sydney Harbour.
events.name: Blue Mountains Day Tour Including Three Sisters, Scenic World and Wildlife Park

events.description: Enjoy a four-hour whale-watching cruise that begins with a barbecue lunch or breakfast onboard the boat while in the calm waters of Sydney Harbour.  After lunch or breakfast, your boat glides past Sydney Head into the Pacific Ocean in search of the humpback and southern right whales that migrate along this coast from May to November. Keep an eye out for whales and dolphins as you learn about them from your naturalist guide, who provides fascinating commentary about Australian marine life during your tour.
events.name: Sydney Whale-Watching Cruise Including Lunch or Breakfast

events.description: Get an exclusive experience of the UNESCO World Heritage–listed Sydney Opera House on a backstage tour of this world-famous center for the performing arts. Your expert guide shares stories about the real-life dramas behind the curtain and in the venue's storied history since it opened in 1973. Go behind the scenes to see parts of the opera house normally reserved for staff and performers, including the stage and dressing rooms. Wrap up this fascinating morning tour by sitting down with your small-group companions for a full Australian breakfast in the Green Room. Numbers are limited to 12 participants for a more intimate tour.
events.name: Sydney Opera House Official Small Group Guided Backstage Tour

events.description: Explore Sydney aboard a hop-on hop-off Sydney Harbour cruise that stops at top destinations including Darling Harbour, Circular Quay, Watsons Bay, Manly and Luna Park. Get a great vantage point for photo ops of icons such as the Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge. Simply jump on and off at as many stops as you like; when you're ready to move on to your next destination, just catch the next boat. Upgrade to include an entrance ticket to Taronga Zoo, another fantastic attraction located on the harbor shores.
events.name: Sydney Harbour Hop-on Hop-off Cruise

events.description: See Australia's most famous native animals in their natural habitat on a full-day tour from Sydney. In a comfortable 4WD, explore the Southern Highlands with a naturalist guide to look for koalas, kangaroos, platypus, emus, wombats and other critters in the wild. Your small-group tour includes refreshments and dinner in a classic pub, and you’ll stay out after dark in order to view nocturnal animals in action. With numbers limited to 10 people, enjoy a more customized experience.
events.name: Australian Wildlife 4WD Tour from Sydney

events.description: Escape Sydney’s urban bustle for a day to explore the World Heritage-listed wilderness of the Blue Mountains. Soak up panoramic views of eucalyptus forests, and learn the Aboriginal legends behind ancient rock formations. Explore the charming mountain town of Leura, and catch sight of koalas and kangaroos at a wildlife park. Plus, you can upgrade to include a ride on a cableway or railway at Scenic World.
events.name: Blue Mountains Nature and Wildlife Day Tour from Sydney

events.description: Treat yourself to a delightful day on the Mornington Peninsula on this full-day tour from Melbourne. Unwind with a relaxing, mineral-rich soak in the waters of Peninsula Hot Springs, and sample regional flavor with a delicious local lunch and wine tasting. Stop at a local strawberry farm or winery, depending on the season, and ride the Arthur's Seat Eagle gondola for panoramic views of Port Phillip Bay.
events.name: Mornington Peninsula Hot Springs and Wine Tasting Day Trip from Melbourne

events.description: Spend two days and one night on the Great Barrier Reef, one of the world’s largest coral reef systems. The Reefworld pontoon is your base for snorkeling, semi-submersible rides, and other underwater explorations by day. Stay overnight on the upper deck of the pontoon, 40 nautical miles (74 km) from shore and sleep under the stars in a swag (tent). Includes most meals and round-trip transport from the Port of Airlie or Hamilton Island.
events.name: 2-Day Great Barrier Reef Reefsleep Experience

events.description: Discover the delights of Swan Valley on a half- or full-day tour from Perth. You’ll explore the culinary highlights of this Western Australian wine region, from cheese and chocolate to craft beer and, of course, wine. Learn about wine making in the area, and visit enjoy lunch at Homestead Brewery at Mandoon Estate if you select the full-day tour. Between stops, stay cool on an air-conditioned coach.
events.name: Swan Valley Tour from Perth: Wine, Beer and Chocolate Tastings

events.description: Explore the World Heritage-listed rain forest of the Gold Coast hinterland on this full-day tour to Lamington National Park. Rumble along remote tracks in a 4WD vehicle, soak up spectacular views from the summit of Tamborine Mountain and explore the subtropical rain forest on a guided nature walk. At O’Reilly’s Rainforest Retreat, get a closer look at native plants, birds and even koalas on an elevated treetop walk. A traditional Aussie barbecue lunch and hotel pickup and drop-off from Gold Coast complete this fantastic eco-adventure.
events.name: Gold Coast Lamington National Park and Tamborine Mountain 4WD Ecotour

events.description: Sample lots of great wine, cheese and other gourmet treats on a full-day tour to the Hunter Valley. Known for its great growing climate and fine wines, the Hunter Valley also boasts fantastic food producers who make the most of the fresh local ingredients. Your guide takes your small group to boutique wineries and cheese producers to sample the goods. Learn more about the winemakers and foodies who have given the Hunter Valley a reputation for excellence. Its worth the trip from Sydney!
events.name: Small-Group Hunter Valley Wine and Cheese Tasting Tour from Sydney

events.description: Sail through the Whitsunday Islands on a classic yacht from Airlie Beach. Sit back and relax or lend a hand with the sailing of the Lady Enid on the way to stops such as Whitehaven Beach Betty's Beach, and Hill Inlet. Snorkel around the Island Reefs and enjoy morning tea, lunch, and afternoon tea between activities. During the sunset sail back to port, sip sparkling wine and munch on appetizers.
events.name: Lady Enid Sailing and Snorkeling Day Trip, Including Whitehaven Beach

events.description: Get a taste of the tropics while in port in Cairns with this half-day shore excursion to Kuranda rainforest. Ride the thrilling Skyrail Rainforest Cableway high up into the Kuranda Ranges; visit the beautiful Barron Falls and explore Kuranda Village. After lunch at Frog's Restaurant (included), enjoy spectacular views of the Kuranda rainforest as you jump aboard the Kuranda Scenic Railway. This small-group tour is limited to 10 people, ensuring a personalized experience.
events.name: Cairns Shore Excursion: Small-Group Skyrail Rainforest Cableway and Kuranda Railway Day Trip Including Lunch

events.description: Learn to scuba dive in one of the world's top locations for underwater wonders: Cairns, Australia and the Great Barrier Reef. Your professional and friendly instructors lead a 4-day PADI Open Water dive course for your small group limited to eight people. You'll gradually learn the skills you need to scuba dive and earn the internationally recognized PADI certification. Practice basic scuba skills in the classroom, a swimming pool, and on confined water dives, then discover the Great Barrier Reef on open-water dives. Hotel transfers are included each day.
events.name: Learn to Scuba Dive on the Great Barrier Reef: 4-Day PADI Open Water Dive Course

events.description: Maximize your time while in port in Hobart and visit five top attractions in one day on this full-day shore excursion. Take in the views from Mt Wellington, browse the stalls at Salamanca Market (Saturday only), and learn about Hobart’s convict history in Richmond. After lunch (own expense), spot kangaroos, koalas, and Tasmanian devils at the Bonorong wildlife Sanctuary, and visit the MONA art museum.
events.name: Shore Excursion: Five of Hobart's Best In One Day

events.description: Explore Kakadu National Park and learn about Australia’s Aboriginal heritage on a full-day tour from Darwin. You'll see the highlights of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed park, including ancient rock art of Ubirr Rock and views from the Nadab lookout. Then take a Guluyambi cultural cruise along the East Alligator River, traveling with an indigenous guide who stops along the way to show you the dramatic landscapes of Arnhem Land. Includes lunch, snacks, guide, transportation, and hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: Kakadu Full-Day Tour from Darwin Including Ubirr, Guluyambi, and Arnhem Land

events.description: Save time and money with this convenient pass for admission to three of Australian Gold Coast's most popular theme parks: Sea World, Warner Bros. Movie World, and Wet'n'Wild. Zoom around on roller coasters at Movie World; admire dolphins, seals, and sharks at Sea World; and ride the water rapids at Wet'n'Wild. This 3-day pass provides entry to each park three consecutive days. Upgrade to the 7-day or 14-day pass for unlimited entry to all three parks. The 14-day pass also includes entry to Paradise Country, an Aussie Farm Experience.
events.name: Gold Coast Theme Park Pass: Warner Bros. Movie World, Sea World and Wet'n'Wild

events.description: Visit Port Arthur Historic Site, part of the UNESCO World Heritage–listed Australian Convict Sites, on this day trip from Hobart. If you’re a history buff, this is the tour for you, as it’s been designed to provide as much time as possible to explore Port Arthur in one day. On a guided walking tour of the grounds, learn about the site’s history as a convict colony, visit ruins and restored buildings, and admire the coastal scenery that highlights the natural beauty of the Tasman Peninsula. A 30-minute cruise is included.
events.name: Port Arthur Tour from Hobart

events.description: Discover the Whitsunday Islands on a sailing day trip from Port. You can swim in the turquoise water, soak up the salty sea air as you zoom across the water by high-speed catamaran and be wowed by the islands’ most famous natural sight, Whitehaven Beach. Lunch, snacks and refreshments are included throughout the day.
events.name: Whitsunday Islands Sailing Adventure

events.description: Enjoy a helicopter sightseeing flight over the amazing Great Barrier Reef. After convenient pickup from your Cairns, Palm Cove, or Northern Beaches hotel, enjoy a quick safety tutorial and liftoff from the Cairns Airport. Marvel at the reef’s endless shades of blue and learn about its ecosystem from an informative pilot-guide.
events.name: Wonder of the World - Great Barrier Reef Scenic Flights

events.description: Travel from Perth to Fremantle or vice versa on a relaxing Swan River cruise. You’ll glide along the river, admiring the waterfront scenery of Perth’s downtown skyline, upscale suburbs and yacht clubs. Drinks may be purchased from the onboard bar. Plus, choose from multiple departure times to best suit your schedule.
events.name: One-way Sightseeing Cruise between Perth and Fremantle

events.description: Indulge in some of the best wines and foods produced in the Swan Valley on a day trip from Perth. Head into this lush wine region just north of the city, and hop from winery to winery to taste some acclaimed varietals. Visit local wineries for tastings, break for a gourmet winery lunch, and enjoy chocolate, liqueur, cheese, and beer tastings on top. Air-conditioned transport and specified tastings included.
events.name: Ultimate Swan Valley Food and Wine Day Trip from Perth

events.description: See the best of Sydney in this comprehensive 4-hour tour. Visit major sights like the Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and Bondi Beach, as well as some hidden gems off the tourist track. Enjoy a morning or afternoon tea with incredible Harbour views. This private tour can be customized to suit travelers’ interests.
events.name: Sydney Half Day Luxury Private Tour - Morning or Afternoon Avail

events.description: Visit the Barossa Valley, one of South Australia’s most popular wine regions, on this day trip from Adelaide. With a guide, you’ll enjoy wine tastings at Seppeltsfield Winery and Wolf Blass. Learn about the region’s winemaking history, admire the picturesque scenery of the Adelaide Hills and River Torrens, and enjoy a 2-course lunch. To end your tour, stop in the historic German settlement of Hahndorf.
events.name: Barossa Valley with Hahndorf Tour from Adelaide

events.description: Seize your day with a highly personalized, private tour from the Hobart area. Rent a 4X4 that seats four people to access off-the-road locations that highlight Tasmania's famous wilderness, or opt for a number of SUV options that seat up to 14 people for a larger party. Your driver and guide will work with you to plan your ideal itinerary based on your time constraints and interests in the Hobart area, from the historical attractions at Port Arthur to the natural wonders of the Huon Valley.
events.name: Private Customized Day Trips from Hobart

events.description: Enjoy a spectacular northern Australian sunset over Darwin Harbour during a 2.5-hour sunset cruise with an optional dinner. Learn about Darwin's history and landmarks from your captain, and get the chance to see batfish and other marine critters. Be sure to bring your camera to capture fantastic photo ops. Your relaxing cruise includes a complimentary drink and gourmet snacks, and the option to upgrade to a 3-course buffet dinner.
events.name: Darwin Sunset Cruise with Optional Buffet Dinner

events.description: Explore the world’s oldest koala sanctuary after a cruise down the Brisbane River. Enjoy picturesque views of Brisbane’s skyline and waterfront during a ride aboard the speedy Koala Express. Then spend time with 100-plus koalas at Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary. Check out sheep dog and raptor shows, and feed wallabies, kangaroos, and other native species.
events.name: Brisbane River Koala Express Cruise To Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary

events.description: Enjoy a 2-hour whale-watching cruise on a comfortable vessel with a naturalist guide. Depart from Augusta or Perth and set out on the waters of Geographe Bay in search of humpback whales and southern right whales, in addition to seals, dolphins, and seabirds. As you go, your guide will provide commentary about the whales and their migration along the coast of western Australia. Your spacious boat is equipped with an underwater camera and hydrophone. Upgrade to the VIP Captain's Lounge for exclusive seating, and complimentary snacks and drinks during your tour.
events.name: Whale-Watching Tour from Augusta or Perth with Optional Captain's Lounge Upgrade

events.description: Spend an evening on the Swan River during this Perth dinner cruise that highlights the beauty of the city from the water. As you glide past the downtown riverfront and surrounding suburbs, admire twinkling lights reflecting on the water, listen to live music and dine on a buffet of roast beef, prawns, lasagna and more. Australian wine, beer, soft drinks, coffee and tea are provided, and you can purchase spirits from the bar.
events.name: Perth Swan River Dinner Cruise

events.description: Explore the wild landscapes and UNESCO-listed rainforests of Far North Queensland on this full-day tour of Kuranda from Cairns. Browse the handicrafts markets of Kuranda village, cruise along the Barron River (extra cost) or enjoy a short hike in the Barron Gorge National Park. For the full experience, upgrade to include a scenic transfer by train and a thrilling ride on the Skyrail cable car. Many options are available with this tour.
events.name: Kuranda Village Day Trip from Cairns With Optional Scenic Railway and Skyrail

events.description: Explore Litchfield and Kakadu national parks with an expert guide on a 3-day 4WD camping tour from Darwin. Visit Florence and Wangi waterfalls, take a wildlife cruise in the Yellow Water Billabong, discover Twin Falls Gorge and Jim Jim Falls, and admire Kakadu’s indigenous rock art at Ubirr. Swim in some of Australia’s most beautiful waterfall plunge pools and camp under the stars in a comfortable swag (bedroll tent) for an authentic experience of the Australian Outback in a small group with numbers limited to 16 participants.
events.name: 3-Day 4WD Small-Group Litchfield and Kakadu Camping Adventure

events.description: Discover some of Victoria’s most spectacular landscapes on this three-day tour of the Great Ocean Road and Grampians National Park. See world-famous surfing beaches, charming seaside towns and the dramatic limestone cliffs of the Twelve Apostles and Australia’s ‘Shipwreck Coast.’ Hike and bushwalk through the majestic Grampians for panoramic lookouts, wildlife sightings and an exploration of indigenous culture. Overnight accommodation, many meals, all park fees and guided transport from Melbourne are included.
events.name: 3-Day Great Ocean Road and Grampians Tour from Melbourne

events.description: Unlike most other Blue Mountains day trips, this experience includes breakfast with the kangaroos at Featherdale Wildlife Park, making it an ideal choice for nature lovers. Rather than worrying about the timings of public transport, you’ll travel from Sydney in climate-controlled comfort and explore the Blue Mountains National Park, home to the iconic Three Sisters and Scenic World, with a guide. Plus, included lunch and round-trip hotel transfers make for a seamless experience.
events.name: Blue Mountains #1 Day Tour includes popular breakfast with the wild Kangaroos

events.description: During your Shanghai sojourn, immerse yourself in the cultural extravagance of an 'ERA Intersection of Time' show at Shanghai Circus World. See a captivating combination of Chinese history, mesmerizing martial arts and incredible special effects throughout the unique spectacle. Watch China evolve from humble beginnings to the global superpower it is today, and enjoy entertaining live music and elaborate costumes as you experience the family-friendly show.
events.name: Shanghai Circus World: ERA Intersection of Time Acrobatics Show

events.description: See three of the top attractions in and around Beijing with a guide on this 8-hour private tour to Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, and the Great Wall of China at Mutianyu. Private transportation with hotel pickup and drop-off is included, as well as entrance fees, lunch, and a ticket for the round-trip cable car or toboggan ride at the Great Wall.
events.name: Private All-Inclusive Day Tour: Tiananmen Square, Forbidden City, Mutianyu Great Wall

events.description: Visit the Great Wall of China at Mutianyu and the Summer Palace (Yiheyuan), both UNESCO World Heritage sites, on a full-day private tour from Beijing. The Great Wall of China is one of the most popular attractions in China, yet the Mutianyu section attracts fewer visitors, which means you get a less crowded experience of this world-famous landmark. Then learn about the history of the majestic Summer Palace as you stroll through its lavish gardens, sprinkled with temples and other eye-catching features. Includes guide, lunch, entrance fees, Great Wall cable car ticket, private vehicle, and hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: All Inclusive Mutianyu Great Wall and Summer Palace Private Day Tour

events.description: Visit the Great Wall on this tour from Beijing with a private driver. Get picked up at your hotel and travel to the Mutianyu Great Wall, a less crowded section. Explore independently and hike along the wall to see its many panoramic views at your own pace. Optional extras include a cable car ride and toboggan ride. Customize the start time of this private tour to suit your schedule.
events.name: Private Mutianyu Great Wall Trip With Speaking-English Driver

events.description: Enjoy an in-depth sightseeing experience over two days with this comprehensive Beijing city tour. With a knowledgeable guide, you’ll visit major attractions like Tian'anmen Square, the Forbidden City, the Summer Palace, the Temple of Heaven and the Great Wall of China at Mutianyu. Transportation between attractions and lunch on both days are included. (Note: Hotel stay is not included; you must have your own accommodation in Beijing.)
events.name: Mini Group: 2-Day Beijing Highlights and Great Wall Tour

events.description: Save time without compromising on experience on this door-to-door private guided tour that covers Zhujiajiao Ancient Town and key Shanghai highlights. First, explore the ancient water town of Zhujiajiao by boat and foot, and savor a local lunch. Then, spend the afternoon discovering Shanghai: the 16th-century Yu Garden, the Bund, and the Shanghai Tower. Upgrade to include a Shanghai dinner.
events.name: Zhujiajiao Water Town and Shanghai City Private Day Tour

events.description: Pay a visit to the Giant Buddha, visit Po Lin (Precious Lotus) Monastery and explore the island of Lantau on this incredible tour, complete with a professional and friendly guide. You’ll get a taste of the beautiful beaches, fishing villages and stunning mountain ranges that make this destination so unique, while getting a behind-the-scenes look at the spirituality and Buddhist practices that drive the culture here. The tour includes lunch, a one-way ferry ride and round-trip hotel transport.
events.name: Lantau Island and Giant Buddha Day Trip from Hong Kong

events.description: Spend the day exploring beyond Shanghai’s city limits—and discover two of the region’s most beautiful destinations—on this full-day tour of Suzhou and the Zhouzhuang Water Town. Following pickup from one of several central locations, travel via comfortable, air-conditioned coach to Suzhou, where you’ll visit the UNESCO-listed Master of Nets Garden, will see the Grand Canal, and more. Then, transfer to the Zhouzhuang Water Town, where you’ll explore the centuries-old buildings and waterways by boat.
events.name: Suzhou & Zhouzhuang Water Village Full Day Coach Tour from Shanghai

events.description: After arriving in Hong Kong, relax and unwind with hot showers, delicious food and wireless Internet access before taking off on your departing flight with this Hong Kong International Airport Plaza Premium Lounge access. Customize your choice based on your layover to be sure there’s plenty of time to decompress and refresh before departure.
events.name: Hong Kong International Airport Plaza Premium Lounge

events.description: Enhance your experience of one of China’s greatest architectural feats on a small-group tour to the Great Wall of China from Beijing. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, explore the ancient Mutianyu section of the wall and ascend Ming Dynasty watchtowers for panoramic vistas of the spectacular surrounding scenery. Descend by cable car or on an exhilarating toboggan ride; revitalize with a delicious Chinese meal; and enjoy convenient round-trip transportation to Beijing. Experience an intimate atmosphere and personalized attention from your guide on this small-group tour, on which numbers are limited to 12.
events.name: Great Wall of China Small-Group Day Trip from Beijing

events.description: Discover old and modern Shanghai as you wish on a full-day private tour. With a personal guide, explore attractions like The Bund, Ming-Dynasty Yu Garden, and Jade Buddha Temple, and visit the observation deck of one of Shanghai’s highest skyscrapers. Customize your itinerary to suit your and opt to explore by private vehicle with lunch and select entrance fees included, or by private vehicle or public transit with lunch and entrance fees at own expense.
events.name: Private Full-Day Tour: Shanghai Old and New Highlights

events.description: Make the most of city sightseeing on this private tour of Beijing, which includes a visit to must-see attractions like Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, Temple of Heaven and more. Your guide provides in-depth information about each site's history and significance and handles all transportation, planning, and logistics so you can just enjoy your trip. A delicious Peking duck lunch and boat ride in the Summer Palace are all inclusive.
events.name: Private Tour: Temple of Heaven, Tiananmen Square, Summer Palace and Forbidden City

events.description: Spend a morning with some of China’s most majestic mammals during a tour of the Dujiangyan Giant Panda Center or the Chengdu Panda Breeding Center from Chengdu. Accompanied by a professional panda keeper, stroll through the research and breeding facilities while observing the pandas and learning about their breeding and life stages. If the conditions are right and the animal is receptive, visitors may have the opportunity to hold a baby panda for a brief photo opportunity under close supervision.
events.name: Private Half-Day Chengdu Panda Breeding Center Tour with Optional Panda Feeding

events.description: Escape the hustle and bustle of Shanghai with a getaway to Zhujiajiao Water Town. Explore traditional architecture and take a relaxing boat ride through the waterways. This private half-day tour takes care of all transfers and entrance fees, and you can upgrade to include lunch or dinner.
events.name: Half Day Private Tour to Zhujiajiao Water Town with Boat Ride from Shanghai

events.description: Enhance your sightseeing experience of Shanghai on an enriching full-day excursion around the city. See all of the city’s spectacular sights with a knowledgeable guide as you tour a selection of historical highlights; absorb the sacred majesty of the Jade Buddha Temple; immerse yourself in the city’s rich heritage at the Shanghai Museum; and stroll amid the botanical beauty of the Yuyuan Garden. Learn about the process of pearl cultivation in the Fresh Water Pearl Gallery and enjoy a traditional Chinese lunch on your enriching tour.
events.name: Best of Shanghai Day Tour, Including Jade Buddha Temple and The Bund

events.description: With a maximum of six travelers for intimacy and speed, small-group travel doesn’t get much smaller than this door-to-door tour. Say goodbye to long lines with VIP access to the Forbidden City and the Great Wall at Mutianyu; explore the Temple of Heaven and Summer Palace; checkoff Tiananmen Square, Jingshan Park, and the Beijing National Stadium; and enjoy two delicious lunches. Upgrade to add an evening Acrobat Show.
events.name: 2 Days Mini Group Tour: Mutianyu Great Wall & Imperial heritages in Beijing

events.description: Enjoy personalized attention and a flexible itinerary on this private half-day hiking tour on the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall. Cable car, chair lift, and toboggan ride included, as well as round-trip private transportation from your hotel in Beijing. Choose between morning and afternoon departure to fit your schedule.
events.name: Private Half-Day Mutianyu Great Wall Tour including Round Way Cable Car or Toboggan

events.description: Appreciate China’s provincial delights during a full-day tour of two charming traditional towns from Shanghai. Escape the metropolitan mayhem of the city and see how daily life has remained unchanged in these quaint and ancient enclaves. With an accomplished guide, stroll amid the botanical beauty of Suzhou’s gorgeous gardens; cruise along the waterways of Zhozhuang on a Chinese-style gondola; and appease your appetite with a delicious Chinese lunch in a rustic restaurant. Enjoy convenient round-trip transportation from your Shanghai hotel.
events.name: Suzhou and Zhouzhuang Water Village Day Trip from Shanghai

events.description: You can choose the attractions you visit and the places you see on this private 10-hour tour of Hangzhou. Work with your guide to customize your itinerary, and see famous spots, such as Meijiawu Tea Village, Leifeng Pagoda, Yuewang Temple, Liuhe Pagoda, and Longjing Village. Go on a boat ride on West Lake, see Chinese monks at Lingyin Temple, or even taste snakes on Hefang Street. This tour includes round-trip bullet-train tickets.
events.name: Flexible Hangzhou Private Tour from Shanghai by Bullet Train

events.description: This unique hop-on hop-off tour allows you to see all of Hong Kong’s highlights with ease. Hop off at any of the 20 stops along the route and explore the sites at your leisure using a provided map. Whether it’s the Man Mo Temple, famed Stanley Market or the fishing village of Aberdeen, your 24- or 48-hour ticket will grant you access to three different travel routes and one way travel on the Star Ferry. There’s no easier or more flexible way to explore. Your Premium or Deluxe ticket includes a choice of admission to Sky100 Hong Kong observation deck or a ride on the Peak Tram. The Deluxe option also offers a traditional sampan ride and a tour of Kowloon at night.
events.name: Big Bus Hong Kong Open Top Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Tour

events.description: This tour allows you to tick off visits to all the important Lantau Island, like the Tian Tan Buddha and Tai O fishing village, in one days. Pickup and drop-off at Kowloon hotels, all admission, transportation between each location, and vegetarian lunch at the monastery are included.
events.name: Coach Day Tour - Lantau Island Visiting and Giant Buddha Cable Car Tour Plus Tai O Boat Ride

events.description: Eat your way around Beijing’s old ‘hutong’ alleyways and courtyards on a small-group tour. Explore by private tuk tuk and enjoy up to five food stops at tucked-away restaurants and homes you wouldn’t find by yourself. Taste staples like Beijing wraps, flame-grilled meats, and noodles, learn about local cuisine over unlimited beers and sodas, and enjoy a last beer stop at an Arrow Brewing Factory bar. Come hungry: your tastings amount to dinner.
events.name: Beijing Hutong Food and Beer Tour by Tuk Tuk

events.description: See three of Beijing’s most famous landmarks on a full-day tour that starts in the city and travels to the Great Wall of China. Start with a guided tour of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Forbidden City, and walk by the monuments of Tiananmen Square, including Chairman Mao’s Mausoleum. Then depart for the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China, riding in a cable car up to the ramparts then walking around for great vantage points. Learn about the sights from your informative guide throughout a memorable tour.
events.name: Mini Group: Beijing Forbidden City Tour with Great Wall Hiking at Mutianyu

events.description: Discover two of China’s most incredible attractions during a full-day tour of the Great Wall of China and the Ming Tombs from Beijing. Accompanied by a guide, visit one of the best-preserved parts of the Great Wall and marvel at the spectacular scenery that surrounds the Badaling section. Then, explore the Chang Ling Tomb, a magnificent Ming emperor burial site. Appease your appetite with an authentic Chinese lunch and enjoy the convenience of round-trip transportation from your Beijing hotel.
events.name: Great Wall of China at Badaling and Ming Tombs Day Tour from Beijing

events.description: Escape the crowds around the Great Wall of China and visit the ancient Mutianyu section on a full-day sightseeing tour from Beijing. Accompanied by a guide, learn the history behind the 6th-century section and marvel at the spectacular natural scenery that surrounds it. See impressive parapets and defensive watch towers and enjoy an optional cable car ride if you wish (own expense). An authentic Chinese lunch and convenient, round-trip transportation from your Beijing hotel are also included.
events.name: Great Wall of China at Mutianyu Full-Day Tour Including Lunch from Beijing

events.description: If you're short on time but want to make sure to visit the Terra Cotta Warriors, this private half-day tour may be just the ticket. An English-speaking guide and driver will escort you from your hotel to the warriors and leave you with plenty of time to explore the attraction at your own pace. You'll then have the option to stop for lunch or dinner or head straight back to your hotel.
events.name: All Inclusive Private Half-day tour to the Terracotta Warriors

events.description: Explore Zhujiajiao with a private guide on this tour from Shanghai. With your dedicated guide, take a boat ride down the town's small canals and visit the KeZhi Garden. This private tour ensures personalized attention and a flexible schedule.
events.name: Half-Day Private Zhujiajiao Water Town Tour with Boat Ride from Shanghai

events.description: See the city of Shanghai light up at night on this private evening tour, which takes you to top attractions such as the French Concession and the Zig-Zag Bridge. Take in panoramic views of the city from the VIP deck of a cruise along the Hungpu River, and then choose to be dropped off back at your hotel or to continue your evening out on the town.
events.name: Private Evening Tour: VIP Huangpu River Cruise and Shanghai Lights

events.description: The UNESCO-listed Forbidden City is Beijing’s most visited attraction with over 14 million annual visitors, and it has the traffic to match. This half-day walking tour ensures you maximise your time, with a private guide, pre-paid entrance tickets, and an itinerary tailored to your preferences. Hotel pickup is included.
events.name: 4-Hour Private Beijing Walking Tour of the Forbidden City

events.description: See the Tian Tan Buddha statue (Big Buddha) on a visit to Po Lin Monastery on Lantau Island—a popular destination almost twice the size of Hong Kong Island. This sightseeing tour includes a ticket for the Ngong Ping 360 Cable Car and a boat ride around Tai O, a quaint fishing village where the houses stand on stilts. You have the option to upgrade to a glass-bottom crystal cabin at booking.
events.name: Afternoon tour - Lantau Enlightenment Tour

events.description: Enjoy a 70-minute Shaolin kung fu performance at Beijing Red Theater that displays the eye-popping athleticism and artistry of this famous Chinese martial art. See skilled performers whip out lightning fast kung fu kicks, leaps and daredevil tricks as they tell the story of a boy practitioner at Shaolin Temple, known as the birthplace of kung fu. You also see contortion- and drunken boxing-style kung fu during the show. Includes entrance ticket and the option to upgrade for hotel pickup and drop-off in central Beijing.
events.name: Shaolin Kung Fu Show in Beijing Red Theater

events.description: Rather than juggling public transport, relax in air-conditioned comfort on this convenient coach tour of Lantau Island. Get skip-the-line access to the Ngong Ping 360 cable car and admire the Tian Tan Buddha. After a tour of Po Lin Monastery and a Chinese vegetarian lunch, take a boat trip around Tai O fishing village. Tour includes round-trip transfers from select Hong Kong hotels.
events.name: Lantau Island and Giant Buddha Cable Car Group Tour with Hotel Pickup in Hong Kong Island

events.description: Experience all that Xi’an has to offer on a full-day trip to Xi’an from Beijing by air. Take a private tour of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed terracotta warriors, followed by sightseeing in the Old City of Xi’an. See Qin Shihuang’s mausoleum, Big Wild Goose Pagoda, the ancient city wall and the Muslim Quarter, stopping for lunch at one of the city's top restaurants. Includes round-trip air travel from Beijing, transport by private vehicle in Xi-an, a knowledgeable guide, entrance fees, and hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: Xi'an in One Day: Day Trip from Beijing by Air with Private Terracotta Warriors

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/9910P19/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Hong Kong Car Tour - Half Day or Full Day

events.description: Get the most out of your Shanghai trip by experiencing the combination of a Huangpu River cruise, and a Xinjiang food experience. Take the stress out of navigating the metro, and instead travel in a comfortable, air-conditioned vehicle. You’ll see multiple famous Shanghai landmarks from your river cruise such as Oriental Pearl TV Tower, and World Financial Center, and have a guide to translate the menu during your Xinjiang feast.
events.name: Shanghai Night River Cruise Tour with Xinjiang Style Dining Experience

events.description: Explore the Great Wall of China on your own with transportation provided from Beijing. Enjoy ample time to walk around the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China, one of the wonders of the world. At this location, you can take a cable car up and down from the ramparts, or even enjoy a fun downhill ride on a toboggan (own expense). Discover the different guard towers and decorative elements of the Great Wall and get fantastic photo ops as well.
events.name: Private Mutianyu Great Wall Trip with English-Speaking Driver

events.description: Soak in the scenery and history of the Great Wall of China at Jinshanling during a day hike with a professional guide. Get away from the crowds as you walk along this 3.7-mile (6-km) section of the Great Wall, passing 15 guard towers while crossing from Jinshanling to Simatai West. Observe the natural beauty of the landscape and the architectural marvels of the Ming Dynasty-era wall during your hike, which takes approximately four hours to complete. Includes round-trip transportation from Beijing, guide, and entrance fees.
events.name: Group Great Wall Hiking Tour from Jinshanling to Simatai West

events.description: Go off the beaten path in Beijing to visit a ‘hutong' (traditional-style neighborhood) with an experienced private guide for an authentic experience of local Chinese cuisine and the rich culture of old Beijing. Visit the produce market and sample more than 20 different dishes at a range of small eateries including locally owned shops, bakeries and restaurants. Meet the owners and learn about Chinese culinary customs from your guide. Your 4-hour tour includes all food tastings, a great treat for foodies!
events.name: Beijing Private Hutong Food Walking Tour

events.description: Travel round-trip by air to Beijing from Shanghai for a full-day tour of two UNESCO World Heritage-listed sites, the Great Wall of China and the Forbidden City, along with Tiananmen Square. Upon arrival in Beijing, your guide takes you to the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China to see a masterpiece of ancient architecture. After lunch, walk through Tiananmen Square, which contains important monuments such as Chairman Mao's Mausoleum, then explore the immense Forbidden City complex and hear about the world of the Chinese emperors.
events.name: Day Trip to Beijing from Shanghai by Air including Private Great Wall and Forbidden City Tour

events.description: If you have a layover in Beijing, use your time to see the city's highlights on this private, 9-hour tour. Hit Tian'anmen Square, the Forbidden City, and the Great Wall in a full day, maximizing your time by traveling in a private vehicle. Pickup and drop-off according to your flight schedule at Beijing International Airport, lunch included.
events.name: Private Beijing Layover Tour: Mutianyu Great Wall and Forbidden City with Cable Car and Meal

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/153481P2/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 3 Days Beijing Group Tour from Tianjin Cruise Port without Shop Stops

events.description: Take a break from busy Beijing for a full-day hike along the Great Wall of China, one of the world’s most famous monuments. Hike the section of the Great Wall from Simatai West to Jinshanling, a beautiful and less-crowded section of this UNESCO World Heritage Site. See parts of the Great Wall that have been carefully restored as well as sections that have not been retouched. After the hike, have lunch at a restaurant operated by local farmers before returning to Beijing.
events.name: Full-Day Small-Group Great Wall Hike: Simatai West to Jinshanling

events.description: Get to know the ins and outs of Hong Kong island during this comprehensive half-day tour that touches on all the highlights. Learn about the history and culture as you visit major landmarks with your expert local guide. Make stops at Victoria Peak, Stanley Market and the traditional fishing village of Aberdeen. Round-trip transportation from select hotels is included in this bus and minivan tour of Hong Kong.
events.name: Hong Kong Island Half-Day Tour including Peak Tram

events.description: Being such a densely populated city, it can be difficult to beat the crowds in Beijing. This Forbidden City admission ticket is the perfect way to ensure you have a stress-free visit with no waiting around. Your pre-booked entry can be accessed by using your passport near the main entrance, close to Tiananmen Gate. You’ll then have the freedom to walk around the palace complex and admire pagodas and beautiful architecture.
events.name: Beijing Forbidden City Admission Ticket

events.description: Escape the bustle of modern Shanghai and enjoy a relaxing day in small-town China during this all-inclusive day trip to Suzhou, a picturesque riverside city famed for its centuries-old heritage. The Trip include a round-trip bullet train ticket. Upgrade your tour with all-inclusive package which offers a complimentary traditional Chinese lunch, a scenic boat ride along the Grand Canal, and a private rickshaw ride through history-packed Pingjiang Road.
events.name: Private Suzhou Day Trip from Shanghai by Bullet Train with All Inclusive Option

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/5079P43/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Hong Kong International Airport Plaza Premium First

events.description: See the best of Hong Kong in one day with this tour that includes hotel pickup in Kowloon. Ride the Peak Tramway to Victoria Peak, visit Aberdeen Fishing Village, shop for souvenirs at Stanley Market, take a double-decker open-top bus ride and more. Entrance fees, transport by coach, a tram and bus ticket, and a professional guide are included.
events.name: Morning Tour - Deluxe Hong Kong Island Tour with Hotel Pickup in Kowloon

events.description: Enhance your sightseeing experience in Beijing on a full-day tour of the city’s most captivating sights. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, immerse yourself in the ancient mystery of the Forbidden City; absorb the majestic charm of the Summer Palace and Temple of Heaven; and stroll around the legendary Tiananmen Square. Relax during a scenic bus ride; purchase special souvenirs in the bustling Pearl Market; and satisfy an appetite for authenticity with a traditional Chinese lunch.
events.name: Beijing Classic Full-Day Tour including the Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square, Summer Palace and Temple of Heaven

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/17972P192/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival or Departure Transfer: Shanghai Pudong Airport

events.description: Escape the city for a day filled with majestic landscapes and ancient human history on this private, full-day trip from Beijing. Cruise past colorful temples and dramatic karst formations swathed in emerald forests on a boat drip through the Longqing Gorge, and then marvel at the elaborate complex of dwellings carved directly into a rock face at the Guyaju Caves. Enjoy the personalized attention of a private guide all day and the convenience of included lunch and round-trip transfers from your Beijing hotel.
events.name: Longqingxia Gorge Cruise and Guyaju Cave Dwellings Private Day Tour

events.description: Beat the crowds and enjoy a comfortable guided tour of the Mutianyu Great Wall, a quieter, under-the-radar section of the world-famous ancient barricade. Get a first-hand peek at parapets and watchtowers set into a rugged landscape—without any time-wasting shopping stops. Tours include hotel pickup from Beijing in a climate-controlled bus and a tasty Chinese-style lunch at a local restaurant.
events.name: Morning Mubus: Mutianyu Great Wall Daily Round Trip Bus (7:30am Departure)

events.description: Discover the UNESCO world-heritage listed Terracotta Warriors and horses on this day trip of Xi’an’s historical highlights. Drive direct to the Terracotta Warriors Museum at the start of the day and cut past the tourist crowds; spend over two hours exploring this world-famous archeological site. In the afternoon, visit several of Xi’an’s ancient landmarks, including the City Wall, the Wild Goose Pagoda, and Muslim Bazaar – a great way to visit these spots without the hassle of hiring a car or navigating public transport.
events.name: Mini Group Xian Day Tour to Terracotta Army, City Wall, Pagoda & Muslim Bazaar

events.description: Discover the glory of ancient China on this full-day tour of two remarkable UNESCO World Heritage sites – the Great Wall of China and the Ming Tombs. Enjoy the undivided attention of your private guide as you walk along the wall at Juyongguan and learn how it was first constructed during the Han Dynasty. After a typical Chinese lunch (included), stroll the Spirit Way and explore the ancient Ming Tombs, built to house the emperors of the Ming dynasty.
events.name: Private Tour: Great Wall of China at Juyongguan and Ming Tombs from Beijing

events.description: Rather than struggling to plan your own itinerary, make the most of Shanghai on a private half-day tour. Available morning, afternoon, and night, it’s the perfect introduction for first-time China visitors. Just pick two or three attractions, perhaps the Bund, a Huangpu River cruise, a temple, a skyscraper, or a market, and design your dream day out. Entrance fees are at your own expense: upgrade to include a private car.
events.name: 4-Hour Private Customized Shanghai City Tour

events.description: Take advantage of your long Beijing layover with a private chauffeured transfer to the Great Wall and city center. Enjoy the freedom to customize the itinerary based on your interests and time constraints.  After arrival at PEK airport, your driver is ready to take you to your chosen attractions. Relax in private transportation for the duration of the tour and return to the airport with ample time to catch your flight.
events.name: Beijing Layover Private Transfer: Mutianyu Great Wall and Beijing City Attractions

events.description: Join an expert guide for a private tour of Beijing’s most fascinating destinations and UNESCO Sites, from the Forbidden City to the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China. With a private guide to take care of the details, you can focus on exploring Beijing history, culture, wildlife, and cuisine, hassle-free. This three-day private tour includes all transport by private vehicle, meals and entrance fees per itinerary, and daily hotel transfers, and it’s the perfect way to experience Beijing at its most remarkable.
events.name: 3-Day Private Tour of Beijing UNESCO World Heritage Sites with Acrobatic Show

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/186700P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Half Day Hong Kong Island Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/87908P6/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Hong Kong To Shenzhen Transfer with Sightseeing

events.description: Visit two UNESCO-listed Sichuan sights on a full-day private trip from Chengdu. Hike and ride a cable car up forested Mount Qingcheng, the birthplace of China’s Taoist religion. View the Shangqing Palace, temples, and lake, and learn how Qingcheng starred in the movie 'Kung Fu Panda 3.' Plus, visit the Dujiangyan project, the world’s oldest non-dam irrigation facility to see its ingenious 3rd-century BC design. Includes private transport, lunch, and central hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: All-Inclusive Private Day Tour of World Heritage Sites: Mount Qingcheng and Dujiangyan

events.description: Macau’s rich heritage and culture is often overlooked by visitors flocking its casinos. Get the best of both on a private tour to the World Heritage site from Hong Kong, and visit landmarks such as the Ruins of St. Paul's and Guia Fortress with your guide before experiencing the Las Vegas of Asia. Customize your experience to suit you with the choice of private or public round-trip transfer.
events.name: Private Customized Macau Day Tour from Hong Kong

events.description: Grab your passport and hop over the border to Macau on this full-day private tour, including hotel pick-up, lunch and round-trip ferry transport. Marvel over the UNESCO-listed ruins of St Paul's, then learn more about the city at the Macau Museum and Maritime Museum. Finally, head to the top of the Macau Tower where you can enjoy impressive views over the city and the Pearl River, then tuck into a delicious lunch at the tower’s revolving 360° Café.
events.name: Private Tour: Macau Day Trip from Hong Kong

events.description: Get the special opportunity to volunteer at one of China's top panda rehabilitation programs, Dujianyan Panda Base, on this full-day experience from Chengdu. Under the supervision of the center's staff, make panda food, clean the enclosures, feed the pandas snacks, and more. Buffet lunch and round-trip transportation from your Chengdu hotel are included.
events.name: Panda Keeper Volunteer in Dujiangyan Wolong Panda Base

events.description: Head to the Chaoyang Theatre in Beijing for an acrobatic arts performance complete with colorful costumes and dramatic lighting and catchy music. During the 1-hour show, the young performers display immense skill, agility and strength as they execute gravity-defying balancing acts, contortionism, aerial maneuvers and more. This memorable show that both kids and adults will love. You also have the option to upgrade your ticket to include round-trip transfer from your hotel and VIP seating.
events.name: Chaoyang Theatre Acrobatic Show Ticket

events.description: See the Chinese imperial palace used from the Ming dynasty to the end of the Qing dynasty up close on this private, 4-hour tour of the Forbidden City, including special skip-the-line access. Along the way, you’ll also get to see Tiananmen Square and Jinshan Park. Please be aware that this tour doesn’t include transportation to and from the attractions, but your private guide can help you get a taxi or other form of transport (own expense).
events.name: Forbidden City Private Tour with Skip-the-Line Access

events.description: Options for visiting to the Great Wall are often limited: you can choose a group tour, where you're one in a crowd, or a private tour, which can be pricey. On this mini-group tour, capped at six travelers, you get a personalized experience and a great value. Start with a quick ride from Beijing, then spend two hours hiking on the wall. Enjoy a Chinese lunch, included in the tour price.
events.name: Mini Group Tour: Mutianyu Great Wall, Summer Palace & Olympic Stadium

events.description: Make the most of your layover in Hong Kong by taking a private guided walking tour of the city. Visit some of the city's most popular attractions, including Victoria Peak and Aberdeen fishing village, while learning more about the city's history and culture from your guide. A private tour allows for a customized itinerary and efficient transportation so you can guarantee that you'll make it back to the airport in time for your flight.
events.name: 4-Hour Private Hong Kong Layover Tour

events.description: Create your perfect Beijing tour itinerary with this private 3-day combo package. Visit up to 10 attractions of your choice including the Great Wall, the Summer Palace, the Forbidden City, and Tiananmen Square; enjoy the convenience of daily hotel pickup and private transport; and explore each attraction at your own pace.
events.name: 3-Day Beijing Sightseeing Private Custom-Made Combo Tour

events.description: Insure a seamless arrival by pre-booking this Hong Kong airport transfer and avoid the hassle of public transportation. Enjoy the air-conditioned comfort of your own private vehicle as you make your way from Chek Lap Kok Airport to your Hong Kong or Kowloon hotel. A representative will even meet you upon arrival!
events.name: Hong Kong Private Arrival Transfer: Airport to Hotel with Meet and Greet

events.description: Discover Beijing’s top attractions like the Summer Palace, and visit the Great Wall at Mutianyu, on this 2-day tour. It’s the ideal way to save time if you’re only in Beijing for a short time and want to experience as much as possible, while still traveling in comfort. Lunch is provided, and you won’t have any language barriers as you’ll have a guide to translate.
events.name: 2-Day Combo Package: Beijing City Tour and Great Wall at Mutianyu w/Lunch

events.description: Don’t spend your Shanghai stopover inside the airport; maximize your time in China and opt for a private and customizable sightseeing tour instead. This personalized layover tour is tailored to your needs and allows you to tick off The Bund (Waitan), French Concession, and Yuyuan Garden in limited time. Airport or hotel pickup and drop-off are included for added convenience.
events.name: Flexible Private Shanghai Layover Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/36522P125/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Flexible Half Day Tour to Zhujiajiao Water Town with Boat Ride from Shanghai

events.description: Under the cloak of darkness, Beijing transforms into an illuminated wonderland. This private 4-hour tour allows you to experience the Chinese capital by night and includes an authentic meal from a restaurant of your choice. See Tiananmen Square (Tiananmen Guangchang), the Back Lakes (Hou Hai), and Beijing National Stadium lit up and enjoy the convenience of hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: 4-Hour Private Illuminated Beijing Tour with Authentic Chinese Dinner on Hutong Street

events.description: Experience all of Shanghai’s historical highlights and impressive landmarks on a hop-on, hop-off sightseeing bus tour. Sail past alluring attractions like the People’s Plaza, the Nanpu Bridge, The Bund and the Jade Buddha Temple on a distinctive double-decker bus, and disembark whenever you wish to explore further. Use your pass to discover three distinct routes, all of which visit must-see monuments sure to capture your attention.
events.name: Shanghai Bus Tour Hop-on Hop-off Premium Ticket including City Top Attraction Admissions

events.description: Beijing is teeming with standout sights, but areas outside the city are filled with hidden must-see attractions. Cover locations outside standard tourist itineraries during this enriching day trip to Datong, with round-trip transportation from your Beijing hotel. Visit the Hanging Monastery, one of China’s most daring architectural feats, and explore the UNESCO-listed Yungang Grottoes, home to over 51,000 Buddha statues. You’ll also munch on savory sliced noodles—a local specialty.
events.name: Private Day Trip to Datong from Beijing with English Speaking Driver

events.description: Discover the Jewish history of Shanghai on a half-day tour with an expert guide. Hear about Jewish immigration to Shanghai and visit important sites around the Hongkou district, also known as Shanghai Ghetto, where thousands of Jewish refugees lived during World War II. Stop at the memorial plaque in Huoshan Park and the Jewish Refugees Museum—formerly Ohel Moishe Synagogue. Your guide shares fascinating stories about the people whose lives intersected in Shanghai, including a Baghdadi–Jewish real estate developer, Chinese migrant workers, and Jewish refugees from war-torn Europe.
events.name: Tour of Jewish Shanghai led by a Jewish History Expert

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/153481P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 2 Days Beijing Group Tour from Tianjin Cruise Port without Shop Stops

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/43667P12/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Shanghai Pudong airport transfer to Hotel

events.description: Explore Shanghai's former French Concession long after dark, tasting more than 20 local foods along the way, on this 3-hour tour. Learn about the history and culture of the Xintiandi, Hefei Road, and Zhaozhou Road areas through your guide's commentary, and leave the tour with your culinary and historical appetites sated.
events.name: Late Night Food Tour in the Shanghai's French Concession

events.description: Take a Hong Kong tour with a difference, and sightsee around the city with a local host. With no official tour guide or shared group, this personalized option matches you with a local, based on your interests. A fully customized tour is then created, which takes in the sights you want to see and focuses on the topics that interest you most. Just book online, and you'll be contacted for a pretour chat before the itinerary is set. Numbers are limited to six people.
events.name: A Full Day in Hong Kong with a Local: Private & Personalized

events.description: After dusk, Hong Kong transforms into a glittering metropolis reminiscent of a science fiction film. Get the best views of the skylines of Kowloon and Hong Kong Island during an evening cruise by junk boat, a must-do for anyone visiting HK for the first time. As well as a boat ride, this package includes a Cantonese dinner at a dim sum restaurant and a visit to Tsim Sha Tsui promenade to watch the famous Victoria Harbour light show.
events.name: Hong Kong Night Junk Cruise with Authentic Cantonese Dim Sum Experience

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/20481P61/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Tiananmen Square and Forbidden City Half Day Trip - Group option

events.description: Keep your camera to hand as you visit two of Chengdu’s most photo-worthy sites on this full-day tour – the UNESCO-listed Grand Buddha in Leshan and the Chengdu Panda Base.  Start your day getting close to China’s adorable native pandas, with the chance to spot Giant Pandas, Red Pandas and baby pandas. After lunch at a local restaurant (included), make the most of your private guide as you explore the Great Buddha temple and stand in awe before the world’s largest stone Buddha.
events.name: Private Tour: Chengdu Panda Base and Leshan Grand Buddha

events.description: Visit Beijing by bullet train with this two-day tour from Shanghai. You'll get to visit sites such as the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China, along with Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City, not to mention the beautiful Temple of Heaven and the Summer Palace before heading back to Shanghai on day 2.
events.name: 2-Day Private Beijing Slightseeing Tour from Shanghai by Bullet Train (No Hotel)

events.description: Discover Beijing at your own pace on a private 2-day tour of China’s capital, which includes select meals, transport, and entrance fees. Tick off top attractions such as Tiananmen Square (Tiananmen Guangchang), the Forbidden City (Imperial Palace), and the Temple of Heaven (Tian tan) on day one. On day two, visit the Great Wall at Mutianyu — one of the New7Wonders of the World — and the Summer Palace (Yiheyuan). Hotel pickup and drop-off are included every day.
events.name: 2-Day Private Beijing Tour with Forbidden City and Great Wall

events.description: Unveil the secrets of traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) with a fascinating 2-hour workshop in Shanghai, hosted by a licensed TCM practitioner. Learn about the creative use of everyday foods and herbal medicines; discover the ancient practices of acupuncture and reflexology (foot massage); and enjoy an individual health consultation. This is a private tour for you and your party.
events.name: Traditional 2-Hour Chinese Medicine Lesson in Shanghai

events.description: Enjoy a hassle-free arrival in Beijing with this private transfer service. Meet your driver at Capital International Airport or Beijing Nanyuan Airport, and relax on the journey to your hotel or private residence in Beijing. This service is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer from Beijing Airport to Hotel

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/28488P57/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Beijing Private (less walking) 2-Day Tour with All Attractions

events.description: Get to know Shanghai with your own guide on this full day private tour. Admire bird’s-eye views from a Pudong tower, stroll along The Bund or Riverside Promenade (Binjiang Da Dao), and visit the Yuyuan Garden and bazaar. Plus, explore the Confucius Temple and Concession area, and enjoy a dumpling lunch (own expense) and traditional tea ceremony. Choose to travel by public transport (own expense) if you're in a group of four or fewer, or upgrade to get around by private vehicle.
events.name: Private Full-Day Tour: Incredible Shanghai Highlights

events.description: Chengdu’s most famous residents aren’t human, they’re pandas. With this private tour, enjoy a customized day interacting with these black and white bears at the Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding. Design your own experience with options to help a panda keeper in their daily tasks, snap photos of the pandas under staff supervision, or simply observe red and giant pandas in their enclosures.
events.name: Dujiangyan Wolong Panda Tour option panda keeper experience

events.description: See the highlights of Xi’an with a private guide on a full-day tour that takes in the Terracotta Warriors Army and Horses Museum, Ancient City Wall and Muslim Quarter. Follow your guide into the UNESCO World Heritage-listed 2,000-year-old mausoleum complex where the life-sized Terracotta Warriors stand. Afterward, visit the Muslim Quarter and the Ancient City Wall, built during the Ming Dynasty and remarkably intact. With a private guide, you can focus on your interests during the tour. Includes lunch, and hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: Xian Terracotta Warriors and City Wall Private Day Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/7309P142/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: All-Inclusive Private Mutianyu Great Wall Day Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/30810P3/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Pick-up From Shanghai Pudong Airport to Locations in City

events.description: Discover China's rich history on a half-day door-to-door tour of the Terracotta Warriors and Horses Museum, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Follow your private guide through the pits one, two, and three and see more than 7,000 terracotta soldiers. Upgrade the afternoon tour to include a trip to the Tang Dynasty Show and a feast of traditional Shaanxi dumplings or enjoy lunch at a Qin Dynasty themed restaurant.
events.name: Private Half-Day Tour of Xi'an Terracotta Warriors

events.description: A network of spectacular walkways thread their way over the Gulong Gorge (Gulongxia). A cantilevered glass platform stands 236 feet (72 meters) above the gorge; a glass bridge runs 1,080 feet (329 meters) across the canyon. Experience them without the stress of queuing for tickets on this private guided tour, with door-to-door transfers direct from your hotel. Besides the walkways and a guided hike, your day includes a local lunch.
events.name: Private Day Tour to Gulong Canyon Glass Bridge from Guangzhou

events.description: Take a private tour to two monumental UNESCO World Heritage Sites located near Beijing: the Great Wall of China at Mutianyu and Ming Tombs. Your experienced guide takes you to the less-crowded Mutianyu section of the Great Wall, which offers superb viewing of historical and architectural features, along with sweeping views of the surroundings. Continue to the Ming Tombs, the royal burial complex for the emperors of the Ming Dynasty, and visit either the Sacred Way, Chang Ling Tomb or Ding Ling Tomb during your tour.
events.name: Private Beijing Day Trip: Mutianyu Great Wall and Ming Tombs

events.description: A Beijing layover doesn’t have to mean hours stuck in the airport. If you have at least 10 hours between flights, check off not one but two UNESCO World Heritage sites on this private guided tour. Skip the long lines at Mutianyu Great Wall, tuck into a dumpling lunch, then enjoy priority access to the Forbidden City before returning to the airport for your onward flight.
events.name: Skip-The-Line Private Layover Tour to Mutianyu Great Wall and Forbidden City

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/21407P29/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Zhujiajiao Water Town and Shanghai Highlights Private Trip With English Driver

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/72859P23/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Beijing Layover Private Trip to Visit China Great Wall

events.description: Enjoy a Hong Kong shore excursion complete with a ful-day sightseeing tour that hits all the hot spots in Hong Kong Island and Kowloon. Follow your expert guide through the most famous landmarks and gain an insider’s understanding into what makes this destination so unique. Hop aboard the Star Ferry and enjoy a ride across Victoria Harbour. Opt for a traditional sampan ride through the floating village of Aberdeen and ride a tram to the top of Victoria Peak. Enjoy free time to explore and shop at your leisure at the area’s most popular local markets.
events.name: Hong Kong Shore Excursion: Full-Day City Sightseeing Tour

events.description: You don’t need to stay overnight to see the best of the Macau. Soak up the sights of the historic center, a UNESCO World Heritage site, and stop by the Sands Casino in one action-packed day that includes round-trip transfers from selected hotels. Or extend your stay into the evening to enjoy the Cotai Strip and Venetian Macao, and arrange your own transfer from the Hong Kong ferry terminal.
events.name: Day Tour of Macau's Historic Landmarks with Ferry from Hong Kong

events.description: Get a taste of Shanghai’s highlights and famous cuisine on this flexible private tour, with a choice of morning or afternoon departure. Settle inside a private, air-conditioned vehicle and tailor the itinerary around your interests and guide’s recommendations. Explore the Yuyuan Bazaar, admire bird’s-eye views from the Shanghai Tower, take a River Huangpu cruise, savor a classic Shanghai lunch or dinner, and more. Cruise, Shanghai Tower admission, meal, and hotel pickup and drop-off included.
events.name: Shanghai Private Tour with River Cruise, Shanghai Tower, and Lunch or Dinner

events.description: Limited time needn’t mean missing out on Macau. This comprehensive guided day tour, with pickup from selected hotels, covers all the historic attractions that have made the center a UNESCO World Heritage site, as well as a buffet lunch in a revolving restaurant. Choose between returning on the 5pm ferry with hotel drop-off or spending the evening at the Venetian Macao and arranging your own transport from the 10pm ferry.
events.name: Day Tour to Macau with Hotel Pickup in Hong Kong Island

events.description: The Great Wall of China’s is one of the world’s most popular attractions, and this small-group visit to the Mutianyu Great Wall helps you bypass the crowds. One of the ruggedest and most picturesque sections of the ancient barricade, Mutianyu has all of the charm and history with far fewer tourists. Tours include round-trip hotel transfers and a tasty Chinese lunch stop.
events.name: Mutianyu Great Wall Small-Group Tour from Beijing including Lunch

events.description: See one of the world’s great monuments up close on a full-day tour to the Jinshaling section of the Great Wall of China. Travel about 2.5 hours from Beijing to reach the remote area, which promises a more relaxed experience away from the crowds. Accompanied by your tour assistant, hike along the Great Wall at Jinshaling for 3.5 hours, taking in the impressive architecture, intricate brickwork and stunning views. Have lunch at a local restaurant before returning to Beijing. Your tour includes lunch, entrance fees, and hotel pick-up and drop-off.
events.name: Jinshanling Great Wall Morning Hiking Tour

events.description: See three of the most important attractions in the Beijing area in just one day with this private tour. You'll start with a morning visit to Tiananmen Square and then on to the adjacent Forbidden City, which operated as an imperial palace for almost five centuries under the Ming and Qing Dynasties. You'll then head up to the Badaling section of the Great Wall of China, stopping for lunch along the way, before returning to Beijing at the end of the day.
events.name: Beijing Private Day Tour: Tian'anmen Square, Forbidden City, Badaling Great Wall

events.description: Even if you’ve only got a layover in Beijing, check off one of the true wonders of the world on a visit to the Mutianyu Great Wall. Choose between a private, transport-only transfer and an all-inclusive package with English-speaking guide, local lunch, entrance fees, and tickets to the toboggan and/or the cable car.
events.name: Private Beijing Layover Tour: PEK Airport to Mutianyu Great Wall

events.description: Wander through Hong Kong’s Central and Sheung Wan neighborhoods on this incredible four-hour tour that showcases the tastes and flavors of Asia. Go off the beaten path and sample food from six different culinary destinations as you follow your expert local guide through back alleys and open markets. You’ll taste traditional dim sum, noodles and sweet desserts, plus wind through colonial architecture and learn about the city’s colorful history. With a small group cap of 12 people you’re sure to have a personalized experience.
events.name: Hong Kong Food Tour: Central and Sheung Wan Districts

events.description: Hop aboard a catamaran and explore mainland China on this full-day trip from Hong Kong. Your guide takes you to some of the nation’s most iconic destinations, and to meet pandas at the Shenzhen Safari Park. Tour the thriving metropolis of Guangzhou and learn more about the Qin Dynasty’s terracotta warriors and their horses. Experience the beauty, history and excitement of China’s third largest city—formerly known as Canton—before returning by train. Lunch, transportation and visas are included in the cost of this half-day trip.
events.name: Guangzhou (Canton) China Day Trip from Hong Kong

events.description: Group tours can often be rigid and impersonal experiences. Enjoy a more personalized experience with this private tour of Nanjing. Travel from Shanghai by bullet train and let your guide know your personal preferences for the day. Explore such landmarks as the Confucius Temple and Heaven Palace, and enjoy an included lunch.
events.name: Private Flexible Nanjing City Day Trip from Shanghai by Bullet Train

events.description: This is a convenient option for time-tight travelers who want to see multiple Beijing highlights in a single day. Avoid the potential delays you'd encounter picking up other travelers, and enjoy a completely private tour instead, with just your party and the driver. This all-inclusive experience ensures a stress-free day without any logistics to organize, as transport, entrance tickets, and lunch are included. Highlights include Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, the Temple of Heaven, and Summer Palace.
events.name: T-Square, Forbidden city, Temple of heaven, Summer palace All Inclusive Tour

events.description: Zhangjiajie National Forest Park is renowned for its mythical, mist-shrouded landscapes comprised of floating mountains and dramatic canyons. See some of the park’s natural highlights on a private 9-hour day-trip to the Grand Canyon and Yellow Dragon Cave from Zhangjiajie. On a guided tour, you’ll visit the highest and longest glass bridge in the world and absorb spectacular views of limestone formations. Then, descend to Yellow Dragon Cave to marvel at stalactites, stalagmites, and underground streams. Lunch and hotel pickup and drop-off are included.
events.name: Private Zhangjiajie Day Trip with Grand Canyon and Yellow Dragon Cave

events.description: Discover one of China's natural wonders and see landscapes featured in the movie "Avatar" on a private day tour to Zhangjiajie National Forest Park, home to Avatar Hallelujah Mountain and the Zhangjiajie Glass Bridge. The park is located inside Wulingyuan Scenic Area, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
events.name: One Day Zhangjiajie Tour to Avatar Mountain and Glass Bridge Skywalk

events.description: Set out on a scenic drive around Hangzhou’s UNESCO-listed landscapes on this private full-day sightseeing tour and enjoy a fully customizable itinerary. Cruise around the mist-shrouded West Lake, one of China’s most memorable natural wonders, and stroll around the Flower Harbor Park. Visit the famous Lingyin Temple, sample traditional tea at the Meijiawu Tea Village and stop for lunch in a local family home (own expense) in Amanfayun Village.
events.name: Private Tour: Ultimate Hangzhou Sightseeing Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/36522P89/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Enduring Memories of Hangzhou West Lake Show VIP Ticket with Private Transfer

events.description: Get the most out of your time in China by seeing Mount Huangshan, Hongcun, and Tangyue on the same tour. You’ll save hours researching your trip, and you’ll avoid language barriers by having a comprehensive itinerary planned out for you. It’ll be the ultimate stress-free experience as accommodation, select meals, transport, and entrance fees are all included. Top sites you’ll see include Tunxi Old Street, Mount Huangshan, Hongcun Village, Tangyue Memorial Stone Archways, and Bao Garden.
events.name: Private 4-Day Tour to Mount Huangshan, Hongcun and Tangyue with Accommodation

events.description: Do full justice to three of Beijing’s must-see sights with a privately guided 8-hour city sightseeing trip. Check out Tiananmen Square, the immense square at the heart of the city, and explore the highlights of the Forbidden Palace and the Summer Palace on guided walking tours. Lunch, entrance fees, private transport with a guide and driver, and hotel pickup and drop-off all included.
events.name: Private Classic Beijing Tour: Tiananmen Square, Forbidden City and Summer Palace

events.description: Don’t compromise on style when exploring Beijing. Travel by Audi, BMW, Mercedes, or Buick and lunch at Lost Heaven and Bai Jia Da Yuan on this 2-day private sightseeing tour. Along the way, check off all the key Beijing highlights: the Forbidden City, the Summer Palace, the Temple of Heaven, the Lama Temple, Tiananmen Square, and the Great Wall at Mutianyu.
events.name: 2-Day Private VIP Sightseeing Tour of Beijing City Highlights and Great Wall

events.description: Experience the Great Wall’s Mutinayu Section from above on this all-day guided excursion. After a convenient hotel, airport, or train station pickup, head to this fully-restored 1.5-mile (2.5-kilometer) stretch of wall that was first built more than 1,400 years ago. Board a helicopter and marvel at its nearly two-dozen watchtowers and parapets, and enjoy panoramic mountain views. Enjoy a walk along the wall afterwards.
events.name: Visit Mutianyu Great Wall by Helicopter with Private Car English Speaking Driver

events.description: This spectacular, and comprehensive tour will help you discover multiple highlights in seven days.You’ll travel between spread out attractions in a comfortable vehicle, and will save time researching and planning your itinerary, as it’s all organized for you. Take the stress out of language barriers, as this tour includes a guide. Highlights included Potala Palace, Jokhang Temple, Sera monastery, Karo glacier, and Everest Base Camp.
events.name: 7-Night Lhasa to Everest Base Camp Classic Tour

events.description: Experience Zhangjiajie’s natural beauty on this three-day guided adventure. After a convenient airport pickup, enjoy a thrilling ride up the 1,070 foot (326 meter) Bailong Elevator, admire the mountains that inspired “Avatar,” and follow the glass skywalk that sits 4,700 feet (1,432 meters) above sea level on Tianmen Mountain, among other stops.
events.name: 3-Day Zhangjiajie Private Tour to Avatar Mountain & Tianmen Mountain

events.description: Take in a bit of Chinese history and culture on a guided day tour to the Ming Tombs (Ming Shishan Ling) and the Great Wall of China, located north of Beijing. You'll have about two hours at the Great Wall at Badaling to walk along this preserved section of the wall, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. You can ride the cable car, if you wish, at your own expense.
events.name: Great Wall at Badaling, Ming Tomb Group Bus Tour

events.description: Discover Xi’an’s many historic treasures on this private full-day tour and enjoy the undivided attention of your private guide. Marvel at Emperor Qin’s Army of Terracotta Warriors, a UNESCO World Heritage Site; explore the Yaodong cave dwellings; and visit the grand Tomb of Emperor Jingdi at the Hanyangling Museum.
events.name: Private Xi'an Tour: Terracotta Warriors, Hanyangling Museum, Cave Homes

events.description: Explore China’s largest city on this nighttime cruise on the Huangpu River. After a convenient hotel pickup, enjoy a delicious dinner while marveling at the city’s glittering skyline. Catch picturesque views of landmarks like the Bund, Lupu Bridge, Peace Hotel, Oriental TV Tower, and Shanghai World Financial Tower. Afterwards, enjoy door-to-door service with a complimentary hotel transfer.
events.name: Shanghai Huangpu River Night Cruise with Buffet Dinner

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/17972P530/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer: Hong Kong Airport to Hong Kong Island or City Center

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/138617P22/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: [5 days 4 nights] Best of Beijing Local Small Group Tour All-inclusive
