events.description: From ancient carvings located behind laundries to the 300-year-old Secluded Library (not open to the public), learn what lies behind the modern glamour of one of China’s largest and most cosmopolitan cities on this private walking tour of Old Shanghai. With just your group and private guide, head to a number of off-the-beaten-track attractions and quirky historical sites that create a fuller understanding of Shanghai’s history and contemporary culture alike.
events.name: Walking Through the Hidden Door of Shanghai Old Town

events.description: Enjoy a dinner of Peking duck or another choice from the fine Chinese cuisine on the menu at Da Dong Roast Duck Restaurant during your vening experience in Beijing. After dinner, choose between watching the Legend of Kung Fu Show at Red Theatre Beijing and the Golden Mask Dynasty Show at Beijing OCT Theatre (VIP seat). Your private tour includes dinner, show ticket, and hotel pick up and drop-off.
events.name: Da Dong Roast Duck Restaurant Dining Experience plus VIP seated Show Entertainment

events.description: Hong Kong Disneyland features some of the newest rides and attractions that cannot be found at other Disneyland theme parks. With full-day admission, make your way to seven themed lands: Adventureland, Grizzly Gulch; Mystic Point; Toy Story Land; Fantasyland; Tomorrowland; and Main Street, U.S.A. Round-trip hotel transport is provided from Kowloon.
events.name: Hong Kong Disneyland Admission with Transfers from Kowloon Area

events.description: Come visit one of the new seven wonders of the world on this full-day sunset tour to the Great Wall at Gubeikou and Jinshanling, including round-trip transport from Beijing and lunch. Journey to the Great Wall at Gubeikou, and then watch the sunset from the wall at Jinshanling before returning to your hotel.
events.name: Great Wall at Gubeikou and Jinshanling Private Sunset Tour

events.description: Experience two of Guangzhou’s must-dos when you try traditional Cantonese dim sum and go for a cruise along the Pearl River. Meet your guide in the evening directly at your hotel, and transfer via private vehicle to Dian Dou De, one of the city’s most beloved, traditional eateries. Enjoy a classic dim sum feast, and try numerous popular dishes. Then, transfer to the river cruise. As you float along the Pearl River, see the Canton Tower, the Guangzhou Opera House, and other key attractions.
events.name: Cantonese Dim Sum Dinner with Pearl River Night Cruise in Guangzhou

events.description: Begin your Beijing vacation the right way by booking a convenient and cost-effective private arrival transfer. Travel from Beijing Capital International Airport direct to your hotel in a spacious, private vehicle that accommodates up to seven passengers. Escape the stress of public transport and the hassle of crowded taxi ranks with this easy and efficient service.
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer: Beijing Capital International Airport (PEK) to Hotel

events.description: Check off two of Beijing’s star attractions on this private full-day tour, with hotel pickup, entrance fees, and round-trip transport all included. Visit the Great Wall of China at Mutianyu and ride the cable car up to the towers, tuck into a delicious Chinese-style lunch, and stroll around the royal gardens of the Summer Palace.
events.name: Mutianyu Great Wall And Summer Palace Day Tour

events.description: Visit Disneyland before departing from Hong Kong with a full-day package that includes one-way hotel transfer and park admission. After your morning transfer to Disneyland, check your luggage at the Disneyland entrance, then spend as much time as you like enjoying the attractions. At the end of your day in Hong Kong Disneyland, it's easy to make your own way to the airport by shuttle bus or MTR train.
events.name: Daily Group Tour: Disneyland Admission With Hotel Pickup and 1-Way Transfer

events.description: Avoid the hassle of trying to find out where to grab a good meal while in Shanghai. This Shanghai food tour takes you off the beaten path as the sun starts to set so you can taste some of the most authentic regional dishes of the city. Pop into family-run eateries, and sample food, beer, and spirits well-liked by locals. Travel in a small group for a more intimate experience as you sample foods with a guide who also tells you about the city’s history and culture as you go.
events.name: Eat Like A Local: Shanghai Night Food Tour

events.description: Skip the boredom of a long airport layover and take a round-trip visit to the Mutianyu Great Wall. After your arrival in Beijing, meet up with your private driver at the airport. Relax in comfortable private transportation to the wall, where you enjoy complimentary entrance. There’s no need to pack an extra coat for the excursion, as extras are available upon request.
events.name: Private Transit Tour: Beijing PEK Airport to Mutianyu Great Wall

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/32073P180/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Flexible Hangzhou Private Day Tour with Lunch

events.description: The language barrier makes Hong Kong’s diverse street food hard to navigate without a guide. Let your personal foodie explain exactly what makes the city’s culinary culture tick over multiple tastings and a market visit. Taste everything from shrimp wonton to pineapple bun, sample sugarcane juice at an iconic teahouse, and experience the vibrant atmosphere of the local markets.
events.name: Private Hong Kong Food Tour: The 10 Tastings

events.description: Experience China’s “Venice of the East” on this guided excursion. After a convenient hotel pickup, upgrade and relax on first-class bullet train tickets from Shanghai. Then explore this historic water town with an informative, professional guide and visit sites like the Humble Administrators Garden, Shantang Street, Suzhou Pingtan Opera, and Suzhou Museum. Enjoy a boat ride along the old canals and a complimentary meal.
events.name: Suzhou Private Customized Day Trip from Shanghai by Bullet Train

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/67316P118/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 4-Hour Shore Excursion: Tianjin City Highlights and Binhai Bullet Train Experience

events.description: Shun Shanghai’s hustle for a private hike in the forests and tea plantations outside Hangzhou. Travel direct from your Shanghai hotel by bullet train and private car. Then set the pace that suits your style as you stroll Jiuxi Scenic Area (Jiuxi 18 Stream) and Hupao Spring with your personal guide. Along the way, enjoy a simple lunch at a tea farm, washed down with Dragon Well tea.
events.name: Hangzhou Jiuxi and Hupao Spring Hiking Day Trip from Shanghai by Bullet Train

events.description: See the sights of Hong Kong with a private guide on a customizable, walking half-day tour. Designed to provide a detailed introduction to the city at the beginning of your trip before you explore more on your own, or if you have limited time in the city, this tour will be tailored to your interests, which you’ll provide after booking. Then enjoy an exploration specific to you, from history and culture to food, markets and local neighborhoods.
events.name: Half-Day Private Custom Tour of Hong Kong

events.description: Wolong National Nature Reserve, one of China’s oldest and best known panda reserves, sits in Sichuan Province outside of Chengdu. With this tour, spend the day volunteering alongside professional panda keepers as you learn how to care for China’s famous black and white bears. Your bilingual guide will be by your side to translate the entire time.
events.name: Wolong Panda Base Volunteering Program with Photo-taking with Panda Option

events.description: See all of Beijing’s cultural and historical highlights on a comprehensive and captivating full-day tour of China’s capital city. Stroll amid the majestic charm of Tiananmen Square; marvel at the imaginative architecture at the Forbidden City; and see the verdant splendor that surrounds the Badaling section of the Great Wall of China. Alongside your knowledgeable guide, gain fascinating insight into the rich history and distinctive culture of Beijing and enjoy convenient round-trip transportation from selected Beijing hotels.
events.name: Beijing Essential Full-Day Tour including Great Wall at Badaling, Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square

events.description: Prepare to be dazzled by "The House of Dancing Water", the water show extravaganza performed in a state-of-the-art theater at City of Dreams Macau. The sweeping love story begins when a storm sweeps a fisherman into a mythical land of pirates, princesses and other characters. The action-packed spectacle full of breathtaking acrobatics, motorcycle stunts, high dives and more. Colorful water jets and multimedia theatrics provide a visually stunning set. You have a choice of two showtimes each evening, making it easy to fit into your sightseeing schedule.
events.name: The House of Dancing Water Show in Macau

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/6977P168/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Fast Pass Priority: Hangzhou Essential Day Tour with Authentic Lunch

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/31320P122/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: All Inclusive Private Beijing Day Tour to Jinshanling Great Wall with Cable Car

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/10771P78/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private one day Dazu Rock Carvings tour with high speed train to Chengdu

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/103545P5/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Hong Kong: 2020 New Year's Eve Fireworks and Dinner Buffet Cruise

events.description: Take advantage of a long layover at the Beijing airport and spend the time visiting the Great Wall on this half-day tour. Get picked up at the airport or a nearby hotel and head to the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall to explore. This area features a cable car, chairlift, and a popular toboggan ride.
events.name: Beijing Layover Private Transfer to Mutianyu Great Wall By English Driver

events.description: Begin your Shanghai sojourn the right way with a private arrival transfer from one of Shanghai’s cruise ports to your accommodation. When your cruise ships sails into the port, disembark and greet your courteous driver for the direct journey to your accommodation. Relax in your comfortable, air-conditioned vehicle and enjoy the ease and efficiency of the service before arriving at your hotel in style.
events.duration:
After your cruise ship drops anchor at one of Shanghai’s many ports (Shanghai International Cruise Terminal, Baoshan Port or Waigaoqiao Port), disembark and greet your courteous driver at a convenient location. Climb aboard your private, air-conditioned vehicle and relax during the direct journey to your accommodation. 

When booking, simply enter your details, pay in advance and present your voucher to your driver on arrival. 

Transfers are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and the price is based on 7 adults per vehicle.

events.name: Shanghai Private Transfer in English Service: Shanghai Cruise Port to Hotel

events.description: Arrange your round-trip airport transfer in advance and skip the hassle of booking a service in Beijing. This convenient form of transport takes you from Beijing Capital International Airport to your hotel or private residence, and then back again. It means you spend more time enjoying your trip and less time puzzling out the logistics.
events.name: Private Beijing Round-Trip Airport Transfer to Hotel

events.description: Enhance your experience of Shanghai regardless of time constrains on a morning or afternoon half-day sightseeing tour. See the best of Shanghai with a knowledgeable guide as you discover historical highlights like The Bund and the Jade Buddha Temple. Learn the complex process of pearl cultivation at the Fresh Water Pearl Gallery; absorb the antique charm of Shanghai Old Street; and delve into the city’s rich historical heritage at Shanghai Museum. Convenient round-trip transportation from your Shanghai hotel is included on this tour.
events.name: Shanghai Half Day Morning or Afternoon Sightseeing Tour

events.description: Save hours wasted waiting on taxis and soak up Suzhou’s old-world charms in just a day on this classic door-to-door private tour. Check all the Suzhou boxes—a classical garden, a silk factory, a temple, and the ancient street—with a private guide and driver. Start at the Lingering Garden, tour Panmen Gate, Hanshan Temple, and Pingjiang Road, then discover the art of silk at Suzhou No. 1 Silk Mill.
events.name: Private Suzhou Classic Tour--Full Day Tour

events.description: Travel back in time during a colorful Tang Dynasty show in Xi’an. The show includes an entertaining combination of live music, dance and poetry performed by talented dancers and singers outfitted in gorgeous costumes that help bring the history of ancient China to life. Xi’an was the capital of the Tang Dynasty, making this show the perfect thing to do while visiting the city.
events.name: Xi'an Tang Dynasty Show with Optional Dinner and/or Transfer

events.description: On a day trip from Hong Kong, discover the top sights of Macau, a small peninsula part of mainland China and known for the casinos and extravagant shopping malls that have earned it the nickname ‘the Las Vegas of Asia.’ Located a 1-hour ferry ride across the Pearl River Delta from Hong Kong, Macau retains influences of its time as a Portuguese territory; explore its history as you visit the UNESCO World Heritage sites of A-Ma Temple, the Ruins of St Paul’s and Mount Fortress. Hotel pickup is included in Kowloon.
events.name: Group Day Tour to Macau from Hong Kong with Hotel Pickup in Kowloon Area

events.description: Learn about the culinary culture of Hong Kong on a private food tour with a knowledgeable guide. Primarily Cantonese Chinese, the local cuisine features small differences that reflect the city’s combination of Chinese and British history. Across five stops, you’ll sample dishes such as dim sum, wonton noodle soup, milk tea and an egg tart. As you eat, you’ll also learn about the history of food in Hong Kong, from traditional Guangzhou to Western influences.
events.name: Private Food Tour: Hong Kong Island

events.description: Experience Zhangjiajie’s natural beauty on this two-day guided adventure. After a convenient airport pickup and drive with marvelous views, enjoy a thrilling ride up the 1,070 foot (326 meter) Bailong Elevator, admire the region’s gorgeous landscapes from Tianzi Mountain, cross the 1,410 foot (430) meter Glass Bridge over Zhangjiajie Grand Canyon, and capture memorable waterfall photos at Baofeng Lake.
events.name: 2 Full Days Private Tour to Zhangjiajie National Forest Park and Glass Bridge

events.description: Breeze past the long entry lines to enjoy your pre-booked tour of the Forbidden City. Follow your tour guide to visit eighteen different palaces, including the lavish The Antiquarium of The Palace Museum (Treasures Museum). Learn about the ancient history, culture, and traditions that helped shape the Forbidden City through your guide's engaging commentary. Entrance fees and hotel pickup in Beijing are included.
events.name: 4-Hour Skip-the-Line Ultimate Discovery of Forbidden City Tour with Hotel Pickup

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/72859P40/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Mutianyu Great Wall VIP Private Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/40944P180/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Beijing hotel to Tianjin Cruise Port with the English Speaking Driver

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/24380P688/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: The Ultimate Private Layover Hong Kong Tour

events.description: While on layover at Beijing Capital International Airport, let a personal guide show you the highlights around Beijing. Spend time exploring the UNESCO-listed Great Wall of China at Mutianyu and the Forbidden City. You'll also visit Tiananmen Square and eat a Chinese lunch. Round-trip airport transport by private vehicle is included on this full-day tour.
events.name: Private Layover Tour: Mutianyu Great Wall, Tiananmen Square, and Forbidden City

events.description: Savor two signature Chinese experiences—dumplings and acrobatics—in one fantastic evening out on this door-to-door tour with professional guide. Start at an authentic Shanghai dim sum restaurant and watch soup dumplings (“xiaolongbao”) being handmade the traditional way. After your dumpling feast, transfer to a theater to watch an acrobatics show that blends Chinese traditions with modern technology in a thoroughly Shanghai way.
events.name: Private Tour: Shanghai Acrobatic Show and Authentic Dim Sum

events.description: Experience the glitz of Hong Kong Harbor’s neon lights at night during this one-of-a-kind Symphony of Lights laser show. Spend the evening cruising Victoria Harbour on a traditional junk boat. Take in the incredible views as you soak up all the wonder of this memorable night on the water.
events.name: Symphony of Lights Hong Kong Harbor Night Cruise with Unlimited Drinks

events.description: With just a few hours in Beijing, it's easy to explore the city, but miss the the region's top attraction—the Great Wall. On this private tour designed to maximize your limited time, enjoy easy transportation directly to the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall. Head up to the top and hike along its ancient, 2.1 mile (3.4 kilometer) expanse. After taking in the stunning views, ride a toboggan back down—at your own expense—and hop in your car to be whisked back to the city.
events.name: Beijing Private Tour to Mutianyu Great Wall by English Speaking Driver with Layover Option

events.description: Enjoy a memorable evening of city skyline views, delicious food, and unlimited drinks during this Hong Kong Harbor night cruise and dinner at Victoria Peak. Relax on the waters of Victoria Harbour during your cruise, savor a delicious meal atop Victoria Peak with views of the skyline, and stroll through the Temple Street Night Market in Kowloon. Pickup and drop-off is included from select Hong Kong hotels.
events.name: Hong Kong Harbor Night Cruise and Dinner at Victoria Peak

events.description: Immerse yourself in the rich culinary culture of Shanghai on a tour that includes a comprehensive cookery class. Pleasure your palate with local specialties like wontons, fried pot stickers and the city’s renowned ‘xiaolongbao’ (soup dumplings) as you discover enticing food stands with a knowledgeable guide. Uncover the secrets of Chinese cookery in a cooking class after your tour and learn to make delicious 'har gow’ (steamed dim sum shrimp dumplings), feasting on the fruits of your labor on completion. Receive personalized attention from your guide on this small-group tour, where numbers are limited to just 10 people.
events.name: Experience Shanghai: Dumpling Cooking Class and Tasting Tour

events.description: On 9-hour this private tour, combine visits to the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall and the Huanghucheng Waterside Great Wall with transportation in between. Ride a cable car or ski lift to the top of the wall and spend two hours hiking, then take a toboggan down. Lunch and hotel pickup and drop-off within Beijing's 4th Ring Road included.
events.name: All-Inclusive Private Day Trip to Mutianyu and Huanghuacheng Water Great Wall

events.description: Skip the taxi hassles and check off two UNESCO World Heritage Sites—the two signature sights of imperial China—on this guided door-to-door tour that’s tailor-made for first-time visitors. See Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City, have lunch in a local restaurant, then explore a silk factory and a traditional tea house. Spend the afternoon at the Great Wall at Mutianyu, a popular, well-restored section that’s easy to walk on.
events.name: Mutianyu Great Wall and Forbidden City Day Tour in Beijing

events.description: Combine your West Lake sightseeing with an evening of traditional performances when you book tickets to the Enduring Memories of Hangzhou show. This outdoor, evening event uses the UNESCO-listed West Lake—one of China’s most beautiful bodies of water—as a backdrop, and combines dance, opera, singing, and other cultural highlights. Book your tickets before you travel to secure your seats and prevent any hassles.
events.name: Impression West Lake Show Ticket

events.description: Maximize your limited time in Xi’an on a private tour. Customize the tour duration, along with the pickup and drop-off points, based on your schedule. With so much flexibility, the tour is a perfect way to begin or end your stay in the Xi’an.  Private transportation allows you to complete your itinerary comfortably and efficiently. Enjoy guided visits to the Terracotta Warriors Museums and other attractions of your choosing.
events.name: Private Day Tour with Airport Transfer: Xi'an Terracotta Warriors & Horses Museum and City Wall

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/6977P132/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: All Inclusive Suzhou Highlight Tour with Boat Ride and Lunch

events.description: Make the journey from Shanghai to Shanghai Disney Resort simple and stress-free when you book a private transfer service. Meet your driver directly at your Shanghai hotel, and travel in the comfort of a modern, air-conditioned vehicle. If you book the round-trip option, your driver will also meet you at the end of your magical day out, and can whisk you right back to your hotel.
events.name: Private Transfer between Shanghai Disneyland and City Hotel

events.description: Visit some of Lantau Island’s most well-known and intriguing spots all in one day on this 7-hour tour. Make your way by cable car up to Big Buddha (Tian Tan Buddha), where you can choose to go up the 268 steps to the top. Then, head over to the village of Tai O to see a Taoist temple and two remaining shrimp sauce production factories. Stop for lunch at a UNESCO site, and take a boat ride by stilt houses built right on the water.
events.name: Full Day Lantau Island Small Group Tour in Hong Kong

events.description: When you reach port in Shanghai, you have an entire city to explore, but with a language barrier and numerous tour options, it's tough to know where to begin. Get the most out of Shanghai with this private tour, where your personal English-speaking guide leads you to the city's most celebrated sights, introduces you to local cuisine, and helps you customize the itinerary. With this tour, spend your time however you want, to make your visit truly special.
events.name: Private Shore Excursion of Customized Shanghai City Highlights with Lunch

events.description: Discover Harbin’s top winter attractions on a private 2-day tour. You stay nice in cozy with all-inclusive private transportation from your hotel.  Join your guide for a detailed and intimate look at the downtown area. See the Ice Lantern Show, Siberian tigers, snow sculptures, and more.  You also have the flexibility to customize the schedule based on your personal interests. Whatever you choose, enjoy the personal attention of your private guide at all times.
events.name: 2-Day Harbin City Private Tour in Your Way in Winter Season

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/37001P119/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Form Xi'an To Luoyang LongmenGrottoes and ShaolinTemple Day Tour by Bullet Train

events.description: Combine visits to Chengdu Tianfu Square, the Leshan Giant Buddha, and the Chengdu Panda Breeding Base in one full-day tour from Chengdu. Pickup and drop-off at select Chengdu hotels included.
events.name: Day Tour: Chengdu Panda Breeding Base and Leshan Giant Buddha

events.description: It’s a matter of debate which of Suzhou and Zhouzhuang really counts as the Venice of the East. But after this fabulous private door-to-door (or port-to-port) tour you’re bound to have an opinion. Spend the morning in Suzhou, exploring the Master-of-Nets Garden, Suzhou No. 1 Silk Mill, and Panmen Gate. After a restaurant lunch, admire Zhouzhuang’s scenic bridges, lanes, and canals on foot and by gondola.
events.name: Private Day Excursion to Suzhou and ZhouZhuang Water Village from Shanghai

events.description: Sprawling across 743 acres (301 hectares) of lake and garden, the Summer Palace was designed to keep the imperial court entertained through Beijing’s long, hot summers. So it’s well worth taking a private guide to steer you to the highlights of this vast expanse. Beat the long lines by pre-booking this convenient door-to-door tour that includes Nanhu Island, Longevity Hill, the Tower of Buddhist Incense, and shopping.
events.name: Half Day Private Tour to Summer Palace in Beijing

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/198514P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Best Food & Culture Hong Kong (Tailor-made & Private)

events.description: The countryside around Xiamen is known for its tulou clusters, ancient circular buildings built by rural Hakka Chinese communities centuries ago. Visit a few of these remarkable Chinese landmarks and immerse yourself in the life and rhythms of rural China, far from the crowded Xiamen city streets, on this day trip into the heart of Fujian Province. Visit the Tianluokeng tulou cluster and the impressive five-story Yuchanglou, and take a leisurely walk through the riverside village of Taxia.
events.name: Private Day Tour Tianluokeng Tulou Cluster And Taxia Village From Xiamen

events.description: Many travelers assume that once they’ve seen one section of the Great Wall of China, they’ve seen it all, not realizing that each section is distinctive. Visit three of the world wonder’s most impressive sections on a private, self-guided full day tour of the Huanghuacheng, Xiangshuihu, and Mutianyu sections from Beijing. Relish the convenience of pickup and drop-off and enjoy hiking through the lush landscapes that surround each part of the Great Wall.
events.name: Private Great Wall Fancier's Day Tour: 3 Sections of Great Wall Visiting

events.description: Absorb the mammoth magnificence of the world’s largest stone Buddha statue on a private full-day tour of the Grand Buddha of Leshan from Chengdu. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, marvel at the colossal size of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed monument and take an illuminated journey down trails that weave around the structure. Visit ancient Buddhist temples and satisfy an appetite for authenticity with a flavorsome Chinese lunch in a local restaurant. Enjoy the convenience of round-trip transportation from your Chengdu hotel on this enriching excursion.
events.name: Private Tour: Day Trip to the Leshan Grand Buddha from Chengdu

events.description: Nestled in Shanghai’s Old French Concession are a plethora of eateries selling noodles and wonton. Seek out the best backstreet hotspots on a 2.5-hour food tour that covers three critically-acclaimed restaurants, all renowned for distinctive noodle dishes as well as some local beer. Vegetarian options and a choice of departure times are available on this small-group tour, limited to seven food lovers.
events.name: Secret Noodle and Wonton in Shanghai Alleyways with Local Beer

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/67316P47/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Day Trip to Suzhou from Shanghai by Bullet Train

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/177296P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Forbidden City Tickets (Main Entrance)

events.description: The Forbidden City is one of the most evocative destinations in all of China, reminiscent of great emperors and China's illustrious past. Go beyond the typical attractions within the City on this comprehensive 6-hour guided tour, which includes access to the Imperial Library, Treasure Rooms (The Antiquarium), and more. Lunch at the former Icehouse is also included.
events.name: Forbidden City with Royal Icehouse Dining Experience

events.description: If you’ve got limited time in China, the last thing you want to do is waste precious vacation time organizing transport and activities. Let a guide do the hard work for you on a private 3-day tour of Beijing, which covers highlights such as the Ming Tombs (Ming Shisan Ling), the Great Wall at Mutianyu, and Tiananmen Square (Tiananmen Guangchang). All entrance fees, select meals, and daily hotel pickup and drop-off are included for added convenience.
events.name: 3-Day Private Beijing Sightseeing Tour with Peking Duck, Hot Pot plus Optional Show

events.description: Set out in the evening with an expert guide and your own tuk-tuk driver to find the best dinner dishes in Chengdu on this tour. Explore pedestrian alleyways, hidden parks, and small temples where you visit favorite local eateries. Experience Chengdu's cuisine and culture by eating at the same places that local people do.
events.name: Chengdu Evening Food Tour by Tuk-Tuk

events.description: Escape to a more tranquil area of China during this tour of Hangzhou highlights, including round-trip transport and lunch. Take a boat across the UNESCO World Heritage Site, West Lake, and then explore Guo’s Garden. Stop for a meal at a tea farmer’s house, and watch a traditional Chinese tea ceremony at the Longjing Green Tea Plantation and Village (Meijiawu). Walk a bamboo-lined pathway in the Yungi Valley, and end your tour exploring Qinghefang Old Street.
events.name: All-Inclusive Hangzhou Highlights Tour with Boat Ride and Lunch

events.description: Visit the world-renowned Terracotta Warriors Army and Horses Museum and the Big Wild Goose Pagoda on a full-day private tour in Xi’an. Marvel at the UNESCO World Heritage-listed mausoleum complex that contains thousands of Terracotta Warriors and other life-sized statues. Then, discover the significance of Big Wild Goose Pagoda, a Buddhist structure that dates to the Tang Dynasty. Travel with a private guide who can customize your day to your interests. Includes lunch and hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: Xi'an Private Tour: Terracotta Warriors and Big Wild Goose Pagoda Day Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/136181P24/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Amazing Guangzhou Golden City Tour and Pearl River Night Cruise

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/36522P64/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Flexible One Day Suzhou Private Tour with Lunch or Dinner

events.description: Explore the treasures of Xi’an on a two-day journey by train from Beijing. Part of the Silk Road and a former ancient capital of China, Xi’an is home to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Terracotta Warriors, where you spend several hours taking in the vast site. Your guide also shows you the well-preserved old city wall, the vibrant Muslim Quarter, Xi’an Museum and Small Wild Goose Pagoda as you travel around the city. Your tour includes one night of accommodation, round-trip train tickets and three meals.
events.name: Two-Day Xi'an Trip by High-Speed Train from Beijing:Terracotta Warriors, City Wall and Dumpling Banquet

events.description: Perfect for visitors short on time, this efficient, half-day visit covers China’s iconic terracotta army—the world’s largest ancient burial site—topped off by a tasty local lunch. Tours include private hotel pickup, so you can skip the hassle of navigating the city. Get detailed history and background from your group guide while getting a peek at thousands of clay warriors along with the mysterious mausoleum of Qin Shi Huang.
events.name: Mini Group: Half-Day Xi'an Terracotta Warriors Discovery Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/32685P183/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Chimelong Circus Show with Private Transfer in Guangzhou

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/32685P181/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Day Tour to Chimelong Safari Park in Guangzhou

events.description: The language barrier can make just getting from A to B in China an epic adventure. Take it easy on yourself with a private guide to accompany you from your door to Mount Huangshan’s most beautiful views—and back. Ride the cable car up the mountain, capture timeless images of the Greeting Pine, Xihai Grand Canyon, Lion Peak, and more, then savor a Chinese lunch in a mountain-top hotel.
events.name: All-Inclusive Private Tour: Huangshan Mountain Exploration With Round-Trip Cable Car

events.description: Lantau is known for its scenery and wildlife, but experiencing its top attractions in just 1 day can be tricky or costly. Tick off several highlights on a tour that includes skip-the-line access to the Ngong Ping 360, vegetarian lunch at Po Lin Monastery, and a scenic boat ride from Tai O. Enjoy seamless round-trip transfer between dispersed locations by private coach and gain insight into the region from your guide’s commentary.
events.name: Private Tour: Lantau Island Crystal Cabin Cable Car and Tai O Village Boat Ride

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/16270P53/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Beijing Transfer Service: Jinshanling Great Wall Round-Trip

events.description: Gain a more intimate insight into village life and Chinese minority cultures with a private tour of the Dragon’s Backbone Rice Terraces. Your private guide will explain the traditions of Yao and Zhuang people before you visit Huangluo village. Next, drive to Ping’an village to trek to two of the most beautiful rice-terrace views. After lunch, your driver will drop you back to your hotel.
events.name: One Day Private Longshen Rice Terraces Tour Including Lunch

events.description: Immerse yourself in Shanghai’s rich culinary traditions, and learn how to cook some of the city’s highlight dishes, on this private, half-day tour. Meet your chef-guide directly at your hotel, and head to a Shanghai wet market, where fresh produce, seafood, and other ingredients are sold. After shopping, head to a local house and learn how to cook a traditional, 3-course meal. Finally, sit down to enjoy your feast.
events.name: Private Wet Market Visit with Cooking Class in Shanghai

events.description: Perfect for first-time visitors, this in-depth, multi-day tour hits all the highlights of Beijing, from the Forbidden City to the Beijing Zoo. Entrance fees, lunch, and private vehicle transfers are all included, so you’ll be free to focus on sightseeing. Head to the rugged, under-the-radar Mutianyu Great Wall, and opt to catch a live acrobatic show. You’ll also enjoy a scenic rickshaw ride through Beijing’s traditional quarters.
events.name: All-Inclusive Private 3-Day Beijing Highlight Tour with Optional Evening Show

events.description: Explore the historic city of Datong and its surrounds without any mandatory factory stops or shopping excursions on this private, customizable two-day tour. Drive from Beijing to Datong with your private driver and visit a range of ancient landmarks and monuments, including the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Yungang Grottoes and the Hanging Temple. Choose between a self-guided tour and a tour package with your own private guide to show you around and explain the history and culture of Shanxi province in greater detail.
events.name: Private Transfer Service: 2-Day Datong from Beijing

events.description: Even if you have only a short time in China, you can still see the majestic Terracotta Warriors and Horses Museum. Just book this private guided Xian day tour from Shanghai by plane, with door-to-door round-trip airport transfers at both ends. Besides the warriors, there’s time for a taster of downtown Xian: the impressive medieval city wall, the diverse food zone called the Muslim Quarter, and perhaps some shopping too.
events.name: Private 1 Day Xian Tour from Shanghai by Flight

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/111889P15/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 9 Day Tour Beijing, Xian, Chengdu - From Great Wall to Great Pandas!

events.description: When your cruise ship drops anchor at Tianjin Cruise Port, make the most of your time in China on a private 2-day shore excursion to Beijing and the Great Wall of China. With a personal guide, you’ll tick off top Beijing attractions such as Tiananmen Square (Tiananmen Guangchang), Summer Palace (Yiheyuan), and the Forbidden City (Imperial Palace). Plus, you’ll also visit the Great Wall of China, one of the New7Wonders of the World. Port pickup and drop-off, entrance fees, and two lunches are included. Please note, accommodation is not included.
events.name: Shore Excursion: 2-Day Private Beijing Sightseeing Tour from Tianjin Cruise Port

events.description: Make the absolute most of Beijing on this 2-day private tour, the perfect introduction for first-time visitors. On day one, tour Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City, the Temple of Heaven, and the Summer Palace. The next day, experience the Great Wall of China, the Ming Tombs, and a tea ceremony. Tour includes lunch, entrance fees, Great Wall cable car ride, and door-to-door round-trip transfers: Accommodation is at your own expense.
events.name: 2-Day Private Beijing Highlight Tour with Great Wall and Optional Evening Show

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/135075P10/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Shanghai Disneyland Tickets&Transfer service

events.description: See some of the beauty Zhujiajiao has to offer with this 8-hour tour of the water town, and then end your night watching an acrobat show in Shanghai. Wander along the canal in Zhujiajiao, and take in beautiful views of the garden homes and scenery before going on a boat ride. Then see acrobats perform dances and martial arts moves in this fun show.
events.name: Zhujiajiao Private Day Tour and Shanghai Acrobatic Show

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/3675P74/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: HK Airport to Hotel - Private Arrival Transfer by Mercedes Benz & Meet and Greet

events.description: Rather than visiting attractions designed for tourists, explore Hong Kong like a local on a private tour designed to provide insider knowledge to first-time visitors. Opting for a private tour means that you can customize your itinerary according to your interests, whether they lie in food and fashion, or culture and history. Plus, you stray from the beaten path and visit local markets, lesser-known temples, and the most globally diverse part of Kowloon.
events.name: Private Full Day Hong Kong Insider Tour

events.description: Enjoy personalized attention and a flexible itinerary on this private tour of Mt. Huashan. Complete with private round-trip transportation from Xi'an, this tour, led by a dedicated guide, will show you and your private party the highlights of the region, including the scenic vistas and ancient temples. Take the cable car up the mountain while your guide explains the religious, historic, and cultural significance of the mountain.
events.name: Private Day Tour of Mt. Huashan with Round-Trip Cable Car from Xi'an

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/86340P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Gulong Canyon Grand Glass Skywalk Bridge Tour

events.description: At over 230 feet tall (70 meters), the 1,300-year-old Leshan Giant Buddha is the largest Buddha in the world and attracts visitors from around the globe. Keep yourself from getting lost in the crowds of this UNESCO-listed attraction by visiting with the comfort and convenience of a private tour, which includes informative commentary, transportation from your hotel, and a side-trip to a local fishing village. This tour also includes all entrance fees, high-speed train tickets, and lunch.
events.name: Private Tour: Leshan Giant Buddha and Fishing Village from Chengdu

events.description: Experience the mountainous beauty of Zhangjiajie National Forest Park during a full-day tour with a private guide. Head into Wulingyuan Scenic Area and ride a cable car up Tianzi Mountain, glimpsing the Wuling Mountains. Upon arrival, explore trails on the mountain and have lunch at a restaurant before continuing over to the Yuanjiajie Scenic Area. Visit lookout points such as First Bridge under Heaven and a place seen in the movie ‘Avatar,’ then enjoy a spine-tingling descent of 1100 feet (335 meters) in the glass Bailong Elevator.
events.name: Full-Day Zhangjiajie National Forest Park Tour: Tianzi Mountain and Yuanjiajie

events.description: Discover Hong Kong in double-quick time on this convenient guided coach tour that includes skip-the-line access to the Peak Tram: perfect for first-time visitors and anyone who’s pressed for time. Visit Aberdeen Fishing Village and Tse Sui Luen jewelry factory, shop for souvenirs at Stanley Market, and leave with a ticket for the Rickshaw Sightseeing Bus. Tour includes door-to-door round-trip transportation from selected hotels.
events.name: Morning Tour -Deluxe Hong Kong Island Tour with Hotel Pickup in Hong Kong Island

events.description: See the Terracotta Warriors and your choice of two other Xian highlights on a private custom tour. After a morning visit to see the UNESCO-listed terracotta army, visit two attractions chosen from the six recommended: Shaanxi or Banpo Museum, Xian City Wall, the Big Wild Goose Pagoda, Bell Tower and Drum Tower Square, or Muslim Street. With no time-consuming shopping stops, this flexible tour includes private transport and downtown Xian hotel pickup and drop-off.
events.name: Private Customizable Terracotta Warriors Day Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/104438P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Wuhan Private Ordered One-day Tour

events.description: No China trip would be complete without watching one of the nation’s spectacular acrobatics performances, and for popular shows like this one it’s smart to book tickets in advance. With this convenient package, marvel at the agility and strength of the Shanghai Acrobatic Troupe as they blend circus skills, martial arts, magic and more into a mesmerizing evening. When you finish, your private driver awaits you at the door.
events.name: Shanghai Acrobatic Show Ticket with Private Transfer

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/7137P110/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Transfer: Hotel to Shanghai Cruise Terminal (Wusongkou or Shanghai Port)

events.description: Uncover the mysterious colonial culture of former Portuguese city, Macau, on a full-day sightseeing tour led by a knowledgeable guide. See legendary landmarks like the atmospheric Ruins of St. Paul and the sacred A-Ma Temple, both UNESCO World Heritage sites. Marvel at modern wonders like opulent Macau Casino and the Guia Circuit and experience a holistic picture of the spectacular city. Revitalize with an international buffet lunch and enjoy the convenience of round-trip transportation from selected Macau hotels.
events.name: Macau City Sightseeing Tour

events.description: Don’t let your evening flight get in the way of you exploring some of Beijing’s iconic landmarks on this full-day layover tour. Drive from your Beijing International Airport terminal direct to the restored Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China, with a private driver, private vehicle and terminal pick-up all included. Hike up the Wall and marvel at the scenic views, then head to the Forbidden City for an afternoon among the grand buildings, courtyards, and gardens.
events.name: Layover Tour to Mutianyu Great Wall&Forbidden city with English Speaking Driver

events.description: Theater lovers—this one’s for you. Enjoy a mesmerizing event at Sichuan’s Shu Feng Ya Yun Opera House. Roundtrip transportation is provided (hotels within 3rd ring road), and you’ll save time waiting in long visitor lines by having entrance tickets included. The show itself will showcase the best of Sichuan opera, including a face-changing show, puppet shows, comedy, music, and dance. During the show, you’ll be provided with a tea service and a small snack.
events.name: Best Sichuan Opera Show in Chengdu

events.description: Celebrate an evening in Beijing in imperial style with this 4-hour dinner and evening sightseeing experience. Travel by private vehicle to the famous Bai Jia Da Yuan restaurant, housed in a Qing-era palace surrounded by exotic gardens. Enjoy an imperial-inspired dinner entertained by live Chinese opera cameos, and then enjoy a sightseeing drive around some of Beijing’s top landmarks. Finish with a tour of lively, lakeside Houhai street, including a bar stop for a beer.
events.name: Beijing Imperial Dining Experience at Bai Jia Da Yuan Restaurant with Houhai Lake Bar Tour

events.description: Visit one of China’s “Five Greatest Mountains,” Mount Hua, on an all-day guided adventure from Xian. After a convenient hotel pickup, travel by private vehicle with an English-speaking guide. Enjoy a cable car ride, hike the mountain’s narrow paths, admire its five peaks, and learn about its important religious history before returning to your hotel.
events.name: Private Customizable Day Tour of Mountain Huashan with Entrance Cable Shuttle Fee

events.description: Visit the World Heritage-listed Great Wall of China at Mutianyu and Ming Tombs on a private full-day tour from Beijing. Travel with your guide in a comfortable private vehicle to the Great Wall at Mutianyu, a less-visited section of the Great Wall. Take the cable car round-trip and admire expansive views over the Great Wall and forested surroundings. After lunch at a local restaurant, visit the Ming Tombs, the royal burial complex for the Yongle Emperor (who also built the Forbidden City), before retiring to Beijing.
events.name: Private Tour to Mutianyu Great Wall and Ming Tombs from Beijing

events.description: Discover the rich history of Nanjing without the language barrier as you explore with a private guide and driver on this comprehensive door-to-door tour. See the Sun Yat-Sen Mausoleum, stroll the Sacred Way, climb on the ancient city wall, and enjoy a restaurant lunch. After you’ve dined, follow in the paths of emperors on a Qinhuai River cruise and explore bustling Fuzi Miao, the Confucian Temple Area.
events.name: All Inclusive Private Nanjing Classic Day Tour with Qinhuai River Boat Ride

events.description: Discover the charming delights of Zhujiajiao, a wonderful water town with an ancient origin, on this full-day private tour from Shanghai. Relish the freedom and flexibility of a private guide and tailor the itinerary according to your interests; gain insight into the town’s 1,700-year history and admire antiquated architecture, tranquil canals and crumbling bridges. Pleasure your palate with local specialties at authentic restaurants and enjoy convenient round-trip transportation from your Shanghai hotel in a private vehicle.
events.name: Private Tour: Zhujiajiao Water Town from Shanghai

events.description: At night, Shanghai’s space-age skyline ignites the city in a riot of color. Soak up this special evening ambiance on a 4-hour night tour including a ferry ride on the Huangpu River. Sample Chinese delicacies on the Huanghe Road Food Street, marvel at the neon-lit skyscrapers of Nanjing Lu (Nanjing Road), and see The Bund (Waitan), Shanghai’s grand historic center, illuminated by night. Several food samples are included on this small-group tour, limited to 12 people.
events.name: Half Day Private Tour: The Shanghai Evening Adventure w/Huangpu River Cruise

events.description: Enjoy an authentic cultural experience during a private tea ceremony in Shanghai. Alongside a respected master of tea, succumb to serenity as you relax with melodious music, fragrant incense and soothing tea made from rare tealeaves. Learn about the cultural significance of the beverage with your English-speaking guide and educate your palate to the delicate and distinctive flavors of different tea types. Sample varieties of black, oolong, Pu-erh and green tea then perform the tea ritual to cement your newly acquired skills.
events.name: Experience Shanghai: Private Tea Ceremony Tour

events.description: Get straight to the highlights of Gulangyu Island, the UNESCO World Heritage Site that’s Xiamen’s most popular attraction, on this private half-day tour. Relax as your private guide and driver collect you from your hotel (or ship) and escort you to the ferry port at a time that suits your schedule. From there, soak up the island’s colonial architecture and timeless landscapes, as well as the signature Shuzhuang Garden.
events.name: Xiamen Private Half Day Tour of Gulangyu Island and Shuzhuang Garden

events.description: Set out with an expert guide and your own tuk-tuk driver to find the best dishes in Xi'an. Explore hidden streets and quaint alleyways within Xian’s city walls where you visit favorite local eateries. Experience Xi’an's cuisine and culture by eating at the same places that local people go, with unlimited food and beverages (including beer) included during your tour. Sample the only craft beer brewed in Xi’an when you stop at a local brewery.
events.name: Xi'an Evening Food Tour by TukTuk

events.description: Discover a side of Shanghai it takes a local to know on this private foodie walking tour. Explore main streets and back lanes as you snack and slurp on delicacies like soup dumplings, roast duck, and mango pudding—enough for a full meal. Finally, enjoy a Shanghai classic: a Huangpu river cruise.
events.name: Private Shanghai Evening Street Food Walking and Cruise Tour

events.description: Maximize time exploring the Great Wall with this full-day private tour. Get picked up at your hotel in Beijing and travel to the Huanghuacheng Great Wall. Hike along the wall independently and take photos during free time. Customize the start time of the private tour according to your schedule.
events.name: Private Trip to Huanghuacheng Great Wall With Speaking-English Driver

events.description: Join a full-day guided tour from Tokyo that travels to Mt Fuji, then continues to nearby Lake Ashi and the Mt Komagatake Ropeway. Enjoy the ease of comfortable transportation and a knowledgeable guide, who will accompany you to the revered Mt Fuji's 5th Station. Take a short boat cruise on Lake Ashi and climb by aerial tram to the top of Mt Komagatake for views of Mt Fuji. Return to Tokyo by bullet train in the evening after taking in some of Japan’s iconic highlights.
events.name: Mt Fuji, Hakone, Lake Ashi Cruise and Bullet Train Day Trip from Tokyo

events.description: Discover Tokyo's must-see landmarks on this full-day coach tour including a cruise along the Tokyo Bay. Drive past the National Theater and other major attractions en route to the Imperial Palace East Garden for a stroll. Then explore the sights of Asakusa, including Senso-ji Temple, with commentary from an audio guide. Hop aboard a short cruise on Tokyo Bay. Opt to include a buffet lunch if you’d like, with views of the Bay and the Rainbow Bridge from your seat.
events.name: 1-Day Tokyo Bus Tour

events.description: Spend a day exploring Mount Fuji and the area around it with this private, fully customizable tour. Your English-speaking driver will pick you up from your central Tokyo hotel and take you to spots such as the Sengen Shrine Complex, Kawaguchiko Lake, the Kachi Kachi Ropeway, Oshino Hakkai, and a trip up to the Mount Fuji Fifth Station, if weather permits.
events.name: 1 Day Private Mt Fuji Tour (Charter) - English Speaking Driver

events.description: Enjoy sightseeing near Japan’s iconic Mt. Fuji, including a Lake Ashi cruise and visit to Mt. Komagatake during this full-day trip by coach from Tokyo. See the celebrated Mt. Fuji during a stop at its famous 5th Station, then take a laid-back boat cruise on beautiful Lake Ashi before touring Mt. Komagatake’s ropeway and summit, offering amazing views of nearby Hakone National Park. This full-day excursion also includes all entrance fees, free WiFi on the bus, a guide, lunch, and pickup from select Tokyo hotels.
events.name: Mt Fuji, Hakone, Lake Ashi Cruise 1 Day Bus Trip from Tokyo

events.description: This guided tour helps you discover lots of Kyoto’s dispersed temples, shrines, and cultural attractions in one day. Save time researching and planning your trip, by having the itinerary organized for you. Travel in an air-conditioned coach for a hassle-free day. Highlights include Kiyomizu-Dera Temple, Fushimi Inari Shrine, Sagano Bamboo Forest, and Tenryuji Temple.
events.name: Kyoto Cultural Forest, Shrine and Temple Tour with Options

events.description: Book the one-of-the-kind Robot Restaurant Cabaret Show in Tokyo featuring special discount! Take the whole family to a spectacle of robotic monsters, neon-clad dancers, and high energy music with this 90-minute matinee performance of the robot cabaret show in Tokyo. You'll be transported to a crazy, Japanese anime-style future, populated by whimsical dancing robots, bright lights, and body-moving techno music. This product is featuring the matinee show time starting at 4 pm in the afternoon which is perfect for families traveling with young children. You also have option for different show time starting at 5:55pm, 5:50pm and 9:45pm!
events.name: Tokyo Robot Restaurant Show Ticket

events.description: See the highlights of Kyoto on a full-day tour from Tokyo. Learn about the history of the region from your guide as you visit top attractions including Mt Fuji, Fushimi Inari Taisha, Sanjusangen-do Hall, and Kiyomizu-dera Temple. Enjoy a delicious lunch in Kyoto, and take a round-trip ride on the super-speed bullet train.
events.name: 1-Day Kyoto Rail Tour by Bullet Train from Tokyo

events.description: Eat, train and fight like a real Japanese sumo wrestler during this sumo demonstration and authentic ‘Chanko Nabe’ (hotpot) lunch. Discover the history, training and rules behind the typical sumo match as you watch three real clashes. You can even try it yourself during a skirmish with a retired wrestler. Once you’ve worked up an appetite, dig into a tasty Chanko Nabe lunch, a filling meal of hotpot, rice, miso, salad, French fries and more, used by these hulking fighters to gain weight. Admission to the demonstration and lunch are both covered.
events.name: Challenge Sumo Wrestlers and Enjoy a Chanko Lunch

events.description: Travel to Mt Fuji’s 5th Station, situated at an elevation of 7,545 feet (2,300 meters) on the UNESCO-listed mountain. This coach tour departs Tokyo’s Shinjuku Station for a full-day itinerary that includes stops at Lake Kawaguchi and Oshino Hakkai in the Fuji Five Lakes district. Snap a photo with a ninja at the Oshino Ninja Village and experience unforgettable 4D views on the Fuji Airways flight simulator. Opt to include a Japanese-style lunch if you’d like.
events.name: 1-Day Mt Fuji Bus Tour with 4-D Mt.Fuji movie Ride and Ninja Experience

events.description: Experience the magic of Studio Ghibli during an enchanting tour to the Ghibli Museum and Edo-Tokyo Open Air Architecture Museum. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, gain insight into the history of the magical movies during the comfortable journey to Mitaka, and then set out to explore the Ghibli Museum independently. Convenient transportation from Tokyo is included on this tour, as well as entrance fees and lunch. On Mondays, your visit to Edo-Tokyo Open Air Architecture Museum will be substituted by a visit to Jindaiji Temple or Takahata Fudoson Temple.
events.name: Tokyo Studio Ghibli Museum and Ghibli Film Appreciation Tour including Lunch

events.description: When in Tokyo, don't miss an evening of awesome entertainment at the Robot Restaurant. Located in the Kabukicho red-light district, Robot Restaurant puts on an eclectic cabaret show with performances full of flashing lights, taiko drums, and techno music. Experience a fun, and sometimes campy, neon-lit show where glitzy ladies dance with dinosaurs, ninjas, a giant panda, and (of course) robots.
events.name: Tokyo Robot Entertainment Show

events.description: This will be a tour you never forget. You'll get to choose a costume from a wide selection of sizes and styles, based on comics, games, and anime characters. You won’t have to worry about getting lost, as your guide will lead the way, and give a full safety briefing at the start. Drive past top attractions such as Rainbow Bridge, Tokyo Tower, Roppongi, and Shibuya Crossing. A fun and memorable way to tour Tokyo.
events.name: Official Street Go-Kart Tour - Shinagawa Shop

events.description: Enhance your experience of Nikko National Park on an enriching full-day excursion from Tokyo. Feast your eyes upon breathtaking countryside, sacred shrines, and stunning temples as you explore the region with an accomplished guide. Visit Toshogu Shrine, a UNESCO World Heritage site dedicated to Shinto worship, and hear about the structure’s fascinating history. Opt for the upgrade to pleasure your palate with a traditional Japanese lunch, and then absorb the natural splendor of Lake Chuzenji and Kegon Falls. Plus, enjoy the convenience of round-trip transportation from Tokyo on this comprehensive tour.
events.name: Nikko 1-Day Bus Tour :World Heritage of Nikko Toshogu,Lake Chuzenji,Kegon Falls

events.description: Discover Tokyo at your own pace on this 4- or 8-hour private, custom tour with guide. Design a tour that’s perfect for your interests. There’s a world of options, including the outer fish market at Tsukiji, the city’s temples and shrines, shopping excursions and food or sake tours. Your private custom tour includes a guide, entrance fees at select attractions, snacks, round-trip transport from your hotel with meet-and-greet and a car (for the private transfer option), or public transport (for the public transfer) and optional lunch (for the full-day tour).
events.name: Private Custom Tour: Tokyo in a Day

events.description: Enjoy a comprehensive tour of Tokyo, covering its best gardens, temples, shopping areas and a Tokyo Bay cruise over the course of a day. Check out Meiji Temple, the city’s most famous Shinto site before visiting the Imperial Palace and Tokyo’s oldest Buddhist site, Asakusa Kannon Temple (Senso-ji). You’ll also get to do some shopping in Tokyo’s Nakamise before enjoying a 40 minute cruise on Tokyo Bay. This Tokyo excursion also includes a guide, coach transport, entrance fees and lunch.
events.name: Tokyo Panoramic : Meiji Shrine,Asakusa Temple,Tokyo Bay Cruise & Odaiba Day Tour

events.description: Discover the history and religions of ancient Japan during this full-day exploration of Kyoto and Nara. See Kyoto’s UNESCO World Heritage-listed Kinkaku-ji and Nijo Castle, along with its Imperial Palace. Then drive from Kyoto to Nara to explore its own World Heritage site, Todai-ji Temple (including Great Buddha Hall), plus Kasuga Shrine. You’ll also visit Nara’s deer park and sample a Japanese and Western-style meal for lunch. Your Nara and Kyoto visit also includes a guide, coach transport and all entrance fees.
events.name: Kyoto and Nara 1 Day Trip - Golden Pavilion & Todai-ji Temple from Kyoto

events.description: See the historical highlights of Hiroshima on a comprehensive full-day tour from Osaka. Ride on the super-speed bullet train to Hiroshima then board a boat to the idyllic Miyajima Island, home to the splendid Itsukishima Shrine. Return to Hiroshima to feel emotionally stirred by the magnificent Hirsohima Peace Memorial Park and Museum, in which intriguing exhibitions speak eloquently of the atomic bomb dropped on the city in 1945. Fully immerse yourself in Japan’s fascinating culture during this enriching excursion. Enjoy convenient transportation from a central Osaka location on this tour.
events.name: Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and Miyajima Island,Itsukushima shrine from Osaka

events.description: Witness one of Japan’s most iconic cultural expressions at an exhilarating sumo tournament in Tokyo. Set the scene before the tournament by visiting the informative Sumo Museum to see fascinating collections of memorabilia then feel the energizing pre-match atmosphere on the subway as you ride to the ‘kokugikan’ (sumo amphitheater) to see a selection of atmospheric sumo matches. Enhance your experience by upgrading to include a delicious dinner of traditional Japanese dishes at a local restaurant.
events.name: Tokyo Grand Sumo Tournament Viewing Tour

events.description: Take a deep dive into the world of Japanese seafood during this tour of the outer Tsukiji Fish Market. Rub shoulders with Michelin-starred chefs as they shop for ingredients at this sprawling, 80-year-old market for all things aquatic. Investigate the various stalls selling fish, shellfish, and everything in between, and sample Japanese favorites such as sushi, dried bonito, fresh Tuna, and sake. A local guide and all food on the tour are included.
events.name: Tsukiji Fish Market Food and Culture Walking Tour

events.description: Visit a sumo training center in Tokyo to observe the morning practice. Spend approximately two hours watching the sumo wrestlers train and observe the rules and regulations of sumo. It’s a rare chance for visitors to glimpse this exclusive world, and a fascinating window into a Japanese tradition.
events.name: Watch Morning Practice at a Sumo Stable in Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/130384P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 1 day private charter Mt Fuji and Hakone trip with English speaking Guide

events.description: Skip the hassle of waiting for others and spending too long at places of little interest on this private tour of Tokyo. In the company of just your party and a driver, you have the flexibility to customize your time to your own interests. Enjoy hassle-free pickup from your hotel and explore Tokyo at your own pace, spending as long as you wish at such landmarks as the Meiji Shrine, Imperial Palace, and Tsukiji Fish Market.
events.name: Tokyo Private Tour by Car / Van - Guide Option Available

events.description: Combine the cultural delights and delectable bites of Tokyo on this 3-hour food tour of Japan’s capital. Accompanied by a guide, delve into the culinary scene of the city by visiting several popular bars and restaurants. Sample local specialties like succulent grilled meat skewers, sweet cakes and refreshing sake. Deepen your knowledge of Japanese culinary and cultural traditions and enjoy personalized attention from your guide on this small-group tour limited to 12 people.
events.name: Tokyo by Night: Japanese Food Tour

events.description: Take a deep dive into traditional Japanese culture and history during this full-day trip to Kyoto and Nara from Osaka. Enjoy the atmosphere of Kyoto’s Arashiyama district and admire the beautiful grounds of the Kinkaku-ji temple. Then head to Nara and see the wild deer of Nara Park. Multiple pickup points and lunch upgrade options are available.
events.name: Day Trip by Bus to Kyoto and Nara from Osaka

events.description: Travel round-trip from Kyoto by high-speed bullet train to take in Hiroshima's historic sites, including exhibits about the 1945 atomic bomb that devastated the city. Start your visit on a lighter note, traveling by boat to Miyajima, a famously beautiful island that is home to the revered Itsukushima Shrine. Have lunch there, then return to the city to visit the Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and Museum. Your expert guide shares important details about Hiroshima's heartbreaking history and remarkable recovery throughout this unforgettable tour.
events.name: Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and Miyajima Island,Itsukushima shrine from Kyoto

events.description: Choose your own adventure with this self-guided, 3-day ski package at Zao Astrea Resort in the Yamagata Prefecture. Three nights and four days of skiing, snowboarding, and accommodations in the Astoria hotel included. Breakfast and dinner on three days, as well as transfer from the bus station, are also provided.
events.name: 3-Night Self-Guided Ski Package at Zao Astrea Resort Hotel in Yamagata

events.description: Find the best viewpoints on this private tour from Tokyo via minivan. Choose between visiting Mt. Fuji or Hakone and relax as your guide navigates twisting mountain roads with ease en route to sites such as Lake Kawaguchi, Lake Ashi, and Arakurasengen Park. This full-day tour also includes hotel pickup and drop-off, a guide available in seven languages, and the possibility to curate your trip to suit your interests—a privilege only allowed by a private tour.
events.name: Private Tour: Chartered Car to Mt. Fuji Lake Kawaguchiko or Hakone and Lake Ashi

events.description: Spend a day exploring historic neighborhoods, visiting temples, and shopping on a full-day tour from Osaka to Kyoto, Nara, and Kobe. Explore the Arashiyama district, tour the Kinkaku-ji Temple and Nara Park, and take in the stores at Kobe MOSAIC. This tour includes Kinkaku-ji entrance fee, as well as pickup from Kansai International Airport (KIX), Umeda, Nippombashi or Namba. Opt for a buffet or torisuki lunch and all-you-can-eat shabu shabu dinner.
events.name: Day Trip by Bus to Kyoto, Nara and Kobe from Osaka

events.description: Cycle past a mix of Kyoto’s most-famous sights and its lesser-known secrets during this half-day ‘Hidden Kyoto’ bike tour. Take a 4.9-mile (8-kilometer) ride that starts by winding past iconic Kyoto temples and shrines like Kinkakuji, Koto-in, and Kitano Tenmagu. You’ll continue ‘off the beaten path,’ discovering intimate Zen gardens and charming backstreets known only to locals.
events.name: Hidden Kyoto E-Biking

events.description: Take a whirlwind sightseeing tour of Tokyo as you visit the city’s top landmarks, observe a tea ceremony and enjoy a river cruise during this full-day tour. Follow your guide to attractions including the Imperial Palace, Nakamise shopping street, Asakusa Kannon Temple and Tokyo Tower observation deck. You’ll also enjoy a traditional Japanese tea ceremony and take a cruise on the Sumida River. This excursion in Tokyo, perfect for those with limited time, also includes lunch, all entrance fees and a souvenir city map.
events.name: Dynamic Tokyo : Tokyo Tower, Tea Ceremony and Sumida River Cruise Day Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/103893P3/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private arrival Transfer from Narita Airport(NRT) to central Tokyo city

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92136P41/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Hiroshima / Miyajima Full-day Private Custom Tour with National Licensed Guide

events.description: Secure your admission ticket to DisneySea® in Tokyo by booking in advance. As well as saving you up to one hour of waiting in line, your pre-booked entrance pass grants you access to all DisneySea® attractions, which are themed according to the myths and legends of the ocean.
events.name: Tokyo DisneySea 1-Day Passport

events.description: Reserve this shared Narita Airport transfer to your hotel in central Tokyo, ensuring a stress-free start to your trip without needing to look for a taxi or worry about high costs. Best of all this simple, cost-effective transfer option is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week, offering transport via a comfortable bus with knowledgable, professional drivers.
events.name: Shared Arrival Transfer: Tokyo Narita International Airport to Hotel

events.description: Experience the nature and culture of Kyoto on this on this all-day guided excursion. After a convenient hotel pickup, explore this UNESCO-designated city with a knowledgeable local driver as a your chauffeur. Customize the tour to suit your interests and visit must-see sites like the magical Arashiyama bamboo forest, the gorgeous Kinkakuji shrine, and the Gion district.
events.name: 1 Day Private Kyoto Tour (Charter) - English Speaking Driver

events.description: Maximize your time in Tokyo on a 10-hour excursion to Mt. Fuji and Kawaguchi Lake, designed for travelers with limited time in Japan’s capital. Departing Japan’s capital in a coach equipped with Wi-Fi, you’ll ascend to Mt. Fuji 5th Station, eat noodles overlooking Kawaguchi Lake, and marvel at the seasonal blooms of Oishi Park.
events.name: Mt. Fuji 5th Station, Lake Kawaguchi & Seasonal Fruits Picking from Tokyo

events.description: Tour Tokyo’s highlights in an unforgettable way—dressed up in costume, traveling by go-kart. Your tour is both fun and safe, you’ll get a safety briefing, and travel with a guide so you won’t get lost. During the tour, you’ll drive past many Tokyo landmarks such as the Gate Bridge, Odaiba, Tokyo Tower, Roppongi, and Shibuya Crossing. Get a souvenir photo of this magical tour to take home too.
events.name: Official Street Go-Kart Tour - Tokyo Bay Shop

events.description: Discover the historic environs of Nara, ancient capital of Japan, as you explore Buddhist temples, shrines and the famous Nara deer park on this excursion from Kyoto. Visit Todaji Temple, one of the oldest Buddhist temples in Japan and home to the country’s largest Buddha statue, before seeing Kasuga Shrine, which features over 3,000 stone and bronze lanterns. Then stop by Nara Park, a 1,250-acre reserve that’s home to more than 1,000 free-roaming deer. Your Nara excursion also includes pickup from select Kyoto hotels, a guide and all entrance fees.
events.name: Nara Afternoon Tour - Todaiji Temple & Deer Park from Kyoto

events.description: See two of the top attractions near Nagano on this 8-hour excursion, including a visit to the area’s famous snow monkeys and a stop at the serene Zenko-ji temple. Travel along a beautiful forest trail to the home of the snow monkeys of Jigokudani, a group of local macaques known for their willingness to live in the snow and bathe in the local hot spring. Then, enjoy a break for a tasty lunch before continuing to the tranquil grounds of Zenko-ji, a lovely religious site known for its historic Buddhist statue. Finally, indulge in a sake tasting nearby, for a taste of Nagano.
events.name: Full-Day Tour of Snow Monkeys, Zenko-ji Temple and Sake in Nagano

events.description: A chauffeured private tour is the perfect way to see Tokyo if you have a limited time or want to get your bearings in the city. Enjoy round trip transportation from your accommodation in a luxury vehicle. Relax on a full day excursion that showcases the diversity of Tokyo, from its high tech present to its traditional roots. Customize the tour to your must-see locations.
events.name: Tokyo City Tour: Private Chauffeur Guide with Chartered Car

events.description: First-time visitors to Tokyo who want a comprehensive overview of the city will love this handy private tour. Experience both modern and ancient Tokyo at attractions like the Tokyo Tower, Meiji Shrine, the Imperial Palace, and more. Foodies will be kept satisfied with lunch at the Tsukiji Fish Market, and shopaholics will love Asakusa and Ginza. Customize the tour to suit your needs.
events.name: Private tour - Enjoy your first trip to Tokyo! All the must-sees full tour!

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/33348P18/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Kyoto from Osaka: Immersive Arashiyama and Fushimi Inari by Private Vehicle

events.description: Explore the best that Tokyo has to offer on a full-day private sightseeing tour. Choose from a set itinerary or customize your own with your English-speaking driver to see the locations of the most interest to you. Visit key landmarks like Sensoji Temple, the Skytree building, the Shibuya crossing and more as you listen to commentary about the history and culture of the city.
events.name: Tokyo Private Chauffeur Driving Sightseeing Tour - English Speaking Driver

events.description: Seeking out the well-concealed back-alley bars of Tokyo's Shinjuku district is notoriously tricky for outsiders. Take the guesswork out of your trip on this guided tour that takes you barhopping to Izakaya bars in two different alleyways—a small group of no more than eight people means that you can easily access tiny bars with just a few seats. Between drinks and snacks (included) your guide shares insights into local culture in this atmospheric part of the city.
events.name: Tokyo Bar Hopping Tour in Shinjuku - Explore the hidden bars in food alleys

events.description: Spend a day exploring Mt. Fuji and the surrounding area on this day trip that includes a visit to a hot spring resort (onsen) from Tokyo. Ascend the slopes of Mt. Fuji, reaching its 5th Station, for amazing views. Then descend to enjoy an invigorating hot springs soak at a nearby resort. You’ll conclude your excursion with shopping time at Gotemba Premium Outlets. Your Mt. Fuji experience also includes an optional lunch, a guide and GPS-based audio guidance for several additional languages.
events.name: Mt. Fuji,Onsen Experience ＆ Outlets Shopping 1-Day Tour from Tokyo

events.description: Explore Akihabara in a unique and fun way—traveling in a go-kart dressed as a character of your choice—from comics, to games, or anime. No need to worry about getting lost, as you’ll have a guide to lead the way. It’s the perfect way to spend time in the fresh air, and see multiple sites in a short space of time, such as Rainbow Bridge, Asakusa, Tokyo Dome, Imperial Palace, Sky Tree, and much more.
events.name: Go-Kart Street Tour Adventure with Guide - Akihabara

events.description: Get a taste for beautiful landscapes and serene religious monuments as you visit the city of Kamakura and Enoshima on this guided day trip. Visit Kotoku-in Temple featuring the Great Buddha and Hokoku-ji Temple. Enjoy green tea at Jomyo-ji Temple overlooking a rock garden and dine on a Japanese lunch. Learn about Japan’s long history before returning to Tokyo. Round-trip coach transport from selected hotels is included.
events.name: Kamakura Highlights Tour with Tea Ceremony and Enoshima Bay Drive from Tokyo

events.description: Immerse yourself in the captivating culture of Kyoto on a full-day sightseeing tour. See the tranquil Kiyomizu Temple amid its verdant surroundings; absorb the Imperial majesty of Kyoto Imperial Palace; and stroll amid the botanical beauty of Kinkaku-ji Temple. Behold the beguiling beauty of the Fushimiinari Taisha Shrine and enrich your knowledge of Kyoto’s rich historical heritage with commentary from an informative guide. Moderate levels of fitness are advisable for this tour, on which a lot of walking occurs.
events.name: Kyoto Highlights 1 Day Trip - Golden Pavilion & Kiyomizu Temple from Kyoto

events.description: Step back in time to ancient Tokyo during this 3.5-hour exploration of the city’s historic Yanaka district. Discover a different side of the sprawling Japanese capital that dates back to its Edo period of the 16th through 19th centuries, admiring the area’s charming mix of temples, springtime cherry blossoms and timeless ‘reien’ (cemetery). A included guide will accompany you on your visit, providing additional details about Japanese history and local culture.
events.name: Experience Old and Nostalgic Tokyo: Yanaka Walking Tour

events.description: Pedal through the historic streets of Kyoto as you visit its magnificent temples and shrines by bike during this small-group tour limited to 9 participants. Take a spin down the Path of Philosophy on this Kyoto tour that gives you an overview of the city while using a mode of transport preferred by locals: the humble bicycle. See shrines, temples and mountains — this is an enlightening escape from the city.
events.name: Kyoto Small-Group Bike Tour

events.description: This tour is your shortcut to discovering scenic villages and towns in the Japanese countryside. Take the stress out of driving on unfamiliar rural roads by having a private driver for the day. Travel with ease between dispersed sites, including the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Shirakawago, Hida Furukawa, and Takayama. You won’t feel rushed as there’s plenty of time to get out of the car and explore local sights on foot at each location.
events.name: Private Tour from Kanazawa to Shirakawago, Hida Furukawa and Takayama

events.description: Sightsee through Kansai’s most scenic areas, seeing iconic landmarks in Nara and Kyoto in one day, without the hassle of changing trains or getting lost. With pickup times in either Osaka or Kyoto, board a convenient tour bus to visit the 1000 vermilion gates of Fushimi-Inari Shrine, scenic Nara Park, beautiful Arashiyama, and more.
events.name: Kyoto and Nara 1 Day Bus Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/17972P359/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private NRT Narita Tokyo Airport - Tokyo City Round-Trip Transfer

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/17972P395/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer from Tokyo Narita NRT Airport to Tokyo City

events.description: Take a fascinating 'deep dive' into Japanese seafood cuisine during this combination walking tour of Tsukiji Outer Fish Market and cooking class. Shop for the freshest ingredients amidst the labyrinth-style aisles of Tsukiji Outer Fish Market, showcasing everything from sushi-grade tuna to octopus tentacles. Then head to the largest gourmet cooking school in Asia as you learn to prepare traditional-style ‘washoku’ food items like sushi and a Japanese omelet. An English-speaking guide, transport, cooking ingredients and tools and lunch with a beverage are all included.
events.name: Tokyo Tsukiji Outer Market Walking Tour and Rolled Sushi Class

events.description: Kyoto is one of Japan’s most popular travel destinations and with over 50 million annual visitors, it can get busy. This tour makes an early start so you can avoid the crowds and cram much more into your day. Stroll around the Arashiyama Bamboo Grove before the tour groups arrive, visit Kinkaku-ji temple (Golden Pavilion) right as it opens, and walk through the torii gates of Fushimi Inari (Shrine) before the midday heat.
events.name: Kyoto Early Bird Tour

events.description: Get an inside look into Japan’s ancient, traditional national sport: sumo wrestling. Travelers can find it hard to gain access to the wrestlers’ stables without local help. On this morning training tour you’ll see the athletes practicing, close up. Enjoy this exclusive insight into Japanese culture and history through this fascinating sport.
events.name: Tokyo Sumo Morning Training Tour with a Local
