events.description: Take a closer look at the fascinating world of sushi, extending from the ocean to your plate, during this 4-hour sushi-making class and a visit to the outer Tsukiji fish market. Tour one of the world’s largest seafood markets with a guide as you learn how fish is caught, distributed, and sold. Then turn your attention to sushi-making, learning to prepare nigiri sushi with the help of a sushi master. Finish your experience by enjoying your creations for lunch.
events.name: Tsukiji Fish Market Visit with Sushi Making Experience

events.description: This scenic day trip is an ideal choice for those wanting to swap the busy city of Tokyo for natural outdoor beauty. You’ll travel with ease in a comfortable bus to Kawaguchiko, where you’ll see incredible views of Mount Fuji and Lake Kawaguchi. No need to worry about bringing lunch with you as a delicious lunch in Fuji-Q Highland is included. You’ll also access incredible views from an excursion ship, and Mount Fuji Panoramic Ropeway.
events.name: Day Trip to Mt Fuji, Kawaguchiko and Mt Fuji Panoramic Ropeway

events.description: If you’re traveling with children, no visit to Tokyo would be complete without visiting Tokyo Disney Resort. Guarantee your place inside the park, and save up to one hour of waiting in line on the day, with a 1-day admission ticket that grants you access to all of the Disney-themed rides and attractions inside the complex.
events.name: Tokyo Disneyland 1-Day Passport

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92136P42/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Hiroshima / Miyajima Half-day Private Custom Tour with National Licensed Guide

events.description: Discover the Zen gardens, colorful temples, and ancient shrines of Kyoto on this small-group walking tour that’s limited to just 12 participants. Experience the elegant architecture and religious monuments of this historic Japanese city, once the imperial capital, as you join a guide on visits to the Gion Geisha district, Tofukuji Temple, and more.
events.name: Kyoto Half-Day Small-Group Cultural Tour

events.description: If you’re visiting Japan for the first time, receive a cultural introduction to the country during a tea ceremony in traditional kimonos. During the ceremony, you’ll learn about Japanese history and sample matcha green tea, a local speciality. Plus, wearing a traditional kimono means you’ll return from the experience with fantastic photographs to commemorate your time in Kyoto.
events.name: Experience Tea Ceremony wearing a Kimono in Kyoto

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/133639P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: KYOTO by Minivan Toyota Hiace 2019 Customize Your Itinerary

events.description: The worldwide popularity of the Studio Ghibli Museum means that admission tickets, which can only be bought in advance, often sell out. Guarantee your entry to the museum, which imitates animated film sets from classic films such as Spirited Away and Howl's Moving Castle, by booking your tickets in advance. This convenient package includes the delivery of the tickets to your accommodation, allowing you to skip the stress of finding a meeting point.
events.name: Pre-Order request for Studio Ghibli Museum – including Ticket delivery

events.description: This half-day tour is an ideal choice for time-tight travelers visiting Tokyo. Avoid the hassle of navigating by having a private guide to take you around the city. A perk of the tour is that you won’t waste time going to sights that don’t interest you, as the route can be customized. A sample itinerary may include Senso-ji Temple in Asakusa, Shibuya Crossing, Takeshita Street in Harajuku, Imperial Palace, and Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.
events.name: Tokyo Half-day Private Custom Tour with National Licensed Guide

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/106364P93/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Airport Transfer from Tokyo Narita Airport (NRT) to Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/133639P20/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: KYOTO & NARA by Minivan Toyota Hiace 2019 Customize Your Itinerary

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/106364P56/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Airport Transfer from Tokyo to Tokyo Narita Airport (NRT)

events.description: Embrace Tokyo’s weird and wonderful side on a private go-karting tour of Akihabara, perfect for travelers seeking an alternative sightseeing experience. This custom tour allows you to select your own start time, duration, and itinerary, and lets you explore downtown Tokyo with a local guide. Plus, you can choose to wear costumes of your choice. Please note, a Japanese driving license or international driver's permit is required.
events.name: Tokyo Go-Kart Rental with Local Guide from Akihabara

events.description: See Tokyo’s top attractions your way on a private custom 6-hour tour, which allows you to design your own experience. Either follow a basic itinerary suggested by your guide or create your own schedule from scratch, visiting highlights such as Tsukiji Fish Market, Meiji Shrine, and Asakusa Temple. Hotel pickup and drop-off are included on this private tour, during which you’ll receive undivided attention from your guide.
events.name: Private Custom Tokyo Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/139289P154/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: [Private] Fukuoka Tailored Tour (Guide + Private Transport)

events.description: Visit Mount Fuji and its surrounding areas with this day tour from Tokyo. You'll start with Mount Fuji, continuing on to the stunning Lake Kawaguchikp before stopping for lunch. You'll then head on to Oshion Hakkai, with its eight natural springs before stopping to go shopping at the Gotemba Premium Outlets.
events.name: Full Day Mt Fuji Lake Kawaguchiko Tour and shopping at Gotemba Premium Outlet

events.description: Experience an enchanting 2.5-hour dinner cruise on Tokyo Bay, enjoying fine dining and majestic views of top Tokyo sights like the Tokyo Skytree, Rainbow Bridge and the nearby Odaiba district along the way. Celebrate a magical night on the calm waters of Tokyo Bay, admiring the twinkling lights of the city while you dine on a multi-course dinner of international cuisine and a complimentary beverage. It’s the perfect excursion for a romantic night out or for a fun-filled family outing. Your dinner cruise also includes dessert and tea or coffee.
events.name: Tokyo Bay Dinner Cruise

events.description: Enjoy a full-day walking tour in Tokyo accompanied by an experienced guide who shares the modern and traditional sides of the dynamic Japanese capital. Visit famous sites including the outer Tsukiji fish market, Senso-ji Temple in Asakusa, and the Meiji Shrine. Stroll down Takeshita Street in Harajuku — ground zero for youth and pop culture, then observe ‘The Scramble’ or Shibuya Crossing, billed as the busiest pedestrian crosswalk in the world. Go in depth with a private guide who customizes your 8-hour tour to your interests.
events.name: Tokyo Private Custom Walking Tour with local friendly guide

events.description: Go off the beaten track—and avoid tourist traps—with this nighttime walking tour of Osaka. In a small group of no more than six people head for the foodie districts of Tenma and Kyobashi to sample local dishes, enjoy a few drinks, and get to know the locals.
events.name: Deep Osaka All-Inclusive Nighttime Foodie Cultural Experience

events.description: Head to Nikko with a private driver to discover the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Toshogu Shrine, savor an authentic yuba gozen lunch, and see the Kegon Falls. Perfect if you’re looking for an easy day trip, this option is customizable to you. Chat with your driver as you travel, and put together an itinerary that’s focused on the Nikko sights you want to see.
events.name: 1 Day Private Nikko World Heritage Tour (Charter) - English Speaking Driver

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/103893P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Airport Transfer

events.description: Get an insiders' eye perspective on Kyoto on this walking tour that combines a food tour with anthropological insight. Wander through the city's streets and understand the nighttime entertainment scene, from geiko (geisha) to hostesses. Afterward sample regional specialties accompanied by included drinks at two standing bars/restaurants.
events.name: Nighttime All-Inclusive Local Eats and Streets, Gion and Beyond

events.description: See some of Japan’s most incredible creatures in their natural environment on this enriching full-day tour from Tokyo. Board a super-fast bullet train and commence your excursion with a tour of Zenko-ji, a stunning 7th–century temple considered a national treasure. Experience magical moments while watching snow monkeys bathing in hot springs. Enjoy personalized attention from your guide on this small-group seasonal sojourn, which runs from January to April.
events.name: Nagano Day Trip from Tokyo: Snow Monkeys, Hot Springs and Zenko-ji Temple

events.description: Make the most of your time in Kyoto by booking a customized private tour with an expert guide. Create your own sightseeing itinerary, choosing from among dozens of cultural and historic landmarks, including 17 UNESCO World Heritage sites such as Nijo Castle or Kinkaku-ji Temple (Golden Pavilion), and Fushimi Inari Shrine. Choose either a half-day or full-day itinerary and travel via public transport accompanied by your guide. Transportation and lunch is included on this comprehensive and flexible Kyoto tour.
events.name: Private Custom Tour: Kyoto in One Day

events.description: Enrich yourself with the fascinating history of Kyoto’s numerous UNESCO-listed temples and shrines during this day trip from Osaka. Explore the seemingly endless ‘torii’ gates at Fushimi Inari Taisha shrine, visit Kiyomizu-dera temple, and explore Kinkaku-ji temple. Customize your trip by adding on a Japanese-style or Udon lunch, and select from four pickup points.
events.name: Day Trip by Bus to Kyoto from Osaka

events.description: Immerse yourself in Japanese culture and history using this private full-day vehicle charter from Kyoto. After selecting your preferred choice of transportation from a van, bus or limousine, your group will enjoy a private tour through the ancient city of Kyoto, complete with UNESCO-listed temples and numerous culture attractions. Explore the city at your own pace and customize the day to see only what you want to, all with the help of a guide/driver. Don’t miss this opportunity to see the best Kyoto has to offer.
events.name: Private Kyoto Custom One Day Tour by Chartered Vehicle

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/2142P927/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 1-Day World Heritage Mt. Fuji Tour(5th Station,Oshino Hakkai, Shiraito Falls)

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92163P75/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Nikko Day Tour from Tokyo – Full Day

events.description: Visit Mt Fuji viewing locations and surrounding Japanese sights on this day trip from Tokyo. Check out Odawara Castle (admission fee not included,) and view Mt. Fuli from the 5th Station. Take a cruise on Lake Ashi aboard a replica of a pirate ship in Hakone. You’ll have great photo opportunities of the famous snow-capped peak, plus enjoy a seafood buffet lunch.
events.name: Mt Fuji 5th Station, Lake Ashi Cruise and Odawara Castle including Lunch

events.description: Bus tours can quickly transport you to top sights, but to really get a feel for Tokyo join this small-group bicycle tour. Soak up the atmosphere while pedaling at an easy pace through the back streets of the city between such historical attractions as temples and the Imperial Palace. Includes lunch at the famed Tsukiji Fish Market.
events.name: 5-hour Tokyo Historical Bike Tour through Imperial Palace & Tsukiji

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/104654P64/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Freely set up plans Guided Private Tours in Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/130036P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Deep Backstreet Osaka Tours

events.description: Gain a better understanding of sake during this tour that explores the Fushimi Sake District of Kyoto. Visit Gekkeikan Okura Sake Museum, one of the largest sake breweries in Fushimi, and end your visit with a sake-tasting session. Not only will your guide be able to explain the basics of sake and introduce you to new kinds you may have never tried, but your tastings will also be paired with Japanese snacks that enhance the tasting experience.
events.name: 3 Hours Kyoto Insider Sake Experience

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/139289P8/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Asahiyama Zoo & Shirogane Blue Pond Tour (from Sapporo)

events.description: Orient yourself on your first day in Tokyo, and see the city through the eyes of a local. During this customized tour with your personal host, learn how to navigate and use Tokyo’s transport system. Choose from the city’s most famous attractions, or explore up-and-coming neighborhoods. Understand cultural practices, find the best places to eat, and get advice on Tokyo’s nightlife scene.
events.name: Introduction to Tokyo & Highlights Private Walking Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/2142P926/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: DRUM TAO: MANGEKYO Tokyo Show Ticket

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/90714P63/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Asahiyama Zoo, Fascinating Aoi-Ike Light Up and Shirohige Falls in Winter!

events.description: Have a fun-filled day in Osaka at Universal Studios Japan. You’ll beat the crowds who are waiting to buy tickets on the day, by having a pre-booked one-day Studio Pass. This is the perfect activity for adults and children alike, with plenty of attractions for all ages. Enjoy attractions such as Hollywood District, Jurassic Park, and rides such as Despicable Me Minion Mayhem, and The Wizarding World of Harry Potter.
events.name: Universal Studios Japan 1 Day Pass

events.description: This an ideal choice for travelers with limited time in Osaka. Save hours researching where to visit in Osaka, and instead have an action-packed itinerary created for you. Traveling between sites in a private vehicle means avoiding the crowds on public transport, and fitting more into your day. You also don't worry about getting lost. Highlights include Dotonbori, Osaka Castle, Shinsekai, Shitenoji, and Harukas. Your tour is enhanced with entertaining stories along the way, and useful tips from your guide.
events.name: Osaka's Best and Brightest by Private Vehicle

events.description: Take a quick nature-lover’s day trip to the majestic Mt. Fuji and forest of Aokigahara, offering the perfect break from Tokyo’s fast-paced hustle and bustle. Enjoy the impressive views from Mount Fuji’s 7,610 foot-high (2,305 meter) 5th Station and join a guide for a one-of-a-kind visit inside an ice cave typically off-limits to the public. Your excursion includes pick-up in Tokyo (at select hotels), transport and entrance fees, local guide and evening drop-off in Tokyo’s nightlife hotspot of Shinjuku.
events.name: Mt Fuji Aokigahara Forest and Cave Exploring from Tokyo

events.description: A guided sightseeing trip to Kyoto, Nara, and Kobe makes it easy to see the highlights of each location, like the Kyoto Arashiyama, Nara Park, and Kobe Mosaic. Board a comfortable bus for this day trip from Osaka to make the most of a day away from the city. Opt for an upgrade to a buffet or set lunch and shabu-shabu dinner.
events.name: 12-Hour Sightseeing Trip from Osaka to Kyoto, Nara, and Kobe

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/87037P2/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Izakaya Food Tour in Shinjuku

events.description: The digital art exhibition, teamLab Planets Tokyo is notorious for drawing long lines of visitors. Guarantee your entry and ensure a smooth visit by pre-booking your admission ticket. Once inside, immerse yourself ultra-digital installations where boundaries between you and the artwork break down.
events.name: teamLab Planets Tokyo Admission Ticket

events.description: Prepare for battle as you learn the skills of the samurai during this 1- or 2-hour class studying the basic techniques of these ancient Japanese warriors. Take the 1-hour session, providing an introduction to the basics of the samurai art, or choose the 2-hour course, practicing more complex movements using a sword and folding fan. When your class ends, enjoy a photo session with your samurai costume and receive a certificate of completion.  This samurai session also includes an English-speaking guide and instructor and a 'tenugui,' a traditional Japanese towel.
events.name: Samurai School in Kyoto: Samurai for a Day

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/133639P21/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: KOBE by Minivan Toyota Hiace 2019 Customize Your Itinerary

events.description: Explore the intricate temples and serene gardens of Kyoto on this 4-hour guided tour visiting some of the imperial city’s most important religious and cultural sites. Check out Sanjusangendo Temple, the longest wooden structure in Japan and home more than 1000 Kannon statues, Fushimiinari Taisha Shrine, the head shrine of the god Inari and the supreme views afforded from Kiyomizu Temple high above Kyoto. This excursion to Kyoto’s top temples also includes all entrance fees.
events.name: Kyoto Afternoon Tour - Fushimiinari Shrine & Kiyomizu Temple from Kyoto

events.description: Immerse yourself in quintessential Japanese culture during a private tour and dining experience with a geisha. In Kyoto, considered the birthplace of geisha culture, you’ll explore the historic Gion area and dine on a multi-course meal at either a Japanese restaurant or tea house, accompanied by a ‘maiko’ (apprentice geisha) or ‘geiko’ (fully-trained geisha).
events.name: Private Dinner with a Geisha

events.description: Discover multiple dispersed Japan highlights on this 2-day adventure. The tour is flexible, based on your requirements, so you can choose one way, round-trip, and from a selection of accommodation options. Experience the thrill of traveling on a bullet train, and get access to incredible Mt. Fuji views. You’ll go sightseeing in Kyoto with a guide, so you won’t get lost, and a Lake Ashi river cruise is included too.
events.name: 2 Day Mt Fuji and Kyoto Rail Tour by Bullet Train from Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/198056P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Tour to Kyoto by Deluxe Van from Osaka/ Kyoto/ Kobe

events.description: Get a taste for Japanese history and traditional culture during this 9-hour private trip to the city of Nikko. Travel aboard the limited express train and arrive in Nikko, where you’ll explore the city’s Toshogu Shrine and Rinnoji Temple. Spend the afternoon learning about Japanese sake during a VIP tour at a local brewery.
events.name: Private Tour: Nikko Guided Full-Day Tour from Tokyo by Limited Express Train

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/176331P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Mt Fuji customisable Sightseeing Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/103013P3/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 5 Top Highlights of Kyoto with Kyoto Bike Tour

events.description: If you are new to the city and don't speak Japanese, finding Tokyo's best bars (with the signs written in kanji) can be tricky. The guided nighttime tour of Shibuya takes you to three izakaya-style bars that you'd be unlikely to find alone. Enjoy a drink and local dish at each while you soak up the local atmosphere.
events.name: Tokyo Bar Hopping Tour in Shibuya - Go into the deep indoor food alley of Tokyo

events.description: Immerse yourself in Samurai history and culture during this 2-hour Samurai experience at a traditional Kyoto Samurai House. Under the guidance of an expert Samurai instructor, learn the philosophies of Bushido, the ‘Way of the Warrior; handle a real katana sword; and take part in a Zen meditation session.
events.name: Kyoto Samurai Experience

events.description: Take a pedal-powered trip through Tokyo aboard an electric-powered cycle on this 2 or 3-hour sightseeing tour by bike. Sample a mix of the Japanese capital’s historic and modern landmarks, visiting hotspots like the neighborhoods of Asakusa, and Akihabara, the Imperial Palace, and much more.
events.name: Electric-Powered Biking Tour: Asakusa, Akihabara, and Imperial Palace

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/133639P19/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: KYOTO & NARA by Land Rover Discovery Sport 2018 Customize Your Itinerary

events.description: Experience the natural beauty of Japan’s tallest peak on this all-day excursion. After a convenient pickup in central Tokyo, catch amazing views of Mt. Fuji from Mt. Nikura Asama Park and try your hand at craft-making or enjoy a stroll around the lake at Kawaguchiko. Admire Oishi Park’s abundance of flowers and mountain views before finishing with a visit to the traditional village of Saiko Iyashi no Sato Nenba.
events.name: Scenic Spots of Mt Fuji and Lake Kawaguchi 1 Day Bus Tour

events.description: Discover the culinary traditions of Japan in Osaka, one of Japan’s best food cities, during this small-group cooking lesson. Learn the preparation methods for popular Japanese dishes including green tea, takoyaki (fried balls of wheat flour and octopus), okonomiyaki (savoury pancakes), and miso soup. Expand your Japanese cuisine knowledge, and best of all, you get to eat your creations when you’re finished. This small-group course, limited to just eight participants, also includes a guide, a cooking instructor, and an optional sake and beer tasting.
events.name: Osaka Cooking Class

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/63670P21/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Osaka Local Foodie Tour in Dotonbori and Shinsekai

events.description: Explore the magnificent temples and natural wonders of Nagano on a full-day tour and benefit from the undivided attention of a private guide. Visit the famous Zenkoji Temple and Jigokudani Snow Monkey Park, enjoy lunch (own expense) in Obuse Town, then choose a soak in the hot springs at Shibu Onsen.
events.name: Full-Day Private Nagano Tour: Zenkoji Temple, Obuse, Jigokudani Monkey Park

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/103893P2/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Airport Transfer from Osaka city to Kansai airport

events.description: Get acquainted with one of Japan’s most famous traditions during a tea ceremony and kimono-wearing experience in Osaka. Alongside a Japanese tea master, you’ll witness the ritual of making green tea while wearing a Japanese kimono, which are suitable for both men and women. Plus, you’ll sample Japanese sweets and enjoy premium green tea while learning about local culture.
events.name: Tea Ceremony in a Kimono in Osaka

events.description: Take in some of the top sights in Tokyo during this sightseeing excursion and river cruise perfect for those short on time. Get a sky-high view of the city from the 40th floor of the World Trade Center building, before exploring the sacred confines of Asakusa Kannon Temple, and strolling the shops of Nakamise Street. Your experience ends with a relaxing cruise on the Sumida River. This Tokyo exploration and cruise also includes a guide, all entrance fees and pickup from select hotels.
events.name: Tokyo Afternoon : Asakuasa , Sumida River Cruise Half Day Tour

events.description: Immerse yourself in the beguiling beauty of the ‘maiko’ (apprentice geisha) scene during an exquisite evening of culture and cuisine at Gion Hatanaka. Gain fascinating insight into ancient Japanese customs as you chat with maikos and capture photographs to immortalize your memorable evening. Sip on a selection of unlimited drinks and pleasure your palate with delicacies inspired by ‘kaiseki’ cuisine, a traditional Japanese cooking style. Enhance your cultural experience of Japan on this enriching evening tour.
events.name: Maiko Performance with Kaiseki Dinner in Kyoto

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/106292P13/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Hiroshima & Miyajima 1-day private tour from Kyoto/Osaka

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/131112P16/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: PRIVATE AIRPORT TRANSFER NARITA ARRIVAL AND DEPARTURE

events.description: Get a taste of Japanese food and culture during this walking tour of Tokyo’s Shibuya district. Escape the tourist hordes as you eat like a Japanese local, sampling favorites like ‘okonomiyaki’ (savory egg pancakes), Kobe beef skewers and more in the area’s off-the-beaten-path eateries and hangouts. Toast your adventure, and new friends, with an included glass of beer, ‘shochu’ (rice liquor) or soft drinks.
events.name: Walking Food Tour of Shibuya at Night

events.description: This tour is the perfect way to appreciate the stunning scenery of Mt. Fuji, and Lake Kawaguchi, and try delicious local specialties too. Save research time and enjoy a day with a full itinerary organized for you. Highlights include Mt. Fuji Panoramic Ropeway, Narusawa Ice Cave, Fugaku Wind Cave, and learning about sake brewing at Ide Sake Brewery.
events.name: From Tokyo:Mt.Fuji Panorama Ropeway and Ice Caves tour

events.description: Marvel at the some of the top UNESCO World Heritage-listed temples and palaces of ancient Kyoto on this half-day tour. This quick introduction to the sights of Kyoto covers Nijo Castle, Kinkakuji Temple (Golden Pavilion), and the Japanese Emperor’s former Imperial Palace—a perfect way to see the city if you’re short on time. Your guided morning Kyoto excursion includes entrance fees and transport between sites by coach.
events.name: Kyoto Morning Tour - Golden Pavilion & Kyoto Imperial Palace from Kyoto

events.description: Why pay for an expensive taxi to the airport in Tokyo when there’s a simple, cost-effective alternative available 24 hours a day, seven days a week? This easy shared departure service from central Tokyo or Maihama hotels to Narita International Airport is the perfect budget-friendly alternative to that costly taxi ride.
events.name: Shared Departure Transfer: Hotel to Narita International Airport

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/167864P3/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Car Tokyo Tour

events.description: Get a local's perspective on Hiroshima's surprisingly lively nightlife on this bar-hopping tour. Stroll through the streets with a guide and dip in and out of local "izakayas" and other bars and enjoy drinks and conversation.
events.name: Hiroshima Bar Hopping Food Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/63670P31/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Hiroshima Peace (Heiwa) Walking Tour at World Heritage Sites

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/185529P5/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: KUMAMOTO CASTLE & YANAGAWA TOUR

events.description: Hop aboard a traditional rickshaw with a private guide for a journey through the atmospheric streets of beautiful Kyoto. Depending on the ride length you select, be peddled through the serene shrines of west Kyoto’s Arashiyama neighborhood, discovering its picturesque Bamboo Grove, or admiring the wooden structures and ancient alleys of the Higashiyama district.
events.name: Kyoto Rickshaw Tour

events.description: Experience the natural beauty of the Gunma Prefecture in Japan on a bus tour from Shinjuku. Take the Watarase Keikoku Railway between Godo and Mizunuma stations and admire the passing scenery. Walk along the Watarase River and see the foliage at Takatsudokyo. End the tour at the Ashikaga Flower Park lit up with over four million light bulbs before heading back to Shinjuku.
events.name: Watarase Keikoku Railway, Takatsudo Gorge,Illumination at Ashikaga Flower Park

events.description: Spend a morning or afternoon sightseeing in Tokyo by comfortable coach. Select your departure time then motor past multiple landmarks, such as the National Diet Building, and stop to explore significant sites including the Imperial Palace East Garden and Senso-ji Temple in Asakusa. Your Tokyo tour includes round-trip transport and headsets so you can clearly hear your guide.
events.name: Half Day Sightseeing Tour in Tokyo

events.description: See snow monkeys and temples on a small-group day trip by bullet train from Tokyo. In an intimately sized group of just six people, you’ll travel to the Nagano Prefecture in just two hours. Visit the history-steeped Zenkoji Temple, then head to Jigokudani Snow Monkey Park to see the monkeys bathing in a beautiful hot spring.
events.name: See Snow Monkeys on a Private Day Trip from Tokyo by Bullet Train

events.description: The Nishiki Food Market, known to locals as the “Kitchen of Kyoto,” is a huge 400-year-old market sprawling with food vendors. Navigate what can be an overwhelming space with the help of your guide, whose insight into the local food scene will give you a taste of Japanese culture—and plenty of food. All food tastings are included as per itinerary.
events.name: Kyoto Nishiki Market Tour with 7 Course Lunch

events.description: Learn to make two styles of sushi during a cooking lesson that ends with a delicious sushi lunch. Your sushi chef-instructor shows you how to prepare ‘gunkan maki’ and ‘nigiri’ sushi with simple utensils that help you easily make sushi. Hear insightful commentary from the instructor throughout the lesson, then enjoy the meal that you helped to prepare.
events.name: (Easy and Fun!) Sushi Making & Sushi Lunch

events.description: Discover the best of the seaside city of Otaru in a day on this action-packed tour. Eliminate the worry of getting lost by having private transfers included. You’ll travel between dispersed sites in a comfortable vehicle including the Yoichi Distillery, Sakaimachi shopping street, Otaru canal, and Tengu Mountain. It’ll be the ultimate hassle-free day as all activities are included, as well as a tasty seafood lunch.
events.name: Explore Otaru & Yoichi

events.description: Make the most of the winter conditions on this fun slow-sledding tour. Kids will especially love sledding and playing in the snow at a ski resort (the exact location depends on the month, as snow conditions change). Refuel and warm up with a delicious, all-you-can-eat lunch of crab. Top off the day by searching for—and picking—seasonal strawberries, which you can eat or take home.
events.name: Snow sledding & Strawberry picking with Crab Lunch Buffet!

events.description: Face off with a professional Sumo wrestler during this experience in Ryogoku. Get into the Sumo ring and learn about this popular Japanese sport including the basic rules. Hear stories about the life and challenges of a Sumo wrestler. A lunch ticket to one of several restaurants is included in the tour.
events.name: Wrestle with a Sumo Wrestler on Real Sumo Ring in Ryogoku

events.description: Go out for an evening of fanciful Tokyo entertainment that includes a robot show and dinner at a restaurant with an ‘Alice In Wonderland’ theme. You may feel that you slipped down the rabbit hole when you enter the Robot Cabaret Show where neon-lit performers dance to a techno beat. Watch a campy show with dinosaurs, ninjas, taiko drummers and costumed dancing ladies put on a dazzling 60-minute performance. Before or after the show, dine in a festively decorated restaurant that recreates iconic scenes from ‘Alice In Wonderland.’
events.name: Robot Restaurant Show with Dinner at 'Alice in Wonderland' Themed Restaurant

events.description: Immerse yourself in the captivating history and rich culture of Nikko on a partially guided full-day tour from Tokyo. Delve into the eventful Tokugawa era during a guided tour of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Nikko Toshogu Shrine, and then venture to the extravagant Edo Wonderland, a colorful enclave in which geishas, samurais and ninjas roam amid period villages. Watch an entertaining theatrical show to catch a glimpse of Japanese culture and enjoy convenient round-trip transportation from Tokyo.
events.name: 1-Day Nikko & Ninja Tour:World Hertage of Nikko Toshogu and Edo Wonderland

events.description: Exploring the historic city of Kyoto with a local guide gives you an experience you won’t get by following a guidebook itinerary. Discover local neighborhoods, see iconic attractions, and get recommendations from a guide who creates a personalized route based on your interests and needs.
events.name: Private and Personalized Experience: See Kyoto with a Local

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/43454P122/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Watarase Valley Railway, Takatsudokyo & Illumination at Ashikaga Flower Park

events.description: Enjoy some of the best views of Mt. Fuji on this convenient private tour to Fuji and the Hakone area. You and your party will be driven to the 5th station of Mt. Fuji, from where there are sweeping views. Continue to scenic Lake Ashi, volcanic Owakudani Valley, and charming Oshino-Hakkai Village. This is a relaxing day out that fits in many beautiful locations.
events.name: Mt. Fuji&Hakone Tour, with Private Car from Tokyo up-to Hakone Spa/Odawara City

events.description: Go off the beaten track in one of Tokyo's most-trafficked areas on a food tour of Shibuya. In a small group of no more than 10 people, your guide will take you to some hidden dining venues, missed by most visitors, where you can try traditional Japanese foods you may never have eaten before.
events.name: Shibuya ALL YOU CAN EAT Food Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/103893P9/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private arrival Transfer from Haneda Airport(HND) to central Tokyo city

events.description: If you want to party like they do in Osaka, this bar-hopping tour is perfect for you. Your local guide takes you to hidden bars that tourists often miss. If you don’t speak Japanese, don’t let language barriers get in your way. Your guide helps to explain the menus, and order for you. This is a fun tour for friends or couples, and makes a great start to a night out in Osaka.
events.name: Osaka Bar Hopping Tour in Namba: Enjoy Osaka Specialties through Hidden Bars

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/5411P274/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Expert Led Private Day Trip to Nara with Train Tickets

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92136P50/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Mt Koya Full-day Private Custom Tour from Osaka with National Licensed Guide

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/150739P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Epic Bike Tour of Kyoto

events.description: Discover the history and traditions of Asakusa on a half-day tour of this older part of Tokyo. Get an in-depth experience as you ride through the district by rickshaw, then stroll along the main shopping street where you sample traditional Japanese snacks. Stop into the famous Sensoji temple, then head to Kappabashi Kitchen street. Finish the tour at a traditional restaurant where you learn to make okonomiyaki (savory pancake).
events.name: Asakusa Cultural & Street-Food Walking Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/22178P48/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Kochi Highlights Private Day Tour with local guide

events.description: See many of the must-see highlights of Tokyo during a day trip that’s ideal for travelers short on time in Tokyo. This fun electric bike tour of Tokyo is a great combination of convenience and exercise, as it’s suitable for a range of fitness and experience levels. Cover much more ground than would be possible on a walking tour, and see things on a more intimate level than you would on a bus tour.
events.name: Tokyo Exclusive Electric Bike Tour

events.description: Savor authentic Tokyo food on this "izakaya" tour of Sangenjaya, a vibrant neighborhood that’s away from the city tourist trail. You’ll tour the Japanese pubs, known as izakaya, where after-work drinkers and friends go to socialize over local snacks and beer. Giving you an insight into Tokyo culture, the experience is perfect for those looking for a taste of local life with delicious Japanese food that won’t be found on any tourist menus.
events.name: Private Sangenjaya Back-Alley Izakaya Experience Led by Tokyo Local

events.description: Raise a glass as you experience Tokyo’s legendary nightlife and make some new friends during this city pub crawl. Get off the typical tourist ‘trail’ as you down a few drinks at three local bars and clubs, choosing between Friday and Saturday night trip options. All venue cover charges, one ‘welcome shot’ per bar, special drink discounts, and unlimited ‘bottle shots’ in between bars are included.
events.name: Tokyo Pub Crawl

events.description: Get acquainted with a real-life geisha during a cultural experience in Tokyo. An intimate encounter designed for travelers interested in Japanese culture, this tour includes a geisha performance, traditionally featuring songs, dances, and games, and refreshments such as tea and sweets. Learn about the history of the geisha and upgrade to include lunch and unlimited drinks.
events.name: Geisha Experience at Chaya in Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/85581P36/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Nikko Scenic Spots and UNESCO Shrine - Full Day Bus Tour from Tokyo

events.description: Experience the traditions of Japan with a 1- or 1.5-hour tea ceremony in Kyoto and learn the origins of this ancient practice. Choose from one of two different tea ceremony options, including a 1-hour session hosted in a machiya (typical wooden house) and a 1.5-hour ceremony complete with kimono dress. Your ceremony includes a guide, who will provide translation.
events.name: Japanese Tea Ceremony with a Tea Master at Wakwak-kan

events.description: Benefit from a full-day tour from Tokyo to Mt. Fuji and Hakone that includes a Muslim-friendly lunch. Travel by coach from Tokyo to Mt. Fuji where your guide takes you up to the 5th Station, situated at 7,546 feet (2,300 meters) of elevation. Next take a cruise on Lake Ashi and ride the Komagatake Ropeway for sweeping views of Hakone National Park. Your tour ends with return by train to Tokyo Station.
events.name: Mt. Fuji & Hakone Tour With Muslim-friendly Lunch (Return by Bullet Train)

events.description: Immerse yourself in the traditional sport of Japan on this half-day sumo wrestling tour. Sumo is world famous but quite a closed community, so is difficult for outsiders to access. Make the most of this tour if you want to learn more about its traditions and the lifestyle of the wrestlers. Learn about its history, watch a demonstration, eat the typical diet of a sumo wrestler, and even challenge them to a match!
events.name: Enter the World of Sumo Wrestling

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/167864P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 1 day tour to Nikko from Tokyo by chartered car

events.description: This personalized full-day Kyoto tour with a local is ideal for first-time visitors to the "City of Temples". You won’t waste a moment visiting places that don’t interest you as this tour is fully customizable based on your interests. Choose the neighborhoods you’d like to visit, and see many of Kyoto’s top sites. Exploring the city with a guide means you won’t get lost, and you'll learn lots of local tips that you wouldn’t discover otherwise.
events.name: A full day in Kyoto with a local: private & personalized

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/22184P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private tour to Lake Tanuki, Shiraito Falls... for cruise ship passengers

events.description: Immerse yourself in the Japanese culinary tradition of Kaiseki Ryouri during this evening food tour in Kyoto. Follow your guide through the Kamogawa and Gion areas, eating your way through a 10-course meal with included beverages and dessert.
events.name: Kyoto Evening Gion Food Tour Including Kaiseki Dinner

events.description: See the highlights of Hiroshima in a personalized private walking tour. A private tour means you can customize your experience and choose your own itinerary. You’ll be picked up in a private vehicle, and your guide will accompany you so you don’t get lost. Possible Hiroshima attractions include Itsukushima Shrine, the Atomic Bomb Dome, and the Peace Memorial.
events.name: Hiroshima one day private walking Tour

events.description: Swap the hustle and bustle of Tokyo for the fresh air of the country for the day. This guided tour takes you to Mount Fuji, Hakone, and Owakudani without the hassle of driving or puzzling over train timetables. Includes lunch.
events.name: 1Day Mt Fuji, Hakone & Owakudani from Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/30791P563/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Sake tasting experience

events.description: If you have a short time in Hiroshima and want to make the most of it, a comprehensive tour is the way to go. Visit Hiroshima’s most iconic sights by private car; don’t waste time waiting or navigating. From Miyajima’s floating vermilion tori gate to the Peace Memorial Park, you will get a thorough picture of this historic city before return to your hotel.
events.name: Private Full Day Hiroshima Tour

events.description: See some of the top Tokyo temples, gardens and shopping areas during this half-day bus tour, perfect for first-time visitors and those short on time. During your Tokyo exploration you’ll marvel at the city’s Meiji Jingu Shrine, see the Imperial Palace East Garden and stop at Asakusa Kannon Temple (known as Senso-ji). Finish your excursion at the busy Ginza shopping district and the colorful Nakamise Street, another commercial hotspot. This overview of the temples, shopping and shrines of Tokyo includes a guide, transportation between sites, and entrance fees.
events.name: Tokyo Cityrama Morning : Meiji Shrine, Asakusa Temple & Ginza Shopping District

events.description: Get a taste of local life in Osaka on a walking tour of Japan’s third largest city. Witness Osaka’s different faces, from bustling business center to historic cultural hub, as you follow your guide through the city’s vibrant neighborhoods. Stroll along the lively waterfront of the Dotonbori entertainment district; visit the landmark Hozenji temple; and ride the subway like a local. Get an insight into Japanese cuisine and sample local specialty Kushikatsu as you explore traditional Shinsekai.
events.name: Osaka Walking Tour

events.description: Explore the intricate temples and gardens of Kyoto on this guided tour from Osaka. Visit some of the imperial city’s most important religious and cultural sites. Check out Sanjusangendo Temple, home to more than 1000 statues; the elegant gardens of Fushimiinari Taisha Shrine; and the supreme views from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Kiyomizu Temple high above Kyoto. This excursion to Kyoto’s top temples includes a guide and all entrance fees.
events.name: Kyoto Afternoon Tour - Fushimiinari Shrine & Kiyomizu Temple from Osaka

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/90714P46/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Majestic Beauty of Lake Shikotsu and Lake Toya Tour! (Multilingual Audio Guide)

events.description: See stunning fall foliage just outside Tokyo on a day trip to the Yamanashi Prefecture, Arakurayama Sengen Park, and Lake Kawaguchi. Only available during November, the seasonal day trip showcases the most impressive displays of autumn leaves alongside views of Mt. Fuji, a striking 5-storey pagoda, and Lake Kawaguchi. A visit to the Chateau Katsunuma winery, the Sagamiko Illumillion lights display, and lunch are also included.
events.name: Autumn Leaves: Mt. Fuji, 5-Storey Pagoda and Lake Kawaguchi

events.description: Discover Osaka’s highlights on this quirky Go Kart tour. Be photo-ready, as there are plenty of funny character costumes to choose from. It’s a hassle-free tour as Go Kart rental, costume rental, insurance, and fuel are included. See lots of Osaka’s top sites like Tsutenkaku Tower, and Kitashinchi area, and you won’t have to worry about losing your group, as it’s a small-group tour. A valid driving license and international license with Japanese translation is required.
events.name: Street Osaka GoKart Tour with Funny Costume Rental

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/90714P83/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Otaru major attractions in winter with lunch buffet and audio guide!

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/65053P2/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Tokyo Disneyland or DisneySea Private Return Transfer - English Speaking Driver

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/90714P84/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Winter Lake Shikotsu and Lake Toya Tour (Multilingual Audio Included)

events.description: Skip the crowds of central Tokyo and soak up nighttime views of such landmarks as the Rainbow Bridge, Sky Tree, and Tokyo Tower on a relaxing cruise. The cruise includes dinner, snacks, and unlimited drinks.
events.name: Tokyo Night Yakatabune Crusing -Odaiba and Tokyo Sky Tree- on Weekdays

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/63670P29/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Kyoto Arashiyama Insider Walking Tour

events.description: Raise your sword like a true samurai warrior during this flexible-length training session in Tokyo. Discover the samurai practice of ‘Kenbu Tachibana Ittoryu’ style, a special sword performance that’s been around for more than 80 years. During your class you’ll don a samurai outfit and train with the ‘katana’ (single-edge samurai sword) and enjoy a photo shoot to help commemorate your experience. Your outfit rental, an instructor and photo and video footage from the session are included.
events.name: Samurai Training Tokyobon

events.description: Take control of your Kyoto sightseeing and visit only the sights you wish to see on this private walking tour. Ideal for first-time visitors, this tour lets you customize a half-day or full-day itinerary. Opt to visit the Golden Pavilion (Kinkaku-ji), Fushimi Inari Shrine, and Nijo Castle, or to stray from the beaten path to see an alternative side of Kyoto. Hotel pickup and drop-off are included.
events.name: Kyoto Private Custom Walking & Sightseeing Tour

events.description: Explore Tokyo on this guided excursion following The New York Times’ beloved “36 Hours.” After meeting your guide at J.R. Akihabara railway station, enjoy experiences that include visiting a historic craft brewery, strolling through the vibrant Akihabara neighborhood, and checking out the art scene at 3331 Arts Chiyoda. Enjoy complimentary beer, subway fare, and happy hour snacks and drinks.
events.name: Tokyo: 'New York Times Journeys' Afternoon Walking Tour with Local Beer & Snacks

events.description: This is a fantastic foodie experience in Japan. Explore the outer Tsukiji Fish Market with a guide, so you don’t miss any highlights, and you don’t get lost. Your experience will be enriched with guide commentary so you can learn about some of the 450+ types of fish as you walk around. You’ll try snacks, and also visit a sake shop for a tasting. This tour is a culinary adventure that will teach you about fish in Japan, and the history of sake too.
events.name: Small-Group Morning Tour to Tokyo's Kitchen - Tsukiji Fish Market

events.description: Create your own itinerary during this full-day private tour of Osaka. Skip the hassle of traveling in a large tour group—your guide is dedicated to just you and your private party. Visit the kofun tombs, the south of the city, as well as temples and gardens. Private round-trip hotel transportation in a luxury vehicle included.
events.name: Private Car Full Day Tour of Osaka Temples, Gardens and Kofun Tombs

events.description: Experience Japan’s tallest peak and beautiful Hakone National Park on this all-day excursion. After a convenient hotel pickup, catch amazing views of Mt. Fuji and learn about the region’s grand scenery from an informative multilingual guide. Enjoy an optional lunch and cruise Lake Ashi, visit the volcanic Owakudani valley and admire panoramic vistas from the Hakone ropeway, or cable car. Your return trip is aboard a bullet train.
events.name: Mt Fuji and Hakone 1-Day Bus Tour return by Bullet Train (Shinkansen)

events.description: Immerse yourself in the cultural and architectural splendor of Kyoto on this private tour, ideal for first-time visitors. Choose from two different routes, both of which cover major Kyoto attractions including Nijo Castle and Kiyomizu Temple, and explore the city with a personal guide. On the northwest-bound route, you’ll visit the Golden Pavilion, Nishiki Food Market, and the bamboo groves of Arashiyama Park. Alternatively, the southeast course covers the Fushimi Inari Shrine, Kiyomizu Temple, and the Gion area. Receive undivided attention from your guide on this private tour.
events.name: Private Highlights of Kyoto Tour

events.description: Purchase a 7-day Japan Rail Pass prior to your trip to Japan and skip the hassle of booking on arrival. An exchange voucher is shipped directly to your home within four business days — FedEx shipping fees included. Use your pass for unlimited rides aboard most railways, including the Shinkansen (bullet train), as well as Tokyo Monorail and buses that are operated by the Japan Railway (JR) group. Select your choice of Standard or first class seating. On arrival, exchange your Exchange Voucher for JR Pass at any exchange offices throughout Japan.
events.name: 7-Day Japan Rail Pass Including Shipping Fee

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/13441P259/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: MORI Building DIGITAL ART MUSEUM:teamLab Borderless Ticket and Transfer

events.description: Don’t miss the opportunity to stroll around Arashiyama in the style of an apprentice geisha, or “maiko,” as they are called in Kyoto. Get dressed in a traditional kimono, including makeup and hairstyling, for a studio photo shoot. Then walk to Arashiyama sites like Togetsukyo Bridge and the Bamboo Grove—ideal for snapping photos with your friends. An album with four professional photos is provided after the 3-hour experience.
events.name: Kyoto Maiko Walking & Photo Shoot Experience

events.description: Learn the Japanese art of archery with this experience in Tokyo. Put on a traditional uniform and try your hand at kyudo (archery) under the instruction of a guide. Get matched with a bow and arrows for your height and practice shooting at a straw bale. Move on to the shooting range and get advice for improving your technique.
events.name: Kyudo Archery Experience in Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/63670P15/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Sake Brewery & Tasting Tour in Kyoto: Try 22 kinds of Sake made in Kyoto

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/142486P5/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Tokyo Supercars Daikoku PA Driving Experience

events.description: Learn the ancient arts of the ninja during this fun-filled introduction to key ninja techniques, culture and weapons. Get suited up in an authentic ‘ninja gi’ outfit as you begin your mental and physical training with an instructor in the ways of the ninja. Among the skills you’ll learn during your session are meditation and ‘Kuja-kiri’ (well-wishing), the ‘Embu’ (ancestor dedication) and an introduction to ninja weapons like the blowgun and ‘shruiken’ (ninja star), among others. You’ll also gain a newfound appreciation for key ninja philosophies like protecting others, community and freedom and have plenty of time for photo-taking at the end.
events.name: Be a Ninja : Ninja Star, Stealth Steps, Sword, Kuji, Blowgun Hands-on Experience

events.description: Escape the noise and stress of Osaka with this relaxing, 7-hour, private day trip exploring the mountains and hot springs near Kobe. Ride in your private luxury vehicle into this mountain escape, enjoying the views from on top of Mount Rokko, visiting the nearby Kobe Botanical Gardens and soaking your worries away at Arima Onsen hot springs.
events.name: Private Car Day Trip to the Kobe Mountains, Gardens and Hot Springs from Osaka

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/43454P108/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 【HOT DEAL】Mt. Fuji 5th Station, Oshino Hakkai, Lake Kawaguchi & Gotemba Outlet

events.description: Get behind the wheel of a custom-made street go-kart dressed up in your favorite Japanese-inspired character on this tour. After a briefing on how to operate the karts, safely ride around the streets of Osaka with guides on a set course. The tour includes a drive to either the Osaka Castle or Nakanoshima, then through Namba, Nodahanshin Station, and Umeda in center of Osaka.
events.name: Official Street Go-Kart Tour - Osaka Shop

events.description: Get an excellent introduction to the cuisine of Kyoto with this small-group guided tour of the city's best food spots. Start at the deliciously vast 400-year-old Nishiki Market, nicknamed 'Kyoto's Kitchen,' where over 130 food shops and stalls beckon your taste buds. Stroll through the market with the guide, learning about the history of food in the city and taste many dishes unique to Kyoto, including pickled vegetables, fried fish cakes, Japanese pike conger eel, mochi and Japanese omelet. After the market, visit a shrine dedicated to the god of education.
events.name: Kyoto Nishiki Market and Gion Cultural Walking Food Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/116273P4/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: 1-Day Kamakura Private Custom Tour from Tokyo by Chartered Vehicle

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/88437P14/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Kanazawa to Takayama(one way) Including Shirakawago

events.description: Discover Japan beyond Tokyo on this full-day tour to see Mt. Fuji. During the coach journey, admire the natural beauty of Hakone and relax over lunch with views of the highest mountain in Japan, Mt. Fuji. Climb aboard a boat for a scenic tour on Lake Ashi and go for a ride on an aerial tram above Owakudani Valley.
events.name: Mt Fuji and Hakone 1-Day Bus Tour by Bus

events.description: Sample the raucous nightlife and good times found in Asakusa during this 3-hour nighttime food and drink crawl. This historic area may draw hordes of tourists during the day, but after dark it’s a true locals’ hangout, ensuring you an authentic nocturnal adventure. Raise a glass with some of Japan’s famous ‘salary-men’ as you enjoy craft beer, sake, and a variety of Japanese ‘izakaya’ (pub) foods. One included drink per restaurant, plus a local guide and food tasting ensure the party keeps going.
events.name: Asakusa Local Food and Drink bar hopping Tour

events.description: Tour an ancient samurai district with an insider to make sure you don’t miss any of the sights. Get insight into Kanazawa, a town of great cultural achievements rivaling Kyoto and Tokyo. Enjoy a relaxing walk through Omicho Market, and visit the historic Kanazawa Castle. Walk through the serene garden of Kenrokuen. Learn the history of this samurai town from a professional guide.
events.name: Kanazawa Highlights Tour including Kenrouen Garden

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/104599P21/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Jozankei Autumn Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/63670P12/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Kyoto Bar Hopping Night Tour

events.description: Ramen is one of Japan’s most popular dishes—a noodle and broth soup, topped with various meat or vegetable combinations. On this tour, learn how to make ramen from scratch at a local ramen factory, including making the noodles, mixing the soup, and adding the toppings. Finish by enjoying your delicious bowl of home-cooked ramen. The factory is also Halal-certified and vegetarian and vegan options are available on request.
events.name: Ramen Cooking Class at Ramen Factory in Kyoto with Japanese Souvenir

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/43549P48/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Mt.Fuji, from/to Yokohama City&Port, with Private Car, by Guide-Driver, 7hour

events.description: Ultra-modern Tokyo still holds many old-fashioned surprises when you know where to go. On this 3-hour walking tour in the Ningyocho and Nihonbashi districts, your local guide shares hidden gems such as long-established shops that carry traditional musical instruments and incense. Learn about classic Japanese art forms and see vendors with stationery, calligraphy materials, gold-leaf decor and more. You'll also taste some favorite snacks while exploring a lesser-known side of Tokyo, traveling with a small group limited to 12 people for a personalized experience.
events.name: Best of Tokyo: Japanese Traditions, Shopping and Food Tour (Small Group)

events.description: Get ‘big in Japan’ during this insider’s experience at a sumo wrestler morning practice session. Enjoy exclusive access to a sumo stable, watching as these massive athletes put themselves through their daily training regimen and go head-to-head. Who knows: you might even get to witness a future tournament champion. A guide is also included to help you gain access and follow the proceedings.
events.name: Sumo stable Morning Training Watching Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92136P33/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Kamakura Half-day Private Custom Trip from Tokyo with National Licensed Guide

events.description: Whether you’re an anime and gaming fan, or you just want to learn more about this exciting part of Japanese popular culture, this is the tour for you. Get explanations about Japanese culture that you wouldn’t get if exploring the area alone, and experience all the “must do” activities in Akihabara, such as visiting a retro video game store, a maid cafe, a photo booth, and much more.
events.name: Akihabara Anime & Gaming Adventure Tour

events.description: Avoid the tourist traps and get to know the real Sapporo with a local host, handpicked to match your interests. Explore must-visit attractions, as well as off-the-beaten-path spots missed by most visitors and leave with a better understanding of local culture.
events.name: Sapporo: Private Must See Experience with a Host

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/90714P64/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Shakotan's Breathtaking View in Autumn! (Excluding Multilingual Audio System)

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/90714P17/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Highlights of Yamaguchi! Karato Market, Tsunoshima & Motonosumi Inari Shrine

events.description: Immerse yourself in the culture of the samurai warriors during this martial art experience near Tokyo. Taking place close to the Haruhino station, the session allows you to handle real Japanese swords and learn various martial art styles. The experience is suitable for younger ages, too; children under 15 are given practice swords instead.
events.name: Become a Samurai Warrior in Tokyo

events.description: See Kyoto and Nara’s spectacular sights on a full-day sightseeing tour of the cities from Osaka. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, gain fascinating insight into the rich historical heritage of the region’s legendary landmarks. Begin your cultural excursion with a guided tour of the ancient Nijo Castle, and then absorb the aesthetic majesty of both Kyoto Imperial Palace and Kinkaku-ji Temple. Revitalize with a traditional Japanese and western-style buffet lunch then explore nearby Nara, home to majestic monuments like the Great Buddha of Tadoi-ji Temple and Kasuga Shrine.
events.name: Kyoto and Nara 1 Day Trip - Golden Pavilion & Todai-ji Temple from Osaka

events.description: Discover Hokkaido’s stunning lakeside scenery by going on a comprehensive day tour to Lake Shikotsu, Toya, and Mt. Usu. Save time organizing transport by having round-trip transfers from a central meeting point included. Travel with ease between dispersed sites and enjoy the spectacular views along the way. Highlights include Silo View Point, Lake Toya, Lake Hill Farm, a ropeway trip up Mt. Usu, and a delicious lunch at Mt. Usu Village.
events.name: Explore Lake Shikotsu, Toya & Mount Usu

events.description: To explore beyond Osaka, this is the perfect day tour to go on. You’ll travel in a comfortable vehicle to Kyoto, and see multiple highlights such as the Arashiyama district and Sagano Bamboo Forest. Other top sites visited include Kinkaku-ji temple, Nara Park, and Kobe MOSAIC. Take the stress out of planning where to eat, as a Japanese-style halal lunch and bento dinner are included.
events.name: Day Trip by Bus to Kyoto, Nara and Kobe from Osaka (with Halal Lunch and Dinner)

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/152504P1/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: The right way to know Kyoto

events.description: Get a taste for the traditional Japanese arts in Kyoto during this 4-hour, small-group cultural performance complemented by an authentic Japanese-style dinner. Enjoy a diverse range of performances covering Japanese arts including ‘maiko’ dancing, flower arrangement, ‘gagaku’ court music, puppet theater and much more. Finish your experience with an atmospheric tea ceremony, conducted by candlelight, followed by a delicious dinner. This small-group event limited to just 24 guests.
events.name: Gion Night and Zen dinner with Tea ceremony : Culture Performance

events.description: Experience the best of both worlds on this half-day Osaka walking tour, designed to reveal popular attractions and hidden gems. Tick off icons such as Osaka Castle (Osaka-jo) and Tennoji Tower, and explore the Dotonbori district, famed for its Japanese snacks and neon signs. Plus, you’ll explore lesser-known neighborhoods such as Shin-Sekai, Namba, and Tennoji, all full of unique charms. Choose from a morning or afternoon tour.
events.name: PRIVATE Half-Day Osaka 4-Hour Off-The-Beaten Track Walking Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/60559P73/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer : Narita International Airport to Yokohama City

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/7812P44/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Secret Food Tours Tokyo

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/103893P10/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private departure transfer from Tokyo city to Tokyo Haneda Airport(HND)

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/60559P39/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Arrival Transfer : Haneda Airport to Central Tokyo City

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/92136P54/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Tokyo Imperial Palace Highlights Tour with National Licensed Guide

events.name: Explore Mt. Fuji Ice Cave in Aokigahara Forest

events.description: Have an authentic Japanese experience by trying on a traditional Kimono. You won’t have to worry about wearing it the wrong way, as a Kimono fitting is included. There are plenty of different styles to choose from, so you’ll have the flexibility to choose your favorite design. See Tokyo highlights while dressed in a Kimono, and then have a photoshoot at Shibuya crossing. You won’t forget your day as you’ll get a souvenir photo at the end.
events.name: Shibuya Crossing Photoshoot with Kimono Rental

events.description: Get to know the wide variety of sake during your stay in Japan. Visit some of your guide’s favorite breweries in Kobe’s Nada district, Japan’s top sake-producing region. Learn to taste the differences between sake as your sake connoisseur guide introduces you to both traditional and innovative brews.
events.name: Sake Tasting at Local Breweries in Kobe

events.description: Enjoy the perfect sushi-lover’s experience during this visit to the world-famous Tsukiji Fish Market, followed by a sushi-making class led by master instructor and lunch. Get lost in the labyrinth of seafood stalls with your guide at the world’s largest seafood market, then head to your cooking workshop, where you learn to make sushi favorites including rolls and nigiri alongside your class of Tokyo locals. Your combined Tsukiji and sushi-making class also includes subway transport to the market.
events.name: Sushi-lover’s tour :Sushi Making and Explore Tsukiji Fish Market in the morning

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/104654P44/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Private Nijo Castle Sightseeing and Nishiki Food Tour

events.description: Get an intimate look at Tokyo during this bike tour. Discover the city’s hidden paths and top landmarks, cycling beneath the skyscrapers of Shinjuku to a local shrine and exploring neighborhoods like Ginza and Roppongi Hills. Pass landmarks like Meiji Jingu Shrine, Yoyogi Park, and the Imperial Palace before ending at the top of the 48-story Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building. A guide, bike, and helmet are included.
events.name: Small-Group Tokyo Biking Tour

events.description: <div data-content-target="productText" data-alt-content-url="/orion/tours/60559P100/extra-content" data-altjs>
events.name: Yokohama Private Arrival Transfer : Tokyo Hotels to Yokohama Port or Hotels

events.description: See the autumn colors of Kobe during a day trip from Osaka, a hassle-free way to eliminate the stress of advance planning. You'll receive a comprehensive introduction to the city on a sightseeing tour and get the best views of the fall leaves from the Rokko-Arima Ropeway. Included round-trip transport from Osaka, all entrance fees, plus buffet lunch and an evening snack make for a seamless experience.
events.name: Explore Kobe: Autumn Leaves, Cruise, Ropeway & Night View
